Name: Danick Picotin
Comment: worse online shopping experienace. They tell to call 3 day later, then 3 day later they tell to call 3-5 day later.....when this is gonna stop ???.... I asked for a supervisor, they say its not possible to transfer.... okay, they got to call you back within 24hours....no call back was made at all. When I recalled 3 day later, they said they couldnt leave voicemail because my voicemail wasnt setup....wow...funny. I will never shop online again with them and do not recommand.

Name: John Vick
Comment: Rip-off... Blood pressure medicine that was once on the 4 dollar list is suddenly $220... rip-off... And they don't take the GoodRx card... Safeway pharmacy did take the card and cost $22 ðŸ˜Ÿ

Name: robin smith
Comment: online buying is good but there are too many items that aren't from US and you don't know who they are until you click on them.

Name: Kevin V.
Comment: This is purely a Walmart review, not their marketplace nor its' sellers.  I removed 1.5 stars because multiple times I called to speak to a customer service representative who says they are doing something then doesn't. I order A LOT and this is the third time that I called because things never arrived or it was damaged in transport, and out of the 6 separate orders that had issues, only one was resolved. I don't have time to waste and paying someone to not do their job only raises prices. I had to call again last week to follow up on the resolution and I have to call for a third time to follow up AGAIN because it's still not resolved. this is not a matter of me being impatient, it is them not processing the issues properly.  I removed another 1.5 stars because FedEx in my area is constantly damaging products, including my Walmart orders. FedEx will report this and in their tracking details section it will say something along the lines of: 'Damaged. Handling per shipper's instructions.' Well guess what... Walmart's instructions are wait for the customer to contact them about the lost or missing package. They are not proactive in anyway about your order not getting to you.  Both of these issues are customer service based and I would expect more from a company with a market cap of 380 Billion (with a B) .

Name: Unknow
Comment: I bought some pillow at 34 dollars and some change on line and the the same company had them for 15 and some change I call Walmart.com and they said they had to contact seller to see about price adjustment first of all I didnâ€™t buy them from them I bought it from walmart well they reviewed both post and it was the same pillow same size just worded different seller response was. The price it the price it is so I told walmart I was gonna return and purchase for sale price walmart agree well that was another mission I went to three different walmart and there return were close so here I go calling walmart again weâ€™ll a supervisor said sorry for all the problem we will give you a full refund you can keep the item or throw it away so then I waited and waited call again supposely they needed to contact t seller to realize the return and then I call back I was gonna get my refund 5-7 days that pass I call them again and was advised they process today to allow 24-48 hours itâ€™s goin on a month and goin back and forth to a promise they made and they havnt adjust the price or gave me a refund Iâ€™m so over walmart I donâ€™t think Iâ€™m gonna shop here any longer and go off to target Iâ€™ll pay a little more but there customer service is a lot better and at least they donâ€™t lie I will also be contacting ring the better business bureau and well let everyone I can know to stay away from purchasing online due there double pricing and there poor customer services and empty promises

Name: M
Comment: For a big store, worst customer service in existence!!! Worst in store and online customer service. They should figure out how not to be so horrible before someone else takes thier place and monopolizes them. There are better places to shop!

Comment: I bought some pillow at 34 dollars and some change on line and the the same company had them for 15 and some change I call Walmart.com and they said they had to contact seller to see about price adjustment first of all I didnâ€™t buy them from them I bought it from walmart well they reviewed both post and it was the same pillow same size just worded different seller response was. The price it the price it is so I told walmart I was gonna return and purchase for sale price walmart agree well that was another mission I went to three different walmart and there return were close so here I go calling walmart again weâ€™ll a supervisor said sorry for all the problem we will give you a full refund you can keep the item or throw it away so then I waited and waited call again supposely they needed to contact t seller to realize the return and then I call back I was gonna get my refund 5-7 days that pass I call them again and was advised they process today to allow 24-48 hours itâ€™s goin on a month and goin back and forth to a promise they made and they havnt adjust the price or gave me a refund Iâ€™m so over walmart I donâ€™t think Iâ€™m gonna shop here any longer and go off to target Iâ€™ll pay a little more but there customer service is a lot better and at least they donâ€™t lie I will also be contacting ring the better business bureau and well let everyone I can know to stay away from purchasing online due there double pricing and there poor customer services and empty promises

Name: M
Comment: For a big store, worst customer service in existence!!! Worst in store and online customer service. They should figure out how not to be so horrible before someone else takes thier place and monopolizes them. There are better places to shop!

Name: Kevin V.
Comment: This is purely a Walmart review, not their marketplace nor its' sellers.  I removed 1.5 stars because multiple times I called to speak to a customer service representative who says they are doing something then doesn't. I order A LOT and this is the third time that I called because things never arrived or it was damaged in transport, and out of the 6 separate orders that had issues, only one was resolved. I don't have time to waste and paying someone to not do their job only raises prices. I had to call again last week to follow up on the resolution and I have to call for a third time to follow up AGAIN because it's still not resolved. this is not a matter of me being impatient, it is them not processing the issues properly.  I removed another 1.5 stars because FedEx in my area is constantly damaging products, including my Walmart orders. FedEx will report this and in their tracking details section it will say something along the lines of: 'Damaged. Handling per shipper's instructions.' Well guess what... Walmart's instructions are wait for the customer to contact them about the lost or missing package. They are not proactive in anyway about your order not getting to you.  Both of these issues are customer service based and I would expect more from a company with a market cap of 380 Billion (with a B) .

Name: M
Comment: For a big store, worst customer service in existence!!! Worst in store and online customer service. They should figure out how not to be so horrible before someone else takes thier place and monopolizes them. There are better places to shop!

Name: Jacob Thomas
Comment: Very happy with this website. I always find my things here.

Name: John Brand
Comment: I have been a Amazon prime member for a number of years .. Recently I have been shopping on walmart.com And for the most part had been very Satisfied ..On January 23rd, I ordered in RCA computer tablet and on the 26th, received a toy instead ..I called and told the associate about my problem and she said that they would send another one out and I would receive it by that 30th ..I asked her since it was their fault that I did not receive the tablet by the date they promised, if they could expedite it and she said no.. To amazon's credit, in all the years that I have received merchandise from them, I have never received the wrong item .. Plus, I have been able to receive items the next day after ordering from them if i wanted it. If Walmart is going to compete with Amazon, they had better improve their customer service ..Very disappointed !

Name: Margarete
Comment: Online shoppers beware,  Did not receive my goods and company claimed to have delivered it

Name: E.
Comment: Online Shopper Beware! I recently purchased items online. I waited for notification that my items arrived and are available for pickup. I emailed customer service and was informed the items were lost in store. I proceeded to call the store directly and I spoke with the manager. He informed me that Walmart has no way to determine if the online purchases that arrive daily from UPS are accurate. There's no report that tells in store Walmart associates that they should have 10 boxes on Monday, 8 boxes Tuesday, etc. Therefore it's just by chance that you actual receive your online order. Now that I'm aware of this, I'll definitely shop at Amazon as they conduct due diligence and I'm guaranteed the items I order.

Name: Vivian
Comment: I ordered an apple phone from walmart market place which did not work after a month. It took me 6 weeks to find what to do. They just play ping-pong with you. Finally they told me the product is from market place. Never buy anything from Walmart's market place you will be dealing with third party and good luck with that. This is like cheating customer to buy on Walmart.

Name: cade fix
Comment: have no local walmart. so i have to pay a $15.00 toll + gas to get there.i have used walmarts web site to see if an item is in stock.i have learned at best this is a crap shoot.so i call both the walmart in linden nj and in edison nj.so as not to waste time and money.at best both stores customer service is a joke.no matter how many times i call.you never get past the 1st person no one ever answers in any dept.really just disgraceful.customer service on a scale of 1-5 does not register.

Name: Cheryl Sterling Penner
Comment: The tire department was great. They helped me get the oil and filter I needed and were quick ringing me up. I've also had new tires put on there and they did a great job when I came back with a tire light on months later. Aired me up and I was on my way quickly.

Name: Megan Wilson
Comment: I've had good experiences except for having tires put on in bellefontaine ohio. They did not put them on right and one came off while driving! After many runaround I was finally able to at least get a district manager to give me a new rim.

Name: Jennifer Brazzel Hascall
Comment: I orderd a set of 5 3 oz bottle of shower gel for a Christmas gift. I recieved 1. Notified Walmart right away and they said they'd notify the seller who would contact me. Never heard a thing. Contacted Walmart again - same result. Will stick wtih Amazon for good customer serivce from now on.

Name: Brian F.
Comment: Fraternizing with the enemy or scoping out the competition? Either way, I needed a couple groceries for a birthday party later that night and I realized that I had never been to an Amazon Go store before so I wanted to check it out.  To get started download the app which is what you will use to enter the store. You just pick up an item and somehow it knows to add that to your cart. And if you put it back it knows to remove it from your cart. Then you walk out without needing to talk to cashiers or dealing with lines or paying. You just leave!  I was skeptical about how accurate my total bill would come out to be and the employee I talked to told me if there was a discrepancy I could dispute it on the app itself. I got an email not long after containing my receipt and it was accurate.  I really felt like a kid in a candy store in terms of the technology used and how everything worked. I didn't catch if there was any noticeable price difference between this place and normal grocery stores. Most of my time was just figuring out where everything was so it made for a quick shopping trip.

Name: Joyce Schmidt
Comment: Walmart online (walmart.com - NOT Walmart grocery) has a new service...1-2 day delivery with free shipping on items sold by/delivered by WM. At first I thought this would be an excellent new service for some non- perishables and other items being that I pay for grocery delivery (1 1/2 years now.) However, they CONSTANTLY send SEVERAL Door Dash employees to each deliver 1 or 2 items - RIDICULOUS! Then I have to tip each person (and I AM going to tip!) I've placed 4 orders using this new service and 3 times I had 2 people deliver 1-2 items off the order, and one time FOUR different drivers bringing 1-2 items! WM NEEDS TO DO SOMETHING ABOUT THIS CONSIDERING PEOPLE DO TIP FOR DELIVERY! This new service might have free shipping, BUT IT'S COSTING ME MORE IN TIPS THAN I PAY FOR THE ITEMS!

Name: Nick Faraci
Comment: I entered the store and was wiping my hands off with the disinfectant wipes I turned around to throw it in the garbage can at the time I was looking at wipes for sunglasses so I continued into the store and this guy is basically be groping a female worker and you can see she's uncomfortable and he starts saying what are you a f****** thief trying to steal that s*** I said excuse me I'm walking in the store as I was going to steal something when I run out the store and I'm not a thief I work hard for what I have I just got robbed for $15,000 worth of tools. He continued to swear me find me a worker came up and yelled at him and was like what are you doing you cannot speak like that then you were here to make sure nobody pick something and runs out the store. After a little bit of manager came up and said they've had many problems with this guy but still have them fired them and then told me that they were going to call corporate and fire him. I waited never heard nothing who I called corporate to file a complaint animals are three different women approach me and told me that UK made them feel very uncomfortable I never scared to say something I felt so bad for them women having to work under them circumstances. Then the self-checkout machine was all messed up it took me probably an hour and a half just to pay for my stuff I end up missing the Bills game I know it's the first time we could have made it back to the Super Bowl and over 25 years. I had to end up selling my Bitcoin and losing out I'm around $100 probably because it was down at the time just so I could take that and put it on a Walmart card to pay for my order because my big card they said wouldn't work my Google pay they said don't work my unemployment card said it didn't work when I use them still to this day I was trying to explain on their machines myself do you want to let me use another machine I sat there for hours missing the game live alone having to sell my Bitcoin when I was down 10% today and from what I've heard the manager has not fired this guy. I will never return to the store. After getting robbed when somebody says you're a thief and you work so hard for everything you've gotten in life it hurts so bad I literally had to see my therapist and talk to her because I couldn't sleep I was so embarrassed and I'm there all the time and now I drive a half-hour further so I don't have to go to that store and be embarrassed.. on top of losing my Bitcoin money and turn into horrible day and I'm still dealing with this but I'm waiting on a email from corporate to see what they are going to do.

Name: Niteprowl2
Comment: Ordered dressings for a wound that I have had. Sent a bottle of Dakin's Solution but nothing eles in the box, even though packing slip said the dressings were in the box. I contacted Walmart and they said they would investigate. Never got back to me. I checked the credit card I used and they credited back the cost of dressings but never contacted me that they were doing this. I needed those dressings badly and had to order from another vendor. Had to pay extra for rush shipping.

Name: Tracie Bauman
Comment: I ordered a bath pillow from Walmart.com. It was $19.99; the pillow I received was not the brand or pillow and cost $8. I called and they said I needed to contact the company that manufactures it, as they donâ€™t correct any problem with someone elseâ€™s products even though I bought it on their website. I contacted other company by email. I sent them a picture and order# of the pillow I ordered and what was mistakenly sent. They sent the exact wrong one again. I called and explained to customer service, they told me to take it back to nearest store for a credit. When I did, they said no that I needed to contact the other company. I was so mad...they refused to listen. Finally one of the girls said if I would buy a box to ship it back she would start a refund credit. I had the pkg it came in but they insisted I had to buy a box. I am DONE with Walmart. Another associate found a box and shipped it. I am still waiting on my credit. Walmart.com does not stand behind everything it sells...BEWARE!!!

Name: Chuck
Comment: We like to get our prescriptions there and order online for lower prices on some brands. They need more help.

Name: Maureen Bismark
Comment: Driver delivered groceries to wrong address! Worst service ever.

Name: Harry
Comment: Purchased two corner cabinets online from Walmart. We thought we could trust their brand. One cabinet came with a broken leg. Called Walmart every day for six days and was told to WAIT for the third party seller to contact us. They never did. Walmart was terrible about it. We are now stuck with a 283 dollar broken piece of furniture. We will never trust Walmart again.

Name: Erinleigh Davis
Comment: The only good thing I can say is Walmart delivery accepts ebt payment. The cons of Walmart delivery are not knowing if everything ordered is going to be delivered until it's too late to approve a substitute. Absolutely no communication with shopper or deliverer. Trying to figure out if a receipt is the updated one is difficult. I've used the service three times and each one has been confusing from requesting refund for missing/incorrect items to providing a proper tip. I will continue with it for the ebt acceptance but I cannot rely on them if I really need something important. Twice I was left without catfood and once without a furnace filter. Both instances I could have had a replacement instead.

Name: Jourdon Washburn
Comment: I dislike Walmart in general. I have been trying to get a job at this place and the assessment is meant for you to fail. What is it there for if all itâ€™s going to do is fail you. Iâ€™m better off not answering the assessment.

Name: Jeni Kusherman
Comment: Zero stars. I was supposed to pick my groceries up from 5 to 6 it is now 749 and Iâ€™m still in line waiting for my groceries. Go anywhere else until they fix this process. Waxhaw Walmart

Name: Robert Wheeler
Comment: If I could give a negative stars I would. Federal law for long rifle ammunition and shotgun shells is 18 years of age. I canâ€™t go into Walmart and buy shotgun shells but I can serve this country. The dude sat there and said federal law is 21 horse crap. There was even a sign that said 18 on the wall.

Name: Jezreel Chitty
Comment: STOP REQUIRING EVERYONE TO SHOW THEIR ID FOR ALCOHOL. My father who is in his 60s.... couldnâ€™t buy alcohol because my 22 year old roommate forgot her ID. Heâ€™s my FATHER!!!!! Do you ask for a kids ID if their mother wants to buy wine????? I just bought my wedding dress and wanted to celebrate with my DAD and ROOMMATE with a bottle of cheap champagne. On a side note, what the HELL stops someone from going in the store to buy alcohol and leaving their underage friend in the car??? Nothing.... You can read this review and laugh thinking Iâ€™m a bratt, but Iâ€™ll be damned if I donâ€™t write this because frankly Iâ€™m pissed. I had a really exciting day ahead of me and I waited 20 minutes in line for that... for my DAD that travelled 2 1/2 hours to share this day with me and wanted to be sweet and buy me Champagne. Screw you Walmart.

Name: Joyce Reine
Comment: I shop at Walmart on 6000 Bullard Avenue; St# 00912. I Always have a Positive Shopping Experience, Whenever I shop there. However, Last week was ESPECIALLY SPECIAL! I was having difficulty reaching the Ozarka Water, of 16oz 12 Pack. Therefore, I called an Employee, Who was nearby and He came immediately. I asked him his name and he responded, Patrick. I looked at His Badge; Which stated: Walmart Associate.  I Apologized to the Young Man for interrupting his job, But asked if He could reach the Ozarka Water for Me and explained, My Doctor didn't want me straining to reach for items; Stored vat Such Height.  Today, I went back to Walmart to shop and decided to get another 4 Pack of 16oz 12 Pk Ozarka Water and to My Surprise, All of Them were stocked low enough, For My Convenience... How Special was that!!!  I Thank The Young Man for restocking, To assist all and I Thank Walmart for Hiring The Best!!!

Name: Peter Myers
Comment: Had an order that came in. It wasn't even close to what i expected. They did not refund the shipping cost, but even worse, THEY KEPT THE TAX THAT I PAID. Never again will i order from them! Horrible service. No wonder they have such terrible reviews.

Name: Biker1125
Comment: I had items shipped, one can of corned beef was missing. I contacted CS 7 times and they have everything screwed up. They were supposed to send one can. They have charged my account for 8 cans. Walmarts online foreign agents in Packystan, and South Africa are useless. Oh, I am yet to get the one missing can of corned beef.

Name: John Plewa
Comment: Walmart.com canceled my most recent order due to â€œunusual activityâ€ and reported issues to my credit card company who suspended my online access. While on the phone straightening this out, I bought the same item for the same price and quicker delivery with a competitor. Why would anyone bother with Walmart.com?

Name: T H
Comment: This is an advise for those that have walmart.com account. Watch your account. My account was hacked and today (01/30/2022) someone ordered 4 tires early in the morning and the order was delivered same day late in the evening. I notified Walmart customer service first thing in the morning but no action was taken to mitigate the situation

Name: Authorized User
Comment: Love everything about online shopping with Walmart BUT they frequently use FedEx ground. FedEx's performance has been spotty in the past. Now I have had two shipments in last two days that FedEx screwed up. Don't need that kind of stress in my life. I will no longer order from Walmart until they pledge not to use FedEx for shipping.

Name: Peter Myers
Comment: Had an order that came in. It wasn't even close to what i expected. They did not refund the shipping cost, but even worse, THEY KEPT THE TAX THAT I PAID. Never again will i order from them! Horrible service. No wonder they have such terrible reviews.

Comment: Had an order that came in. It wasn't even close to what i expected. They did not refund the shipping cost, but even worse, THEY KEPT THE TAX THAT I PAID. Never again will i order from them! Horrible service. No wonder they have such terrible reviews.

Name: Biker1125
Comment: I had items shipped, one can of corned beef was missing. I contacted CS 7 times and they have everything screwed up. They were supposed to send one can. They have charged my account for 8 cans. Walmarts online foreign agents in Packystan, and South Africa are useless. Oh, I am yet to get the one missing can of corned beef.

Name: John Plewa
Comment: Walmart.com canceled my most recent order due to â€œunusual activityâ€ and reported issues to my credit card company who suspended my online access. While on the phone straightening this out, I bought the same item for the same price and quicker delivery with a competitor. Why would anyone bother with Walmart.com?

Name: T H
Comment: This is an advise for those that have walmart.com account. Watch your account. Name: Bill Warren
Comment: I would have give them a ZERO if it were possible. My wife bought Kroger ranch dressing 5 days ago and the expirations is 15 months ago! I tried to go thru the walmart website to file a complaint but just before the last step it would not go any further! It is a one hour drive from my house to the nearest walmart not to mention the time I have to spend in that Ridiculously slow line. I cannot believe they put a product out that old!!  MY BADD!! I asked my wife twice where she bought the product ands she said Walmart and I said are you sure and she said yes! It turns out Walmart does not sell Kroger products. turns out she bought it at Ralphs ( I called Kroger after I found out) I want top clear this up because I unfairly ( and not knowingly blamed Walmart ) when it was Ralphs all the time on Hwy 79 in Temecula CA

Name: Vickie Hotard
Comment: Shout out to Harley Comardelle. She helped me with issues with another Walmart when I couldn t get through to them on the phone. She is an exceptional employee and graciously and professionallly helped me. I hope Walmart appreciates this wonderful employee for the outstanding job she is doing for them. You rock Harley

Name: Georgeann MONTESANO
Comment: Pretty good and fast delivery. Nothing bad ever happened from us ordered here.

Name: James David Hatfield
Comment: i never thought in my life that i had to ship my tv back to secure my 4 year warranty when it wouldn't turn back on February 11, 2020 and the virus didn't help at all...why did it have to take 5 different sr #'s and 8 months to finally get it to go through??? then i have this big box sent to me that barely fit in my car...then, packaging the tv, i had no idea you were supposed to wet the packing tape to seal the box and with 8 months gone by, i have no idea where the remote or power cord went to... no idea i would ever need to either...

Name: Bonnie Nelson
Comment: Their delivery drivers are dirty, unkempt, and miserable looking.....I have had several items stolen and WalMart has to refund for those things stolen.

Name: Margaret Chapel
Comment: I placed an order for a new lap top computer on 10/6/20. Per shipping info was to expect the package by 10/16/20. We were so pleased to have received it on Monday. I have always received excellent service with both on line and in store with Walmart. And even better, rarely shipping costs.

Name: Jason
Comment: I always new walmart was garbage. They tried to copy Amazon prime day. So I tried to buy a TV. They took the money and then I got an email saying suspicious activity. And now I have to wait 10 days for the money to come back to my account. Pretty good scam.

Name: mike richard
Comment: Online orders from Walmart are a disaster. Good luck trying to return anything. Really difficult. Shop elsewhere. Buyer beware.

Name: Caroline T.
Comment: Decently priced grab and go items, with a free side of entertainment (watching folks 'attempt' to walk out without being charged for something, and seeing people use Amazon Go for the first time).  They do have some staff scattered throughout the store, mostly to restock the inventory (they are consistently restocking/on top of things), answer any questions, or to check ID (for alcohol purchases in their back area.  There's a variety of items in the store from drinks, hot food entrees for lunch, breakfast items, sandwiches and salads, sweets, and even some random items for the kitchen (sauces, spices, etc.).  I love their hot entrees, a perfect lunch solution on the days I don't bring my own. If you don't work in the area, or you're just visiting, once you exit the store there's a little sit in area with microwaves to heat those entrees.  The one downside for me is most of their food items either expire the day of visiting, or the next day, so it doesn't give you much of an option to stock up if you're looking to.  Favorite entree so far as been their sweet potato curry ($8-ish with tax), which is spicy and perfect for a gloomy day.

Name: Humberto Esteves
Comment: I bought this item and received on 09/10/2018. When I started to open the box, I notice that the table was broker. Returned and they received back on 09/17/18. I'd called 4 times with no solution to receive my money back. Last time the person was very rude telling me that they had a problem in the system and I have to sit and wait.

Name: Andrea Grady
Comment: I would give them zero stars for not proving security at the cross walking in to shop. Everytime i go im nearly run over by cars speeding throu. The do not yeild to predestrians at all. Customers spend money in ur store so why not protect ur investiment.

Name: anna farris
Comment: lately I have been shopping less at walmart due in part to the fact that our local super center seems to shifting from a store to a warehouse where the stockers seem to outnumber the shoppers and appear to enjoy blocking aisles and making it harder to find items.Like an ever growing number of shoppers I have been making more purchases from online stores (not walmart) and doing what most retailers do by ordering directly from overseas suppliers at a fraction of the cost.Walmart seems to be trying to play catch up with amazon and others but failing.

Name: Spanishrise
Comment: Shopping for seatbelt extension found them on line, however your description as to the features are disgusting to say the least ! Please se feature number 4 at bottom of page where you describe the ideal use for your product. There is no tack ir respect I n the wording itâ€™s absolutely insulting. To state that it could be used with fat people. WOW Donâ€™t know who writes up your advertising and web pages but they need a lesson on respect. This is fat and body shaming and itâ€™s unacceptable. Just disgusting is about all that this is. Features: 4. Ideal for use with fat people, pregnant women, fire fighters and service men with bulky equipment belts, those with limited mobility and range of motion.

Name: Deborah Sparbanie
Comment: I bought an Applebees gift card on Walmart.com. Walmart never activated the card (it was their responsibility). I spent over 4 hours and spoke to 6 different people at Walmart customer service and the issue is still not resolved. They will not activate the card or issue a refund. They also refused to transfer me to a supervisor. This is the worst customer service

Name: Maria Bonaparte
Comment: They change the pick up address after I paid for my groceries. This is the worst service ever. Wonâ€™t buy from them againðŸ¤¬ðŸ˜¡

Name: Christine Brill
Comment: If I could give Walmart in Escanaba Mi minus stars I would. Where do I start? At the below sub-standard customer service or their blatant disregard for the Covid 19 pandemic? I will not return to that trash store ever again. Next call...the health department.

Name: Tomeka Owens
Comment: There are African Americans in those areas that are mostly white populated. We would like hair products we can pick up off the shelf as well that are good for our hair and not just for mixed races. Selling products from other companies within your company? Give us just a heads up please.

Name: Francisco Robert
Comment: The store is trash. I will never shop here again

Name: Today
Comment: Walmart on Princeton in Orlando Fl. Megan the front end manager is a disgrace to this organization. She arrived to the scene intending not to provide a solution. I'm a regular shopper at Wal-Mart. Megan's attitude and of lack of professionalism made a bad situation worse. Word to the wise, don't stop by this Wal-Mart after being released from the hospital and surgery days before. It's times like these that people like Megan gives Wal-Mart a bad name.

Name: Genevieve W.
Comment: This is such a weird but cool concept. I really didn't know what to expect going in. You literally just activate your app for Amazon Go, pick out what you would like, and then walk out with your purchases. Wow, what sorcery is this. It even recognizes things you put back. Staff was amazing and there are a ton of different food choices!! The prices are not too bad either!

Name: Dennis C.
Comment: Ok wow, this is the coolest concept.  It's almost too much for today's consumption of grocery shopping.  Its a strange concept to walk into a grocery store, grab what you want, then just walk out and not speak to anyone.  I literally downloaded the app outside the store, walked in and bagged up like 15 small items, then headed for the door.  To get a tall can of beer I had to show a guy in the back my ID, but no biggy, I'm only like 45ish.  Love it, going to hit this place every time on my way back home from work.  Only thing I didn't like, very limited selection of foods.  Overall, nothing bad to say, its just ahead of its time I think. People may not be ready for something so advance and game changing yet.  We will see.

Name: Aaron Galindo
Comment: I called in to Walmart today because I have not received my refund for an item I have returned she proceeded to tel me that she can see where the item was scanned in at customer service and return label was printed but not used when I asked to speak to a supervisor she became extremely agitated and said it wasnâ€™t a valid claim because I have no proof that the team was returned even though she said it was scanned in but customer service at the Walmart associate didnâ€™t finish the return so Walmart got its product back and Iâ€™m out $200 dollars I truly hate Walmart and I wonâ€™t buy anything else from them

Name: Richard
Comment: The grocery pickup is a awful to try placing an order. It is so confusing - I go to check out and half of the stuff is shipping and half is for pick-up. I just want to shop grocery pick-up, not everything in the Walmart universe. Please change it back because this new app is ridiculous.

Name: Mark Thomsen
Comment: Bring back the old application.  The new application wonâ€™t scan clearance prices and shows item out of stock when Iâ€™m holding one in my hand.  Iâ€™ve cut back shopping in store browsing for deals and now only get the essentials snd leave.

Name: Rachel Melton
Comment: Your new Walmart app is garbage. You cannot scan anything to find the accurate price. The grocery pickup is a horror to try placing an order. I havenâ€™t placed an order since this update and deleted my app. Please change it back because this new app is ridiculous.

Name: Sky
Comment: The most awful company for online orders and returns. If you ordered from the 3rd party, they make you return items yourself!!!! 1st, you have to go stand in their long lines at "customers service"with one or maybe 2 very, very slow moving clerks. Then they'll tell you that you have to contact the 3rd party customer service and ask for return labels yourself, and after they give the instructions, then you have to go to the post office to send them back!!! What a pathetic and horrible customer service is that? Ordering something online and literally seconds later get notification that they're out of stock. Or not being able to see the full screen of your shopping cart. Have to constantly scroll up and down, to see if you ordered everything you wanted and make sure you didn't order something twice. Always having "delayed" shipping after they already told you it was coming much sooner. There's NO excuse for this giant company to be so incompetent and greedy. I mean you are a multimillion dollar company, get your freaking act together!

Name: Shaina
Comment: Manny was extremely knowledgeable and concerning about my online order issue. It was not delivered on the day it was scheduled and the store said I had to wait on a refund in order to get my food because it was through a third party. Manny apologized and informed me the store gave me false information and it should have been delivered through the store it self which it was but it was delivered to the wrong address. He refunded my delivery fee and my grocery order and re ordered my grocery's for me to pick up tomorrow he was outstanding.

Name: JJ
Comment: Im thinking this whole app update is a joke or some kind of test to see how many customers they can run off...I'm not believing that wmt actually rolled out this update aka disaster as terrible & user unfriendly as it is. I went to the store today & since you can't use apple pay or samsung pay I as usual when at wmt attempted to use the app....a complete disaster..Wal mart changed the app recently & I didn't realize how terrible it was until I simply wanted to switch to a different stored card to make a larger purchase..."neither could anyone in the store who works there" & it no longer tells you which card you're paying with when the payment scanner appears..Wal Mart needs to just let customers pay with the samsung pay or apple pay if they're going to make a mess of their "wal mart pay"..jeez..the customer service number is HORRIBLE...terrible ...just terrible..they dont even deserve 1 star..very frustrating...I walked around in store for 30 minutes after first attempt trying to get the payment method switched & finally gave up..I just left the cart/item at the register..I ordered on Amazon on the way to my vehicle. I also noticed if you place an order that's less than $35 for pickup at a local store WMT charges an additional $5.99 for that why would anyone pay wmt 5.99 just to pick up in store???....they're getting worse and worse, smh.

Name: Caleigh Mcdonald
Comment: I have had to start using Walmart.com because our Walmart in Corsicana Texas is just awful. (Itâ€™s the management not the everyday cashiers and other workers) but anyway.... my experiences have mainly been good some stuff comes late but it happens, weather and what not. Plus the email me so much I can complain if need be. Better than going into that horrible store.

Name: Angela
Comment: 5451867-587242  Where are the ethics of allowing Overstock.com to be allowed as your market place provider. At What point does Walmart take accountability for this? Walmart pointing the finger to their market place. The market place should have ethics and know their faults, and how to correct them. This is poor business.  I had one week, of no one calling me back. In this time, I spoke to chat support, daily, asked for escalation. I've asked for call backs. higher rep, at one point set up a conference call with me, and never called me for the call or even when I waited an hour, I then called in, got escalated. Was never transferred to "Tammy". Was lied to by the escalation Rep, asked to be transferred to manager, was told no, they'll call me back in 24-48 hours. It's a week later and not person has called or treated me with decency. Chat support, customer via email, has stopped replying to my emails and sends me a seperate email of a $25 dollar voucher that I need to speed $45. and mind you this was after I spoke to a higher rep asking them to make this right. When they offered a higher deal, then just blew me off. I need justice on this.  All I keep hearing is someone else pointing the finger, and a small, we can make it right on another dining set, however I'll have to pay way more out of pocket to get the quality that I ordered and was taken away Unjustly. 1) Offer Sale 2) Acceptance of the offer by buyer. check 3) Consideration in the form of payment. Check All those were done and I have screenshots to prove. At this point Walmart or market place needs to take accountability. You do have access to this table set. It's still on your website!!!! Under a different heading with an $800 + price increase.  Badly treated customer

Name: fgf
Comment: Walmart2Walmart. I would never use this service except for the fact that a couple friends don't have bank accounts and this is the only way to get them money. Its unbelievable how difficult they have made it! Even when presenting your state issued drivers license they require a physical address. The address on my ID is a PO Box. Why they have a huge issue with this is unknown not to mention ridiculous! I don't see what an address has to do with sending/receiving money with a proper ID. Too difficult to deal with & not worth the trouble. Will never use again, anyway its basically obsolete having Zelle!!

Name: Helen Panteleontidou
Comment: Worst experience I have ever had with online shopping. I will NEVER EVER order anything from them. Cheap prices cheap stuff cheap service. There is a reason they have such a bad reputation

Name: Alba Lopez
Comment: Hello, for 10 years I send money and receive money for moneygram at walmart with the ID of my country .no of USA ... on 2 occasions a young man named thomas attended me the first time I sent and when he asked me for the ID he told me why not You have a USA ID and I said why not !!!! Today I went to complain and he told me the same thing went to the manager and told me if he could and he attended me. This is in Stafford Va

Name: Anne
Comment: I have sworn in the past I would never darken WM doors, but had to have clothes quickly, so once again I shopped there. Now they wonâ€™t let me return the clothes that didnâ€™t fit because â€œof COVIDâ€. I should have gone to Kohlâ€™s, same town, same COVID and can return clothes. Once again WM has screwed me! DONE

Name: Ronda Delbosque
Comment: If I could do less then 1 star I would. I ordered the 50 service for bike assembly and they canceled and rescheduled 4 times before they canceled finally for good the 5th time . Why offer a service u clearly don't plan on preforming. Worst experience ever..so unprofessional

Name: F G
Comment: Online grocery was supposed to be delivered in the morning by 11:00. Its passed 6:00 PM and their site site still shows that they are preparing the order!!! Have been on the phone and their chat line but it seems like nobody in India cares about Canadian customers. Never ever again I will use Walmart. BTW, it is not the first time dealing with issues like that with them. Avoid.

Name: Joseph Frades iii
Comment: Shopping NIGHTMARE! FIRST, to park. Understandably, handicap parking should be up front, as well as a space for local law enforcement and decorated Veterans. YET Walmart has now elected to add to the up front parking spaces, pick up for orders to go. Okay, I get it, have to transport the orders out by cart to the online customer. BUT/YET, those IN STORE personal shoppers are the most RUDE persons I have encounter. They will NOT move so you can shop, have attitude. Perhaps what they may not realize,.... I believe in time Walmart will go completely AI (artificial intelligence). Just like the robots that provide for inventory and cleaning, they too can select and item, put it in a cart AND transport it out to an online buyer. SO, for all those rude personal shoppers,... your days are numbered. Walmart will go high tech, eliminate you, and Walmart's will be an giant artificial online shop and pick up location if not already ordering online to be delivered. Walmart will survive and make even higher prices. For me, I will move my shopping to Albertsons, Smiths, Vons and pay the higher price, for the HIGHER STANDARD they offer the consumer. End of share.

Name: Rebecca Ann
Comment: Terrible experience with Walmart.com. If you have any problems with your order just chalk it up as lost money and forget about it. I know Amazon has not been up to standard but so much better than walmart.com

Name: Kayla C
Comment: I updated my payment method to use my walmart credit card. After submitting my order, I noticed it took the payment from my debit card! I called right away to see if they can just update my payment method (since Amazon can do this, I thought walmart could too) they told me I had to cancel order and send individual messages to the items that are a private seller to see if they will cancel! So now I have to wait and see if they will even cancel it. And in the meantime I have a large sum of money that I'm waiting to get back into my checking account. What a nightmare. I should have just stuck with Amazon like I usually do. I will never order from walmart.com again.

Name: Elle
Comment: Ordering groceries is an absolute nightmare. I used to be able to just check my regular items off my list and be on my way, but now there are seemingly hidden delivery fees even though I paid for a membership to not have these fees, and thereâ€™s no easy way to differentiate between the items that will ultimately tack on the fee. Also, why are my orders being separated into shipping and delivery? I have kids to feed and this has made my life astronomically more difficult. I will no longer be using Walmart+. I have to use Instacart which is so much more expensive but at least theyâ€™re upfront and keep their word on waiving delivery fees for members.

Name: Jason
Comment: Terrible update, horrendous online customer service, and super UNRELIABLE. Theyâ€™ll draw the money out of your account before the order is even delivered, and then when they screw up and leave me hanging for days for an â€œexpress deliveryâ€ that never showed, now thereâ€™s a hold on my $250 I needed for food this l week. So big thanks to Walmart for almost making me miss rent and making me live off ramen noodles for a week. Iâ€™m done with this company Iâ€™ll never spend another dime in one and Iâ€™ll never make the mistake to trust delivery form them ever again.

Name: Judah Kessler
Comment: I ordered 2 identical items on Walmart.com & when received they were the wrong size. I could tell by the packaging alone. So, UN-OPENED, I placed the 2 boxed items into the shipping box & began the "return process" online. The page wouldn't allow me to process one return, I had to process each item separately and print TWO separate return labels. But BOTH items were shipped to me in only one box. I contacted customer service via "chat". The fellow obviously had no working understanding of English & promptly cancelled the pick-ups for both items. He told me I'd receive one shipping label via email. Ah, what, in fact, he did was he cancelled the pick-up & made it so that I HAD to go to a store! The closest being about 45 miles away! I contacted customer service again, via "chat", and again, though I clearly stated my situation, this fellow repeatedly asked "You want a refund. Right?" paying no attention to anything else I explained. I asked to "chat" with a supervisor, the reply was "It'll take me a minute to get a supervisor." Fine. The NEXT response was a message telling me that it appeared I'd "left the chat" and was "disconnected"! OK, I telephoned and, yes, again, English was completely alien to the person on the other end. "I see you cancelled the pick-up...", "I see you cancelled the return..." "OK. No problem, you can return both items to the store." When I said that I couldn't get to the store and that's why I'd ordered online in the first place I was told "There's nothing I can do about that." Well, now I see that ALL correspondence concerning my order has disappeared from records and I'm unable to to even TRY to return these items. We're talking 60$ that I'm out now and from what I see, I can't expect a refund OR a return at a store that "doesn't do online returns". Nothing short of a scam here, a ploy. Walmart has the money, I have useless merchandise. I should have remembered my previous review which also indicated intent to defraud. Well, fool me twice but never thrice.

Name: Keschel Sherman
Comment: Placed a order over 2 weeks ago. Received all but one item. Had (3) different delivery dates but still didn't receive my item. Not happy at all with this experience. Been checking my mail EVERYDAY for the past 2 weeks. Mighty funny all my other items arrived except 1. Kinda of strange to me. I could have ordered the item elsewhere. Wal- Mart was a waste of my time. I was being patient. Now I'm pissed off. Thanks for the inconvenience Wal- Mart

Name: Karen
Comment: Walmart needs to improve the quality of it's produce. If I am paying for delivery, I don't expect to receive moldy or poor quality produce. They now expect me to drive to the store to return these items when I'm paying for delivery. Really ridiculous. Also, their policy as far as cancelling time sensitive items that don't arrive on time is absurd. I understand that items may be delayed every now and again, but for it to happen 2-3 times in a row is just insane. I've wasted a lot of time with clueless customer service associates and frankly I'm frustrated. My time is valuable and I shouldn't have to jump through hoops for paid services and quality produce. I should also add that their new web interface isn't just user UNFRIENDLY, it doesn't work on several browsers. I've been a Walmart customer for a very long time and have literally spent thousands of dollars there. It's time to look elsewhere.

I tried to apply for a refund/exchange by calling walmart.com customer service and initially got an approval for that with the instructions how to apply for a refund online and return tires in a local store. However, the walmart online service did not allow me to file return due to expiring 90 day policy. In store, they also refused to accept tires. I called walmart.com customer service 3 more times but they refused to accept wrong size tires. It looks like walmart does not respect their loyal customers, refusing to fix own faults, giving faulty recommendations to buy wrong goods. I was also surprised that all customer service representatives were not consistent of how the good can be returned giving faulty and confusing instructions. I had to waste $160, 5 hours of my time, 1 gallon of car gas, 40 min of my cellular call balance to understand that walmart would not fix its fault and let down. Unfortunately, at this time I had a bad experience having business with walmart and did not expect that walmart ignores patriotic customers. Alas!

For a few dollars more you could have picked them up at a brick and mortar store. Walmart.com and their affiliates suck. I won't be ordering from them anymore.

Name: Greg Dorn
Comment: I order online for the convenience of not having to drive to the store since most days I work very late and would have to leave early. So now the newest fee scam is by Wal-Mart itself. Place and order which in itself can be nightmare on Walmart.com. Trying to select items to be shipped can be a challenge. But a little perseverance this task can be done. So I place in cart, remove, place in cart remove since many items are out of stock for delivery. So this little scenario goes on for 15 to 20 min to order 6 items or something to substitute the out of stock items, which you will not find out till you go to cart to check out. So, I finally get done and found the 6 items I would like delivered and check out. All these orders go to my business during the week, since I'm there 18hrs a day. But Wal-Mart, the local warehouse, and their oh so intelligent people decide to change one, 4 dollar item, to local delivery through DoorDash on a Sunday. I get a call that they are on their way to deliver one, 4 dollar item, instead of shipping with the rest. Apparently they change your shipping/delivery options at their will once you complete your checkout and they have your address. OK, now I'm pissed I have to drive 20min to go to work on a Sunday. I just left at 0230, now 1100, and thought I could have some time off, but no! On top of the inconvenience of driving to work, they now have charged me $8.59 for a below minimum delivery fee, 7.99+ fees and taxes. WOW, unbelievable how ignorant this is on their part. I could have driven to walmart for 25cent worth of fuel, but who shops in store for 1 four dollar item if you don't need to go? Unreal!

Name: Janet Carter

They accused me of lying because the picture showed the apartment number but I look out my door and there's no groceries. Of course you can't prove it to them so they think the worst. Like I tell them I'd rather have my groceries than a refund. I got a refund for the orders I didn't receive but now I'm banned from making online orders even if I'm picking them up I cannot order ever again. I'm sure many of you have faced the same issues but be warned they will cancel you from placing another online order if your order gets lost and they refund you. It's ridiculous how they treat their customers when it's they're fault for the terrible system update. I'll never shop with them again on to another store.
