Name: David D Irby
Comment: Walmart.com is infamous for saying an item is in stock then telling you it isn't after you place an order. It is also infamous for its very poor shipping practices.  I ordered several items which the site said would arrive before Christmas. It's 12/28, and the items have yet to arrive. One of the items I ordered I had to cancel because it wouldn't be back in stock any time soon, and it was supposed to be a Christmas gift.  Past orders have often arrived damaged or clearly broken.  I will not order online from Walmart again.

Name: Angela Eaton
Comment: I purchased an item online through Walmart from a second hand provider, for my son that was $130. There had been a label made for shipping. And was to be delivered by the 14th of December. On the 14th I got a hold of Walmart who got a hold of the company that provides the item to Walmart. The secondary company responded stating it was damaged before sending and would I like a refund. Since then Walmart has informed me that they themselves (Walmart) cannot give me a refund. That the provider of the item has to give me a refund. Even though I bought the item from Walmart.ca. When I buy an item whether it be at the Walmart store or on walmart.ca I would expect a refund from them not from their provider of items. I understand Walmart gets items from many different companies but it is Walmart who is selling the item to me not a secondary company. Walmart does not provide the refund that I would expect. They're waiting on the other company who for some reason is not responding to Walmart or me. Be wary of purchasing items that are not from Walmart themselves.

Name: Charlie Vo
Comment: I ordered item way back from August till now nothing delivered, I kept calling back,and waiting, wasting time and they didn't give me specific details what gonna be, Terrible system , can't cancel either.

Name: Jenn Wester
Comment: Online order worthless, customer

Name: Brad DeLong
Comment: The order was"shipped" on December 10th but there is still no information on the 28th. Calling Walmart.com they say they can send an email. Using the tracking link does it was never delivered to the post office. The best they will do is refund the money, sort of.  They do not guarantee anything. They add on their mark up and want to have you track down your own package from the 3rd party. They had the information that the packages were late and did nothing until I contacted them. Use Amazon instead.

Name: *Well Advised*
Comment: I placed a $119.00 grocery online order and I clicked to try the 15 day FREE trial of delivery for $98.00/year or $12.00+/month... I go to take care of another matter and my card was declined!!!! Walmart took out the $98.00!!! Right then and there!!! Then, I had to wait over 20 minutes to â€œget approval to refund the $98.00! It takes 3-5 business days to get that money back in my account, meanwhile, Walmart wiped out my bank account by just taking my money!!! I canceled my $119.00 order, of course and have to wait 3-5 business days for that, too! Before COVID-19, I ordered and had many items delivered for FREE from Walmart! I canâ€™t always carry groceries, so I have heavier items delivered; FOR YEARS!!! Now, COVID-19, is a get rich quick scheme for many people and companies. Horrible! Still, what is worse, is, it is not empathetically clear, that if you want to try the unlimited delivery for Free; Walmart is going to charge you for a years membership, immediately!!!!! Amazon doesnâ€™t do this, nor does other grocery/merchandise stores. No one has to be victimized by Walmartâ€™s sneaky scheme to rip off customers. It was convenient to order from Walmart, it was 10 minutes by car from me... now, I will go anywhere and everywhere else, except Walmart. I had to cancel a Veterinarian appointment because Walmart wiped out my bank account w/o having CLEAR CONSENT to remove $98.00 immediately from my account! Buyers Beware!!!!

Name: Becky Ben
Comment: If I could give negative stars I would. I will never order online again. They shipped my daughters Christmas present not in a box put the packing label right on it and it was left in the snow on our porch. Customer service was no help at all and offered me a $25 giftcard as compensation even though that doesn't even cover the cost of the toy. They told me I could also go online and reorder it when it's back in stock which who knows when that would be then call back and they could credit my card. Who wants to jump through all those hoops when this wasnt even my fault in the 1st place!!!!! Terrible customer service. When I told them that doesnt work because I would have to rebuy and be out more money she said I could call the billing department tomorrow and see what they can do. Again, now I'm the one sitting on the phone and doing all this when your company delivered me a toy that is now soggy and damaged!!!!!!!

Name: Lesa Johnson
Comment: I ordered a iPhone xr over a week ago, still haven't got it, I talk to walmart.com it was support to come through fedex but fedex never received my package now they saying I got to wait another 48 hours before I can make a claim and they can do something about it, I have never had this much trouble with an order in my life and I don't think I will ever order anything online again from them at this point.

Name: Tom
Comment: Went to the Davenport Iowa store to shop. Went to checkout and there was 1 full service checker available. We waited in line for 20 minutes to get checked out. A gal that was restocking the gum was very rude when we made a comment about this. She said help was hard to get. True, but maybe she could have stopped restocking him and ran a cash register. Also there were numerous employees doing the personal shopping. Iâ€™ve been against Walmart for awhile with their crappy service, but you finally convinced my wife. Kiss us goodbye Walmart. We wonâ€™t becoming back.

Name: bklyn style
Comment: YOU RAISE PRICES LIKE A HUNGRY GOUGE DOG , SHAME ON YOU

Name: Jami M
Comment: I was paying $12.99 for Walmart + and I found something I wanted to get my grandson with a huge discount online. When I got to the store and found the item and was checking out it came up full price. I summoned the manager and told her about it and she declined to give me the discounted price. I was very upset and didn't get the item. So online and when I scanned it at the store with my app it was discounted but the manager refused to honor that price. Seems to happen alot with the new updated walmart app which I don't like.

Name: Damien Hartley
Comment: Walmart is amazing! I prefer and recommend Walmart over any other store. It's not that I have never had issues but Walmart makes up for it via there generous prices and friendly customer service.

Name: Lisa
Comment: I will start calling you Sears,,, Toys r us .. Kodak ,,, Smith Carona Youâ€™re going down Horrible service. Do not order from them They donâ€™t care They canâ€™t get it right Their vendors donâ€™t care  You will never be Amazon ,, EVER Iâ€™m going to just start calling you Sears or Kodak or Smith Carona. 1) ordered tv from Walmart.com Took days to hear I will get it in a week 2) got email saying â€œ must be home for signature for Delivery on 12/28 1-5 I waited 12/29 too giving you benefit of the doubt. 3) never arrived. No communication 4) I called delivery service EFW 5) Elizabeth laughed and said â€œ oh those are automated emails they donâ€™t mean anythingâ€ 6) I asked to speak to a supervisor , she put me on hold for 10 minutes 7) I called back and spoke to â€œ Jessicaâ€ The supervisor - she answered in a voice like she just crawled out of bed, â€œ helllllooo??â€ 8) I said, â€œ is this E FW? Her reply â€œ yesâ€ I respond, oh it doesnâ€™t seem like a professional way to answer a call , she responds. I didnâ€™t expect a customer to be on the phone 9) I explain to her I just wasted 2 days of my life waiting for this delivery. She said , I will get them to deliver it another time - 10) what ?? That is your response after me and my son waited for 2 days in the house over the holidays for a delivery that was promised for a 4 hour time frame in 12/28.

Name: Carole Bonhotel Cronan
Comment: Photo Center S*cks.... I ordered an 11 x 14 photo with frame on Dec 14, 2019. Was supposed to be delivered Dec 20 Customer service representative at customer service cancelled the order cause "didn't take". Please reorder. Wouldn't give me a supervisor. I stupidly reordered. Didn't take again. Next morning called again. this time got a supervisor and got gift cards and apologies and i stupidly again reordered. Dec 21, be here by dec 27th..... nothing happened till the 28th when it supposedly shipped... Today the 29th still nothing showed up. I called and asked what the hell was going on. they refunded my money... LOST IN TRANSIT..... FURY UNLEASH.... took my money back... went to snapfish. ordered picture from them picked up picture from them at 2pm . it was ready on time and now picture is hanging in my hallway. Never going to use photo center again. Walmart S*CKS

Name: Abby Cyr
Comment: I ordered a candle before Christmas and it finally got sent to the store for pick up today. Well I go pick it up (30min) from my house and I open the box and it is all smashed up broken glass everywhere to the point all the little pieces cut my hand!!! I reached out to Walmart and all they did was say sorry oh we will place a new one! No rushed shipping and could not even be sent to my house now I have to wait another week to get it and have to go out of my way to pick this up! The two people I talked too could care less just wanted me to stop talking and go! Never again will I order from here

Name: JoAnn Buck
Comment: They sent one of my Christmas gifts to a store I don't even go to(Suppose to be delieved to my house). Showed pictures of items but, did electronical delivery. Acted like I was the problem when I reached out to the for assitance. No empathy, No making things right. They just mess everything up and expect you to fix it. No compensation, nothing.

Name: Jamie
Comment: Walmarts return policy has gotten ridiculous! I bought my son an expensive game from there and tried to return it a couple days later cause he couldn't play it cause u needed WiFi for the game and they wouldn't let me return it they said cause it was open...all the stuff I've seen returned that was OPEN this was a joke!

Name: M
Comment: I went to your store located in dalton,GA & I did not feel very welcomed by an employee named Carol. They gave me attitude for just asking a question & continued on to talk about me to another employee. I do not appreciate this behavior & expected more.

Name: Ki
Comment: If I could give it 0 stars I would. I made 4 purchases and none of them were delivered or ready for pickup on time. My grandsonâ€™s bike had a peeling seat and filthy handlebars, needless to say that was a trip to return it(pointless to have it delivered). One item never made it to me, but the claim they had a signature. After investigation no signature. Pairing with Fed Ex was another horrible mistake. The deliveries are left outside without so much as a knock on the door. The service just sucks period. I will stick with Amazon

Name: AMW
Comment: For the third time in 11 months I have observed the security guard(s) at the Perkins Road location in Stillwater, Oklahoma harass their customers. In each of these encounters, I have witnessed textbook examples of a proud and glib individual (i.e. Wal-Mart security) wield the thinnest of power and influence over normal, every day â€˜â€™Joes.â€™â€™ Or, stated another way, the security team at the Stillwater, Oklahoma Wal-Mart should be embarrassed, ashamed, and apologetic of their behavior. Or yet another way to put it is that a very small, insecure, pathetic twentysomething male got his rocks off by outright bothering people whoâ€”guessing by the of their car-full of itemsâ€”had just spent about two hundred bucks at the Stillwater Wal-Mart.  Itâ€™s weird, 25 years agoâ€”when I worked in the frozen food section at this very same locationâ€”I felt sorry for the storeâ€™s security guards because they had to thanklessly toil through their days as they tried to stop tricky, shifty shoplifters from stealing. Over the years itâ€™s been obvious to me that Wal-Mart security guards are less respectful and, more importantly, less impactful. Seriously, Wal-Mart should reassess the fiscal value their security teams bring to any respective store. Iâ€™m quite sure that, on occasion, a random theft has been thwarted and eve brought to justice. However, my recent experiences leave me no choice but to write this and to implore any one that might care to, please, please, reconsider your shopping at the Stillwater, Oklahoma Wal-Marts.  To be more specific, the first instance of harassment that I saw occurred about 11 months ago. A close friend of mine purchased an item in electronics at about 1:00 am. When we walked to the storeâ€™s main entrance/exit three people stopped my friend because he didnâ€™t have a receipt. The reason he didnâ€™t have a receipt is that the original sales associate in electronics had not provided my friend with a receipt. To make matters worse, after my friendâ€™s purchase the sales associate from electronics had gone on his lunch break so he couldnâ€™t vouch for us either. My friend was quite polite the entire time, despite me telling him we should go. After all, he HAD paid so the item was his. At that juncture, Wal-Mart had no business nor did they have a right to ask for a receipt. The item belonged to him. Is Wal-Mart also allowed to ask for receipts for the clothes in your back or for the things in your pockets? I was irate but my friend patiently endured the 40-minute detainment until the matter could be cleared. The second time I witnessed problems with Wal-Mart security was back in August 2019. I was in the self-checkout lines and, again, three different guards and/or managers had accused a customer of stealing. The customer, a sandy-haired blonde woman in her 20s, had made multiple purchases at the self checkout counter. Apparently Wal-Martâ€™s staff had no interest in ensuring whether or not a crime had been committed before theyâ€™d accused the woman of a crime. The lady kept saying, â€˜â€™I bought it. I paid. Iâ€™ve paid for everything.â€™â€™ But, nonetheless, the intrusive and invasive Wal-Mart employees dug through the womanâ€™s bags. They removed all her items and counted them as they referenced her receipts along the way. After about seven or eight minutes one of the managers muttered a half-hearted â€˜â€™sorry for the inconvenience, maâ€™am,â€™â€™ and then beckoned her to leave.  Finally, just yesterday I saw a security guard harassing three or four junior high girls (they were loosely chaperoned by one of the girlsâ€™ parents). The girls were in tears and clearly had done nothing wrong because, after all, if they had done something wrong then the local police would have been on their way. The Wal-Mart security guard said heâ€™d followed the girls around and that they had carried some item around the store and, GASP, had put the item back on a rack? When I walked by this particular conversation by the exit doors, it was obvious that the guard had nothing â€˜â€™onâ€™â€™ these young women. Otherwise the conversation wouldn't even be happening. If he had evidence against them then SPD would be on the way. Instead, the ridiculous (small) man stopped these teenagers just to beat his chest and try to make the girls feel scared and small. One girl just kept crying ''I just came for starbursts.'' It was disgusting. Anyone with an IQ over 75 would have recognize the manâ€™s wrong doing. Anyone with a bit of sympathy and empathy would have recognized the man just wanted to feel big for three minutes. He should be ashamed and fired. The event occurred about 11:30 pm on Saturday, December 28th. At the end of the interrogation the so-called â€˜â€™security guardâ€™â€™ just said, ''Okay. If I hear you did something this lady [pointing at the mother] shops here all the time.'' The ladies shuffled away and I told him he was â€˜â€™a piece of sh**â€™â€™ then he replied that I should move along or heâ€™d call the police. I told him what he did was wrong and that I was going to formally complain to corporate. His response was to call the local police on meâ€”or at least to pretend he was. I walked away assuring him of my intention to file a grievance against him. I do hope Wal-Mart recognizes that the security guard at their Stillwater, Oklahoma location gives the company a bad name. He makes them weak. He frightens, intimidates, and humiliates paying customers. Um, in what business model is this a viable behavior? On what planet is this a legitimate practice? Grow up dude. Do better Wal-Mart. In the meantime, I do hope those in Stillwater will reconsider spending their money at such an unstable, unsafe establishment.

Name: Monica
Comment: Very poor costumer service! They delayed my order three times and didn't even have the courtesy to advise me of the delays. Then I call to see where my order is and the guy simply says, "oh yeah it's late. Sorry". Never again will I order from walmart.com and I advise against anyone doing so.

Name: Tehmina Khan
Comment: Walmart online shopping is the worst and I recommend that never ever use it. I ordered some beauty products online on Nov4 and now itâ€™s end of December I didnâ€™t receive my stuff. I called them 5 times. Every time I was told that higher management will resolve the issue within a week and now this is two months. At one point I was told to directly call the seller. Since I ordered from Walmart itâ€™s not my job to contact the seller. I am seriously thinking about contacting my lawyer. They are not even giving me my money. I am frustrated and very upset. Walmart sucks especially their online shopping service .

Name: dawn fradera
Comment: If there was a zero star Iâ€™d give it a zero. They are trying to knock Amazon out the box. Not going to happen. I am canceling my service with them and their delivery arrive that that canâ€™t get right. Wish Amazon had a wholesale close to me. Lebanon pa Walmart has a bunch of kids working with no supervision and mess orders up all the time. Next day delivery my ass. Donâ€™t believe them. They deliver to you next day while your free trial is going on but just like cell phone service they offer you all the best as a new customer and screw you after because you are in a year subscription. Donâ€™t do it

Name: Lynn Bryant
Comment: Walmart needs to have a contact point for how well it is doing on Covid 19. I went to your Walmart in Lake Jackson, Texas Dec. 28, 2020 between 8:00 and 9:00 am. I planned to purchase 2 lbs of Deli ham. The staff that came up to help me had her mask hanging on her chin. I told her she could not help me. I went to the service desk and told them I want a person wearing a mask to help. The Lead over the area did meet me at the deli. She was wearing a mask. I asked her if it was protocol for the staff to wear their mask correctly. She said it was. I pointed out that the other staff was still not wearing her mask correctly. the lead said she had talked to the staff. The staff person was standing by the slicing machine moving her mask up and down with her hands to pantomime her mask would not stay up. The lead person said she was going to get the staff another mask. At that point I left. I have worn a mask since March, and have always been able to keep it up. Walmart apparently does not have appropriate mask readily available to its staff, and not trained their staff in pandemic hygiene. That a person would be allowed to wear a mask incorrectly, and display to a customer moving it up and down with the same hands that will get your order ready is not acceptable. I understand you cannot be responsible for all your customers, but you are responsible for your staff. I intend to spread this experience as far, and as often as possible.

Name: Eric
Comment: Terrible customer service - if you ever have an issue with an order, they will NOT resolve it for you. Ordered an item for pre-order 4 months ago, they delayed my shipment and are now selling it in stores. The expected shipment date remains 1.5 months ago (Nov 2020 vs Jan 2021) and is not updated remains "in process". Item is mostly sold out in retail already now with a few stores still in stock. Walmart can't even have a store ship the in stock item to fulfill my order because it's "different fulfillment centers".  Never shop here if you can shop at Amazon instead, Amazon always takes care of its customers. That is far from true for Walmart. Never again.

Name: Neil Allen
Comment: Ordered photo paper 30 days ago and haven't received it. Contacted WalMart help and they replied with a generic excuse. Won't refund amount I paid so have to contact credit card company. Will never order from WalMart.com again!

Name: Elizabeth Holden
Comment: Stop using FedEx to send packages. Every time I order they deliver a week later than they are supposed to and their tracking is a joke. I actually paid more for something just to order it from somewhere else because you ship everything with FedEx and I canâ€™t run a business never sure when my stuff will show up! Get it together!

Name: Jessica Colella
Comment: Ordered 4 bluetooth dongles for PS4 for my whole family for Christmas on November 18. Received items November 23. Opened on December 25 & tried them out December 28. They did not work with any of the 3 brands earbuds used. Return policy for Christmas was 90 days, so contacted them for return. Will not take return or give refund because was not actually Walmart selling item but one of their third party vendors. Was not aware was 3rd party or never would have purchased. TOTAL SCAM. Walmart should use same policy for 3rd party & should make it clear you are ordering from one of those scammers to avoid this issue. Bad business Walmart... But you got your money, so why care.

Name: Lisa Stammer
Comment: Has any and everything, fast shipping, great updates on orders and easy website.

Name: Bill Haney
Comment: Ordered a puzzle from Walmart, was defective had to return it . Now if I order it again I have to pay shipping. this seems like a total ripoff it was their fault, and I wind up paying more for it. original order was for more items so it was with free shipping . Chatted with a person from Walmart and they could not do anything about it.

Name: Gary Brown
Comment: I bought a pair of eyeglasses from your optical department you guys are the biggest thieves I think I've known in the times that I bought glasses which is most of my life you guys take the cake for rip off you ruined one of my lenses and had to replace it when you replaced it you replaced it with inferior crap I can see why you have such bad reviews your service is terrible and you could care less about your reviews I can see that because you probably won't let me submit this one LOL

Name: Justin
Comment: Small items work well. If you are in the market for a larger item so not buy from Walmart. I purchased a TV for Christmas on Black Friday which was supposed to deliver by Dec 10th. After 8 calls with customer services and 4 more with the delivery company I was promised it would be there before the 25th. Well itâ€™s not the 28th and they lost the order. They did order a replacement and itâ€™s another month out. Worst experience I have ever had buying an item. More than 12 hrs on the phone trying to resolve for kids Christmas.

Name: Mike Giuliano
Comment: My first large purchase to Walmart, and my last. I bought some Bose 35 Headphones from them, and ON THE AD on line, it clearly states "30 day money back guarantee." There are no exceptions listed of any kind. Then once the product was MAILED, it get a notice explaining me that this was a third party seller (which was listed on the original ad), but that this seller's return policy is 14 days PLUS a restocking fee. There is NO WAY to know that until you actually have your order shipped, and then it is too late. Wow, just wow. Why would you put "30 day money back guarantee" right under the product if it wasn't true. Serves me right for leaving the class of on line ordering- Amazon. I will never give another cent to walmart.com.

Name: Jennifer
Comment: Great choices, Great prices but Horrible customer service until you've waited so long you want to explode they contact you. And guess what? Sorry Walmart your little $10 gift card DOESN'T WORK OR EVEN COME CLOSE TO MAKING UP FOR THE UNPROFESSIONAL BUSINESS Y'ALL ARE DOING AND THE 3RD.PARTY DISTRIBUTORS Y'ALL HIRE REALLY NEED TO BE BETTER LOOKED AT BEFORE YOU USE THEM. GOD BLESS JENNIFER

Name: billy green
Comment: very good product,shipping fast,and with a small giveaway.thanks

Name: Jennifer Rabon
Comment: Customer service is just lowsy. The cashiers are disengaged... the floor clerks are not helpful and just rude... the management has excuses for everything and are defensive and unwilling to solve an issue, but instead want to argue with the customer. It's not worth the savings you see. I'd rather spend a little more and get the customer service I deserve by patronizing your store.

Name: Natalie Welch
Comment: I absolutely think that walmart should completely redo their hiring standards

Name: Klaus Shitzspritzer
Comment: Horrible experience all together. I have tried various Walmarts in different areas. I had a terrible time with the photo department, I ended up getting the store manager to retrieve my photos after about 30 minutes, another store was trashed filthy and smelly. There are lots of videos on Youtube of people playing fart pranks in the store and being obscene over the paging system. The Waltons keep a very low profile, I can see why.

Name: Ben Mennegar
Comment: Wal mart has gone to total trash! Close early, no returns or exchanges without a receipt. They wont get another dime of my money. Target is much better

Name: KK
Comment: Never again will I order from Walmart.com! I ordered a tricycle as a surprise for my granddaughterâ€™s birthday. My first order was cancelled by Walmart stating that the fraud department found unusual activity on the order! Are you serious? I contacted, through live chat, a representative who told me to reorder the item after an hour of my call to them but within 24 hours using the same device I used for my original order. I didnâ€™t do that. Instead, my husband placed the order on his computer. Since it was a gift, it was stated that the tricycle would be shipped in a Walmart box so the recipient wouldnâ€™t see what was inside. The tricycle arrived in record fast time but the tricycle was not in a boxðŸ˜¡ It was left outside the house with no box, paperwork or instructions allowing anyone to see it (including my Granddaughter). Anyone could have picked it up and walked away with it. My husband checked the delivery email which was supposed to have a delivery snapshot of the purchase...there was no such thing in the email. How does this company stay in business with this kind of service? I wish I had read the reviews before I placed this first time order. Lesson learned! Beware if you order this type item from Walmart.com!

Name: Monica
Comment: Walmart you just lost about 75 million customers and you can thank your own Twitter account for this. You lost a long time shopper, I will be giving my Business to HEB now. I know of many more people who are no longer supporting Walmart.

Name: Mary King
Comment: I purchased an iPad from Walmart, which was expected to arrive December 16, never did. The Walmart representatives kept on telling me it will arrive soon. On December 23rd I was finally told I can cancel the order and reorder, I did. I was told I would receive my new order December 29th, I didnâ€™t. This was a gift to my daughter for Christmas, and though I felt bad having to tell her she would get her gift until after Christmas, I had to let her know. Well today I called Walmart to find out what the delay was in me receiving the second iPad I ordered and they told me, to my surprise, â€œthe warehouse did not confirm the order, I will have to cancel the second order and order a third time.â€ Iâ€™m hurt because, from my first purchase to now, Walmart did not take any time to give me as much as a courtesy call, to let me know what had transpired with my order, I had to reach out to them throughout.

Name: Michelle Johnson
Comment: I had a bad experience at the Walmart on Columbus blvd.Vision center. Upon arriving was told paper work needed to be filled out. As I retrieved new gloves to be sure of no cross contamination from my purse. Due to Covid 19. Was immediately told by the lady that there stuff was clean and I could not wear gloves in the back when seeing doctor. As I was seated in the front waiting area. Then was given a "dirty look". (Unprofessional) She was very rude. Then gave paper work to next patient and skipped over me. After sitting in area a lil longer was denied care/visit canceled. Stating the doctor would not be seeing me. No signs were posted that gloves were not allowed. And furthermore does this grant access to not be seen by doctor based on wearing gloves in the waiting area during these crucial times. Poor customer service.

Name: rosebud rr
Comment: I have to lol Iâ€™ve used there pick up service for groceries and was told 45%of my items where Out of stock so I chalked it up the first time Well here come a second time I figured I try again (stupid me ) well spent over 185.00 in groceries and received a notice 13 items out of stock ok so one of the items was sugar now Iâ€™m fuming really is there a shortage of sugar during Covid mmm well I get out of my car go into the store 3 min after and whatâ€™s there?!!! Sugar and all the other groceries I ordered that where supposed to be out of stock I video taped every item but behold couldnâ€™t find a manger after asking for one for way over 15 min so I left it all in the Carriage and left...now I will send my complaint to corporate headquarters I donâ€™t think itâ€™s gonna get me anywhere but go head Walmart take advantage of people during Covid karma bites When this world gets back to normal hope you go out if business....

Name: Darshit T.
Comment: As good as tech can get!! You pick what you want and out you go with no queues, credit card etc. I wish there were more items (particularly warm and cooked recently) but otherwise - a wonderful experience. Oh one thing - remember to download the Amazon Go app before you go (you will need to swipe to get inside the store)

Name: Yolandas Dixon
Comment: Stopped at Walmart on East Elmore in Davenport Iowa waited at the jewelry counter for 20 minutes they have a red but you push no one came X3 sales people they got smart said that that's not their department went back and waited another 5 minutes no one ever showed up I know they understaffed but no customer service at all it's my wife and I 39th anniversary was going to buy her two carat diamond ring they lost that sale

Name: Susan Manson Dixson
Comment: First I would like to say that Laura and Mercy saved the day during my horrible Walmart online experience during Christmas season 2021. I made a mistake by putting the wrong address on my delivery when I updated my new home address. I contacted Walmart and provided everything they asked from me to verify who I was and they pretty much called me a liar a thief a con-artist and with the supervisor hanging up on me. I called and I was told that I need to contact the police. I was furious then because my husband is the police and I worked for the court system dealing with fraud cases and knew that they were able to handle my situation but because of what I believe racial discrimination they did not want to redirect my shipment because they instantly believed I was a fraud. I professionally educated the supervisor and informed him that all black people are not frauds. I told him I was educated I told him I was a business owner and I told him that if he did not handle the situation that I did have the proper connections to sue Walmart for discrimination because previously I spoke with a representative who said that they would not redirect my futons because I lived in the metropolitan Detroit area. That statement right there is pure discrimination. I was able and willing to provide the credit card that I used, my current driver's license that had the correct address, the order number and whatever else they needed to prove that I was indeed the customer who purchased the futons. I have never been more insulted and treated so badly by Walmart customer service. The two weeks that I contacted Walmart I remain professional because I myself have had over 20 years experience in customer service and I know how difficult it can be to deal with an irate customer. But it took me to step out of my professionalism and educate them on my rights as a customer and my community. I eventually did get to speak with Laura and then later I spoke with Mercy these two ladies at Walmart were the only ones that believed me and was willing to accept the proof that I had to provide. They also were the only ones that was willing to go on a three-way call with FedEx. FedEx had told me numerous times that all they needed was Walmart to call them to have the futons redirected but because Walmart refused to believe me and at one point Laura had given me a number so they would be able to pull up my case and the guy that I spoke with tried to tell me that I was lying and that they didn't not have case numbers. At this point I was completely upset and told him that he was the one that was lying that is when he put the supervisor on the phone and after an unsuccessful conversation with the supervisor the supervisor hung up on me. Later that day I spoke with Mercy and she completed my request and within two to three hours what the supervisor said was impossible to do I had my three futons on my front porch. Again a big shout out to Laura and Mercy at Walmart for saving my Christmas event.

Name: Lyle Bialk
Comment: Walmart has lost an online customer with these ludicrous return policies and their refusal to allow exchanges. I ordered Wrangler jeans for my brother in law for Christmas. They donâ€™t fit. He wants to exchange them at a store so he can try them on. Walmart doesnâ€™t allow that. I have to return the jeans to the store, then wait 10 days or more for the refund to be processed. This is NOT acceptable, and I will never shop for anything at Walmart.com again.

Name: john stew

Name: Adam
Comment: Slave labor and underpaid employees and you have the balls to call a representative for the American people a sore loser. I will never shop here again not at at place that hates Americans

Name: Luciana Thomas
Comment: I placed a order for a bike that was out of stock than I received a alert letting me know it's back in stock. I placed the order on black Friday and was told it would arrive by Dec 18. December 15 I get an email stating my order is now delayed. Ok December 18 pass no email, December 25 pass no email. Then December 27 came I get a email stating my order was canceled. Comment: Your political views are aligned with your business views. Comment: Walmart you suck! I will never set my foot in one of your stores!

Name: Chad
Comment: Sad that I have to choose between companies that either use slave labor to make their products and think someone objecting to an obviously fraudulent election is a sore loser, or a company that thinks men in the women's bathroom is normal. Screw it, I can easily not shop at either.

Name: Deborah Sinni
Comment: For years the Conservative movement has supported Walmart with millions of our hard earned dollars.  And Walmart responds to our loyalty by calling us losers.  Well maybe the 75 million Conservative shoppers need to shop at other stores who appreciate their dollars and loyalty.  Remember Walmart it is the Democrats like Hillary and Barack who make fun of your Brand and would rather die than set foot in a Walmart store.

Name: Alice C.
Comment: Really bad online and offline shopping experience. Incompetent CSRs don't have the knowledge to assist through the phone or in the store. Slow ship times. Just terrible experiences. Never giving Walmart anymore business.

Name: Anthony B.
Comment: The stuff they sell at Walmart is okay, sometimes aisles are empty. You have to pay shipping if you buy stuff less than $35. I don't go to Walmart a lot, causes their locations are terrible. They don't have a Walmart in Rural areas like San Francisco and Seattle, you have to go outside the city. Not like Target, there is stores inside big cities like L.A. and NYC. Walmart is like a neighborhood and suburb store, not fully everywhere. I like it that it's international, they have it in China.

Name: Larry Williams
Comment: MAGA boycott

Name: C F
Comment: Rep Josh Hawley and 80+ Million voters are not deplorable for insisting on an investigation be done concerning all of the blatant voter fraud that has been occurring. Walmart frequently makes abhorrent and enormous ethical blunders and I will no longer shop your stores. Bow down to the CCP, and take your company completely out of the USA.

Name: Suor K.
Comment: The original Amazon Go store, located next to the Spheres, is as much a tourist attraction as it is a grocery store. On one of my recent visits to Seattle, I remembered that it was open to the public so I had to take a look inside. Assuming that you already have an Amazon account, all you have to do is download the app and setup a payment method.  I brought my own tote bag, but if you don't have one, they are complimentary tote bags available. I took one as a souvenir. I made a quick loop around the store and was surprised at how small it is. The food options consist of prepared foods, packaged foods (e.g. chocolate), and drinks. I guess that makes sense because it's supposed to be a grab and go store.  I ended up buying something just because I wanted to see if it would charge me for the right item (it did). I picked up an Amazon Go branded Theo chocolate bar, 70% dark chocolate, with sea salt. I didn't like it.

Name: Jimmy Hovey
Comment: They are okay, if you want cheap things you can get. But sometimes they are empty.

Name: RageSpawn ukeepout2
Comment: 11 purchases at various WalMarts have been made impossible by WalMart. Either things are on the shelves that they cant sell because they are reserved for sales and werent supposed to be on the shelves, to WalMart.com not having accurate inventory as to what is in the store and tells you to pick up by 4pm, then at 355 its postponed, then the next day its cancelled. Cant call OGP because I guess they arent trained on phones yet, tried 11 times over two days. Called management 4 times, the phone picked up and was hung up immediately. Electronics said they only have one of the type of item I am trying to purchase and nothing in stock as to the item I am trying to buy. I walked in the store, there was nine, NINE, right there on top shelf. I will continue going to Target as WalMart has forced me to do since November 22nd. First you leave your prices where they are and have me do the job you used to pay employees to do, nice passing on the savings vs keeping the profits, now I have to do OGP and electronics jobs too? Thanks for making the final decision for me, I wont be back.

Name: Natalya
Comment: I ordered a treadmill and they delivered it - I heard them ring the bell and then they just left the parcel downstairs and left right away. I am a single woman and I had to drag it all the way up by to the 3 floor by mayself. If I knew, I would have ordered it elsewhere. I find this attitude unacceptable. It is the first time in my life I am writing a negative review, but I am really dissapponted.

Name: Holy Moly
Comment: You may end up with broken product and good luck getting any kind of refund. I've spent over a month and close to 20 hours on phone support and emails trying to get a refund for a mini clothes washer that stopped working. The warranty is for one year and the manufacturer said contact seller. I contacted the seller and we did troubleshooting and determined the item is defective. The seller didn't want me to return the item and agreed to send a refund. The seller can't send the refund because Walmart won't allow refund on purchase post 6 months and says contact Walmart to have them initiate the refund. Walmart 800 number/support said contact the seller. This back and forth loop went on for a couple of weeks. Finally Walmart agreed to refund the purchase price and said wait 48 hours. I've waited 48 hours and no refund so I call back and told to wait another 48 hours! This happens over and over and over and over, for over a month!!!!!!! This item isn't cheap and now I'm out the $ purchase price. I had already replaced this washer(and not from Walmart!!!! Never again!!!!) having expected the refund, which never came, and so my Christmas budget was robbed and some friends never got a Christmas gifts from me, I tell them about Walmart's terrible conduct and and warm them about buying stuff from Walmarts website. I tell everyone that will listen about the risk of buying from Walmart. Thank you Walmart for the crap service and for ruining Christmas!!! In the future I'll be shopping anyplace but Walmart and I will be changing my FSA account from Walmart to CVS . Walmart will not get one more cent from me!!!!!!! I hope Walmart thinks that raping their customer during the holidays was worth the investment.

Name: Ready to fire someone
Comment: I am absolutely sick of problems from this company. It's like they have no common sense and decided to open a business last week but they have been around for a long time. I am not leaving anything significant here simply because Kroger will now be my official food source and if they are lucky they won't here from me again because they pissed me off at least 6 times alone last night. Good riddance you incompetent fools!

Name: Mikki Drew Barrett
Comment: I have been a customer of Walmart for more than 30 years but after my last three experiences with their online grocery delivery, I will no longer purchase anything from this company no matter how good their pricing may be. I held a Walmart+ membership where I pay about $14 a month to have my groceries delivered for free (obviously not free if I'm paying a fee but this is how they market it) Unfortunately, they require you spend at least $35 each shopping trip in addition to the monthly fee or you are charged $5 for the delivery. I don't like this requirement but accepted it for the convenience of not having to shop. What I did not know until recently is the orders are sent to what they deem is the closest store to you even if you have specifically requested delivery from another store. The store my groceries are delivered from is not the store that is clearly listed as my chosen store on the website. Recently, after planning meals, I placed an order for the needed ingredients. The order included six items from the meat department. Of those six only two were in stock and both of them were prepackaged deli type foods. Unfortunately, I was not notified of this until my delivery was on the way! What grocery store does not keep cubed beef for stew on hand?? This left me with items I could not use timely because I needed the meat. As it turned out when I questioned why such a large store did not have the meat they always have when I physically go into the store I was told my order was routed to another store which I never shop at. The order I placed a week or so before the above order was never delivered because a Door Dash Driver never arrived to pick up the groceries. I had to reorder the next day. at that time, I requested a member of management contact me. To this day, I have yet to hear from a store manager or a regional manager. Today was the last straw. I placed an order early am and was unable to schedule delivery until between 3-4 pm because slots were full (my order was placed at 10 am). I get a phone call at 3 pm from a door dash driver insisting that I put in the wrong address because his GPS system took him to 111 Doctors Way instead of 111 Sam's Drive. I have received multiple deliveries to this new address both from Walmart and pretty much all the mail carriers. He basically kept insisting I did not know my own address. The situation kept escalating until he told me he was not going to deliver my groceries and was taking it back to the store. I immediately called Walmart and before I could get to a CS representative he had dumped my groceries at someones door, snapped a photo and entered it as delivered (probably his own front door). The CS I was talking to placed my groceries back in the cart and was going to have them delivered properly only to be told in the system that there were no time slots available and I would have to wait another day. She then placed me on hold to contact the store to see that my food would be delivered promptly. After waiting, and waiting, I suddenly heard someone say hello can I help you. She had transferred me to the store and had hung up! The poor clerk was clueless and when I requested to speak to a manager he told me there was no manager but a team lead. I asked to speak to them. He left the phone and a minute or so later they disconnected me. I called Walmarts 800 number again and it was finally arranged to refund me the charges for the groceries I did not get. This whole process took well over an hour out of my workday and I never got my groceries! I then went online to cancel my plus membership only to find I could not do so. I had to call them again and then spent another 15 minutes answering questions as to why I wanted to cancel. I was also told at this point that they could not guarantee that a member of management would reach out to me. What in the world has happened to customer service? It's pretty obvious we are not valued anymore!

Name: Michael Deterding
Comment: Six p$eudo-american$ have more wealth than sixty percent of Real Americans, yet they continue to exploit the entire nation by compelling their grunt employees to subsist on minimum compensation that does not even afford them the opportunity to shop in the store the work within. These are the six heirs of the Walmart Empire. Your tax dollars continue to enable them to own much of what you see as you look out the window. That is because these employees are emergency room visitiors, (Walmart has no health care for 38 hour per week employees) . and their wages are so low that they qualify for food stamps, and other taxpayer funded assistance. The Congress (GOP controlled house) is not voting on anything relevant, I voted with my feet, and wal ked out of Wal mart,, and Sam's ( same six despots ) , and into Costco, where employees are likely to be more fairly compensated , and therefore not such a burden upon us taxpayers.

Name: Laurie Daddenger
Comment: When I need toiletries or non-perishable food, or pretty much anything I'd buy at the grocery store, I always find it cheapest here. I've never had trouble with shipping, but the website has been glitchy every once and awhile otherwise I'd give it 5 stars.

Name: Steve Fettke
Comment: I will never order anything from Walmart.com again. I was supposed to get a gift card with my purchase. I didnâ€™t receive it and called 7 times and emailed several times. Every time they said someone would get back to me and they never did. Now they say the promotion has expired! Only because they never did anything was why the promotion expired. I tried over and over and over again. Worst customer service ever.

Name: Multiple system owner
Comment: I have brought my vehicle in to the service center 2 times for this bad battery. They held me hostage for hours and still did not replace it. The vehicle has a new alternator on it so why do they continue to play games. Do not buy a battery from Walmart they are garbage an the warranty process is full of hassle.

Name: Richard Courtright
Comment: Walmart has a bad reputation, why I don't know. I have nothing but good experience there. Especially now with Covid. I can't believe the only place I could get a Covid shot was at Walmart even though I was in the phase 2 (72 years old) group. The State and County both pretty much ignored me. THANK GOD FOR WALMART !

Comment: I will never enter a walmart store again. Your customers Do NOT work there we pay to shop there you got rid of your cashiers you guys are ignorant, good bye walmart

Comment: I don't know what happened to Walmart now a days. wrong tags on the wrong products.wrong wrong wrong almost everything is wrong at Walmart. not impressed!! just today I went there to buy Bugatti bread. grabbed 2 of the same thing. one is $.87cent and the other $3.47 lol . and this is on every category!! watch the price big time because this happened to me almost every time I go there.i guess warren buffet got enough money to gave it....

Comment: I will never buy from Walmart again I will never buy from Walmart again. Beware of online ordering from companies via Walmart. You will not be able to return any products. Stick to Amazon for better returns and service

Name: Roman R
Comment: I recently discovered that walmart also offered their products online. The order experience was not very smooth. The processing times are slow and also delivery is bad. If you want something from walmart just go there :-)

Name: Ms B
Comment: I arrived at Apopka, Florida Walmart Super Ctr @8a.m. Where Jeff checked me in for a oil changed n didnt tell me the price so i assumed the same just like the last time. My name were called n i paid more then the last time so i ask Jeff why is that n can he call a mgr which i stayed calm for every conversation i held with these mgrs bcuz of whom i worked for a competition store.. Mgr came n we talked.. i found out later were the store mgr Russell which he didnt give me his best customer svc. He tried to explain n said to me what since im a regular customer i want god father treatment i were shocked he said that. He ask do i want a discount n i said no i can pay for it.. So i left n went inside by parking in front of the store n went inside store to ask for a mgr which its Samantha..Russell asst mgr. she stop me from talking n said Russell is her boss n lol at her n said I'll call the Corp.Ofc then but she help me anyways n explain the price in customer svc area which Russell could of done in Car Care area.. The way they treated me i wouldnt work for them at all..they are terrible mgrs..n not the perfect road models for the employees..they're just there for the money n not their customers.. I want be taking my car back there..but i will be calling Corp.

Name: Random Gaming
Comment: I just left this walmart in south sioux city humiliated. The workers there have zero customer service. The smug supervisor (Macey) that I had them call after 30 minutes of a electronics specialist having no clue how to verify the price of a laptop was the worst customer care I have ever seen. They had 2 laptops mounted to a display with 2 prices one was $199 and the other $549 after spending about another half hour wating for him and two others to sort out whats what I was very irritated. So I told him I felt they should honor the price they CLEARLY had on display for one of those two laptops. No apologies and a solid "im im not gonna do that" is all I got from him. At that point I told him thats not right that I have wasted a hour of my time for your stores mistake and you wont honor the price displayed. That is false advertisement. I asked isnt there something you can do. His reply was " I can fix the take but I'm not giving you a $500 laptop for $200. His attitude was clearly meant to make me feel stupid and I left the store in a walk of shame because I couldn't afford $500. It was humiliating and I will be calling corperate. Their is no such thing as customer service even more now because almost all the registers are self checkout too. Like what happened to walmart EARNING the money we work hard for? Sad world we live in.

Name: Evelyn
Comment: I'm disappointed with walmart membership program. I decided to do the month to month payment to give it a try. I CANCELLED! I received a delivery with items just in bags in the rain left at my door. No text or notice just an email. Another order delivered to the wrong house! Photo sent (10 pm ) in an email of my item in a bag at someone else's door. Email of another delivery coming early! When I call C service, told isn't coming for another three days! Pick up at my area walmart store 1091 Mill Creek Rd Allentown PA (wow!) Regular shoppers park in Pick Up Zone Area not a care. It takes long (freezing cold) waiting in car just to get my groceries. And it's not even busy! I call the phone number provide in parking spot to find out if they know I'm there. It goes straight to automatic voicemail! I'm looking at my phone with the options app has given me 1.Color of car. 2. Parking Spot number or other (spot with higher number not as a selection) My SUV is silver. In spot (Other)14. A male associate comes out takes my name runs back inside. Wait some more and I get my stuff. Get home and the thing walmart texted me they didn't have I find in bag. Plus the substituted item. So walmart you gave me the "free item" I paid for the substitute. At least I didn't pay for something I didn't get, right? Walmart I'm telling you this because this ( online grocery pick up) has happened twice. To many errors and inconveniences have been done from your part. You should take accountablity and make some corrections. Check out the reviews from my local walmart store. It surprised me that I had an online grocery pick up experience so similar to other community shoppers.

Name: Ange Jones
Comment: Honestly they don't even deserve one star. How ridiculous. I bought a new computer and since I didn't have problems with it until after the 30-day "window" I can't return it. I bought a brand new computer and it's like they sold me some refurbished crap. The computer is not even 6 months old and I can't use it without keeping it plugged in because the battery goes in about an hour, the screen freezes it's extremely slow.. I have to boot it up 30 minutes before I actually want to use it. Had these problems happened right away I would have turned around and returned it but everything was fine at first. Of course Walmart's hands are tied?! Give me a break I just wanted to turn it back in and exchange it for a computer that actually worked!!!! Screw you Walmart.

Name: Jaclyn
Comment: On 2/13/2022 I put in an order from Walmart for pick up. The pick-up got redirected to a different Walmart without anyone notifying me (this is the second time that has happened) I was running late to the second store because it was so far away. I tried calling over 5 times before 8:00 and no one answered the phone. I called the front and the pickup. When I got to the second store at 1800 NE 12th Ave #3877 I was told they could not get my groceries so I asked to talk to the manager. Wanda, the manager said to me that no one could get them for me tonight. I preseeded to ask if she had a key or if anyone else was able to go back there and get it since I had already paid for it. She said no again at that point I got upset and she told me that she was thinking of someone who could possibly help me but no longer would help me because I was upset I couldn't get it. She said even if she could help me she wouldn't. I then asked for her name and she ignored me and would not look at me. I read her name tag and left. I had to call to get a full refund and I canceled my membership. If this is how Walmart runs their stores with no one answering the phones, changing pick-up stores with no notice, and such rude management then I no longer want to step foot in a Walmart again. And if nothing gets done to solve this then it is even worse than I thought.

Name: Ange Jones
Comment: Honestly they don't even deserve one star. How ridiculous. I bought a new computer and since I didn't have problems with it until after the 30-day "window" I can't return it. Name: Jaclyn
Comment: On 2/13/2022 I put in an order from Walmart for pick up. The pick-up got redirected to a different Walmart without anyone notifying me (this is the second time that has happened) I was running late to the second store because it was so far away. I tried calling over 5 times before 8:00 and no one answered the phone. I called the front and the pickup. When I got to the second store at 1800 NE 12th Ave #3877 I was told they could not get my groceries so I asked to talk to the manager. Wanda, the manager said to me that no one could get them for me tonight. I preseeded to ask if she had a key or if anyone else was able to go back there and get it since I had already paid for it. She said no again at that point I got upset and she told me that she was thinking of someone who could possibly help me but no longer would help me because I was upset I couldn't get it. She said even if she could help me she wouldn't. I then asked for her name and she ignored me and would not look at me. I read her name tag and left. I had to call to get a full refund and I canceled my membership. If this is how Walmart runs their stores with no one answering the phones, changing pick-up stores with no notice, and such rude management then I no longer want to step foot in a Walmart again. And if nothing gets done to solve this then it is even worse than I thought.

Name: Ange Jones
Comment: Honestly they don't even deserve one star. How ridiculous. I bought a new computer and since I didn't have problems with it until after the 30-day "window" I can't return it. I bought a brand new computer and it's like they sold me some refurbished crap. The computer is not even 6 months old and I can't use it without keeping it plugged in because the battery goes in about an hour, the screen freezes it's extremely slow.. I have to boot it up 30 minutes before I actually want to use it. Had these problems happened right away I would have turned around and returned it but everything was fine at first. Of course Walmart's hands are tied?! Give me a break I just wanted to turn it back in and exchange it for a computer that actually worked!!!! Screw you Walmart.

Name: Maye Elqasem
Comment: bad customer service experience, the agent is called Odail S. hung up on me the chat while i was talking and did not even send me the survey email. They only send it when they are doing a good job when they do not, don't expect a review survey.

Name: Zoe O.
Comment: Cool experience, selection is small, app is easy to use and understand. Plus they give out free reusable shopping bags

Name: Zoe O.
Comment: Cool experience, selection is small, app is easy to use and understand. Plus they give out free reusable shopping bags.

Name: Arthur Alan Shugars
Comment: I purchased a Cooler Master NotePal X3 - Laptop Cooling Pad with 200mm Blue LED Fan $67.72/EA Qty: 1  on 1/24/2022 with Order 2952262-769067 sold to and shipped by a 3rd-Party seller "The Caidan Shop" (out of China. I got a 4-day delay in the tracking in Houston, and when my supposed package finally came with the corresponding tracking # I only receieved a "Thank You" Card and no Laptop Cooling Pad. I then had a heck of a time navigating the Wal-Mart.com site to report this and finally got a hold of a customer rep named Miles, whom assured me that I would get a refund. This refund has never been credited to my account as of yet, and I will give it another day for the outside possability that my item actually does get delivered, but I'm not holding my breathe, as I did some research on the entity that is supposed to deliver this item, aka DropAir. Based on a large majority of reviews of their service, I can pretty much expect that my item will never come, or if it does get delivered, it will be delivered somewhere else. This situation has been a COMPLETE DISASTER, and if my bank account doesn't get credited for this transaction in one day, I will be going to my bank to file a dispute, then I will report this situation to the Better Business Bureau. This seems to me to be a complete scam job, and after be a lifelong supporter/customer of Wal-Mart, I think I will take my business and money elsewhere because this situation brings a large degree of hopelessness when trying to figure out what went wrong.

Name: chris kelly
Comment: i used to buy certain items from walmart because they were cheaper. even signed up for the membership at $12/month for free delivery. i recently canceled the membership. for the past few months walmart ,uses fed ex for delivery, cannot manage to get fed ex to deliver items purchased. it began with my package severely damaged and the contents broken. and progressed to delivery exceptions,meaning no delivery. items are never delivered. in spite of online tracking stating they are "on the vehicle" for delivery. the fed ex facility is less than an hour from my address,yet fed ex can't deliver. the last item was allegedly so damaged as to not be deliverable according to fed ex. this after a week of tracking stating the item was scheduled repeatedly for delivery. the final straw was yesterday when again fed ex after tracking stated on time delivery suddenly had an EXCEPTION with future delivery pending again. on top of that walmart refuses to refund the purchase price claiming "policies" state the customer has to wait more days to see if slow fed ex delivers the item. fed ex is unreliable. walmart continues to ship with fed ex. therefore i am no longer a customer. amazon may be a bit more expensive but they at least deliver as promised on time. paying walmart for free 2 day shipping is a disaster. good bye walmart,customers mean nothing to them.

Name: Martin Morrison
Comment: Ordered a large screen LCD TV and fully expected it to be delivered a week later in a Walmart truck. They decided to send it from the local store, instead. "Great!" I thought. Then I got a message that "Kristopher" was going to be delivering it in about 20 minutes. "Awesome!" Five minutes later the order was cancelled because I, apparently, refused the delivery? It turns out Walmart subcontracts deliveries through DoorDash and the TV wouldn't fit in Kristopher's Prius. Since when can a delivery subcontractor cancel MY order. According to Walmart's Customer (Dis)Service, which takes hours to get to answer the phone, my request to un-cancel the order can't be done, (even by God). So, I have to wait a week to get my money back. They did activate the extended warranty, though. In the end, I had to go to the damn store ant drive it home. Still waiting on the refund for the first TV.

Name: William Aiken
Comment: New app is HORRIBLE. Why did you have to change it? It's impossible to navigate. WHY WHY WHY!!!

I then had a heck of a time navigating the Wal-Mart.com site to report this and finally got a hold of a customer rep named Miles, whom assured me that I would get a refund. This refund has never been credited to my account as of yet, and I will give it another day for the outside possability that my item actually does get delivered, but I'm not holding my breathe, as I did some research on the entity that is supposed to deliver this item, aka DropAir. Based on a large majority of reviews of their service, I can pretty much expect that my item will never come, or if it does get delivered, it will be delivered somewhere else. This situation has been a COMPLETE DISASTER, and if my bank account doesn't get credited for this transaction in one day, I will be going to my bank to file a dispute, then I will report this situation to the Better Business Bureau. This seems to me to be a complete scam job, and after be a lifelong supporter/customer of Wal-Mart, I think I will take my business and money elsewhere because this situation brings a large degree of hopelessness when trying to figure out what went wrong.

Name: chris kelly
Comment: i used to buy certain items from walmart because they were cheaper. even signed up for the membership at $12/month for free delivery. i recently canceled the membership. for the past few months walmart ,uses fed ex for delivery, cannot manage to get fed ex to deliver items purchased. it began with my package severely damaged and the contents broken. and progressed to delivery exceptions,meaning no delivery. items are never delivered. in spite of online tracking stating they are "on the vehicle" for delivery. the fed ex facility is less than an hour from my address,yet fed ex can't deliver. the last item was allegedly so damaged as to not be deliverable according to fed ex. this after a week of tracking stating the item was scheduled repeatedly for delivery. the final straw was yesterday when again fed ex after tracking stated on time delivery suddenly had an EXCEPTION with future delivery pending again. on top of that walmart refuses to refund the purchase price claiming "policies" state the customer has to wait more days to see if slow fed ex delivers the item. fed ex is unreliable. walmart continues to ship with fed ex. therefore i am no longer a customer. amazon may be a bit more expensive but they at least deliver as promised on time. paying walmart for free 2 day shipping is a disaster. good bye walmart,customers mean nothing to them.

Name: Martin Morrison
Comment: Ordered a large screen LCD TV and fully expected it to be delivered a week later in a Walmart truck. They decided to send it from the local store, instead. "Great!" I thought. Then I got a message that "Kristopher" was going to be delivering it in about 20 minutes. "Awesome!" Five minutes later the order was cancelled because I, apparently, refused the delivery? It turns out Walmart subcontracts deliveries through DoorDash and the TV wouldn't fit in Kristopher's Prius. Since when can a delivery subcontractor cancel MY order. According to Walmart's Customer (Dis)Service, which takes hours to get to answer the phone, my request to un-cancel the order can't be done, (even by God). So, I have to wait a week to get my money back. They did activate the extended warranty, though. In the end, I had to go to the damn store ant drive it home. Still waiting on the refund for the first TV.

Name: William Aiken
Comment: New app is HORRIBLE. Why did you have to change it? It's impossible to navigate. WHY WHY WHY!!!

Name: Jennifer N.
Comment: Definitely a cool experience compared to your average grocery store. I stopped by on a Friday afternoon and there was a small line gathered outside. Luckily, the line moved pretty quickly, so we were able to get inside and escape the cold. The employees outside hand out reusable grocery bags to place your purchases in, and you have to download the Amazon Go app and log into your Amazon account in order to enter. The store was the size of a convenience store, and it sold snacks, drinks, alcohol, ready made meals, meat, bread, and pastries. My sister and I made a full circle around the store within 3 minutes, and left with a bag of chips, a case of Bundaberg peach flavored fruit drink, an aloe vera drink, a bar of chocolate, and a souvenir bottle. All in all, our trip only took 5 minutes since we didn't have to wait to check out!

Name: Brendan c.
Comment: The novelty is high here. Fun way to shop, a Seattle only experience and/or yeah another sign Amazon is taking over your last life. Pick your reason to go. It's a small convenience store but one with a lot of fresh meals to go. Coming from Philly I will argue the Italian Sandwich is just wrong but the selection is wide.  It's a great place to grab breakfast or lunch if you work in the area. Even better is the meal boxes you can take home to cook if your out of meal ideas (cheaper than some box food services.)

Name: Bjarne B.
Comment: I came back 1 year later, the store is pretty much the same. I bought the same canned wine (for nostalgia)!?!? The underlying tech here works well. I am still impressed.

Name: Kevin
Comment: I purchased a car battery and some tires from Walmart less than 6 months ago. I took my car to a reputable mechanic a few weeks ago. He told me that "the garbage Walmart battery was dead" and that it had taken the starter with it ($350). He jumped my car and I was able to get it to Sam's club to get gas (10 mins away). It was dead when I tried to start my car and had to get it jumped again to get it to Walmart which theoretically has a 1 year warranty on batteries.  They told me that it would be several hours before they could charge the battery to which I replied that I had to pick up my kids. They recommended that I purchase a battery and that they would refund it out when the battery report came back good. I had them swap it and was only 10 minutes late to pick up my kids (1.5 hrs total).  They called me that night and told me that the battery tested good so I told them I'd be up in the morning to have them swap it back out. I arrived in the morning and when it was my turn in queue (90 mins or so) they told me that I now owned 2 Walmart batteries and that they wouldn't honor the warranty. I refused this, have no contract with them, and simply disputed the charge with my credit card company.  This testimony is being written on the day after the event.

Name: Fred Engle
Comment: I get capitalism. But in general I abhor this company and their business practices particularly how they hurt small local businesses.

Name: S. Beck
Comment: Never really had any problems.

Name: John S.
Comment: I've never had a good experience using the Walmart website. Shipping has always been slow and that's only if they actually have what I want in stock. In general, it's always been frustration.

Name: Nunchurees
Comment: I donâ€™t want to give a star. Customer service is very bad.I order online but can not return. I am not happy.I will not order Walmart.com anymore.

Name: Goddeva
Comment: Walmart continues to work to provide Great value for people like me and most others indeed as measured by average to high-quality products and the lowest price available nearby. Regardless of the opposition, Walmart is worth shopping at most times when not over crowed.

Name: Wade G.
Comment: A fun, modern experience. I think the model can work. It's convenience factor alone is worth the visit.

Name: Julianna B.
Comment: Pretty nifty store. It's amazing to see the advances in technology that allows you to walk in and walk out without having to deal with checking out.  Things to note before your visit:  Make sure you've downloaded the amazon go app and log in.  If you're going with someone, make sure that they download the app too, or you'll have to scan them in with your app and then scan yourself in.  It was a great experience and I can't wait until they bring these stores out to Texas

Name: Barbara Brown-Cavallaro
Comment: I love how substantial glass is & how the covers are air tight! I have not used them yet. Just got them today. Storing food in them will be great because I can see what is in the container. I also love the glass instead of plastic.

Name: Eboni Campbell
Comment: I've shopped at Walmart.com a few weeks ago and my shipment came in damaged. I called customer service and was instructed to take the item to the store and get a refund. Well I did that and the store would not honor the refund even thought I had a receipt and was told to call customer service back. Called customer service back and they told me that the would speak to the store manager. I show up and the store manager says that she didn't know what was going on but they cannot accept the return. I will never deal with this company again!

Name: GRETA HOLLIWAY
Comment: Honestly This company have lack of heart since Sam Walton passed away, its like nobody cares, cash registers are lacking people to assist customers, especially if they have 13 available and only 2 are open for about 30 people per line to check out. The laywaway program should never been fully eliminated, plus all the charity programs Walmart once over seen no longer exist. How can this be, when it used to be a place where everybody once had a since of pride when shopping there. Walmart needs to bring the heart back and show Sam Walton that together his retail can gain respect from people who truly love shopping at this retail store.

Name: raja saini
Comment: After the products were scanned, I gave the coupons to the cashier. She looked at them, started scanning them.
