Name: Devan Clark Tolle
Comment: This is the 4th. Time me and my husband has came to Walmart to use customer service to cash his pay check and pay our bills not to mention spend a couple hundred dollars on things we need but once again it's closed cause they said there's no one there to work it. What kind of crap is that? There are 50 employees stocking shelves and sitting around chilling but no customer service. Then on top of that no cashier's. The lines had 15 people in them and reached half way thru the store. I thought managers were trained to work all stations. I guess I was wrong. Well we had over $200 in stuff so we just left it. I mean if they can't get anybody to work then they need to look into whoever manages that place cause we just seen 3 more people leave there stuff and walk out. West Union walmart is terrible.

Name: Frank King
Comment: Don't order on line from Walmart case it will say package delivered when it hasn't been delivered and when you contract Walmart they tell you to wail another 48 hours which already 24 hours late.

Name: sr
Comment: The worst customer service. Have been trying to do a pay in store order for almost a month. After multiple attempts the managers at the store contacted their help center and where told that the systems where not working together correctly. I was given the choice to either keep trying or to pay for the items online and bring them back into the store so they could do a resale of the items in order to change how the items where paid for. After doing this I am being told that they can not do that due to the part numbers not being in the computer to do this and that I would need to contact customer service. I have been given a phone number by email from the online customer service saying that is to a special store team and they would be able to help me. I have spoken to 8 different people 4 of them stated all they could do was a return and that I would have to take them back to the store and then hung up. One of them gave me a number saying that I could go through this department, but the number that was given to me was to a different insurance company. Then I tried calling again and was bounced to different people and departments after I asked to speak with a supervisor due to being told different things by every one and not getting any help with the problem. After being bounce around to different departments and still not speaking to a supervisor they had put me on hold and after a few minutes was hung up on again. As it stands after this I may never buy from Walmart again.

Name: Janneth bh
Comment: I got a oil change for my car. Took an hour and a half to get it done. Usually is about 30 min. I asked the crew member why took so long he said he was working by him self with a new employee. I try not to be upset because his superviser should make sure he get all he need to do a good job. Still I am really upset I lost some money because I was 1 hour late at my job. And I have to pay for a terrible service.

Name: Heather Trinneer
Comment: I made a purchase on Walmart.com on March 31st for a 4x6 storage shed that was supposed to be delivered, latest expected delivery by April 16th. I waited a week before calling to find out where and what is going on because I haven't received a tracking number yet. Not one person was willing to help me beyond saying that the warehouse is preparing it. I was still being told on April 20 that it WILL arrive by April 16th. After days of calling, getting hung up on, told that there isn't anything they can do ... I was actually told by a Walmart representative to reorder on Amazon because I would receive it that way. On April 22 they decided to put it in as lost in transport and reordered it. I am still, 1 month after I ordered for any information. I still haven't received a tracking number. I keep asking them to transfer me to someone that can actually help if you are unable to. I tried emailing the CEO with no response. At this point I feel like I was robbed. As a customer, I did my job ... I ordered, I paid and at this point, it appears that Walmart either can't or won't fix any problems and take care of customers. I lost a job that I was supposed to start because my car had to be the shed that I ordered and haven't received. This has been the worst experience ever.

Name: Upset in Cordova
Comment: WATCH YOUR BANK ACCOUNT! HORRIBLE WALMART.COM EXPERIENCES! Walmart needs to do a major overhaul of it's online ordering and delivery process. Free delivery doesn't always mean honest, professional and reliable. After sitting on hold for well over an hour, nobody ever came to the phone. Walmart charged me $128+ for products that I still have not received! That toyed around with something as simple as a $3.54 box of Q-tips they either counldn't figure out whether they had them in stock or not, b c my bank account showed this amount being constantly either debited or credited on my account. Now, customer service eventually got back with me to, so-called, escalate my complaint of not ever receiving anything at my door after many orders placed with them since last year, while the process was haphazard and disorganized, I never, until yesterday spent this much money at one time in an order, then, never receive the actual products that they swear FedEx delivered to my door yesterday. I filed a Better Business Bureau complaint requesting a refund, b c I don't play games with companies stealing or messing around with my hard earned money while they mismanage their businesses then charge me for $128 worth of products that I am still looking out the door to see if the boxes will ever turn up!!! I don't recommend placing any orders with them. While FEDEx, I think, is generally good, either they never delivered my items, delivered to wrong address, or delivered and were stolen by either FedEx or someone else. Either way, I want my money back and won't stop until I get it. I have Legal Shield and it won't cost me one more dime to get my attorney after Walmart in this instance. If I don't hear from the Better Business Bureau within 5 days, the CEO will be hearing from my attorney about how his operations are not professionally operating....in my experience and opinion!

Name: CMacArthur
Comment: Ordered product online. Provided 3 week delivery date which seemed long. It's now over 3 weeks and product hasn't shipped Should have ordered from Amazon. Never again WalMart.

Name: Dug
Comment: If Walmart is forcing us to be their employee and check out our own groceries at least the checkout credit card machines should work properly.

Name: Pat Franklin Oles
Comment: I made an order to Walmart for delivery at 11:30 this morning, 4/29/21. They received it according to the app-charged me for it-$145. Was to be delivered at 11:30 eastern time. I am in Sebring, Fl-a pretty small town. It was delayed 4 times. I called customer service for Assistance-now it has been an hour and I am still waiting to talk to a representative. This is the worst service i have ever seen. But I want my money back.

Name: Trav
Comment: Don't expect to work here if you work hard and don't do the suck up thing. The only people they want are the ones that are lazy and kiss their butts everyone knows it and they have their cliques they run in and all the stuff they say in training about equality and no favorites and managers can't do things is bull i loved my job enjoyed it and helping people but I didn't kiss butt I didn't need to and all my managers knew I didn't n my work spoke for itself and it took one assistant manager not liking me cause I didn't kiss butt and stood up when I was right n that's it boom worked for 9 months no problems then 1 coaching then another one 2 weeks lmbo and when talked to main people nothing they back their managers no matter how wrong they are they need to go in to stores and break this kind of stuff up and make it equal place and where when you go to store manager or co and talk it stays there like it is suppose to not as soon as you leave they run and tell the AM what was said and done. It's messed up really but all of America can see it you go in and all the workers that have been there years and years are obese and lazy and do not want people asking them for help and some will tell customers their off the clock or something just to keep from working and those are the one they keep I mean come on really.

Name: Customer
Comment: bought clothing from you online (I live in NJ)and there was sales tax charged. There is no sales tax on clothing in NJ. I figured this was an error and would be fixed when it shipped. When I shop online in any other site, Target, Etsy, eBay, I am ONLY charged sales tax on items that are taxed in NJ. It's not determined by where the item is SENT FROM, as many come from across seas where they have NO TAX...yet I am rightfully charged if it is a taxable item in NJ at NJ's tax rate. My request for a refund was denied as Walmart claims it can charge tax based on the merchant's state, not the point of sale. NO OTHER ONLINE SITE DOES THIS!  Here is the review I am posting on every social media site I can and will be contacting the BBB and news media. People have a right to know how Walmart is basically stealing from people, and especially in these times, that is beyond reprehensible.  BEWARE! When you buy clothing from here, Walmart charges you sales tax, even if your state doesn't tax clothing. They CLAIM it's because it is being shipped from a state that does have it! With people being as hard hit as we are now, this is another truly *** greedy robber baron move on the part of Walmart. When I buy clothes from ANY OTHER place I am not charged, as my state NJ, doesn't tax therm. The tax is to be collected at the POINT OF SALE and the state tax where it is being SHIPPED , not where it's shipped to. Please share this so people know what dirtbags this company is!  I filed a dispute with paypal and was denied. Here is their response:  I understand in New Jersey there is no sales tax on clothes. When you purchase online you may not be purchasing within the state of New Jersey. You have to pay whatever fees are associated with purchasing wherever the merchant may be located.  PayPal would not be able to fight the legality of this dispute and that is why we denied the claim. You would need to take legal action to pursue this further.  Please feel free to share this on any social media you use, I know I am!  User's recommendation: DO NOT BUY CLOTHING HERE!  WalMart Cons: Slimy ethics, Illegal charges, No response from company to complaints.

Name: Paul Otruba
Comment: 5/13/200 Went to Walmart in Mansfield Pa today and at least 6 of the employees were wearing their virus masks on their chin. The risk of infection is just too great to shop there; there are other grocery stores and on line shopping which will be happy for my business.

Name: Jonathan Lapin
Comment: I ordered a few products online from walmart.com (since all the kiosks are closed due to Covid). I've waited over two weeks now and the whole time the order said they would be delivered last week and it ony arrived today. The tracking didn't work correctly but it got here eventually. Bit disappointing.

Name: Nancy Ratzlaff
Comment: Brian in the automotive department at the Walmart at 21st and Maize in Wichita Kansas was the epitome of fast, friendly service! We took our car in for tire repair/replacement since we had purchased the road hazard insurance. Usually warranty work will get you pushed to the end of the customer service line since they know it is going to be free, but not in this case. Even though they were busy they had us in and out in 30 minutes with a new tire and Brian was so very helpful! Well done Brian and well done Walmart!

Name: Naomi De La Riva
Comment: ORDERED A BUNDLE FOR MY SWIMMING POOL AND I DID NOT RECEIVE MY SANDFILTER 3000 THAT CAME WITH IT AND I ONLY RECEIVED THE OTHER 2 THAT CAME WITH IT . I CALLED AND THEY SAID THAT THEY COULD NOT SEND IT CAUSE THAT IS NOT WHAT IT SAYS IN THEIR SYSTEM BUT WHEN I ORDERED IT CAME WITH IT AND I HAVE PROOF . HOW CAN THEY ADVERTISE SOMETHING ON WALMART AND NOT SEND WHAT IT SAYS ON THE PRODUCTS

Name: Hello The Bestfriend
Comment: One time me and my brother ordered A Disney infinity And it never came and We were waiting for so long and in pretty sure we ordered it from Walmart online

Name: Eric Fitch
Comment: NEVER AGAIN! This delivery system is pure garbage! Even with tracking you never know when It's going to change and since you have 12 deliveries over a two week span on the ONE order you put in...So far 4 out of the 7 items have been stolen. No I don't blame Walmart for theft. I DO blame them on causing so much confusion the only only way would be to hire a 24 guard. Good luck even trying to get ahold of Walmart. They just brush you off and refer you to the delivery drivers.

Name: toni
Comment: Wow, blown away. Spent 2200.00 on a pool, dug up my back yard. Waited 2 weeks for a pool that was supposed to be delivered by fed. Ex. That we blamed for lost delivery. And after 7 hours of phone holds and correspondence find out they are out of stock. They actually charged our account and we still had to contact them. Wow- shame on them!!!

Name: Eunice L.
Comment: So cool. Food is actually good and so convenient. Nice place to stop by for something quick and easy

Name: Janet Morse
Comment: Bought 2 fans from u guys and they r far the best fans I've found around!! Ty walmart!!

Name: Karen Scott
Comment: This week needed to get a COVID vaccine quickly as I was flying out of the country. WalMart in Haines City FL was awesome. The pharmacy staff excellent, professional and caring. I was SO grateful they were willing to help me! Thank you very much!

Name: Karen
Comment: Went to Dorman center in spartanburg sc was going to purchase a grill had to hunt down an associate for her to say if its not on the shelf we dont have it another associate state what about on the top shelf and pam said we cant sell them. So left and went to Home Depot

Name: Amy Couey
Comment: Purchased a TV for my daughter for her birthday, manual showed it was supposed to a DVD player attached/into TV and did not, called service and no help at all. Also called by the wrong name twice. Very disappointing.

Name: Elva
Comment: I called Fontana,Colton,Beaumont,Moreno Valley and Redlands locations. You cannot reach anyone to talk to. Very sad. No business here.

Name: Sallie Saxon
Comment: Last time I will do business with Walmart.com I purchased items then I am told they no longer have the item. As of May 13 I still have not received a refund.

Name: Shar O'Brien
Comment: I've already lost my money. This is just a warning for anyone else. MarketPlace, a Walmart selling site for 3rd party sellers, is not really backed by Walmart. I ordered shoe boxes, which were just flimsy plastic file-folder thingies (not even the point). Tried to return them, but got blocked by offers of 'some' money back instead. Twenty, then forty, sixty, eighty (unfortunately I spent over 300, so I didn't bite). Ended up suckered into sending them back to China (they originally came from a warehouse in Mississauga, Ontario). Cost me $146.00 bucks. By boat! (plane was $50 bucks more) Only way to complain to Walmart is by phone or live chat (live chat is useless). Best part? I wrote a humorous, though rough review, because I wanted it posted, on MarketPlace. Walmart rejected it. Wow. Nice gig. Get to rip me off, then edit which reviews people post online. My only objective is, watch out. The fine print said 'returns welcome'. Just didn't mention I had to return them to China.

Name: Robin
Comment: Only shop here if you have to. And for Gods sake dont expect help over the phone.

Name: Alicia Montalvo
Comment: I would give Walmart a zero if I could but I have to leave at least a 1-star rating. I was there on May 11th, 2022 at the Walmart on 8001 US HIGHWAY 19 PINELLAS PARK, FL. As I was paying for my stuff which totaled over $300.00 the cashier Krista G. seemed to already have a crazy nasty attitude toward me apparently she decided to go over board when it was time to slide my car (mind you I have a cast on my hand and arm all the way up to my elbow. As I was trying to slide my debit card the machine kept dropping down and as she could see it was broken and I kept telling her that it kept canceling my card so she decided to get nasty and start yelling like a crazy woman and I finally lost my patience with her and told her as you can see it's broken and I have a cast on my hand. So I asked to speak to her manager and out of nowhere, she yelled out the top of her long Customer Service! like she was in a barn. Finally, a manager comes which I already knew she was not going to hear or listen to what happened also had a nasty attitude, and when I tried to explain to her what happened all she had to say was to go. Go? really is that how your employees treat your customers? Fix your equipment so people don't have to struggle to slide a credit card through and have your crazy cashiers go off the deep end.

Name: Will
Comment: Walmart has become a hostile place for me to shop because the customers get so irate and impatient after waiting in line for purchases and returns. They don't hire enough employees and that makes the lines and waiting much longer. It's become such a problem for me that I refuse to go there anymore to risk being in the middle of a angry customers getting physical.

Name: Honeyfaithboynton
Comment: Their dolls are a scam!im truly ashamed of them for advertising cheap dolls!but I've got one from Amazon and she's beautiful!honey faith Boynton

Name: Rick Hand
Comment: Did not meet their shipping estimated date and did not notify me of the change. I only discovered it when I started looking to see why it had not arrived today, the day that was posted as the delivery date all week long. And customer service was a joke. An apology and an offer of $2.95 adjustment! I requested cancellation and refund but they said I have to wait for the order to arrive, refuse it, and they keep my money until the return gets back to them! So if the order doesn't arrive for another week I still don't get my money. I'm at their mercy. I purchase online a lot but I cannot ever remember feeling as unappreciated. And I don't remember another seller not trying to solve my problem. Walmart doesn't get it. A big part of the reason I ordered from them is the date the items were confirmed to arrive. My problem is not that I need a discount. My problem isn't solved with an apology. I need what I ordered. Nothing fixes this other than getting my items to me or refunding so I can purchase elsewhere.

Name: Mrsz Rivero
Comment: I ordered a package from walmart.com, a 50 inch tv. The package was left on my porch and stolen. I spoke to the customer service department and they were absolutely NOT helpful. The supervisor Norma informed me that I had to go out of my way to fill out a police report for further assistance.....I will NEVER shop at walmart again. The experience was horrible. Now on top of me spending more money on a Mother's Day gift because I didnt recieve my package, I have to take extra time to go to the police report so my issue can be resolved.

Name: ColoradoLuke
Comment: I just got off a chat with Walmart.com customer service and have to warn everyone about their ineptitude. I ordered an "e" birthday gift card for my grandson on walmart.com, 2 days before his birthday. I was in the UK and he lives in Colorado so I couldn't be there. He loves to buy toys at the local Walmart store, so thought this is the perfect long-distance gift. The card was to be delivered via email to my daughter's account. We've done this many times before successfully with other websites like Amazon.  The Walmart.com website said the card was delivered about 4 hours after I placed the order. But my daughter never received it. She's very tech-savvy and knows about Junk and Spam and how to find stuff. We waited and waited, and after two days, still no card. So I was forced to buy another gift.  The next day I contacted Customer "Care" (ha-ha) via the Chat tool. The nice agent told me that she would resend the gift card email. I said, no thanks, a bit late I already bought something else and just want a refund. Since it wasn't delivered, surely you can just cancel the card number. No we can't, she replied. But I'll escalate this to our gift card team who will contact you in 48 hours.  They never contacted me. So I tried again. The very nice agent this time said we don't ever give refunds on gift card purchases. But she'd be glad to resend the gift card. Again, no that's not what we want. We want a refund. Or we'd settle for a voucher we could use on the website again. So she sends us a voucher good for the gift card amount. but it says we first have to spend an additional $45 at Walmart! Unbelievable.  I ask, can you change the email address and just send the card to me, maybe I can use it. She says, sorry we cannot change the email address after the order. Wow.  So here is why you should never buy an e-gift card from Walmart.com: 1. If it's not delivered or received, you have no recourse. You're screwed. End of story. 2. Delivering an e-card today is such a simple operation at every other website. But something is wrong with the Walmart.com system and they're not admitting it. I'm not the first to complain. 3. Their Customer Service chat tool is strange, compared to others. Firstly, there are no time stamps anywhere. I guess so you can't tell how long you've waited or been on with them. 2nd, there is no way to Print or Save a transcript of the chat. I had to manually copy and paste. Why doesn't Walmart want us to save a copy of the chat?? 4. If you are angry enough, they will try to buy you off with a coupon that requires you to spend more money in order to get your refund! That's insulting.  Shoulda bought from Amazon.

Name: mar
Comment: I bought an EXPENSIVE ride on for my son from Terrace Walmart and he only used it TWICE and it stopped working. NOT happy. I do not recommend buying from Walmart.

Name: Linda Brzak
Comment: Will not go there again! Way too many people NOT wearing masks. Store needs to make it a policy or can't go in. Nit hard to do if Walmart is really co concerned about their customers.

Name: Rita Galeas
Comment: I love Walmart so much! Walmart is the best, thank you for keeping their prices competitive to other supermarkets, and have good stuff, they are very good in customer service and is easy to shop online or in person.

Name: David
Comment: I appreciate Walmart so much, for keeping their prices competitive to other supermarkets, thanx dw

Name: T. Enos
Comment: Tried to order a Acade1up machine as a birthday gift for a friend. I live in CT and he lives in NY. Ordered it online, got a confirmation and then about 10 minutes later a "Walmart has Canceled your order" email. I guess the website on the phone duplicated the shipping address as my billing and even though my credit card okay'd it Walmart didn't. Okay, your web site on the iphone sucks. Let's move to the computer.  Second time, used the computer, ensured the delivery and billing addresses were correct, submitted it, 5 minutes later same Walmart has canceled your order email. Lets try calling them to fix the order.  Called the company, went for the call back 1 hour 45 minutes later (I get it, it's busy right now with everything going on). Got the call back, guy I talked to was nice but he couldn't help, said it was because I did not use that specific credit card at Walmart.com before... Escalated it to someone else who said they overrode the system and I had to order it again after 30 minutes and within an hour and it will absolutely go through.  40 minutes later....Third time is a charm right...no way, submitted the order, correct addresses everything, 5 minutes later, Walmart has canceled my order. Needless to say, I am all set. If they couldn't get it right after 3 tries I am moving on. Target was no problem and price matched it - Done with Walmart Online and BUYER BEWARE.  Now I'll wait and see if the three pending charges on my credit card for $350 a piece disappear or not.

Name: Nik K.
Comment: This was a fun experience to try out! I didn't realize how small the actual store was but everything was calculated correctly and we were in and out within 5 minutes without checking out.

Name: Juan
Comment: I purchased a pack of 6 hair products and only received 5, I contacted Walmart via the chat feature only to later be emailed stating that I was shipped the correct amount. Hey Walmart, Iâ€™m frugal but not a thief which is more than I can say for you!

Name: Pretty Fly
Comment: I bought 2 TVs but got a broken TV and a baby gate.  I don't know how this can happen in modern e-commerce with barcodes and such.  The first thing is that the one TV arrived with a broken display. The second TV came as the wrong item. Ok, you might think I'm overly dramatic. Stay tuned, and there is more.  So I went on their website, contacted customer support to get my TV switched for a baby gate (wrong item). At this time, I didn't even unpack the other TV, so I didn't know it was damaged (I bought it for my rental). The customer support lady told me they're sending a replacement my way, and I was like, daaam, Amazon has competition right there. Well, no, actually, I got an email from Walmart (which I skipped because the lady said they're sending a replacement) that stated that I needed to return my item first. Okay, that makes sense, but I wouldn't have waited 7 days to do it. But ok, my bad, so I did turn in the post office. And voila, another 7 days goes by, still no sign of my replacement item. So I contact support again, and they have no f-ing clue what's going on and can't help me. They're actually asking me to call USPS and check with them the status of the item I dropped. (reminder: They sent me the wrong item).  Alright, so I ignore that problem for a while and install the one TV that I got to my rental and then SURPRISE!! Broken screen. Alright, this time I contact support. I don't want a replacement; I want a refund. But this time, I read an email, and it says I need to return my item first to get a refund. Now I am at the point where I don't know what I should do because the one item I returned still hasn't been received, and naturally, I didn't get my replacement. Then how am I expected to send this as a return when the same thing can happen.  Hopefully, if you lasted by now, you understand that I'm not overly dramatic. I hope, and I pray to God someone will read this and not buy at Walmart.com. Just do yourself a favor, pay a tiny bit extra at Amazon, and just enjoy the experience. Both buying and returning. I regret the day I decided to buy at Walmart. It cost me money, time spent with stupid support people, and I am still not done with them at the end of the day.  PLEASE DONT IGNORE THIS

Name: kiki Reeves
Comment: Horrible service!!!!!!!!!!!! I have ordered many times, the last 2 times I paid for express and never received my order and had to wait for days to get my money back! I live in largo Florida! Do not use this app if you expect good service!

Name: Brock Simard
Comment: ok so let me get this straight i may be ten but i have the expeirience of a 40 year old divorcesd man at walmart the ten years ive been alive walmart was the only thing there for me its the best place on earth if i could have my birthday there i would in a heart beat its just amazing how kind and geonourours the employes are i think im goona cry how heart warming walmart is thank you for your time love you walmart from brock in nanaimo.

Name: Diana Brown
Comment: I purchased online a mattress from your LaMarque, TX location and received an email stating I could pick it up at 12:00 PM today. I went in to see if I could pick it up early at 10:30 am and the lady said it was in the back that I would have to wait for them to retrieve it and it would be a little after 12:00 pm, while I sat in your parking lot from that time till 12:10 pm they stated that they sent me an email telling me it was cancelled that the inventory was wrong. I looked at my email and at 11:24 am they cancelled the order after they told me it was in the back and I was sitting outside. This is very unprofessional!

Name: latyra james
Comment: I ordered 2 items neither had all the parts to assembly gave them 2 chances to send out correct parts that was missing and they sent the wrong parts i called last week for a refund & they start sending out emails trying to send more parts after i requested for a refund now i just called today and they said no refund was issued so at this point i will not order anything else through their services i also ordered it for the extra 79$ for them to assembly my tv stand that was ordered "HANDY SERVICES" set up an appointment and never showed up & never rescheduled so i had to call them to ask what's going on and if i could just be refunded they said they sent the refund but it has been over 2 weeks & still no refund DO NOT ORDER THROUGH WALMART ONLINE IT IS HORRIBLE SERVICE & PRODUCTS

Name: Karen
Comment: I really did not want to give it any stars at all. My daughter had just got her wisdom teeth pulled and went to get prescription filled and she could not have been treated more rude. She was told it was not called in yet and when my daughter called the Dr he said it was called in but they were terrible about checking their messages. When my daughter told them that, they refused to check their messages and we stood there for 20 minutes until I lost my temper and ask if anyone was going to take care of this. My daughter stood there in tremendous pain (never complained) and the man said rudely to me, that he was taking care of it. I took my daughter out of there and they were suppose to text her but never did. She had to call hours later to find out it was filled. Never again will I use their services!! This was the Adrian Michigan Pharmacy

Name: CL
Comment: I will never work with Walmart.com ever again. Not only does 1 of out 4 tires get lost the customer service is TERRIBLE and not willing to go above and beyond in helping fix the problem.

Name: Meg
Comment: I ordered storage bins online on March 22. It was supposed to be available for pickup April 9. I have contacted the chat support 5 times and 5 times been told the situation has been escalated. Iâ€™ve tried cancelling and requesting a refund but was told that couldnâ€™t happen the first 4 times. The most recent time the CS rep told me I would receive a refund within 2-3 business days. 1 week later I received an email saying I never responded so the issue is considered â€œresolvedâ€. This is ridiculous...itâ€™s been two months... just give me my money back we donâ€™t need the bins to move anymore.

Name: Richard Paverd
Comment: Ordered a new Apple AirTag online for pickup on May 2nd. Notified of delay - which is undestandable for a new product. On 3rd May notified of further delay until 6th of May. Checked online and STILL out of stock. Obviously a bait and switch approach on the basis that they will sell everything to the first available customer... And then they have the gall to send out a request for me to review the product! On completing the review - showing my displeasure at the lack of customer service - the website threw an error stating "try again later" possibly it rejects all negative reviews automatically? On contacting "Customer Service" department, they stated that I should go to the store or that they would be happy to cancel the order for me... ! Maybe they should change their name to "Customer Disservice Department"? UPDATE: Within 6 hours of submitting this review I received an email that my device was available for pickup - and the curbside pickup experience was decent. But really, does one have to go to these extremes just to get something from Walmart?

Name: Casey
Comment: I ordered Batman begins this last Monday. It originally said it would be here the next day. Since then it has bounced around multiple times from Thursday, to Friday, to Saturday, back to Thursday, and back to Saturday. This is crazy. The only reason I ordered from Walmart was because before I purchased, I was told it would be here the next day. Yesterday (Thursday) I was parked outside of game world after work ready to head in and pick up this product for myself since I cannot realistically tell when it will be here from Walmart but one check of my Walmart app later and it says my product will be delivered later that day. I went home not wanting to have paid for this product twice to have it show up hours later. Not only did it not show up but It wonâ€™t be showing up today either. The ONLY reason I ordered this from Walmart was because it was expected to be in my possession 4 days ago. I will be headed out today for another trip to get this product I should have gone out for myself anyways. I expect a full refund once I do and will be taking the correct steps through Walmart to get it. Will never ever order online through Walmart again and I donâ€™t recommend anybody else do either.  Edit: game showed up Saturday with a broken box. Disk was fine and playable but now I have a broken box to add to my shelf. Without sending the game itself back there is no option of refund. Stay away from ordering packages off of Walmart.

Name: erik ramos
Comment: When you need something, just simply walk through a walmart and you can find what you are looking for at lower prices.

Name: GaryTheBadger
Comment: I worked at the Walmart Home Office for six years in a white-collar management position. Glad to be employed BUT way too conservative for me, it interfered with my ability to be myself and contribute the most possible. I was actually asked by a second-level manager not to ask so many questions!! And I was told to change a report value that was $666k, because of someone's superstition! And the lay-off process is for six-year-old's, rather than adults who would continue contributing after being notified. Instead, we're immediately walked to the door for the last time, hand over your badge, you'll get your personal belongings later.

Name: Brad Geller
Comment: Good range of food and quality at a great price. What more to you need

Name: John M
Comment: Not great customer service, looking for a refund on item lost in shipping only to be told THEIR procedure on going through their distributor,not interested in Walmarts problems,would prefer to get regund without runaround.

Name: George Mouratidis
Comment: I asked the manager about coronavirus restrictions he said we donâ€™t believe on it but we advise our employees whatever government says

Name: Shelby Watt
Comment: Very disappointed shopper. Ordered approximately $900 of clothing items online. Half the items were of very poor quality and sizing was way off. Return process is very difficult. I expected better from a well known company like walmart. Will not order any more clothing items from online.

Name: Disappointed walmart shopper
Comment: I want to return the item.    On May 14, 2020, at 9:24 PM, kwanshop wrote:   Dear Disappointed walmart shopper  Thanks for your call and so sorry for all the inconvenience.  We accept the return and refund. But since we are the third party seller on Walmart, we are afraid that you need to return the products to our own warehouse and pay for the shipping.   The returning might be troublesome and the shipping is expensive. And Walmart allows sellers to charge a restocking fee of up to 20% for returns.  To save you time and energy, what do you think we offer you total US$10 refund of the order and you keep the product please?   Waiting for your reply.  Regards.  (This is terrible 3rd party business for faithful walmart customers. I am afraid to even attempt to send the Item back because after I finally read the reviews on the Kwanshop website, I read that a lot of people never got their refund, and so they dont have the Item and they didnt get a refund. This is bad business for Walmart.

Name: Richard A. Gould
Comment: I will never order from Walmart to have something delivered again. Waiting a month for a lousy pair of socks disgusting of WalMart delivery. So take my advice if you want something from Walmart you're better off to pick it up then to have it delivered believe me the delivery time is disgusting.

Name: Yannick
Comment: I ordered a elastic band kit mid march and it was supposed to arrive mid April and still nothing has arrived it's unaceptable even in this situation ... 2 months is bad logistics

Name: Reinaldo Galindez
Comment: I order a 65 inch Roku on the 5/6/2020,,and tryed to call and I even emailed them,,for a tracking number,,,and they never responded,and not only that,,,on the 15 when I'm supost to get the tv..they send me a canselation on my TV,,,wow I bought it with my credit card,,,waiting,and the last they day cansel......I would never order online again...

Name: Stella Ramos
Comment: best store in the world takes corona seriously and everyone wears masks.

Name: Marina R.
Comment: Fun experience! Basic and not so basic convenience store eats. If your visiting you have to go and experience it!

Name: marion
Comment: I contacted the walmart manager of the white horse road store in greenville sc on 5-14-21 to ask about purchasing a pallet of mulch that was in stock. I asked him if it could be loaded with a fork lift ,he said no but there would be ample help to load 68 bags of wet mulch. After talking to him I went to the store around 6:30 pm and was told the garden dept was closed and I would have to come back another day. 5-15 8 am I arrived at the store 35 min to check out then waited for help to arrive to help load the 1st pallet. Back at the store at 10am for the 2nd pallet 30 min check out , no help!!!! loaded all by myself, nobody ever checked the load out , no help anywhere, If I was not honest ????? store is in trouble with the help walking around playing with their phones and not doing what they are being paid to do, I have run my own business for 37 years and to me this is just bad management from the top down . This will most likley be my last vist to walmart!!!!!!!!

Name: Sonu Grewal
Comment: If your customer service representative unable to answer our questions then dude why are you paying them, at least save your money despite paying people who put the customers on hold for hours instead of replying to them. Today I talk to two representatives both are ridiculous, don't know how to treat customers, none of them helped me. if we are placing an order for curbside pick up then why are you charging $5 for product handling. Moreover, why do you put the minimum requirement of $35 for grocery pick up? I do not have an option for negative that's why I had to select one star, but believe me, your service is below zero.ðŸ‘ŽðŸ‘ŽðŸ‘ŽðŸ‘Ž

Name: Brooke Gorman
Comment: The employees literally harass people into getting the Walmart rewards card. I said no at least 7 times that day to the same employee and she insisted on taking my information and setting the card up so I said whatever, if it will make her leave me alone about it. She made it CLEAR AS DAY that the first purchase is FREE. I got out my debit card and I was still ready to pay but she said â€œNO ITS FREE, you use this as a points cardâ€ basically made it sound like an optimum card with shoppers. Long story short, I now have a past due balance on my account from 5 months ago, and the card was never mailed to me.

Name: anomous
Comment: If I could leave no stars I would. I placed an order for a swimming pool that showed in stock for $288. Several hours past and I get an email stating they are sold out and I will be refunded the cost of the pool. I go back online to take a look for another one and see the EXACT SAME POOL FOR $715! They refunded my money and increased the price. When I confronted them, they claimed that they are out of stock and this item would be a third party seller, and they could not modify the price. I got this answer after several hours of several agents lying to me about it being out of stock and then in stock at another store and then out of stock again. I lose count as to what they said as it changed every 5 minutes. One agent actually ended our conversation with me still talking. Another just wanted to ignore me. Really nice customer service.....not! Poor customer service and that is putting it nicely.

Name: Sarahshope Newman
Comment: Since you have dropped your Mask requirements, we will no longer be shopping in your stores.

Name: Betty A. Butron
Comment: I have been a Walmart customer for years, unfortunately not by choice. But for the last two years their customer service from the floor all the way to the cashiers has gone to be a horrible place to shop. On the floor if you ask for help, no one can coz they claim the belong to other departments no matter which one you need the help on. Then when you find some that is willing to help they have no knowledge about their floor products, so then they cannot help coz lack of product and floor items knowledge. Most of every one has an attitude and want to treat you like a child. They get loud and obnoxious. Then I looking for products made in USA, and very few. Good luck most of their merchandise is MADE IN â€œCHINA ðŸ‡¨ðŸ‡³â€œ low quality junk that donâ€™t last. Merchandise quality much better. Cashiers and customer service are attentive and good ðŸ˜Œ So, bye bye China ðŸ‡¨ðŸ‡³ Walmart!

Name: Patrick McCroskey
Comment: I am slow to learn, sometimes. Everytime I make an order on Walmart.com the same thing happens. I get a notification it is on it's way (sometimes they even claim it is early). I am directed to FedEx tracking and the package says out for delivery and arriving that day. That will be the case all day even though the departure and arrival scans are not updating. Then, right before delivery deadline, the status will change to pending, no longer saying that it will be delivered that day or even WHEN it will be delivered. Then, after that, there are calls to FedEx where they say its not their fault followed by customer service calls to Walmart where they say its not their fault. This continues a few days and then I finally get a notification that the order was canceled due to being out of stock. This has happened to me no less than 5 times. It is ridiculous. Mark my words..."I WILL NEVER NEVER NEVER AGAIN PURCHASE ANY ITEM FROM WALMART.COM TO BE DELIVERED."

Name: Karen Smith
Comment: While visiting our Local Wal-mart in Hudson, NH on May 14, 2022 we went in to get a few things, and when we were ready to check out, only 1 cash register was opened, sure the self serve registers were there, but a lot of senior citizens do not like to use them, well this 1 cash register that was opened the line went all the way around the store, worse than Christmas time, people in line were getting extremely pissed as well as I was, there shouldnâ€™t have to be only 1 cash register opened they needed more opened, because of this I will never shop at Wal-mart again, you need to have more registers opened for your customers, I am a very unhappy customer, but never again, GOODBYE WAL-MART.

Name: Kay grech
Comment: I shop online at Wal-Mart, great deals free shipping, love this store

Name: Snow Mills
Comment: I placed a order for a happy birthday sign for my grandaughters 6th birthday. It went through then it was cancelled due to high demand. We went to the store and found it. Are they to lazy to get it. Do only people who want it enough to go to the store to get it, get it. This isn't the first time. If I can go there and find it shouldn't s person that works there be able to. So disappointed that they don't even try. You really need to hire new people with a better with ethic.

Name: Barbara Cicerchi
Comment: What is up with your eggs? Everyone of the 36 eggs I got the yolks where so thick they wouldn't mix, ugg. So disgusting. As if they were partially cooked some how. Thank God for Aldi's. BTW I'm so glad I saw theses other reviews before I bought a $600 tv online.

Name: Chuck
Comment: One star is actually one too many. I ordered on April 30 fro Walmart a Resistance Band Set for $33.99 with free shipping, prior to payment told my order would arrive on 4 May 2020, after checkout it changed to 8 May 2020 and it was coming from a vendor not Walmart US Prime Technology. On 01 May 2020 I received shipping confirmation from Fremont CA with tracking number that it had shipped. It is now 16 May 2020 and I have not received it and the order delivery has not been updated. I sent a message to Walmart help line on 13 May and 15 May, each time Walmart robot responded email with a US AMPRIME Technology would respond within one business day and the US AMPRIME Technology has not responded. I blame Walmart on this as Walmart is who I placed this order with, they do not respond to me other than ROBO emails. Walmart's policy is once an item ships the order cannot be canceled. So technically my order has shipped even though it apparently only moved once on May 1st and never again since, Checking reviews online for US AMPRIME Technology finds a pattern of similar complaints, orders reported shipped to one location then not moving again. Again I ordered form Walmart, that was the website and reviews I read for the product, At this point I consider my money stolen by an online scheme that one of the worlds biggest companies is part of. Never going to shop online with Walmart again.

Name: Amber Johnson
Comment: Walmart.com. what do i have to do for you to be honest and deliver my tv. i order this on april 20 and now it is 5/16/2020. I dont think I am being unreasonable. I just want the item I spent my time finding and saving for. why cant i sue this big box company for wasting my time.

Name: AndrÃ© Innocenzi
Comment: Customer service is awful. Very complicate to return items.

Name: Noha Haidar
Comment: I will never do business with them again. I used to spend an average of 300 $weekly till I had an accident at one of their stores, where a bottle of the sunny D drink that I took off the shelf was broken and spilled and stained my beige coat and brown Coach purse. The manager came and see the whole situation and was sorry and promised to compensate. I went to the cash and as usual,and I paid my bill. A week later the insurance company called me and investigated the situation and then they found out that they were not responsible and the manufacture is . I also had to wait for the manufacturer investigation who also found irresponsible. The case end up dismissed and Walmart didn't take any responsibility not even an apology. Very poor customer service, they don't care about their customers no such think called customer loyalty, and very poor complaint handling procedure.

Name: Onesi Girona
Comment: Consumer be ware! Walmart will wash their hands of any gift card purchase at their stores, other than their own!! What's worse they will not even make sure that the gift card provider will actually help you, the customer, resolve your issues. Their employees and managers have a drilled speech and will not go beyond this to help you.

Name: Joseph Daleo
Comment: I recently ordered supplements from Walmart.com and it was delivered in a flimsy shopping bag by Doordash! One of the items was placed loose on my doormat for the photo.  What is the head of shipping thinking? My items will be packed in a box and delivered by a shipper or quite frankly I will buy online from someone else.  If I wanted it delivered this way any grocery store or drugstore would have been better and faster.  Learned my lesson order supplements elsewhere.

Name: Henry Hellen
Comment: Never ever ever order online with walmart I purchased a Sony DualShock Playsation 4 controller and received a complete counterfeit then when I reported it, it took 8 months and over 30 phone calls to get a refund there staff continuously lied while speaking them them absolutely disgusted with the customer service and professionalism of this place, never again in my life will I spend another dollar here

Name: Science Guy
Comment: My wife and I were at Walmart (Langley, BC Canada) today. Some guy took a quick video of us. I walked up to him and looked at his phone to be sure, I seen the video recording screen. This is happening at all the large stores. I'm sure management knows about this but they are not going to do anything about it, it happens too frequently and would use up too much of their resources. Comment: I got the Walmart plus membership at the end of last year and have had nothing but trouble with the delivery and customer service at the Walmart at metro phoenix az. I have on many occasions received items with another customers name sticker on the bag. Once my order went to the wrong address and they just cancelled it all together making it so that I had to wait 7 days for a refund rather than correcting and delivering. Last sunday I made a large order of $430 and paid express shipping for it to be delivered in 2 or less hours. should have been here by 6pm latest. When I did the customer service chat they called and no one answered. They asked if I wanted a refund and I said no, I dont want the funds being held for a week just put a note to have it delivered tomorrow. The next day the store canceled the order and funds are being held anyway. So two days later I attempt again and put in a $270 order the day before and in the morning its late and says delayed delivery. I call the store and get hung up on at customer service a few times before someone finally puts me on hold for about 10 mins then gets me to a manager, Kristin, and she checks into it and says she will text me from her personal phone so I can get updates. Never does this which is fine just bs. Calls me back to say it will be here at 11am. The number they list for this seller "has a voicemail that has not been set up." I am very disappointed with the "hands off" approach Walmart seems to be taking with this. If you are going to sell products from a third party via your website you would think they'd want to hold them to a higher standard, or at least facilitate cancelling your order in cases where it appears the item will truly not ship.

Name: Louise Ungro
Comment: All Walmarts are not taking clothes back for refunds or exchanges, its been months since the first breakout of the China Covid 19 yet, customer service keeps refusing my refunds by repeating the same thing over and over.....its "Walmart policy during the covid 19 pandemic to not allow any refunds or exchanges for clothing"....However, its been five months and beyond the crisis now and Walmart still refuses to refund or exchange clothing worse yet, these clothes were purchased without trying them on in store which was the first rule "no one is allowed to try on clothing" so it was a guessing game as to fit and style for ourselves and others we bought for, at this point it doesn't look good that we will ever get our money back. Walmart is too big a deal on our very lives, I feel they are bent on not ever returning back to normal again. Thank goodness for competition we can go elsewhere for food and clothing and other necessities which will help our businesses immensely to finally get their rightful place again since Walmart took over years ago and nearly wiped them out heartlessly by selling cheaper products mainly from China and didn't mind damaging smaller businesses across this country, they are still presently the largest importer of China goods. Shame on you Walmart.

Name: Bindu G.
Comment: Amazon go was an amazing experience for me. The store piqued my curiosity long ago but I didn't get the opportunity to go that side. I finally stepped in without any assumptions. Firstly one has to download the amazongo app on their mobile for entry. I had already done that a while ago. It has a bar code which has to be scanned at the entry gate which slides you in with no issues. I walked around the store looking at the food, drinks, chocolates, etc they even have alcohol by the way. I had no intent to shop but I wanted to experience the shopping experience hence I picked a coconut water and simply walked out. I must be honest I did feel I was stealing . The app was updated about the sale and the value maybe within 5 Mins and that was it. It's simple and super cool in My opinion. I went on a saturday afternoon and the crowd was moderate but I have a hunch that it can be bad during evenings and also during the lunch hours on weekdays. Happy hassle and human free shopping people! Go try!

Name: Angela Delfino
Comment: I ordered a birthday present 5-10-21 Fedex said it would arrive 5-13-21, it didn't. I called walmart.com and fedex for days only to get the run around then finally 5-19-21 walmart.com broke the news to me that my order was lost. They also charged my credit card on 5-12-21. All I wanted was the truth which was to hard for walmart.com and fedex to do.

Name: Michael Kirchoff likemindsreative
Comment: I ordered a chaise lounge for a friend for Motherâ€™s Day. Delivery date came and went and no sign of my item. Now Iâ€™m told itâ€™s on back order with no specific timeframe for delivery. They should have told me this before taking my payment and wasting my time.  Called customer service three times and was routed to Central America, India, and the Philippines. My complaint is still unresolved. I just cancelled my order. A very crappy experience.

Name: Jazzy
Comment: Almost every interaction I've had shopping on the app or on the main Walmart.com site has pleasant and positive. The prices are great, they are super inexpensive, the products are good quality most of the time. It's easy to get a refund if the product doesn't work or if it isn't what you expected it to be. The only issue with the site is some items are out of stock and you don't know when (or if) they will ever come back in stock.  Walmart delivers faster than Amazon does (sometimes on the very next day for certain items) and you don't have to pay Walmart for their service like you have to pay Amazon Prime. Just meet the minimum $35 threshold.  Grocery pickup is quick and convenient. I just find whatever food I want to buy, checkout and choose a time & day to pick it up. The only issue I have with it is some items are out of stock but they have good substitutes available. If you don't like the substitutes, you can just cancel them.  Online shopping is easy. The app works well, it never crashes or freezes.  Honestly, if I ever had a negative experience, it's usually almost always in store (not surprising). But this review is for the main Walmart.com site/app.  Overall, I have had a pleasant and easy experience using the site. And I have been a loyal customer for years.

Name: GH
Comment: When another online store let me down, Walmart saved my bacon by quickly shipping the items I needed for a birthday party. The items arrived in 2 days and were very well packaged, and I didn't even pay for shipping!

Name: Ð™Ð¾Ð½Ð°Ñ ÐšÐ°Ð½Ð²Ð°Ð»ÑŒÐ´

Waited 45 minutes to be told they couldn't find it. To avoid interest I had to pay for it in my credit card bill. Hours of wasted time & gas plus $536.00, tall grass & no mower.

Comment: Walmart has some fast shipping time. I like the ease of use on their website and how fast it was it find the product that I wanted. They also have a layaway program that'll help save an item for you at the store location. Very helpful.. best prices all around.

Name: Jonathan
Comment: Like everyone is saying the 2 day shipping is false. Was hoping this would be another place to shop & get fast free shipping but guess not, I had guaranteed Delivery by Today & it was rescheduled to tomorrow & they couldn't do anything because "it already shipped" The order was split into separate shipments for some reason, the 1st part which I needed today, shipped first but is not on time! the part 2, which I didn't need soon, came hours after it shipped! DO NOT use Walmart if you need something by 2 days it will most likely not arrive!

Name: John Fitzmaurice
Comment: Every time I have looked for something they have it without exaggeration. There clearances are very good prices.

Name: Ismael Martinez
Comment: I get a call from Walmart telling me my Womenâ€™s Bike that Iâ€™ve been wanting for a couple weeks is in, I ask Jeff thatâ€™s in the Bike department and he also the person that called me if he can hold the bike til 3pm Iâ€™m getting a ride there to pick it up,, I get there at 1pm and he tells me that he sold it and heâ€™s sorry,are you for reals!!!!!! I had my daughter coming from another town to take me to Yakima Walmart in time and bike is sold!!!!!ðŸ˜žðŸ˜£

Name: Grouchy Dude
Comment: The Walmart in Napa Ca is run by idi*ts! I ordered a Scoob lights and sound at was instructed by the website to pick it up at Napa,Ca Walmart. I presented my bar code and a DynoMutt plushie comes out. I asked for help and some an Asian lady at the checkout literallys says, "I dunno know..." I stared at her for a minute until I see a light bulb shine over her head and she says, "Maybe I can find help for you...." She then asks another employee who then procededs to get someone to help me. At the pickup kiosk, the employee comes over to me and says "I don't know..." with a dumb look on her face. She then procedes to tell me that because I ordered online, i need to contact someone online and get a refund. I ask her, "Someone in your store loaded the kiosk and put in the wrong order.." She looked confused. Because I was only charge $7 or so and I had my 2 kids with me, I didn't feel I needed to make a scene for so little money so I left. I don't care about the money or my order not being fulfilled. What I hate the most is the sheer incompetence in that store! I know you don't need an education to work there, but at least get competent people who do custome service. I'm never, EVER shopping there again. I will either go to Safeway or Costco for my grocery needs.

Name: cesar
Comment: I am only giving one star because that's the lowest I can give. I don't know which of their service to name WORST First. WELL let me be fair THE ONLY THING THEY ARE GOOD AT IS CHARGING YOUR CREDIT CARD. When I contacted them for first time to find out where part of my order was, a representative from some where in ASIA not in the US let me know it was out of stock. Why to send something incomplete unless you want to upset customer. Why one has to contact a third party if I purchased thru WALMART.com. Getting my money back is a mission. I also had to print returning label thru USPS. Take the heavy box on top of scale cuz they could not do it at post office among some other headaches this order cuz me. Thanks Walmart for teaching me a lesson. NEVER EVER AIGAN.

Name: Rusty.a davison
Comment: Walmart sucks they rip me off and not buying from there again

Name: Joseph Locke
Comment: I ordered a white board from Walmart. After they charged my credit card and sent me a notification that it has shipped, it did not arrive. When I finally made contact (they are â€œreceiving an unexpectedly high volume of callsâ€) they gave me a refund, as if it wasnâ€™t their problem that the product hadnâ€™t been delivered. Unfortunately, I needed the item and have waited 10 days for delivery. Now I am stuck without a way to get one in time for my presentation. Stay away from Walmart.com!! They are neither reliable or responsive.

Name: Dre Robinson
Comment: Walmart needs to bring on some chick fil A hiring personel because the people they're hiring today is just terrible. Door greeters don't greet because they're too busy texting. Sales associates can't even tell you were the bathrooms are, even though I'm sure they use them quit often. And when you ask someone a simple question like: excuse me, could you tell me where peanut butter is? They turn around slowly like they wanna punch you in the face for doing the job they get paid for. Crazy! Don't think about asking for a manager, chances are the associate you want to complain about are close friends with manager. So nothings going to change. I went in Tuesday for new releases on dad's as always and the associate I asked never answered she just pointed to the manager next to her, I guess her voice box was disconnected. The manager saw her response and simply said: oh yeah they "might" be up front. Okay thankx for nothing.

Name: Harry k
Comment: Ordered cooking oil from walmart that i needed the next weekend. Website said 1 day shipping. The item was lost in shipping. Contacted customer service, they said they would cancel the order. I went to the store and bought the item I needed there. Walmart then ships a replacement of the missing items and bills me. Later the missing shipment shows up and walmart sends and email that they are rebilling me for it unless I call them... I will never do buisness with them again. Why do I have to just through hoops for their mistakes... the $100 isn't worth my time to wait on hold to fix their mistakes. Amazon treats customers better.

Name: Renee
Comment: I would rate zero stars if I could. Their customer service is the WORST I have ever experienced in over 30 years and I will NEVER buy from them again. When you call their customer service you have at a minimum over an hour WAIT TIME, then you get transferred again and again for each time OVER AN HOUR HOLD,they will not give you any identifier that links your conversation back to a person - no ID NUMBER - only First name and Last Name initial which is NO HELP when you have a problem. They made a typo in my email but will NOT Fix it nor forward the email the right address. DO NOT BUY FROM THEM - THEIR C/S IS NON EXISTENT i COULD NOT BE MORE FRUSTRATED AND SPENT OVER 5 HOURS FIXING THEIR PROBLEMS - AND IS IS NO EXAGGERATION. THE MOST MADDENING EXPERIENCE. DO NOT USE COVID AS AN EXCUSE NOT TO DO YOUR JOB. SHAME ON WALMART ..

Name: Al Carr
Comment: Received my order on time. However, there is no information on their site to assist on how to obtain a refund on broken glass food containers. So, now I am out the amount I paid for the broken items that cannot be shipped back.

Name: sandra k
Comment: Such poor customer service that its unbelievable. I will NEVER order from the Walmart site again!! April 19th I placed an order. My credit card was charged. States I would receive order May 1-6th. No order arrived And NO ONE will respond to my questions. Please be aware of this company

Name: Wendie Renee Halbert
Comment: If I could give no stars I would but it forced me to give at least one star to write a review. I will be deleting my Walmart app and never purchasing through them again. I have ordered and shopped Walmart for years. Recently I ordered tiles for a floor and they took my money and never received my tiles. I have also ordered two area rugs and they have not made it to my door either. They are ridiculous when you call customer service they are saying they have nothing to do with it and they canâ€™t help me. Do not order through Walmart. They are awful.

Name: Yuriy
Comment: Exselent prices. Big veriaty. Good quality.

Name: EyeWitnesssDeath
Comment: I shop at a Wal-Mart in North Carolina regularly. I always buy a 40 pack of the store brand water (equate) during my visits. The packs have been $2.86 for years. Within a week of my last arrival, the price jumped to $3.98. If that is not price gouging I don't know what is!

Name: Debra Davidson
Comment: Order a smart Bracelet last month and when I received it it didn't work I have called the company 3 times And was told by Janet that I would receive a replacement in about 9days it's been 2weeks no replacement. I have always enjoyed what I ordered from company but no I don't. This is good Walmart. Com

Name: Karen Starnes
Comment: Walmart really went above and beyond today. I used the self checkout to buy a full length mirror and I set it aside and sadly I bumped it and it fell over and shattered in the middle of the floor. I was incredibly sad bc it was the last mirror and thought I would have to pay for it, but the woman in self check out said it was okay and refunded it and even asked me if I was okay. It was a sad & embarrassing trip to Walmart but I really appreciated the customer service bc it could have been a lot worse.

Name: Mo
Comment: This is a horrible delivery online service.....they have problems, I was told when ordered online that would receive my orders yesterday 5-18-20...today is 5-19-20 and still no orders delivered yet.....tracking number says on way to destination now for almost two days.....Sam Walton would turn over in his grave if he knew how downhill Walmart has gone.....sad but true. Mo

Name: Frank Lopez
Comment: My complaint is about one of the Walmart's in Pearland, TX. It seems that on some items when prices are increased apparently overnight. The registers are changed to reflect the new price, but the tags on the shelves when they can be found are not changed. I have been surprised almost every time at the register. The price can be anywhere from 10 cents to a couple of dollars (I never but major stuff at Walmart). It may not be much of a price difference, but add that with the daily amount of people getting overcharged than it becomes quite a bit. I now only but at Walmart if I have no other option. Too bad they ran all the other businesses off by undercutting them. Bottom line is they are a monopoly and in need of competition.

Name: KellyP Parde
Comment: The item I purchased was not as expected. The vacuum I purchased looked like it had been previously used. I now have to ship it back and wait longer for the new one to be shipped out. NOT happy with my experience. I should have just gone into the store.

Name: Popi
Comment: I have shopped the Carthage Walmart for over 30 yrs! Now I shop at Aldi's and King Cash for a decent purchase. One they do not move their products around the entire store so i can actually get an idea where my items are located. They do not price gouge products overnight like Walmart continues to practice. While they move it to a new more for a higher price in the name of marketing. This is our thanks for supporting our local "GREEDY" hope you go broke carthage Walmart!

Name: Elizabeth
Comment: I do grocery pick-up with Wal-Mart. It's very easy, the app is super simple to use. I have only had one time, out of many that my fresh groceries weren't very fresh. I went to customer service and they refunded me for every item that wasn't good. Other than that, every other time my orders have been perfect. The staff is always very polite and hard working.

Name: Matt
Comment: I do not recommend walmart. They took my payment, delivered my item in another city and now I have to dispute with my bank. According to the rep. I could get compensation if I re-ordered, but it would take 2 weeks to deliver. What a Shame.

Name: Joody
Comment: WARNING: I made an online purchase from Walmart from one of their third party sellers. I was unhappy with the product. I followed the instructions on the Walmart website and promptly took the unused product to a Walmart store for a return. Unfortunately Walmart did not follow their own return policy and did not return the product. Instead, they shifted the responsibility to the third party seller. The 100% satisfaction gaurantee is a joke. I will never purchase anything from Walmart again and I will tell as many people as possible about the terrible customer service experience that I received today. Update: Itâ€™s 2 weeks later with many phone calls and broken promises from Walmart. They took my product back but have not returned my money. Many reviewers have called Walmart crooks. I can see why.

Name: George Long
Comment: We went to the Walmart at High Ridge to have my girl friend's glasses repaired and Jennifer Garrett was so helpful and pleasant that she saved our day so much that I must tell you what a great employee you have there. She did not charge us anything for installing the nose pads that we purchased there and I wanted to give her a tip for her fine service and she informed us of the no tipping policy that Walmart has. Boo Walmart!!! These folks are so nice and they work hard. I hope you will take this review in consideration when it becomes evaluation and raise time for this lovely lady with an excellent personality. She is an employee to be proud of. Sincerely George Richard Long ( a long time and regular Walmart shopper)

Name: Mark Cremer
Comment: WalMart is a ripoff that seems to know no bounds. I purchased a $25 blu ray thinking I was getting a movie but it turned out to be a freaking cartoon. As soon as I realized that, I returned it to the store, less than 20 minutes after purchase and was told that because of copyright it could not be returned. I will NEVER shop at Walmart again.

Name: Terry Nesmith
Comment: Eye glass lenses are bad quality. I've more trouble with glasses from Walmart than any other company. They don't honor their warranty. I would not trust them.

Name: Eric Harritt
Comment: They're okay. Customer service could be a lot better a lot of employees acts rude seems like they hate working there.

Name: Kippie Matthews
Comment: Centerville Walmart is the most unclean and disrespectful store I have ever been to

Name: M Mc
Comment: I ordered from "Walmarts Site". However it turns out that the majority of the listings are actually from 3rd Party Vendors. Warning- Walmarts guarantees/protections apparently do not extend to these third party listings. One of these scammers got me and there is nothing I can do but cry.

Name: Tammy Sprowes
Comment: I sent for two dresses from Wal-Mart.com and they are seriously undersized and came with no return address no name of whom I ordered it from. Nothing. Came straight from China

Name: Jane
Comment: Will never come back. Rudest service ever. In fact, no service. No one knows anything. App doesnâ€™t even work. Team lead called to customer service told me she didnâ€™t know answers to basic questions. Went back out to Order Pick Up and waited 15 mins after checking in for 2 small items. Called again as there was only one other car being helped and asked how long it would take for my order to be out. The man said â€œit doesnâ€™t exactly work that way.â€ What???? â€œOh, itâ€™s random,â€ he said. What???? Meanwhile, even though I was on time for pick up, yes, you must abide by WalMartâ€™s rules but there is no advocacy for customers, my card will be charged the full amount and then, hopefully, the amount will be refunded in 3 business days. You are kidding, right? Really? What an atrocity. On my way to Target. Cleaner store, better technology, friendly, helpful associates.

Name: James Roth
Comment: Walmart better get a clue they are more expensive than your local grocery store every product

Name: s Walters
Comment: Do not buy from this company. The mess up ur orders n u have to wait weeks for a refund. I'm done with Walmart everyone should pull together n not buy from them. So they will have no choice but to close there doors

Name: Shannon Amell
Comment: I ordered a serger sewing machine LATE last night and I was supposed to be able to pick it up after 11 am today. Walmart canceled my order without my knowledge , after talking with 3 people, I found out it was out of stock. Not 1 email or text saying it was out of stock. It only said it was unavailable or there was problem and it never said it was canceled. I found that out after I talked to 3 people. That was not $5.00 you people was playing around with, it was $219.00 , to me that is a lot of money!! I will never order form walmart.com again. It was my 1st time ordering online and my last time!! I don't like people messing with our hard earn money!! Your website said it was in stock, but the store says it was not. y'all need ti fix this issue, I found out I am not the only person something like this has happened!! Believe me, if Pell City had another store that carried the items Walmart carriers, I would never step back into the store again! BTW I am still waiting on my $219.00 to be refunded, but it only took seconds for walmart to get it out of my account!!!!!!

Name: Chris Medeiros
Comment: WALMART JUST SUCKS. I could go into vast detail but no one cares stick with Amazon! They have real customer service!

Name: Ian
Comment: I have worked for the company for 10 years as a Licensed Dispensing Optician. I have a perfect record and have brought in over $300,000 in sales each year in the eyeglass field, just working part time. I decided to retire last year and left with a record to be re-hired, if I want to. At store 0706, in Zephyrhills, Florida, they needed a LDO, so I went in to speak with an assitant store manager, who knows NOTHIUNG about optics or the optical industry. I stated I wanted just to help them on a part-time basis until they found another LDO, as they are extremely short staffed. This so-called interview took place on April 29, 2019...  Here is an email I received from WalMart......  _________________________________________________________________  Hello Ian, Thank you for your interest in joining the Walmart family! We appreciate the time you took to apply with us and just wanted you to know we received your application for LICENSED OPTICIAN at Walmart at 7631 GALL BLVD, ZEPHYRHILLS, FL, Facility number is 706.  Unfortunately, at this time we have decided not to move forward as we have other candidates who are more qualified for the position.  We wish you all the best!  The Walmart Team * This account is not monitored, so please do not reply. _____________________________________________________________________  As of today, 5/22/2019, they have NOT interviewed anyone or hired anyone...... My qualifications are of the best, according to my records..... It would appear that the interviewer (name withheld at this time) is either discriminating on both accounts re: gender or religious affliation? Just wonderfing if I should take it further! Is is worth the hassle? To me, it is the principle of the matter.

Name: Estela
Comment: Bought vitamins from them, they didn't arrive and then they ask me to go to the post office to get them, the USPS page says it was delivered, a mystery.. I would NEVER buy from Walmart again. They don't want to refund you and waste your time, NEVER Walmart and their customer service is minus 10.

Name: Diego Gonzalez
Comment: I was looking for a pool and I asked the Walmart employees and none of them helped me . They said it was the flowers but it wasnâ€™t

Name: Jeri Ryan
Comment: Don't ever buy a product protection plan. I have gone round and round with these assurion people to no avail. I have to start over every time. And they make up reasons not to accept the claim

Name: Will Batista
Comment: I wish I could give it. Zero star. I made a $1,000.00 purchased through this crappy company and itâ€™s been a month and I havenâ€™t received the package and no one seems interested in helping me. Itâ€™s a shame it was my wifeâ€™s birthday present that was disregarded and treated like garbage by this shifting store. I have open a claim against Walmart with the Secretary of State and now someone called me but she seems to know nothing that would help my situation. I advise you all to please open a claim with your Secretary of State because they might be prevented to do business until they fix their online problem but we need to open cases and keep opening it until we get heard. Opening a claim with your Secretary of State is easy and quick.

Name: Billy Boyster
Comment: I have had dealings with w.m. and all I get is crap and lies from them, I will never purchase another thing from these aholes. I WOULD GIVE THEM NO STARS IF ABLE TOO!

Name: Geri Durrenberger

Comment: WARNING: Do NOT order anything from Nextgen Living Space!  Through Walmart.com, I made a simple $6 order for a 3 pack of 12 pills, those desolvable ones with sponge creatures inside, for a Sunday School lesson.
