The latest, they want to give me a discount on my next order. NO! I want my product or money back.  This is a second time I ordered from a third party on Walmart.com and both disastrous. Only order Walmart items, not 3rd party.

Name: Momof M
Comment: We can we expect Wal-Mart to remove ANYTHING Chrissy Tegan? Assuming you are against bullying and harassing... right? Or maybe you agree with her telling others to commit suicide?? AMERICA IS WATCHING

Name: Gerald Handschumacher
Comment: I really like WalMart, but... Their products and online shopping experience is wonderful. However, most of all employees at every WalMart location, are extremely unhelpful, rude, and present their lifeless mentality on the public they serve. I wish Walmart was just online. I kinda understand why they're rude, because I worked once for Walmart. They treat there employees like garbage.

Name: Gee Serge
Comment: A w while back I had a problem with a delivery person I contacted Walmart.ca on line shopping and a supervisor gave me a $10.00 promo code good for one month, 1 day before expired I try to use it but it said expired. I found out that the supervisor who issue this credit is a scammer after he sends you the email he or she then make it expired and give to his other scammers they do this to how many customers and Walmart escalation department donâ€™t do nothing .they are a bunch of thieves in there. Stop complaining aswell you are making them rich . Shop somewhere else. Yours truly customer who got rob.

Name: Will Kessler
Comment: I ordered an ipad and a case from their tech center. Turns out i didn't need it, so i went back to the website within 15 minutes of making my order to cancel it. It was very difficult to find, they told me they would cancel it if they could, then sent just an ipad case. Don't waste your time, go ANYWHERE else

Name: James Wilson
Comment: Jpgif Woman Man Fashion Hat Formal Cap Beach Sun Straw Band Outdoor Hat Cap Nice hat. Looks like it was laying out in the middle of the interstate, being run over by 18 wheelers. I thought I could post pictures on here???

Name: Bernard Jefferson
Comment: After placing my first order with walmart on line, I was hooked. I have not driven to them in months. Every order arrived as advertised and on time. Plus we save gas and the planet!

Name: James Anderson
Comment: I shopped online for a bike and it was listed to be at several of my local stores, so I ordered and paid for it. When I went in to pick it up they brought me a different bike! They told me this was what I ordered. I said no, the one I ordered was green and silver. What they brought me was red!  Of all the stores nearby I could find, it said the green and silver was available, when I called, they said it was there, when I went, it was not, all they had was a red one. They told me that the model is the same but they have no choice of colors that they get! [I'm sorry, but WHAT?!!!] Go to a furniture store and order a brown sofa, and when they deliver a blue one, tell me how you feel then! I'm very angry, Won't be ordering from them online any time soon, I won't know what I'll get based on my order!

Name: Mildred Pineda
Comment: I can honestly say this is the last time I purchase anything from Walmart. I ordered a pool May 1st. Got a confirmation email saying it will be delivered to the store for store pick up May 18th. Of course the pool never arrived, and I have only been getting the run around since then. Customer service advised me that the pool will arrive at the store May 21, then, May 22, now it wonâ€™t arrive until sometime next week. I could have ordered 5 pools from amazon and would have received them by them way faster then Walmart.

Name: Anthony Huerta
Comment: Bad idea ordering a tv said in stock two days later get e mail no longer in stock. This was may 1st so I canceled my order now it may 23 still no refund . I call they tried to sell it to me again after saying my refund was in prossess.Three weeks ago

Name: Ama
Comment: DO NOT ORDER FROM WALMART.COM!! I ordered a trampoline with a safety net, 2 separate boxes. Both shipped and provided me with estimated delivery date. Net showed up first and I opened box to prepare to put it all together the next day when trampoline was to arrive. Next day, the trampoline did not arrive. I checked tracking number with UPS and Wal-Mart never shipped the trampoline and its out of stock. Now I have a net, no trampoline. After 5 calls and being on hold for 6 hours, I was told 3 times that a shipping company would be in contact with me to pick up the item for return. 6th call I was told to return the item to my local Walmart (in the middle of the pandemic shut down). 3 weeks later I get recharged for the item because they have no record of the return. Yet another call, I get told they will call me tomorrow morning at 6AM!! So they can transfer me to another department!! Guess we will see if I will be awake tomorrow at 6AM, if not I will be disputing the charge. Don't waste your time, spend the extra few bucks and get your stuff elsewhere unless you enjoy spending hours on the phone with people who barely speak English.

Name: Ericka Robinson
Comment: Walmart south 710 East Ben White the customer service is horrible. I went to pay a Sams club bill there like usual in the customer service department. The young lady that was helping me really wasn't, familiar with the payment process. There was a manager near by and the young lady asked the manager Christina about the process and the manager stated to me "We don't take Sams payments here". I informed Christina that I have always paid my bill there. Christina threw her hands up very disrespectful and rudely and said go to the pay center. I then asked for a manager she got rude and said I am the only manager here, but didn't tell the truth. I call a cousin that works at that Walmart and asked if there is a supervisor on site and yes there was another supervisor on site. I then asked for the phone number to the corporate office. she basically refused to give out that number. I will not be going back to that Walmart any more. Walmarts Manager Christina needs to work on her people skills. Christina needs take more trainings on customer service.

Name: AA J.
Comment: Today I popped into the new Amazon Go on 132nd in Mill Creek. I purchased a turkey & Swiss croissant sandwich as well as Melt in your Mouth cookie from Alki Bakery. The sandwich was decent. The cookie tasted old. I looked for an expiration date, did not find o e. But what I did find was the date the cookie was packaged...01/29/22! What?!! I just purchased a cookie, from a brand new store, that was packed 4mos ago?!! Pretty disappointing Amazon. Things were over priced in comparison to a grocery store or even a small convenience store. I thought it might be worth it for convenience once in awhile but not when you have to sacrifice quality. Amazon failed again.

Name: Cheated
Comment: Recent online purchases were not received. On one order, delivery was delivered by Grub Hub, which I DID NOT WANT. I wanted the bag of party candy to come VIA MAIL. I never did get that first bag and the snapshot the delivery person took was OF THE INSIDE OF HIS/HER CAR! They delivered another order where the grocery bag had been opened and the contents fell out as I picked it up from my stoop. That was a week ago. I am presently waiting for an order that Walmart said would be here on the 21st of May. Unfortunately for me, this order was a third Party seller so according to the Customer Service person at Walmart, I now have to give 48 hrs to the vendor to contact me and if I donâ€™t hear from them, I have to recontact Walmart Customer Service. Meanwhile, Iâ€™ve already paid for the purchase and I have nothing. This is the 3rd time Iâ€™ve had issues with Walmart dot com in LESS THAN TWO WEEKS! WALMART IS BROKEN! I pray I donâ€™t have to go to them for anything ever again!

Name: George Trump
Comment: Bought stuff on line told I could pick up in a few hours. Checked on order told I would get refund on order 6 hours after order was placed cause they said they donâ€™t have any at store went over to store so I could get my money back and they have a full skid what I ordered. Done with this place

Name: Ted Trebilcock
Comment: The store manager and the inventory purchasing manager are selling â€œGood Year 26â€ heavy duty 1.9 to 2.3 bicycle tubesâ€ for bikes that are of such a low quality they donâ€™t work. I bought 3 boxes so I had 6 tubes. After installing and carefully not stressing or jarring the valve, three of them within 60 seconds blew out - meaning the valve itself let go. I then checked on the internet and folks have been complaint about these bike tires. At some point this becomes the store manager doing this on purpose, stealing from their customers by selling defective garbage, made in China, and not caring. They do not like their customers. They are harming us citizens because they are mean and donâ€™t care. Buy bike tires some where else.

Name: esther gold
Comment: Customer service is fine! but if you return more than 3 times in this uncertain time they close your account! bad policies

Name: Terry D Junior
Comment: I will be as helpful and not negative as possible. I purchased a window AC unit on 4-23-22 and received a large mattress topper instead. Set up for return through walmart.com for two days later. Didn't realize they sent me a return tag so it was picked up from FedEx on 4-26-22 without a call tag. After calling walmart.com 6 times in two weeks the item can't be tracked. I went to local FedEx hub today and was able to get complete tracking info on package as it was delivered to my house then picked up and shipped back to original Walmart warehouse where it originated. Now I can't seem to get anyone from Walmart.com to send proof of delivery to original shipping location to get my $390 refund. Keep getting a run around. It is currently 5-23-22. Was told at one point by Walmart I would have to go talk to my bank to get money back. Who does this?! Pray for me that I get my money back. I will not be using walmart.com for ANYTHING ELSE ever again. Update, was about to ask for supervisor and after an hour and 20 minutes was able to speak to an American citizen in billing. He was able to refund my money. Very happy with Logan in the walmart.com billing department. That was like pulling teeth!!

Name: Laura Hodson
Comment: I ordered a mobility scooter on 22/5/22and have still not received it but they have taken my money fast enough. When I tried to contact them I get messages back in Spanish I am British and I live in England. Regards L Hodson

Name: Arlene
Comment: I just went on line to Walmart to look at how much Ezekiel Muffins were at Walmart. $86 for Ezekiel Muffins? Who charges that? Who should be allowed to charge that? Disgusting and Deplorable!!!!! Would never buy or patronize Walmart Grocery Shopping!!!!

Name: Christy
Comment: I only shop here because there is no other place to shop in my area. The products are cheap and do not last. You can buy something and it may work one time and never again. Nothing is guaranteed and it is a hassle trying to return something. I am just sick over the fact that the quality of the merchandise is so bad and it is made with cheap materials. Nothing in this store is worth any amount of money. It is a rare find if you purchase something from this store and it works or lasts. I don't know where they are getting their stock from but it has dropped way low. People should sell the stock they have and invest in another store like Target who has so much better products. People just dont realize what a rip off this company is. They are really taking advantage of consumers with the cheap products they are selling. If I had a choice I would not ever shop here for anything.

Name: Michael Holden
Comment: I have always like to shop at my nearest Walmart. Friendly people as always, so I can't complain.

Name: Chen
Comment: If Amazon rated as 10, then Walmart online store deserves -10. I have order 6 pillows, after two weeks while my order was finally ready to be picked up, all I got was just 1 pillow... And the store staff said this was all they had! The other 5 pillows are missing and they knew nothing and could do nothing... Physical store seemed did not communicate and deal with online order at any level, so they could do nothing for me. I called customer service and all they said its wait... What?! Wait? How long? What was next step? They could not answer rather than be patient and wait... For this reason, I shop again on Amazon and got my things the other day... I will not give up until I found out what happen to my order and consumers like me...

Comment: I really liked Wal-Mart until Spring time. I started looking for a pair of blue jean shorts. I'd been buying one pair Faded Glory. Went to website not any in my size on the whole website. Call corporate spoke to a young man said he would get it taken care of. Looked through Spring onto now. No change.

Name: Beverly Carayas
Comment: I went into the Walmart in Washington, UT for my daughter to get a battery. The service was great, staff was personable and friendly!! They tested her battery and then replaced it. Great price Fast Quick Service. 100% pleased

Name: Treasure
Comment: I had just bought a snack pack with apples cheese and pretzels, and the apples were disgusting, the cheese didn't taste right, and the pretzels were very stale. I ask you to pay more attention to the things you sell please. It will not only benefit the customers, but it will help you guys from having every customer go to Kroger instead. Thank you!

Name: Alexandria Ell
Comment: No issues. Have been buying there for years.

Name: Walter Eaton
Comment: Walmart "Customer Service" I thought I'd save time shopping at Walmart today due to the varied goods I needed to purchase. Big mistake! On a Monday the place was busy! I completed my shopping and proceeded to check-out. Two registers were servicing many customers about ten deep. I was forced to "scan and go". A novel concept in which I, the paying customer gets to perform the duties previously done by paid employees. As I've always managed to avoid this travesty (I'm of the mind-set trained employees should be designated to this task). Following my griping a very pleasant employee "Amanda" volunteered to help. "I don't mind" she cheerfully exclaimed. Several of the items required her to look up the SKU'S and type into the scanner. They didn't match. We then had to discard the bags and run each item back through another register. This entire process took about 20 minutes. The poor employee kept apologizing and I felt bad for her, as well as me. Clearly Walmart is attempting to reduce their workplace over head by eliminating the register employee and getting the paying customer to volunteer our time to increase the Walton's wealth. The heirs of Sam are worth 155 billion according to a 2019 survey. Indeed two of them are among the thirty wealthiest people in America. When is enough wealth, enough? For me, I'm avoiding any of these entities that practice this form of retail abuse. Bye Walmart!

Name: Lauren Lam

Price listed online was $49.97. Attempted to purchase in store, the exact rug, it rang up at $89.00. I told the sales associate the website says $49.97. Sales associate told me they do no price match. I advised her that this is YOURS(Walmart) website! She said the prices are different on website and that they donâ€™t price match their own site. Gtfoh....craziest thing Iâ€™ve heard. If I were to order same day pick up for THAT exact item, I would be getting it for the $49.97. At this point Iâ€™d rather pay more for better service.

Name: Tammy
Comment: I had been using Wal Martâ€™s pick up service during the height of COVID-19 and was pleased at least for the few times. Then my orders werenâ€™t ready on time, despite the fact that they were placed several hours in advance. One time my order was ready 3 hours after specified pick up time and the pick up service was already closed for the day. One order was for 6 items placed 12 hours in advance and it wasnâ€™t ready, the store had been to busy that day. Iâ€™ve since stopped using this service. I quite often use the Walmart.com delivery service and am pleased with this service. Today I thought I would take advantage of their free 15 day trial of free delivery. I placed a big grocery order and chose the option for a text to be sent once the groceries were delivered between my chosen time of 12-1pm. Itâ€™s 1pm and still no text, I then check my email and at 12.30pm I received an email that my groceries had been delivered! I went outside and there they were sprawled all over the front walk, falling out of plastic bags in the hot sun, it was in the high 80â€™s!! I had cold and frozen food sitting in the hot sun!! I took my order in and put it away and started going over my digital receipt and realized I was missing about a quarter of my order!! I called the customer service number, was transferred to the wrong department and was put on hold again. When the woman answered, I explained what happened, told her the items I was missing, and she said thank you after every item I mentioned, and said she would refund my card. I told her I wanted the food, thatâ€™s why I placed order and took advantage of a service they offered. She placed me on hold to call the store only to come back on the line to say that she called the store twice and once was placed in hold, and the other time no one answered. I will be cancelling my free trial and NOT recommending Wal Mart to family or friends ever!! And I was also told that the delivery service doesnâ€™t send a text upon delivery, even though I checked the box to receive a text upon delivery! Oh, and I went to Aldiâ€™s to get my missing items and was able to pick up a few more items for the same price of my undelivered Wal Mart items. I will BE recommending Aldiâ€™s to family and friends which can have my pick-up order ready in less then 30 minutes from start to finish. BYE BYE WALMART!!!!

Name: Angel
Comment: This is a thrift store. I bought a TCL TV 50" and it stopped working after two months. I approached to this location (niles, IL) and asked them why my TV turned black and what my choice was to return it...they said: "you may buy a new one and to throw the other one away"...it was amazing to hear how they implicitly recognized that what they sold was garbage. I asked to speak to the manager and he told me the same thing (May 22,/2021 @ 3pm) They do not care about what you have to say or to keep you as a costumer. They recognized that whatever you buy, you eventually will end up throwing them away after few either weeks or months...! that is a thrift store. they are not going to take any responsibility for any garbage they sell; however, you are most welcome to continue buying in their thrift store. You never should buy any electrical appliance, cells, or expensive products. they do not guarantee any products more than one month because they know that those things are wasting money...it is a joke when they say that they will cover the first months...that is their game because they know that whatever they have do not last too much time. They do not bother to ask their providers about quality of their products since they are not made in US. Stay away from those thrift stores. if you are a young professional, it is better to spend a little bit more but you will get good asleep. ABT, Best Buy or amazon are a good alternative for electronic equipments, appliance or furniture.

Name: Monique S
Comment: I have been purchasing on Walmart.com for 8 years now. Two times in the past few months Walmart has allowed someone to hack into my account & purchase hundreds of dollars worth of items. The first time I had to obtain a new business cc, which is such a hassle with all of my automatic debits coming out each month. Again yesterday an order was canceled because it was suspected to be fraudulent. I called the Walmart.com number only to be bounced back & forth to the corporate office. No manager was available to speak to me to help me to understand how this could happen not once but twice in a few months. I am suspecting itâ€™s their employees now,but Iâ€™m not sure. I told them I wanted to close my account & with no hesitation,no trying to keep me as a valued customer they did exactly that deactivated my account. Buyer BEWARE!!! This website is not secure!!!!!

Name: Debra
Comment: Walmart in Woodbury, MN: Itâ€™s not entirely true when they say Free Shipping, if youâ€™re above the min. purchase. Itâ€™s very sketchy, actually! Even though Iâ€™ve been above the min., Iâ€™ve been hit with shipping fees and sometimes â€œBelow min feeâ€ charges.  Iâ€™ve also been hit with duplicate charges (doubling items), then when you return the items, I only receive a refund for one item. Also, no refunds for the added fees. Totally CHEATING people!! Youâ€™re tipping the scales!  This is to warn people to pay attention to your charges, added fees, and quantity of items. Also, scrutinize your refunds!!  Iâ€™ve also had some problems ordering a set (I.e. 6 headband in a set) of items, only to get and be charged with one item out of the set. Also, totally cheating people!! I donâ€™t know who these vendors are (Chinese vendor names), but some are obviously NOT to be trusted!  Another serious issue is Walmartâ€™s Customer Service Dept. NOT answering their phones. It would seem whoever answers the phones initially catches wind that you have an issue, your call and number are flagged so that no one picks up. My guess is that they canâ€™t handle ALL of the complaints so they donâ€™t bother anymoreâ€¦.. Very POOR management!! They just lost another customer.

Name: Bea WorkfromHome
Comment: I have been a happy customer since 2016 on the West Coast. Okay, their are not a lot of people to help nor are their enough cash out registers available . I have recently learned how to use the check out and enjoy it much more and its faster. there is always someone in the self check out to help.  Prices are by far the best. Assortment depending on which store is above average. Returns are easy with a generous time frame with and without a receipt.  opening hours have cut back here in NV. Not all superstores are open 24/7

Name: Steph G.
Comment: Wanted to start off stating that just because I'm an Amazonian does not mean this review will be biased. The Amazon Go store is such a cool addition to Seattle. I'm excited to see them pop up elsewhere so others can enjoy the fun.  While the store is small, it's always stocked with amazing grab and go items. The process is simple!!download the Amazon Go app on your smartphone and you'll log into your existing Amazon account. This will give you instant access to your preferred payment methods stored on your account. You scan to get into the store and that is where the magic behind the curtains happens.  Without getting into much detail (because we can't), the moment you've scanned into the store, anything you grab and place into your really cool AND FREE reusable Amazon Go bag is tracked. This scares some people as technology can be quite intimidating at this level! But trust me, it's accurate!  I had not gone in a while but decided to stop by before a meeting in one of the neighboring offices. The process was flawless and I began my scan of items I was going to buy. As usual, I really just wanted a La Croix and ended up buying a ton of goodies because everything is reasonably priced! Not to mention they sell Blazing Bagels! This was awesome for me to see and despite the store being a roughly 20 minute walk from my office, I'm probably going to come a lot more often!  They have a ton of bottled drinks, breakfast and lunch sandwiches, prepared dinner meals, veggies, now serving bottled alcohol! If I lived in seattle I would probably shop here all the time! If you haven't checked it out, download the app and experience it!

Name: Matt Wells
Comment: Absolutely the worst customer experience at the Florence, KY Walmart location. We purchased a bike for a birthday (1 week before b-day), they said they could assemble it in a day or two. My wife called and the response was that the bike assembly person had not shown up. My wife called 5 days later and they said the bike was in terrible shape, but offered no alternative. Said they could only refund the bike. We requested if there was a bike at another Walmart location, if we could get that one. David, the manager we were talking to at this point, stated there is no way for them to get the bike from the other location to Florence, KY location (less than 20 miles away). One of the world's largest logistics companies can't get a bike from a location 20 miles away. I offered to get the bike, but they would not give a price break for the time we would have to go get the bike. Again, absolutely ridiculous one store cannot work with another store to ensure a happy customer experience. Manager David kept saying his hands are tied, he's not able to do either of those things. He stated the Store Manager was not at the Florence location, so he was one of the highest ranking managers at the Florence location at that point. It's unbelievable a manager of that level cannot ensure a good outcome for a customer. My wife has spent at least 4 hours trying to get this issue resolved, of which at least an hour was on hold. Just a refund does not effectively remedy this situation. It's unheard of that a manager does not have the authority to do any more to help the customer through this Walmart failure.

Name: mark c
Comment: Criminal Conduct!  I placed an on-line order with Walmart for two cans of Minwax for a total price of $43.12.  The Fed X tracking indicated the item arrived on May 18th, 20201 at 12:12 p.m. I checked my porch and it was not there. I checked my Ring camera and it showed no deliveries for that day. I called Fed X and they said the package was delivered to an address on Onstott Frontage Road in Yuba City and a person by the name of AEVANS signed for it. I live on a completely different street and I know no-one by the name of AEVANS. Obviously, the package was delivered to the wrong address.  Fed X said it was Walmartâ€™s fault because they put the wrong tracking number and wrong address on my order. I was told to contact Walmart for an easy resolution. The Fed X representative said put the information we discussed into Fed X and Walmartâ€™s notes regarding this order so Walmart could review the notes and easily resolve the matter.  On May 21, 2021, I â€œchattedâ€ on-line with a Walmart representative and she said that since the item was signed for, she would not help me. I told her to check Fed X notes about the delivery address and the person who signed. Both have no relationship to me. She told me there was nothing she would or could do and to dispute the charge with my credit card company. That takes five weeks or more and offers no guarantee!  Walmart, being one of the richest companies in the world does not seem to care about customer support. I have never had any trouble whatsoever with Amazon orders when a problem arises. It is handled immediately with one phone call.  Apparently, itâ€™s Walmartâ€™s policy to cheat their customers, and what can a consumer do when the company that took your money refuses to make good, reimburse or credit you. Itâ€™s out and out theft and action should be taken against such companies.

Name: J.M.
Comment: Walmart Location: 16555 Von Karman Ave, Irvine, CA 92606  Last night on 5/24/2022, I showed up at 8:55pm to exchange an item. The woman at the customer service department told me they were closed. Walmart closes at 11pm. So why would they refuse to help me? I asked for a manager who later arrived at 9pm and she refused to do the exchange as well. The manager's name is ELIZABETH, she said, she was not going to do the exchange and as I was walking away she very loudly yelled, "this is the worst store to work at and shop at." Says a lot if a store manager yells that at the customers. I will be returning my item today & I will be taking my business elsewhere & I will let others know that this is the worst Walmart store because their own employees told me so.

Name: John
Comment: For the first time I am writing a review about walmart .Sam Walton was a simple guy who built an empire by providing goods and services .Over the years while Walmart profits has increased simultaneously Services and Product quality has Declined. I make no apologies for saying that there are stores within the Walmart chain that has fallen so bad its literally a "cesspool". This may come down to localize management but either way someone through the rank and file is definitely not doing there job.It is sad to know the hiring process looking at resumes takes 2 months minimum and then some epically when stores are lacking workers such as cleaners,packers , cashiers etc ...I.know this first hand ! Word of advice to Walmart upper upper management i know its difficult to see the ground when you reach the cloud. At least share in the vision of the founder , the legacy of Sam Walton ..not only by name but also by great customer service , great products , and the discipline and focus to Maintain employees and pay attention to whats happening on the ground .

Name: Steph
Comment: when i worked here a few of the managers ganged up on me and tried to get me fired. all i did was work hard even spoke with the store manager and told him i would love to move up one day and wanted to grow with the company and make it a career for myself. they were working me so hard getting mad at me for helping customers find things or if i didn't do unrealistic timed tasks. i ended up and antidepressants because they were treating me so badly. i was being harassed off the clock as well when shopping with my family on my days off being told i shouldnt wear certain clothes ( i was in jeans and a tank top). i remember one of the managers that hated me pulling me in to the office after yelling at me in front of a customer when i was trying to explain another manager had told me not to let other managers override something on our registers. i was simply following instructions. i was so upset and nearly had a mental break in front of the customer then she pulled me in the office to write me up for being defiant and tried to get me to sign a paper stating that i understood i was in trouble. the store manager wasn't any help either as it got worse after i explained what was happening. i went on medical leave when i found out my mother had breast cancer and never went back. it took me two years to not have complete anxiety attacks just walking through the doors. i rarely shop there now and will never work for walmart again.

Name: Saman Karimi
Comment: They don't accept returns even when it is perfectly reasonable to do so. Once they even refused to take back an item I bought, in sealed original packaging. A lot of their products is expensive low quality things which are made in China, coupled with their poo poor customer service.

Name: Shaylor S.
Comment: This is definitely the future of shopping. Basically no direct interaction. All surrogate and independent processes. It is very enabling for the customer making things quick and efficient. Really fun to experience! If Amazon can make this profitable, this will be an exciting future.  Open the app when you walk in and scan your phone. Put your phone in your pocket and go grab whatever you need. Lots of good snack and drink options with very low prices. Prices that you would see in any grocery store. When ever you're ready, just walk out and go on your way. So simple and enjoyable. Sensors galore all over the ceiling. Try to steal something, it just won't work.  Two concerns I had: If I put stuff back in a completely wrong spot or on the other side of the store, will that mess things up? Will it charge me? Does it have to go exactly back to the spot I grabbed it from? I scanned into the store on the app and I realized my phone was at 1%. If my phone died before I walked out, would that have caused any issues?

So because they did not prepare our order in a timely manner the 5 they had in stock sold out by the next day. Ours should have been ready for pickup the previous evening. Now by the time I get out of work today I have one afternoon to find one before we go camping for the holiday weekend. Most the ones we looked at the afternoon before are sold out now. I will never order anything from Walmart again.

God is definitely on his way,because people like Nina are horribly rude and needs a reality check, and Shannon be a Manger stand up do what's right and not such up to people over you, when you knew Nina actions were wrong. Because one day you will see that same person and God help you, if you may need that person help and they treat you the way you treated them, when they were in that store. Name: m moore
Comment: I love the great prices and I like the convenience of one stopping for household items, clothes and groceries. The store can be crowded on weekends, but so is the Costco we go to, so try to shop on weekdays.

Name: Johnny appleseed
Comment: My delivery is now over a week overdue and Walmart has provided NO explanation. CS via live chat provide ZERO explanation and only state that they "have no policy regarding late deliveries!"  So DONT ORDER FROM WALMART! clearly not as reliable or service oriented as AMAZON!

Name: Jess Ry
Comment: Do not buy anything online! I ordered clothes. My jeans took over a week to arrive, when it promised 2 day shipping at check out. Now my shirt is still in North Carolina. Is been one week and it was supposed to arrive today! They promise 2 day delivery but dont. When you call you are told there is extended wait time of over an hour. Im sorry but I dont believe every day there is that long of a wait. They just dont want to hear the complaints. I will NEVER order online from them again. If you want to get your items on time go with Amazon. I know I will.

Name: Michelle Jackson
Comment: Don't buy any electronics from WALMART they have terrible old stuff and it's not worth it...and they also cancel your orders when they don't want to deliver merchandise. I bought a laptop from them in December and paid over eight hundred dollars for it...to this day it doesn't work well at all, the keyboard sticks and the screen goes black. Also I tried to order a smart television online from Walmart and they waited until the next day to cancel my order claiming that they didn't have good payment information, which is WRONG because they will either decline your creditcard or approve it the same day...so that doesn't make any sense...this place is not worth shopping for electronics...it's only good for cheap clothes and things that are cheap.

Name: shannon scott
Comment: I ordered a loft bed at the beginning of April. To be fair FedEx lost the package and I was told to contact the seller. The seller was someone on WalMart's website and I could not get contact info for. One month four days later the bed shows up after I already had to purchase another. I will never shop WalMart.com again. I have had issues with Amazon but was immediately able to speak with someone and get resolution. Sadly this was not so with WalMart.

Name: Fauntasia Le Ganiel
Comment: I ordered a bunk bed from the walmart website to be delivered to my home in Pennsylvania and it was delivered to New York instead. When I called customer service they were of no help they told me I had to go to my local walmart to complain, which was false information. This was the third time I had ordered from them and the third time I did not receive my merchandise. . This is by far the worst company to order from. I was promised a full refund in a week. When I went in to look for bunk beds in the west york pa store the man I asked for help refused to call someone to furniture so I went to the counter to ask and again was not given the help requested. This is an ongoing issue with walmart. I am very upset with the services of this store.

Name: judy mck
Comment: they have very rude people working for them this will be the last time i go there

Name: Emre Dinc
Comment: You can not find what you like price realy expensive

Name: MsNickie
Comment: So Walmart.com decided to deactivate my account and told me I violated their policies concerning returns. They have some nerve. I had previously told them that I would not be placing anymore online orders anyway because I am tired of getting scammed and being sent counterfeit products or products that are damaged or spoiled. I have had NUMEROUS problems with placing orders on Walmart.com. Most times I do not get my order, the order shows up days or weeks late, it's damaged, or I am being sent a fake product. Over the last few weeks since COVID-19, I have had to deal with incorrect orders, money being taken from my account unauthorized, damaged smelly products, and the list goes on and on and on. I have complained several times about scam sellers and Walmart does nothing but blame me and think I am wrong, which couldn't be further from the truth.  One Walmart.com seller even sent me two shoes of different sizes where someone wrote over the size 9 and put the number 7!!!. Unbelievable!!! I wear a size 7 in shoes, so how in the holy hell did they think I could wear a size 9 flat shoe and the other shoe being a size 7?! The f&*k??? Actually, this is a relief. I have had issues with Walmart for years when it came to placing online orders for store pickup or delivery. Walmart.com is a complete scam full of criminals, and when you complain, they do nothing and their nasty attitude miserable employees don't give a royal f$%k! I hope to not even have to shop in their stores, but that is sometimes hard to do because they often have lower prices than other local stores. So I can breathe easier now and just spend my money online elsewhere from more reliable retailers. To be honest, most major retailers are problematic at some point, but I have found that Walmart and Amazon are the absolute worst. And most, if not all, retailers seem to give customers a hard time when it comes to returning items and wanting a refund. I do not want to shop with any store that tries to control me; I'm not anyone's inmate. If I have a legitimate concern, then I have a right to complain or request a refund however many times I want. That's why when I hear about Walmart or Amazon being scammed by customers, I rejoice because they deserve it. No one with active brain cells likes Walmart, people only shop there because it is cheaper when you live on a budget. So f%$k you Walmart, I do NOT need anymore stress and I'm much happier not having to deal with Walmart.com!!! Goodbye!

Name: James and Ty Whitmire
Comment: Don't purchase clothing from Walmart if you have a growing teenager or have changed sizes recently and need to try them on. They will NOT allow returns on any clothing until they say "maybe sometime in June". So keep it/store it until then and maybe they will take it back. But they have a 30 day return policy? They say that the signs are posted. Yeah right, little index cards with small print in obscure places and they have a current sale on clothing now to boot. As far as I'm concerned, the clothing can sit on the racks and rot because I will not purchase from Wally world ever again. Their whole attitude about it made me see red. At least when they sell fireworks, they post HUGE signs that say no returns. Why not about NOT returning clothing? Because it's a straight up rip off. Other stores are allowing returns on clothing and I will stick with them moving forward.

Comment: Honestly I didn't even want to give this company a one star. I feel like they don't deserve any stars. I have purchased from Walmart.com three times . The first two times was small items and 20.00 or less but never got the items and never got the money back. When you write the merchants about the products they give you run arounds and pretty much refuses to help you. Yesterday I purchased two items for pickup at Walmart near me. Walmart online shows the item was at the store so I purchased it. When my fiancÃ© pulled up to get items he got one out of two items. When I asked about the other item they said that the hold on my card can take 5 to 10 business days for refund. Now I don't think ðŸ¤” it's fair that if I used a ebt card or Walmart gift card my funds would be returned with in 3 hours. But now I used my debt card and I have to wait 5-10 days for my money to be returned for something I never got and never Picked up I feel that if Walmart doesn't have the item they should reach out to customers. Not just email but also call them and see what they want to do. Cause if someone would have called me and said hey I don't have this futon but I have this one I would have paid the difference now I'm out of a bed for my child and gotta wait for the money to be returned smh. Name: Yolanda Ramirez
Comment: I have shopped with Walmart for a while but lately I stopped because there delivery service on trac is very bad I had issues with Walmart online orders not arriving when it says also the stock items too I had to call them 3 time on the same day asking where my order is and they just kept saying it get there tomorrow and then tomorrow would come it and it said it was delayed then it said it was in my city out for delivery and then 2 hrs after said it was in a different city 45 minutes away from my city and then it kept saying it was delayed it was upsetting because I needed the stuff I order for a special occasion ....even with there item in stock i placed an order online and was in stock a week later I called no one called me or emailed me I called and they said my order was lost I will no longer shop at Walmart I rather pay a bit more and shop at target there orders always get delivered on time also store pick up same day and itâ€™s ready in 2hrs sorry Walmart you gotten bad also going in to shop itâ€™s become I bad experience

Name: Mr Unlimited

Which it had not. Nor was there any notification for such? 5. I had now paid for 2 frames and had no frame 6. They directed me on my 13th call to fill in some paperwork and reorder a new frame ðŸ¤¦â€â™€ï¸- my refunds were in process 7. Who would be willing to be out for 3 frames- still waiting for my funds after 4 weeks. Run!!!!!!

Name: Gabby
Comment: Purchased a cooking item it was amazing i will never use my oven again

Name: Jamie
Comment: I Purchased 4 Goodyear tires and paid extra to have the LIFETIME roadside hazard Warranty with lifetime balance and lifetime tire repair from Walmart Store on County Road 54 and Little Road In New Port Richey Fl 34655. Within 10 months of owning these Goodyear tires, the tires started to Crack in a few places on the tires. I took my car to Walmart tire service and they said it was normal and safe to drive on. As time went on the front driver side tire upper side wall just split open by those cracks in the rubber. So Walmart charged me around $50 to replace that tire even with having the road side hazard under the warranty. Then 11 months later the passenger side front tire came apart like it was a recapped tire when driving at 25MPH in city, and thank god this did not happen on the highway. The Goodyear tires came with a factory 60,000 mile warranty. The first tire blew out side wall at 23K miles the 2nd tire fell apart ripping rubber off like it was a recapped tire at 29K miles. Walmart would not honor road hazard warranty on that 2nd tire. On top of that I had a nail in back tire and went in to get that fixed under lifetime tire repair that I paid extra for. Walmart service said they won't patch the nail leak because the rear Goodyear tires they sold me had cracks in the rubber. These are the same Goodyear tires I showed them within 10 months of being installed with cracks that Walmart Tire Service said was normal cracking. Now Walmart Tire Service said those 2 rear goodyear tires with cracks need to be replaced. Walmart service is telling me they can't honor the lifetime road hazard warranty that I paid extra for because Walmart Tire Service is now blaming the cracking on weather conditions, but tires are designed to drive in different weather conditions. Yet when I took my car into Walmart Tire Service with 9K miles on the tires and within 10 months of bring installed, I was told at that time few cracks were normal. So Walmart Tire Service flip flopped their story to benefit not replacing defected tires they sold me when I first showed them the tires with cracks in the rubber within 10 months of being installed. I never had issues when buying tires from regular tire stores. I feel I was sold defected tires based on all what happened plus these Goodyear tires did not wear well based on Walmart saying tires came with a 60,000 mile wear warranty and front tires blew apart at under 30,000 miles, and it is only a matter of time before the 2 rear Goodyear tires do the same thing.

Name: Moli Moli
Comment: I would like to shop on their platform more but I can't trust their platform. But I stopped since my account being hacked couple time and made a purchase of a few hundred dollar apple watches. When called customer service, they didn't sound concern at all. this is very disappointing.

Name: Olivia Sheppard
Comment: I bought from them an amazing bike. The price was fair and the quality was good. I'll give them 5 stars! Thank you Walmart!

Name: Josh F.
Comment: This place is OK. Prices are lower than most places but my God are the lines long at checkout. They should have more cashiers during peak hours.

Name: Giselle
Comment: Never order from Walmart.com. I ordered 500.00 worth of items and they sent me double my order and charged my debit card twice. The same week I ordered from them - my debit card was compromised And 900.00 was taken out. I had to cancel my debit card. I had to return the duplicate items and because my debit card had been cancelled they could not return the money to my card and said because I ordered through Wal-Mart.com I could not receive a cash refund and would have to get my refund in Walmart Gift cards. Additionally, half my order couldnâ€™t be returned and I had to send it back to the 3rd party ... the 3rd party emailed me 1 time and sent me two return labels and I could only print one. They didnâ€™t send a label for the last item. I have been trying to reach Hayneedle, the third party, for days and no response and I have only a couple more weeks before I can no longer return these items. Additionally, I will have to dispute with my bank to try and get a response. This is absolutely unacceptable for a mistake Wal-Mart.com made. I will NEVER use them again and strongly advise against order from them. This has been noting but a nightmare.

Name: Juan Calderon
Comment: I have tried to purchase a 50 to 65 inches tv on Waltmart.com 3 times for the past week all 3 occasions they cancel my order after they ware approved. The 1st time the said that they could confirm my bank card and they claimed it was their mistake. The second time they claim that my bank had denied my purchase wish my bank never did. The 3rd time i used a credit card and the day that i was supposed to pick up the tv they send me an email that my order was cancel because of high demand. Walmart use to be my favor store and is disappointing that they are doing this. I send them an email and they never replied. Call them as well and all they say is to reorder again. This tv is was supposed to be a gift for my wife.

Comment: My husband order an iPad from Walmart for my birthday. It didn't arrive. Tracking shows that an employee put too many shipping labels on the package and per FedEx it is undeliverable. Walmart will not issue a refund because I can't return the IPad. They called FedEx and know that I never received it. I can't dispute it on my credit card because Walmart is keeping it as a pending charge. I guess the next stop is the BBB to try and get help.

Comment: Got a reply from Walmart. "Contact manager at your local store." Manager REFUSED TO HELP! "That authorization number isn't coming up, you'll have to contact the sender." Does that sound helpful to you? She spent all of 30 seconds "being helpfull" before she walked off. WHERE'S MY MONEY?

Comment: the worst company for online shopping with the worst shipping courrier. Comment: This should be zero stars. I have been trying to return a beach bag, swimsuit, beach cover up, pants, capris, t shirts, since the end of April. Here it is Thursday May 28, 2020, and still they will not take my return. They are blaming it on the virus. The customer service area has protective shields in place, the employees have face masks on, there are social distancing markers on the floor. There are no customers in line. The employees have nothing to do. This is $84.00 of my Stimulus money being held hostage. The longer they hold on to it, the more interest it acrues for them. I have contacted the Louisiana state Attorney General's office. I demand something be done about this. Walmart should have roped off the clothing area if they knew that they were not going to be accepting returns. Now I can't get the correct sizes, I have nothing to wear. Target is not doing this to it's customers. Target will be getting my business from now on. Very unhappy, very unsatisfied. You lost a loyal customer.

Name: D Wyatt
Comment: I think back 10 years or more and Walmart was the place to go, what felt like the best place in the world. I wanted to be there literally everyday! Fast forward to today and I DESPISE going there. It is never an enjoyable experience and honestly for me it has been because of the employees. I live in LA, and I have been to multiple Walmarts and the experience has been the same-no one greets you, they are huddling around talking about personal stories ex.- "how they didn't get a stimulus check because someone owed taxes," complaining about benefits, how much they are paid, hours, ect. I understand if you are unhappy, but if you are choosing to stay then you should be professional and not have discussions like that around customers. I have asked for help and someone just shakes their head no, and the last straw for me was being in Walmart and asking for something from the case-I asked 2 employees that were working in that area "I don't have the key," ok so who has the key? "Manager up at customer service"-ok, can you go ask for me to get in the case? "Oh, I would have to walk all the way up there and back because I don't have a radio.!" WAIT, WHAT! Now come on man, and to beat it all I went to customer service and then the manager tells me to go back and ask the pharmacy because they have the key.  I was appalled and honestly I have been dealing with that kind of environment long enough and that was the last straw. I would rather pay more money and go to a classier store where you are treated with respect, people are friendly, employees aren't miserable and displaying it to customers AFTER I have even heard them in the huddle meetings yelling "Walmart, Walmart, Walmart."  Don't be fake Walmart. I know I am only one person, but I am 100% certain that others have experienced the same situations and they are tired of it to.

Name: Monica Gonzalez
Comment: I purchased 3 rolls of bounty paper towels, they canceled them and charged me for them. Iâ€™ve called 3 times trying to get assistance, no one seems to care. I want my money back!!

I just want my product

Comment: This place is the best. Fast, convenient and there's a big selection! Usually cheaper than other stores nearby too, my go to spot!

Name: mandy deltas o o l
Comment: I must say I love walmart but there app on the other hand need some improvement. Seriously it gives me trouble often. Upgrade it already

Name: Ken Mershon Virus Vanquisher
Comment: Order: 4022180-500129 I ordered this on 5/11, it was to arrive on 5/28. I went online today to check if it was still on time and am told to go to Pilot Air Freight and check order 122040186. Pilot Air Freight tells me that is not even a proper tracking number...yet here it is in my email as the tracking number. They look further and find that there is nothing in their system for my address. I then call Walmart (1-800-925-6278), this is where the real fun begins. After navigating their automated system to get to an actual person, the person tells me the shipper picked it up and I am to call them. I explained in detail that I had in fact called the shipper first and they have nothing and the tracking number is not even a number they use! I asked to speak to a manager and one was not available but would call me back in 30mins to 1hour. 3 hours later no call back! I call Walmart back. I gave the girl my order number and she says..."i am sorry our system is slow" and something else I could not make out. I wait for a few seconds and hear nothing and say hello a couple times and then get a disconnect. I call back for THE THIRD TIME and this time the person tells me the shipper never got the item, Walmart shows it was processed but yet have no shipper info...THEN HOW AND WHY did Walmart send me 122040186?! When was Walmart going to tell me my order was never going to arrive? They then said I could wait till the 15th and I could get another. Ya no. I was told earlier in the call to wait for it a little longer to arrive, yet then later in the call told it was never shipped! So Walmart, that is the new business model? Take people's money and give them nothing...sounds lucrative.  I told my kids about this playset, we talked and talked all about it and made plans. You have DESTROYED our plans and my children's happiness. Sam Walton would turn in his grave if he knew what Walmart has become.  I will NEVER buy from walmart.com again. Amazon from now on. Will be reporting Walmart to the Better Business Bureau.

Name: Linda Miller
Comment: I ordered an online item to be picked up at my local store. I got a mail saying my item had shipped, but the link for tracking never worked. I waited patiently for the mail to pick my item up but that never came. After 10 days I managed to track it through an alternate link, and my item was returned to the seller the day after it was shipped. No idea why. I tried to speak with Walmart Customer Service online. They could not tell me anything. They referred it back to the seller. The seller asked if I wanted a refund or a reship. I chose the refund. I got a mail from WALMART saying it would come in 2 billing cycles. What is a billing cycle? When I tried to ask Walmart Customer Service that simple question on the phone, I got nothing but run around. I paid Walmart for this item, not the manufacturer. I expect my money back within 10 business days, or I will be issuing a chargeback for failure to deliver my item.

Name: Synthia Pugmire
Comment: Unless you have unlimited hours and weeks and time and a lot of patience Walmart will not honor theyre warrenty..they put you off as many times as they can hoping that your busy schedule cannot meet theyre ignore ignore ignore call this number refill this iut start over ir what ever they can do to make your warrenty run out without honering it .the warrenty is a wSte of time and money..y sll are crooks and robbed me again..booooooooo..i hope you all go out of business bankrupt

Name: Richard Rodrigues
Comment: Shopping on Walmart's online marketplace means you're buying from random sellers, not Walmart. I purchased a swing set weeks ago, though I was charged and notified it was delivered, the product never actually shipped. I found out two days after it was due that it was never shipped. Walmart customer service couldn't figure out what happened or why the tracking info was wrong. To fix it they simply said I would have my $2600 refund sometime in the next two weeks so that I could order from some other place.

Name: LuAnn Foster Leasure
Comment: I am 66 years old and have always shopped at walmart. When I went today I finished my shopping and went to check out. There were NO regular checkouts open. Only Self checkouts. I used the self checkouts but was NOT happy. Bags are impossible to open and the whole process is only good if you only purchase a few things. I will now shop at Marc's where they have people working at the checkouts. If I wanted to scan and pack groceries I would get a job doing so.

Name: Cath Mac
Comment: THE WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE OF MY LIFE!!!!! I WILL NEVER ORDER ANYTHING FROM WALMAT AGAIN..Call center in India, the males in the center are rude and hang up on you!! THEY ALSO PREND THEY CANT HEAR YOU...AND THEN HANG UP YOU..JOKERS....I have been requesting a shipping label for 4 days!!!!!!!!! I don't understand what is so hard about this!!! SHAME ON YOU WALMART FOR PUTTING YOUR CUSTOMERS THOUGH THIS!!!!!!! MY BLOOD IS BOILING!!!!!!!

Name: DeLauren Shepherd
Comment: I cannot stand Walmart online. They sent me the wrong thing, told me to return and buy again. Then they just didn't send it. When I called they just canceled the order. So two months later and I still have nothing. I also returned something a month an a half ago and still have not been refunded.

Name: The Bear Family
Comment: I was considering buying a used portable tabletop ice machine from Kijiji. My partner suggested we get a new one instead, but I insisted they were alot more than the $75 I was to spend on the used one. She found one at Walmart.ca on sale for $119+ hst, with expected delivery of June 11 2021 and convinced me to go that route as a newer unit is more reliable. The reliability may have been possible had we not been dealing with Walmart online. I ordered the unit, paid for it and got my email confirmation. I promptly told the kijiji posting that I had changed my mind and would be buying a new one instead. Now Walmart has canceled the order, citing availability. The kijiji one has sold, and I'm left spending $200 instead of $75. In these times where online shopping has become so prevalent, Walmart has proven that while they want to compete, they aren't actually a reliable online retailer. Who collects payment for an item they don't even have for sale? This will be my last dealing with Walmart online, I will stick with more reputable retailers like, well, any other online retailer out there.

Name: chelsie lantz
Comment: I had ordered off Walmart.Com through one of there 3 party sellers the people didnâ€™t even send me the right tracking number and they where message to contact me with in 24 hours after I have talked to someone about it they never did this is why I will continue to take my business to Amazon done with Walmart

Name: DA
Comment: I ordered from wal-mart.com I can't get a tracking number or any type of customer service (their calls are routed to the Philippines - get me started on not keeping the jobs in the USA) . I ordered tires so that I could travel for the holiday weekend.

Name: Karen R
Comment: Walmart is a great place to do your shopping for most items, I like the online shopping. I get my shopping done and it shipped right to my house, I still get the great prices at Walmart and I can stay away from the crowds, it doesn't get any better than that.I get great deals from them and I also get my groceries, I like Walmart for all of the reasons as everyone else, the great prices on most everything.

Name: Minjing Liu
Comment: Walmart being rediculous recently. My last few orders all had problems. First of all they delivered my items, I only received some of them. Customer service said they'll make a replacement, but at the end they just give me refund. Then second time, they delivered part of my stuff to somewhere else that I don't even know where to find. I talked to customer service again, whatever they said ended up just a refund. An email told me the rest of my stuff will arrive today, then today I got another email says "We're processing your refund. " What's going on?! They just directly give me my refund without saying/doing anything?! That's rediculous and awful! If Walmart had problem delivery stuff to people then don't make any online purchase service!

Name: CHRISTINE JONES
Comment: I am still waiting for some of my items--items that I've long ago paid for. FedEx is their carrier for all of these vendors, and it's the same song, second verse with them. Promises are made but never kept. I'm tired of being lied to, so will be asking my bank to initiate fraud investigations against Walmart. Enough is enough. I hope that customers will boycott Walmart and their vendors. Let's put 'em out of business.

Name: Robin Batura
Comment: This store staff, on Collier, near Marco Island, doesn't care about elderly or handicapped people. Not one cash register available other than self checkout. Customer service did not have one customer. However they did have three employees standing there doing nothing. They refused to let me check out which would have been so much easier with my handicap cart and refused to open up a lane. When I got home I could barely get out of the car I was in so much pain. From now on I will shop at Publix because it would be worth paying more money to be treated like a human being. These people on duty at 5:00 p.m. on May 24, 2001 had no compassion or humanity concerns whatsoever. They should be ashamed of themselves.

Name: Michael Fallah
Comment: I returned something i bought from Walmart online, it took about a month after i returned it that they refund my money , while it was $230 short. after so many calls the customer service that i am sure is based in India, always said they are escalading this and i will get an answer in 2-3 business day, I had heard this more than 6 times now but I have not recieved any money yet.

Name: Carolyn Miller
Comment: WORST SHOPPING EXPERIENCE ONLINE; I wouldn't DARE go to their store. Their customer service reps are beyond RUDE and IGNORANT. They don't know their merchandise; they don't know their store's policies and they absolutely don't know common, acceptable manners when it comes to dealing with the public. In addition, their knowledge of the English language is very limited making it almost impossible to understand them on the phone. I will no longer subject myself to this unacceptably low level of customer service. I'm closing my account as soon as I finish this review.

Name: Sylvie Gamboa
Comment: DONT USE WALMART.COM THEY ARE FULL OF FRAUD! I AM CURRENTLY HAVING THEM INVESTIGATED BY POLICE INVESTIGATORS FOR FRAUD. WHEN WE ORDERED SOMETHING THEY DIDNT HAVE IN STOCK FOR A FUTURE PURCHASE THEY CLAIM TO THE PUBLIC THEY WONT CHARGE YOUR DEBIT CARD FOR UNTIL IT SHIPS BUT THEY LIE! THEY DEBITED MY DEBIT CARD FOR A ITEM THEY DIDNT HAVE IN STOCK AND I NEVER EVEN RECEIVED. THEY LIE. AND WHEN I CANCELED THE PRE ORDER THEY HELD ON TO MY FUNDS STILL FOREVER..IT TOOK ME GOING TO MY BANK TO FILE A COMPLAINT AGAINST THEM FOR FRAUD TO FINALLY GET MY MONEY BACK! DONT DO BUSINESS WITH WALMART.COM THEY ARE FRAUD AND LIARS ...A VERY DISHONEST COMPANY! FRAUD LIARS! NO DIGNITY NO CLASS AT ALL THIS WALMART.COM SHOULDN'T EVEN BE IN BUSINESS!

Name: Customer
Comment: On April 29, I bought a custom made blanket from here, and the process of making it was kind of annoying, which was okay because it's not their fault. So after I purchased it, I checked to see when it was going to arrive, because since it was a birthday present, I wanted to make sure it arrives before my friend's birthday, which was May 5. I saw that it said the most likely delivery date was going to be May 9th, so thinking that it might be faster if I send it to my local Walmart, (so they could print it there, and I pick it up), I did. And thats when I wait, waiting, waiting, waiting. It is now May 10, AFTER my friend's birthday and I keep trying to check the status of the blanket but it just says "Processing". I have not gotten any email update, or any email saying there was difficulty with my product (which is extremely understandable because mistakes always happen). So I'm pretty annoyed by now since I waited 11 days for my item but it was still stuck at "processing". So I decide to go on the Walmart live chat and just see what was going on. (I recommend going on a live chat, rather than a call because it is just more efficient and less likely to receive "bad customer service"). And I chat with them, probably over 30 minutes) to see what was going on with my package, and they tell me that the package had an error so it never finished processing, and so they just cancelled it and gave me a refund just now. I was understanding and grateful for the customer service because they explained to me. But the thing is, if I HADN'T come forth with the error with my package, I would've still been waiting for an email or something about it. I just think that if the product has an error, the customer should be notified of it.

Name: Gil
Comment: Low low level store with the most horrible CS. They have closed their fitting rooms due to corvid telling clients to check fitting at home and replace as needed, so we did. Now trying to replace some of the non fitting items they tell us they don't replace anything until further notice. Called the store manager and she said that if I don't remember the name of whoever told me that then she will not replace them... LOL Insanity and stupidity at its best. I'm done with Walmart after 20 years of loyalty... they are really dropping the ball lately

Name: CHARLENE JACOBSON
Comment: We are behind a Wal-Mart in Lancaster ca. I posted a review about how well they did here and how horrible it was in bullhead city az. So I've been sitting here in the heat for 30 minutes and no sign of my groceries. Also, 2 hours before pickup they notified me of items I ordered not in stock. Totally unacceptable. Will start shopping at winco.

Name: Aneisha Cooper
Comment: Walmart has the best customer service team.

Name: Deez Nutz
Comment: Avoid using Walmart at all costs. Their return policy is how they are making up for loss from covid-19. They are not doing exchanges or returns until the unforeseeable future. So they will hold onto your money and build the interest in their accounts for the next 3 to 6 months. Holding the money of millions of customers that are already struggling just to make more profit is downright scumbag and dirty of Walmart. They are knowingly selling defective food products and Walmart is not willing to correct the issue in any way.

Name: Scott Cooper
Comment: Ordered a product 5 weeks ago online from a third party seller. Product has not arrived and countless emails have gone unanswered and what is worse Walmart customer service reps were ignorant and uninformed. One rep rudely hung up on me while another transferred me back into the main queue and the third rep simply lied to me by telling me my package would be delivered within the next few days. The package she was referring to was still at customs in Vancouver and she would have not known that at that time.  In short, Walmart has hired lying buffoons to help their loyal customers. I will not shop at Walmart until they fix this issue. Wayfair gets my business  Scott

Name: Ms Mercedesk
Comment: In the midst of COVID Walmart had this cycle for $98.99. I called & after being put on hold for 47 minutes they said it was on clearance & "out of stock". It wasn't returning therefore, I couldn't be put on backorder lists. They adviced to try my local stores. I spent a long weekend calling & going to all my local stores in a 40 mile radius. Zilch! Nothing! The VERY next day, MONDAY, a friend called saying It was BACK on their website! I said what? I went online & sure enough miracles of miracles there it is! Except now 24 HOURS later it's for $199.99! I ordered it but the more I thought on it I felt conned! I called Walmart for an explanation. They said "it just arrived" & that it sold online ONLY. So why was I directed to the stores? No answer. Only "Sorry". After all the rigamarules I went through I feel walmart yanked it off their website only to jack up the price. That as a "3rd party" sold this they were unable to honor the 24 hours previous price. Adding insult to injury they offered a 10% off my next order. UNBELIEVABLE! I'm refusing delivery of this & will no longer shop Walmart. (And trust me when I tell you. I shopped A LOT at walmart) I'm going back to Target & Amazon. At least they honor their prices. This kind of horrid service shall become walmarts down fall. As a loyal customer I am seriously so very disappointed in Walmart.

Name: Katrina Clarke
Comment: HORRIBLE.....OUT OF $300 AND AN IPAD  ordered iPad 4 weeks ago for a motherâ€™s day gift for my grandma and still waiting. Wish I wouldâ€™ve just paid an extra $100 and went through target. At least I would have had it 2 weeks ago. I guess they have to recover for all the stolen items due to becoming a DIY CHECK OUT type of store. People steal from them and then walmart steals from me. Nice but if I do what they did to me.... IM GOING TO JAIL. What a sorry excuse for a family store.

Name: Michael Hanford
Comment: Problem with delivery of my order by FedEx. Called Walmart, as, I got nowhere with FedEx! In four minutes, the young lady got FedEx on the phone (Iâ€™d waited 30minutes and no answer), found out that FedEx outright lied to me, placed a new order, and apologized (NOT Walmartâ€™s fault). A perfect example of the all-too-rare first class customer service!

Name: Tamara D.
Comment: Friendly staff, first timer here and helped me get in with my stroller.  It is a bit tight spaced when it's crowded so bring your baby carrier and skip the stroller!    I liked the selection of ready to eat snacks, lots of drink choices.  They have beer and wine too.  The only downside was there was no baby food.  And that's really not that much of a downside.    They're giving away free reusable totes for a limited time so come now to get yours.  You'll need it if you're grabbing more than a couple things.    The best thing that stood out to me was the reasonable prices.  I filled up an entire tote with snacks and drinks and treats and it only cost me $16!  They do not mark up the prices like other grocery places downtown which is awesome.  Things were cheaper than back home at my local grocery store.  My son thought it was the coolest place so we will be back.

Name: Nick S.
Comment: It's in an amazon district so it feels like you're in a suburb surrounded by boring people. Being in amazon districts in Seattle also have a mall vibe about them. Everyone over there dresses and looks the same. It makes it hard to enjoy it. Amazon should have moved into Bellevue, they would have fit in well.

Name: Thomas Barry
Comment: Service has always suffered at Walmart locations. Now they suffer a lack of employees. Due to the government and their lack of paying employees. So now the service is worse the lines are longer and Walmart keeps profiting. I'm no longer spending my money at Walmart. I'll go somewhere I get treated nice and spend my money.

Name: Kenneth A
Comment: I find it TOTALLY offensive that Walmart store #2205 allowed a black employee to wear a shirt while at work on duty stating, "I'M ROOTING FOR EVERYONE BLACK" on Saturday, May 29th, 2021. This needs to be addressed. Racism comes from ALL directions!!!

Name: the og st st
Comment: Walmart is the worst when it comes to online orders for pickup. Target, order is ready within 20 minutes. Walmart, I order in the morning and early evening itâ€™s still NOT READY!!! WTH are you people doing?!! Order from Target and see how itâ€™s done! Learn from them.

Name: ABM Ontario
Comment: I ordered through walmart.ca and paid through walmart.ca. Their return policy states any product $150.00 or less sold and shipped by a third party can be returned at walmart stores. I received the car wash solution spilled all over the bag it was packaged in. I chatted with customer service who told me the product is final sale and would not be taking back the item. I said it was never indicated anywhere that it was final sale and I never would have purchased it if it was final sale. She said the third party will contact me within one business day. I said I bought this through walmart.ca and was charged by walmart, that walmart had no issue charging me this product but when I received this product damaged, they cannot help me resolve this and I'll have to wait for the third party seller to contact me. walmart said this is their policy. Business practice to charge customers and not care about customer's issues with the purchased products as long as they get your money. Hopefully Better Business Bureau can help me.

Name: Scott Adams
Comment: The "Re-captcha" H3ll on wallymart.com is insane. It's no longer worth even considering them for most items.

Name: eric harris
Comment: Stop selling out of stock items as in stock! Stop telling people items are shipped when they do not exist! Let people know if an item is not in stock! Advertise truthfully, don't lie about your procedures. Nothing was done honestly, I am tired of being lied too and ripped off!

Name: Mujeeb
Comment: WALMART IS SELLING FAKE PRODUCT ONLINE, ORDERED BBQ LARGE AND I GOT TOY GRILL WHICH I CANT USE FOR ANYTHING, I LOST MY TRUST ON WALMART, THIS IS 2ND PURCHASE ONLINE AND I GOT FAKE PRODUCTS

Name: Sarai Antonio
Comment: They don't know the difference between a grape and a cherry. Sad.

Name: Jill Leone
Comment: On two different occasions, when I ordered online and was sent confirmation I am then notified that the items and are not available! One time, I went to the store after receiving a pick up notice ,waited for a while using the app, and decided to go in the store and wait some more. I was told that items were not available! To make matters worse, I went into the store and found the items in stock which were twice the amount of money! I contacted customer service and was told that they would be returning after they investigated. Receive no refund and no call! Amazon is far more efficient !

Name: Duncan Daughtry
Comment: Recently purchased a Centerpoint Patriot 425 Crossbow.first time I tried to shoot a bokt, the bowstring broke, and the bolt shattered. I tried to return it the next day. Although they poise a 90 day return policy. They do not honor it. They refused the return.

Name: AnnieW
Comment: I had a very horrible experience with two Representatives from walmart.com. the first person whose name was cordaja actually hung up on me when I was trying to explain my situation. I was not being rude in any way. The next representative was an actual manager. Her name is Roxanna and she refused to refund me for a product that I was charged twice for. She was very unprofessional. This was actually the first time I called Walmart for a refund and usually representatives are supposed to look at the background of this kind of History to see if I'm able to get a refund or not and she did not do that I do not believe that she is an ethical person she may need more coaching for this position.

Name: Cari
Comment: Walmart.com has the worst service ever. Do not order from Walmart.com if you cancel your order as it processing they will still charge you and make you send it back with your own money or tell you not to worry about it and charge your credit card a month later. Order through Amazon where it is easier and convenient. Walmart has the worst customer service ever they are rude and have no understanding of nothing. It is a list of problems with Walmart.com and I believe they will never fix it. A bunch of morons.

Name: Matilda Richardson
Comment: Iâ€™ve always ordered from Walmart.com but this time Iâ€™m very disappointed not only are my items not arriving today, they wonâ€™t be here until the end of the day Tuesday why am I upset because these are my groceries and I couldâ€™ve made other arrangements

Name: Jocelyn Ponto
Comment: I purchased items this month of May and one item is delayed and I got that. My concern was after I have a Walmart. Com app, they took my money out of my account without me buying on that particular price.It happened several times and its frustrating that I couldn't get a hold of their customer service. Coz of that you can't get a refund of your money that no one knows who took it.Am gonna uninstall my Walmart app once I receive my last item that up to now its still somewhere as the tracking system says.

Name: Steve Caison
Comment: Purchased a set of crosswind HP010 tires on line. They sent a set that no where on their site that fits my car. Big hassle to get a set . Wound up costing me well over 100$ more for a lower grade tire. Couldn't get the free rotation or road hazard, had to pay else where to have mounted and balanced cause shop was closed. And now I have to pay each time to have mounted and balanced. More further expences on me. Wound up running me more money in long run. Screwed blued and tattooed by Walmart with out lube

Name: Hannah
Comment: Part of my order was cancelled due to a â€œsystem error.â€ After talking with friends who use Walmart.com to shop, they have had orders cancelled too. A good company would make sure that their customers were taken care of and products were delivered appropriately. On top of this, I tried completing the satisfaction survey that was sent to my email so that I could voice my concern. However, it was not accepted due to it being over seven days old.
