Name: Jeff L.
Comment: The Amazon Go store was quite the experience.  Luckily, one of my friends in my traveling party had visited earlier in the day and gave us the breakdown of how it all worked so we were ready to go.  We made sure we had the app ready to go on our phones prior to getting to the store itself.    Walking into the store was almost like a grab and go convenience store set up but with some subway turnstiles.  You scan your QR code via the app when you enter and you're ready to go.  The store itself is fairly small but there's a variety of some household grocery items on the right side of the store, and then a lot of packaged ready to eat things on the left hand side.  There's some cool Amazon Go store exclusive items that they have at the store that would be great souvenirs.  They had tumblers, mugs, and chocolate bars.  You take anything that you want and once you're done, you leave the store.  Through the magic of technology, they know exactly what you took and what you put back. In about 10 minutes or less you'll have an emailed receipt of what items you had taken and what was charged to the credit card that was linked to the Amazon account/app.  The app didn't accept my gift card balance as a form of payment but it had to be a credit card.  Overall, this store is very efficient and convenient.  There wasn't a wait to check out and this place easily could have been chaotic with crazy lines with how many people were in there if this was a traditional market.  There were It's a wide range of shoppers that were in here including people that worked in offices nearby, construction workers that are working on the next big building across the street, and I'm sure many tourists such as myself checking the store out.  I wonder when they'll start rolling these stores out in other cities.  This probably works best in a city setting where there's just the right amount of foot traffic.

Name: Deep Sdihu
Comment: Very bad experience,I purchase engine oil for 26.77 each and when they cancel my order the refund me 24.38 .it really hard to get ur money back trust me

Name: Chris Hamlin
Comment: I would rate zero if possible two time one couldn't find a TV they had 20 of on their shelf and then the 2 items I had with it they put in a totally different car because they can't tell what numbers are and then I give a days notice for pick up for what they had in stock and then it gets canceled then next morning and the crappy thing is they hold your money just to not give you your stuff this is the dumbest stuff I have ever been thru like everyone should stick to amazon changing because it was definitely in-stock I went in and bought it they are crazy

Name: Princess Annabelle
Comment: A month ago me and my roomate went shopping with our money and a customer in front of us forgot to cancel his order.  He was also upset at them too cause they assumed we were stealing.  I'm sorry we flipped out on them but its places like this that give me flashbacks.  This was very disrespectful and discriminatory how this store treated him and I really was on self check out trying to help my friend pay for his food.  He is disabled and sometimes i go with him to help him pay.  I do not appreciate how your staff stands over the customers like were all criminals.  Please tell your staff to ease up on the customers.  Some of us used to work retail too and we quit because of people like that who worship there staff but ignore the needs of the customers.  They have way to many self check outs and not enough carts. It is ridiculous. That is not customer service. That is discrimination. Grow up walmart.

Name: NDIrishfan â€œNDIrishfanâ€
Comment: Walmart.com has gotten so bad that you see more 3rd party merchandise than you do Walmart. I do not go to Walmart.com to buy from sellers already on Amazon and Ebay. You cannot even filter them out. It always lists them 1st and Walmart stock last. No wonder Amazon is so much better. At least Amazon lists their items 1st then the 3rd parties. Hey Walmart if I want to shop 3rd parties I can go to Ebay or many other seller sites. Walmart should always list their products 1st. What I see happening now is 3rd party sellers using bots to buy up all the hot products and then selling at scalper prices on the same site. Walmart is aweful now. If you go into a Walmart its cluttered up and there is never any help around. They now want you to self check out and I have done just that. I have Self checked out of Walmart period!

Comment: Ordered groceries select delivery. In Delivery preference I added directions as this is always an issue. Receive 1st text order is on the way approximate arrival time. Next I receive an email order is out for delivery etc. it showed in tracking order 18 mins. Driver Travel time. 3 mins away driver calls he doesnâ€™t speak English I reply â€œno hablo espaÃ±olâ€œ remember what driver is calling about is in the delivery preference . I did my best to indicate the Main Street he was to turn on he replied ok and hung up 3 mins away 5 mins goes by and tracking ends in between the time we hung up I sent Spanish text to update driver(Spanish translator)! After 45 mins of waiting I called Walmart to be told order was delivered back to store & canceled . What poor services it leaves me the customer to reorder the same items while my payment for a refund is being refunded what if thatâ€™s my only money. Itâ€™s not fair to the customer to wait several days for a refund itâ€™s been cleared on walmart end they have confirmed & cancel the order. I know everyone needs a job We also have to make sure their subcontractors have people who can speak or comprehend In order to have a successful delivery. This happens a lot Walmart loses if the order is delivered to the wrong address or return because the driver canâ€™t find the correct address. A lost and not to mention the client. Since this all started itâ€™s the worst service when dealing with Walmart and they donâ€™t care . They have the means to sub with companies to put in place better delivery protocol and a faster turn around of refunding customers that paid with their bank or credit card within 3 hrs as their other methods of payment. Im very upset with this process. And I have to reorder and hope tomorrow they can get my order delivered! Thumbs down Walmart!

Name: Wil Clarke
Comment: May 29, 2022  Message 1: â€œYour Walmart delivery has arrived! Chanelle will leave your order at your door. No need to sign!â€ Message 2, a minute or so later: â€œSome of your Walmart items were delivered on Sat May 28 at 9:13 a.m. View a photo of your delivery at â€¦â€ The photo showed a wall covered with a rack-facade and a bench in front of it with a plastic bag of goods. Walmart has recently proved to be significantly faster by a day or more than either e-Bay or Amazon. This time Chanelle outdid herself. Only one problem! She delivered it somewhere else! My house doesnâ€™t have a stone faÃ§ade, nor a brown bench. I phoned Walmart the next day and spoke with Rana who had an Asian accent. I explained what had happened. He put me on a long hold. When he finally came back, he asked if he could refund my money. I suspect he checked Googleâ€™s picture of the front of my house and saw that indeed this isnâ€™t a picture of my house. We did some sleuthing. Google Maps boldly and erroneously labels the house behind my house on a different street, with my address. That house has a setup as shown in the picture. But its number is not the number in the address and is on a different street than mine. Obviously, Chanelle didnâ€™t read my address: she simply, blindly believed Google and delivered my order to that house. That part of my order was not vital. The outstanding item in the order is vital and is to be delivered in a day or two. Iâ€™m hoping that Chanelle isnâ€™t chosen to deliver that one, too!

Name: Travis Harrell
Comment: Crackheads everywhere fun to watch tho.

Name: Punkin Wilson
Comment: I came here to write my review, which isn't good, but I see so many others have had the same bad experiences, so what more can I say? They continue to have several cash registers that aren't staffed, you can hardly find help and when you do, they tell you they don't work in "that" department. Lines are long and many of the stores are unkept. Does Walmart even come here to read these reviews? I'd like to know if Walmart even cares?

Name: Ryan S
Comment: I ordered a set of tires to be delivered to a nearby store location for pickup. The shipment was delayed a week and a half. It said online they had been delivered to the store, but when I called the store they had no record of them having arrived. This order was then refunded to me and a new set of tires was ordered with a 10% discount for the inconvenience. The discount part was at least something. But with this second order, there were yet again logistical problems. The website said they had been delivered to the store, but the store checked the back room and did not find my tires. Again they said contact the website. I called walmart.com again and politely explained how frustrating this whole experience had been, which had taken almost a month, and I had nothing to show for it. They said they would refund my order. Apart from this, the maximum compensation they said they were able to give me was a promo code to "spend $45 dollars on the website, get a $25 dollars off". Now ask yourself, does this sound like it makes up for all the wasted time waiting for nothing, the phone calls with representatives that had no idea where the tires were, the bouncing back and forth between the website and the brick and mortar store, etc? For me, this waste a serious waste of time, and the promo code compensation a shrugged off gesture with very little substantive value.

Name: nakesia saulsberry
Comment: I always shop online at Walmart. Sometimes I go to the store. I order mostly groceries. I have it delivered to my apartment. The drivers are lousy. They will deliver your groceries and put them on the sidewalk. I told them to bring the food inside. My groceries was stolen. Somebody walked by and took it. They didn't bring the food to my door. Left it on outside on the sidewalk.

Name: MrNugua
Comment: I want to love their online service. I really do. But 3/4 of the items I need to order are constantly out of stock. Or they won't ship them.  Sorry Walmart. I really did want to utilize your service but it needs improving.

Name: Boom Ona
Comment: I had given a 1 before for the rude staff. On 2nd thought I'll give a 3 on account of the place being tidy and clean. Restroom didn't have an awful smell either. In guiding the stag effort hag a bad night or just didn't wish to be there.

Comment: Was charged 98 dollars for a yearly delivery service that I did NOT sign up for. I don't know how it happened but my bank account is 98 dollars lower today because of it. It took a struggle to finally get a customer service rep to issue a refund that I am supposed to see with 3 to 5 business days, I'll believe it when I see it. Walmart says it is all up to my bank as when and if I receive it. Should never have been charged in the first place. I removed my payment method from my account and will never use them again.

Comment: Pharmacy is a joke. Waiting 4days for my medication. The only pharmacy that needs codes to fill your prescription. They say they are going to help you,by the time they get back to you your prescription is cancelled. Do Not Get Your Pain Medicine From Walmart Pharmacy. If you do you will be sorry.

Name: ingersollwe
Comment: Last night at 11:30PM I found a squat rack that was a 'roll back'. I attempted to purchase this on walmart.com several times last night but every time I clicked proceed to checkout I would receive an error message. Now it was late and there was no timer that I could see that would indicate the squat rack offer would expire, so I figured I would go to bed and order them in the morning. Well this morning (6 and a half hours later) I go on to order them and the squat racks are no longer 'roll back', increasing the cost by 10 bucks. I then contacted customer support hoping to receive the previous pricing since it was less than 24 hours old. The representative informed me that Walmart prices go up and down and to check back later because Walmart could not honor previous prices...  First of all, I have dumped thousands of dollars into Walmart over the years and have had mostly decent experiences. For such a large Organization to not honor their own prices is ridiculous. I've heard several other stores have honored previous pricing in situations like this, but I suppose that's because they value customers.  Second, I am not the kind of person that enjoys messing around with price watching. When I need something I need it, and don't have time to sit and see what happens.  After this experience I plan to still get these squat racks, but I will most likely purchase them on Amazon. I'm sure nothing will happen because of this review, but I just want people to be aware in the event you see a product that is considered a 'roll back'.

Name: Andrew Messina
Comment: Worst store I have ever tried to shop at. Got lied to over and over and over and then sent to two different store locations 4times . I am a disabled man and feel like I have been played a game with the employees. Phillip the store manager at pier park is an jerk attitude that did not want to waste his time to help me with my situation. Amber the manager at location 818 tried to help but told me a lie that pier park would help. Panama City beach Florida is the worst !!

Name: Amar
Comment: Be careful with your purchases! Without notice, Walmart is no longer accepting returns on food and some other items . . . Taking advantage of Covid19 to get richer!

Name: N.M.
Comment: I ordered a chair for $200. online at walmart. The chair showed that there were 4 in stock and it would be delivered in a week. A week later i got an email saying that they item was out of stock and they cancelled my order. I went back to the online site and the chair was still there, but the price had been doubled to $400. They wanted me to re-order at double the price. I have reached out to them but only got one reply saying that due to high demand they were out of stock. This is bull. They still show 4 of the chairs in stock at the new price.

Name: SJohnson
Comment: Today I spent almost $300 using the delivery grocery service. My order was NOT delivered to my home yet it showed delivered on the app. There is no direct phone # or chat to customer service, I had to google it. I finally spoke to a csr who told me they would reach out to the store directly and the result was my order would be delivered within 2 hours. It wasn't! Now I'm nervous. I called back asking for refund, I was informed that because it was over $50 the matter had to be escalated. I asked for supervisor or manager, was informed that they do not speak with customers directly, it would only be escalated and decided with a callback. The only thing the csr could do was reach out to the store a 2nd time for order status, again, informed that order will be delivered but they need a driver. I called the store and offered to pick it up, was told "no, we already ordered the driver is there anything else"? Her tone was so nasty and Im so disgusted with this experience. Also several of the gluten free items were substituted with reg items, which is a waste. I will just have to go back to shopping at several stores.

Name: M-G Alfano
Comment: Today I received a package with the wrong item. Looking up that item, it was discontinued which is most likely why the substitution was made from that ordered. Upon contacting the Online department, going to the store and speaking to the return associate, then the floor super, and finally the manager, "Nothing can be done." If you order from the online department you may not be able to get satisfaction. Walmart says their computer system prevents the return and only through the contract company can one expect the right package. A bait and switch is obvious, give your possible unsuspecting customer something you had for a while as they won't know. But, often we do. Compare this store with A... and C..., any number of others too numerous to name. Buy elsewhere, receive what you ordered and get customer service rather than customer no service, receipt or not. This company online dept doesn't even deserve a 1. So, customers, buyer be ware.

Name: Laura B
Comment: I'd give a negative star, if I could. I ordered a piece of furniture from these clowns. When it didn't come by the promised date I called, only to be told, "That's a different seller. We can't help you." Seriously?!?!? You'll sell it on your site under your name, but you won't take any responsibility for it? Homesquare is the third-party seller from whom the furniture was supposed to come, and if you look them up you'll see they rate about one star everywhere on the web. Shame on you, Walmart.com, for doing business with companies who don't come through, and for refusing to stand behind what you sell!

They are so huge the frustrations of one customer does not bother them. Online, they do have fast, free shipping after 39.00 but the website is clunky, slow and full of errors. Often, the descriptions are just not there or inaccurate. It is unfortunate that I live in a very rural area and have to drive 65 miles round trip, so guess I am stuck with good old WM.

Name: Judy Tipp
Comment: Went to the Walmart on Sanderson in Hemet CA to get a tire replaced. My husband checked with them the day before to make sure they had the tire size we needed and they told him they opened at 7a the next day. We arrived at 655a and got our car in line. Cars were lining up behind us but they hadnâ€™t opened yet. At 730a myself and another lady starting calling the store to see if there was a problem. No answer, it just rang for about 3 minutes then disconnected. We both called 10 times and same result. Finally around 8a I walked around to the front of the store and asked for a manager. A girl said she was the front end manager. I asked about the auto shop. She said they donâ€™t open until 8a. I said the sign in the door says 7a. She walked away from me. So I walked to the interior auto department and found the manager. He said most of his staff didnâ€™t show up, only one mechanic. At this point he and the mechanic opened the bay doors and advised everyone that it would take one hour per car and they would start with me since I was there first. They wrote me up and took my keys. I went inside to shop. After an hour I returned to the auto shop and my car had not been touched. Now their story was they cannot change a tire without a second mechanic on the premises pee California state law. I verified this and it is not true. At this point Iâ€™d been there 2 and a half hours so just said give me my keys, Iâ€™m done. They were rude and unprofessional. Laughing at the customers who were all upset at this point. A women who said she was the shop assistant manager showed up and instigated all kinds of anger amongst the customers that were still there. I went to take a photo of her name tag so I wouldnâ€™t forget her name and she completely flipped out of me. Started yelling at me that it was illegal to take a video. I said oh, I wasnâ€™t taking a video but I will now. She completely lost it. She put her hand up to block my phone. It was crazy! I finally got my keys and left. I called to register a complaint with Walmart customer service. They advised the the store general manager would call me in 3 days. I waited 2 weeks and no call so I contacted them back. I was advised that my behavior was inappropriate so he refused to call me. Inappropriate? For taking a video? Donâ€™t ever do business here. I for one will never shop at any Walmart again

Name: Veronica Ortiz
Comment: Walmart has the worst return policy ever!!!! I purchased an air bed and couldn't return it or exchange it at all ðŸ˜ i had lost my receipt, but still they could have exchange it ðŸ˜¤ it's not like I wanted the $$ back I truly hope u guys change your return policy soon. I will never go back to shop at any of your stores again!!!!

Comment: So, I went into this store today (12236 Montana Ave El Paso, TX 79938) looking for a robovac. The one I wanted was locked, so I asked someone for help. As I asked this person, he immediately continued walking and said that he didnâ€™t have the key and that he would call someone. She went to talked to her supervisor and the supervisor asked her to get my name and phone number and they would contact me back because they donâ€™t have the key. ðŸ¤¦ðŸ¾â€â™‚ï¸ no one likes people wasting their time. If it is for you to have certain merchandises locked, either make sure that someone is available at all time with the key on the floor or leave those merchandises unlocked

Name: M FR
Comment: Walmart's customer service is designed to steal money. If they make a mistake in on order, they make the customer fix it or they will not issue a refund. I spent two weeks trying to get them to resolve an order I canceled immediately because the $70 in expedited shipping was worthless. I paid to have an item delivered fast. They then emailed me to say it would arrive five days later, after I'd moved 3000 miles away. They expected me to go pick up the item and return it before issuing a refund. Their customer service is a complete waste of time and obnoxious with their cute little "nice day" attempts. Meanwhile, they cause problems they won't fix and then keep the money. SCUM BAG company.

Name: Amanda Rifenburgh
Comment: I ordered a class ring for my daughter online. Waited a month nvr got ring. Order was cancelled but they took the money out of my account. I called they said they nvr got the money. Called my bank and they said it was paid. Bank gave me a good faith and put it back in my account and went after walmart for money. Walmart nvr paid my bank. They took the money back ouT of my account and bounced every one of my pending charges. I tried calling walmart no answer or the run around. By the time I got anyone my account was negative $407.16 walmart apologize said they would hve my $80 put back and gove me a $25 gift card but would not take care of all the other charges they caused. They told me they felt they were taking care of their part n were nice enough to give me that crappy gift card. Needless to say now im goin to contact a lawyer n will never shop that store again Meijers all the way! If I had stolen $80 in merch from their store it would be all charges pressed against me b miney id pay in fines but its ok for them to steal from me.

Name: Joop V.
Comment: The future of grocery/convenient store shopping! I was so excited to check out the Go store with my friend from out of town after hearing that the store has open. After all, nobody else has cashier-less and check--out-less process in the world today! :D  It was so fun to see how cool technology can be integrated smartly into everyday life and, better, help bring our lives even more efficiencies!  My friend and I had fun checking out the store, the food selection and...we even tried to engi-nerd some confusing use cases to see if Amazon system could get the billing wrong! But no, they got all the systems done right!!  Great idea and super well executed concept! I would love to see this store expand to other areas...and also..more selection beyond food...and cover the whole supermarket selection!

Name: Marcel Gautreau
Comment: You will get hassled if you bring a service animal to the Chatham, Ontario store. Calls to head office about the issue go completely ignored, despite repeated contacts. No issues ever with the same animal anywhere else - other Walmarts, grocery stores, wherever.

Name: MichaelB
Comment: Walmart performed like they said. They where true to their word regarding getting a warranty issue solved. A few months ago I was moving and hired a moving company. Once the moving was completed we started to get our new home situated. We turned the TV on and unfortunately the screen was cracked internally. We called Walmart where I purchased the TV/warranty and they told me the steps I needed to do. Within 15 minutes I had completed the warranty paperwork and a new TV was on its way. The TV was delivered within a week.The new TV was similar but had more features for which I was satisfied. I would recommend Walmart to purchase any TV and also the warranty to which they back.

Name: Charlie
Comment: I myself has usually had good transaction. They have some quality stuff,plenty of toys and hunting camo. Always had good dealings.

Name: marina do
Comment: I like the wallmart pricing. I bough glass plates and really awesome.

The resolutions customer agent named Ivy screamed at me and told me that my items should be shipped at the billing address and so I asked about what the purpose of filling up the shipping address for, if they sent it to a billing address and what if I sent an item to a shipping address that is a gift for someone else. People who screamed at the customers shouldnâ€™t be working as resolutions customer service agent, or stay at home. You are a bad asset to the company.

You people are working there because no one wants to hire u and no one wants you to work for them. I think you should go and pick toilets with your tounges after someone has diarerea!!!!!!!

Name: Teresa
Comment: Our Wal-Mart store in Noblesville Indiana Has bad customer service. The older lady working customer service should not be working in that area or any other area. Store always has lines and no one cares. No ones friendly and now the stupid arrows on the floor. For goodness sakes its a Grocery store, follow the arrows, get real. Everyone in their yellow vest stands around, help people. Meijer is going to be my new store.

Name: Maryanne S
Comment: I had ordered patio furniture in April 2020. I expected a delay in delivery due to Covid-19, however, upon checking on my walmart order history, items were said to be delivered! You can imagine my surprise as patio furniture would be a hard one to miss on your front step!  I contacted walmart's customer service. They saw that it was delivered and suggested I ask a neighbor or family member to see if they had it. Really?! Patio furniture? It's not a small box. I was, like most of the world, AT HOME due to covid-19 so it was not delivered.  I called again! This time they suggested I file a police report or I would not get my refund!  I then called the shipping company and in their searches, they discovered that it hadn't even been documented there and concluded that it was never shipped to them! (I'll remind you that in my tracking, it had already said delivered to my door!)  I called walmart again!!! This time I spoke with a nice gentleman who said it was long enough and he would escalate a ticket to a supervisor who would contact me within the day or two so I gave him my cell phone number for contact purposes.  It is now a week later and I have not heard from anyone SO... I CALLED AGAIN! This time, I got someone who repeated the notes on file (I could tell her almost by heart right now). She told me that someone had already tried to reach out to me but there was no answer and no voicemail. *GRRRR Need I remind you that I gave my CELL PHONE NUMBER in case I go out to get milk or whatever and that my cell phone has voicemail attached!  I am beyond angry at this point and STILL HAVE NO patio furniture. Why am I writing all of this?  DON'T SHOP AT WALMART ONLINE!!!

Name: Ebby
Comment: Horrible, I ordered something through the Walmart online app from a company called Zimtown and they basically just stole my money never sent the item out and Walmart customer service keeps giving me the run around I will NEVER order anything else from Walmart online again apparently anyone can sell on Walmart with a business license...a bunch of crooks

Name: David M Mack
Comment: This review is regarding my experiences with Walmart's online customer service. I have been shopping online since about 2014 for everything from housewares to clothing to craft supplies and everything in between. My purchasing picked up during covid and has increased recently because of the epidemic of street crime and gun violence in the city in which I live. Anyways, I have been making purchases from Walmart for grocery, craft supplies, and power tools and whenever there was/is the unavoidable hiccup their customer service has resolved the issue to my satisfaction. I feel so comfortable with my shopping experiences with them that I opened a Walmart credit account. I can not say enough about my positive experiences with the Walmart Customer Service Team. Thank you for reading this review and I hope that someone may find it useful.

Corporate response was to have someone call me and basically tell me I was in the wrong with nothing even close to an apology when I was the one inconvienced!!! Almost unbelievable.....so yeah that is it for me no more WalMart. They do not need paying customers at that particular store anyway.

Name: Kathryn Torres
Comment: Walmart.com is complete trash. Everything they are saying about not getting your order is completely true. I ordered some items and went ahead with the 30 day trial for the service. I got multiple emails and text messages that my order was on it's way and then that it was delivered the very next day I ordered. I thought, wow this is great. When I go check, there is no order. So I call and they say I need to look around to see if the order was left "somewhere'. I need to go ask my neighbors to see if they received it instead. And the best part: I need to wait at least 48 hours before I can get a refund for my money for the order I never received that says "delivered". They told me that some carriers will mark an order delivered before it really is delivered. WHAT??? I never heard such nonsense in my life. They use the worst method possible, USPS. So the tracking information says my ordered was left in the mail parcel receptacle which means who knows if it was really delivered or someone got my order and never came clean. Total garbage. Their customer service people will pretend they check to see if they can refund your money but the answer is always NO. You will have to wait. When I called back after the required wait time, they now mark my order "Lost" which in their lingo means I might have received it but I am saying I did not. Do not fall for their advertising. This is a very subpar service. Stick with the mainstream competitor. I never any issues with them.

Name: Marta
Comment: Save yourself time and lots of stress. Walmart is giving me so much trouble trying to return an item. Went to the store they couldnâ€™t process it, called 4 times already. They canâ€™t help it. No one knows why- itâ€™s returnable till September. Their customer service people are incompetent and useless. Iâ€™ll never buy from Walmart again. Buy from better company.

Name: Karen Talarico
Comment: Each visit to Walmart I get more and more frustrated. Service is horrendous. The self check outs are a joke! If your lucky there may be one cashier open and line ups at the self check out. Now most of the self checkouts are closed causing huge line ups for something we must do ourselves. Prices continue to go up double and triple what they were a few months ago. You pay your staff peanuts and expect your customers to do staffs job. Many products, cleaning supplies, condiments, some clothing etc are more reasonable ( less than 1/2 the price) in the Dollarama and dollar stores than Walmart. Which I have begun utilizing. Your fresh meats and selection of meats are something to be desired. For a few cents more it is now more cost effective to shop in places such as SaveOn. They provide a good variety of grocery selection and offer full service.

Name: Sheresa Stubbs
Comment: I went to store # 01153 Macon, GA on Harrison Road on June 15, 2022. I explained to the people greeter and customer service that I was bringing back a product. I got to the desk of customer service to exchange the ceiling fan. I was refused the right to exchange it, because a sales associate lied to a manager and said that I cursed them out. I told the manager that it was not true. On the way out I explain to the supervisor that it was a lie. Talked to the sheriff on duty that followed me out the store and told him that the manager lied, she was not even present during the conversation that I had with the sales associate. I recently contacted Walmart corporate office and the police officer's superior. The officer told me that I was banned. I may just decide to contact the media. The way I was treated was unjustly and unnecessary.

Name: Martha Bellamy
Comment: I Martha Bellamy purchased a bottle of wine and the associate always hides her badge turned where you can't see her name, so Vickie came said she must card everyone and she said since my daughter is the youngest I won't be able to purchase the wine. I told her I put in a complaint and corporate said they're wrong and she took the wine and put it behind the counter. I feel as though I'm dealing with racial profiling. I want something done about this nonsense why would I allow my 18 year old to purchase wine? this makes no sense please address this issue. It's the Walmart in Whiteville NC the store number is 01268 on the day of 06/13/2022 at 7:10 pm. The

Name: Joanne Engelbeck
Comment: Purchased four items based on "two day delivery " not necessarily on price or preferred brand. At checkout I was guaranteed two day delivery. Placed order. Next day received email stated my product would arrive in six days, not two. Had to run to store to purchase same items. Will never use or trust Walmart online.

Name: Jennifer
Comment: I ordered a CD on walmart.com, got to the store to pick it up and it was cracked. So, I asked to get a new one sent that was not damaged and received no help even after talking to a manager. This is terrible customer service. They should be able to reorder a damaged product and maybe even offer to have it shipped to your house for free, not tell you to go home and order it again yourself. I remember why I barely ever shop there.

Name: Roger Nunn
Comment: Purchased a gun safe weighing approx 150 pounds for home delivery. After all how many family cars can accommodate a 5 feet tall, 150pound safe?..1 week later fedex ground delivers it, Box was a little battered but seemed intact so we accepted delivery. Had to open and remove box from safe to review contents, Only to discover no key. So I have a locked cabinet I cannot open. Called Walmart customer service, guess what they wonâ€™t replace the key. Ok, I said return it. Ok they say, but it must be in a box to return it, I ask how do I do that? They say after escalating to their tier 2 sophisticated customer service, â€œthatâ€™s my problem, if I donâ€™t b0x it, I cant return itâ€.. they cared nothing that they short shipped an order and charged me, they cared nothing that they could simply get me a key.. and they certainly cared nothing about customer service. If I couldtnâ€™t Use something I got from them, they donâ€™t care. Itâ€™s like about Walmart policies. .... well, Iâ€™ll cancel the credit card payment and see them in small claims court before I get stuck with a gun safe I cannot open. My advice, donâ€™t purchase anything that requires opening from Walmart.com, because if you want to return it they make you pack it all up again for shipping. Little hard if you have to destroy the box to open it!

Name: Robert Cecil
Comment: People need to leave their pets at home. If you cannot go more than 1/2 hour to one hour without your pet then your life is pathetic

Name: Tosha chewning
Comment: I will never shop in Walmart again. They are not deserving of my hard earned money. They changed the garden center to a 20 items or less line all of a sudden and I didn't notice, so after waiting 15 minutes in line one of the employee's walks over and starts going through my basket and counting my stuff. I had 26 items and 7 of them were candy bars. The employee told me to leave the line. Rude nasty people!

Name: Jennifer Jackson
Comment: Still waiting on my order from a couple months ago. They've actually cancelled orders before and not notified me in the past, so I'm not surprised. This time I put in for a refund. It says they'll send a mailing label for me to return item that were to arrive a 2 months ago and says delayed. Uhmm, I don't have them....ughhh

Name: Brandee
Comment: Bought Walmart grocery delivery 300 dollars worth. The doordasher delivered it to the wrong apartment. The tenants stole my groceries and split it between three people. Called the cops. They recovered some of the stuff but some was damaged. Walmart issued me a 39 dollar refund and took an 18 dollar delivery charge out. Now I'm without grocery money and groceries

Name: Susan Obrien
Comment: Ordered pharmacy supply, accepted order, told me delivery date June 12, no updates, last time I checked AFTER delivery date it was marked "Canceled." Thank heaven I did not really need this product immediately. Never ever will order from War Mart again.

Name: Patty A Rodriguez
Comment: Walmart has the worst website ever, information is never accurate... it show products available that are totally sold out weeks ago. Twice drove more than 1 hour and got there an everything was sold out two weeks ago!

Name: JoDeana Stafford
Comment: When Sam Walton first started Wal-Mart he told my roommate that if he just made a penny profit on what he sold he would be happy. He also asked him if he wanted to invest in his new business but my roommate didn't think much about it at the time. Now he wishes he had gotten in at the time. Sam Walton would turn over in his grave if he knew what was happening to the business he started now. They are now trying out a new concept at a store somewhere. There are no cashier's there are only self check out there. And they plan to do this in ALL STORES in the near future. Look at the thousands of people who will lose their jobs. If they continue to do this WE will stop shopping there even though it will cost us more money to do it.

Name: Daniel Rockwell
Comment: I ordered 2 game for my son for his birthday Splatoon 2 and Cuphead. Cuphead only came over night and the Splatoon 2 version just stayed there not processing I tried to chat with someone about this but they were no help. So if you try to order games from Walmart, try to do it at a decent time cuz they will of course *not do it*

Name: Bevers
Comment: We just visited the Walmart in Deerfoot Meadows. There were 2 staff in the self checkout area - neither of them cleaned our terminal either before or after we checked out. They both appeared to just be standing around. Also, isnâ€™t Walmart a large enough store to have no contact credit card terminals?

Name: Regina Johnson
Comment: Returned an item that I purchased a week ago. It is customary to have money returned to card used however they already have my money so why should I have to wait 3 to 5 business days for refund when I was in store and requested cash immediately. I've been waiting for a supervisor to call me back to resolve this issue since 3 PM and it is 11 PM

Name: Tony
Comment: I was scammed by Walmart into buying two $500 Walmart/Sams gift cards. My Bad! Walmart adamantly refused to refund my money. Tried to use the gift cards to buy gas at Sams and they wonâ€™t work without spending more money on a membership card plus the gas is $0.15/gal higher than Costco. All in all, Iâ€™m stuck with $1000.00 of Walmart gift cards for a store I find absolutely nothing of value to purchase, expensive gasoline, and an attitude of extreme confrontation.

Name: Lauren N.
Comment: This is a really interesting way to shop. Just scan in with the app. Grab what you need and walk out. I felt rushed when I was in the store. People were walking up and grabbing things so quickly I felt like I had to get out of the way vs shopping. I also didn't like that it took some time after we left to find out what we were charged for.

Name: Kyle M.
Comment: Regardless of the products offered, I think this is an awesome experience to have. I like how you can check your Amazon Go app after a visit and see what you took and how long you spent in the store (my record is 14 seconds). Aside from the novelty of it, this place is extremely convenient amidst a busy lunch scene in South Lake Union. Their offerings are pretty tasty as well. I would recommend the goat cheese and date salad and the egg salad sandwich.

Name: Mckenzie
Comment: Poor customer service. Tried investing in crypto? Give a try to www. primetrustcoin.io . They are legit and genuine site with an incredible policy for payments. Iâ€™m getting much profit here

Name: Moe Akhbari
Comment: I purchased tire twice it took 2 hours to put the on very unprofessional establishment I wouldn't shop there anymore they're either on cellphone or walking around went to another place took only 20 minutes

Name: d miyazaki
Comment: horrendous. trying to return a spray that did not work. after fedex says CANNOT due to postal regulations. then walmart to say thank you for being a customer then deactivates my account.  never never will order anything more. dectivate a customer's account after attempting to return that fedex cannot accept ?

Name: Customer
Comment: Order a pool june 1 was suppose to be HERE by june 15th here it is the 17th still no pool called walmart told them and all i got was a run around told me to just wait its summer and i paid over 2500 for shipping and the pool do not order from walmart they get your money then screw you around on delivery!

Name: Kate Savoyard
Comment: I have not ordered any items online yet - prefer seeing things and having opportunity to touch them in order to see the true quality and try them on before buying. I love the variety and prices.

Name: Harry Siew
Comment: I wanted to buy a TV set, so I went to Walmart to look for one, but I went home without buying it - thinking that I could buy it cheaper elsewhere. But I returned the next day I saw the same unit were more affordable by 50 dollars! I quickly bought it.  So I guess if you think your item is not cheap enough, check the next day. Perhaps they are more affordable then :D

Name: Keshu MAINI
Comment: Selected this company by thinking that it is one of the biggest name in US. Using web service, from U.K tried to send a family gift for brother's family in Round Rock, TX., After waiting for a week and talking to the courier company, come to know it's delivered to someone else as address labels messed up by the company. The customer support executive promised to delivered afterwards but then refused. A very big disappointment. Will never recommend to anyone to buy something from Walmart.

Name: Tommy
Comment: They scrutinize your product reviews and if they don't like it they don't allow it to post so I don't review anything that I buy from them.

Name: Lodye
Comment: I have placed an order on March 12, 2020. and still haven't received it. contacted Walmart to cancel and refund my payment on May 15, 2020. as of today, still not receive money back. i called every second day to follow up. each person the the phone told me a different s*it of waiting another 2 days. it's completely bulls*it. my request has been escalated multiply times,,, now on hold waiting to talk to escalating team.. been on hold for more than an hour, i guess no one is dare to pick up my call any more. the worst shopping experience ever.

Name: Jeanie Melton
Comment: I went to the vision center in Walmart at Quinlan Texas 75474 to order some contacts . of course its all roped off you have to stand outside the rope for service. one lady is in there sitting at a computer didnt bother to look up when it was obvious she knew i was there. Shes been there for 50 years, needs to retire shes so rude. I told her the doctor personally brought my prescription over to them , which of course she couldnt find. im will never go in that sorry Walmart store again. Im white of course so i dont guess that discrimination. I have never been treated so rudely in my life. They will never have any business from me or my family again

Name: Eric Garvey
Comment: I ordered a product online and they said that it was in stock and I could pick it up today. I then received a message stating that it had been delayed. About an hour later, I received a message stating that my order had been cancelled and that the item was no longer in stock. THANKS FOR WASTING MY TIME WALMART! I will now shop elsewhere!

Name: latoya james
Comment: Every time I order online the order is cancelled. These people do not keep track of what is in stock so why they have online ordering, I have no idea. Will not order online any longer and I do not really shop there so no problem. HEB > Walmart!

Name: Maria
Comment: The pharmacy at Walmart in Chicago Ridge is great. Not only do they have great employees working there but one of the employees specifically, Patrycja was kind enough to give me a big discount on my medications. Iâ€™m so pleased with the service I received.

Name: bob
Comment: This has been THE WORST EXPERIENCE I have ever had any where!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Order COMPLETELY wrong. I ordered 5 tires for my trailer; all the same every thing; Load range "d", size 205-75-R15; same manufacture, and got 3 the wrong size, 1 with a lower load range than what I ordered and 1 that is about 3 size's bigger, different manufacture, different type "off road" I think. Customer service IS THEE WORST!! People on the other end don't speak or VERY little English, They do not understand you, They speak right over the top of you with out paying attention to you, Miserable gruesome experience. Walmart IS NOT worth the aggravation, buy else where, IT WILL BE WORTH IT!!!!!!!

Name: Rozanne Lamar
Comment: I Would rather do anything than walk in Walmart I hate going to walmart. The store is tired and the workers are unfriendly. They also never have enough people working in line There are workers there standing around doing nothing but the manager has told us standing in line before that walmart will not let him open extra check out lines. Walmart use to be great I love sams but I would rather go anywhere than go to Walmarts now.

Name: Maria Damato
Comment: Gave one star because there are no lower ratings available. If there was, I would have rated it -10. Customer service agents do not know what they are doing, at all. If you call 10 times, you will get 10 different answers. Need more training or placed on a different position.

Name: Michael Apice
Comment: Utter disgrace of a store.  I went to this â€œsuperâ€ store because it was on the way....what a mistake. Gotta be the dirtiest,, most disgusting and least welcoming Walmart Iâ€™ve been too. Just avoid this place at all cost.

Name: disneyfan131
Comment: Its the future! Wow! This is the future of shopping and if you are visiting Seattle you have to check it out! This is basically a convenience store with a larger than normal selection of stuff. But here is the cool part, you come in and scan your Amazon Go app, you grab what you want... AND YOU WALK OUT! Itâ€™s really cool and amazing how it all works. Prices are normal and they have a good â€œbasicâ€ selection of stuff with some good prepared foods. Check it out if you have any interest in tech!

Name: Reed B.
Comment: Wow! This is the future of shopping and if you are visiting Seattle you have to check it out!  This is basically a convenience store with a larger than normal selection of stuff.  But here is the cool part, you come in and scan your Amazon Go app, you grab what you want... AND YOU WALK OUT! It's really cool and amazing how it all works.  Prices are normal and they have a good "basic" selection of stuff with some good prepared foods.  Check it out if you have any interest in tech!

Name: Brian H.
Comment: All of the Amazon Go locations have steadily declined to the point Amazon should be embarrassed.  This week I went to the Amazon Go at headquarters.  A lot of the shelves were empty, a common occurrence since they opened.  The prepared foods selection and quality has also gone down in quantity and quality.  At first they offered selections from local restaurants and food purveyors.  Now it's almost all Amazon brand, and we find the quality  of Amazon brand prepared foods similar to 7-11.    Complaints and feedback sent in online and delivered in person go unanswered.

Name: Chris Flores
Comment: Horrible customer service, a well as security who was more worried about his hair, not about the associates.  I ask about my online order and was directed to a 800 number who unfortunately was unable to answer my question about a refund due to the lack of limited acknowledgment of speaking English. Walmart Associates unable to fill my online order promptly. Will never again purchase online orders with Walmart due to the lack of courtesy by their employees.

Name: Dinky Dee
Comment: Walmart publishers nice sales on their air conditioners online only. You order one online only on the date it's supposed to be delivered you can't find a tracking number but you call and they give you a 5% discount and sorry for the inconvenience but it's going to take 10 extra days to order it from a different location. You check back in 7 days and they've canceled your order without notification because they want you to now pay from 294 to 418 and buy it from the from the manufacturer who now offers it. They're not sure when they'll get it back in but they can hold you a rain check.

Name: Shelia B
Comment: I bought a battery Nov 2019 and this battery is now DEAD, took it back to Walmart for an exchange and I have my bank record of purchasing it, they wouldn't honor it!! Walmart is the worst!

Name: Jeremy Castello
Comment: Walmart is luck to even to get 1 full star. Customers service horrible, I called 5 time and was hang up on 2 times. Not only to drive a hour to findout they don't have any generator even tho online said there in stock n the employee check for me n the system said they had 15 but no location.

Name: Amber
Comment: my experience was really bad because non of the cloths were in my size and you're jewelry was crap and really ugly and the few good jewelry was really expansive and you guys had ZERO BBQ chips at the time and that made me really mad and i took my anger out on my kids. Also don't forget that BBQ is the best chips flavor

Name: Laquan Webb
Comment: I purchased a pool with handy service only to get rescheduled 3 times. After putting it together myself having a hard time getting my refund. Already a month in Walmart now wants me to collect it from the service company purchased through them. Never again. Shop anywhere else people.

Name: Kristin Driscoll
Comment: So I donâ€™t know if anybody else has ever experienced a Walmart customer service these days. But I know that the Walmart in Waverly Iowa is definitely lacking it. When did Walmart start not returning things after 8 oâ€™clock what if I can only go into Walmart at 9 oâ€™clock at night. I can buy something at nine but I canâ€™t return something at nine I canâ€™t make it in any other time so youâ€™re really gonna shut your customer service down at 8 oâ€™clock.? What do I need to find somebody to take my returns back for me because Walmart decided to start closing their customer service down at 8. Now checkout there is not a damnWorker on check out these days. Theyâ€™re all watching us as we work for them. What are we? what are they? They stand around and watch us check out. I Mean the customer service was already bad enough but now you walk in you donâ€™t even get greeted by anybody they sit there and watch you as you check out like youâ€™re a criminal. Thereâ€™s nobody to help you in any aisle when you actually do need it for a specialized spot in your store such as hunting. And then the other half of the time when you ask somebody something they have no clue where it is. Occasionally I do run into somebody that actually goes out of their way to get up off from what theyâ€™re doing and actually walk me over to what Iâ€™m looking for. Every single time I walk into Walmart in Waverley Iowa I am disgusted by what I see and Iâ€™m not the only one I can tell you that. I think Walmart needs to remember a little bit of customer skills when it comes to the customers in their store. Iâ€™m not just saying this because of one bad experience Iâ€™m saying this because of many bad experiences. They wouldnâ€™t sell me cigarettes it was 10:50 and Iâ€™m sorry but now because I could only go in at 10:50 having one leg they were going to make me go to another store to get cigarettes . Good thing for my lack of control and not being able to keep my mouth shut about some thing I see is not right. . I ended up getting my cigarettes but I know it wasnâ€™t A wanted sell for them since they have already shut down that area and counter down the drawer. . Our world is turned to lazy lazy employees and people that are only allowing their own jobs to be taken away by robots basically I mean what good are you for your job if you donâ€™t even work when youâ€™re there. Your jobs are now mine. why am I not getting paid back for what I do at Walmart when Iâ€™m there half of the time I canâ€™t even get the right prices with the right things because theyâ€™re in the wrong places and then they make me wait what happened to Being free or discounted when it was in the wrong place. so now I have to wait another 15 minutes for the employees to all gather up and figure out this one is in the wrong place and it should be over here and then still try to charge me full price screw that this is all Iâ€™ve got folks if youâ€™ve had anything like this you know the stresses that I am feeling right now itâ€™s itâ€™s ridiculous I have to laugh.Iâ€™m sure I could probably get about 1000 different names of people I know that Iâ€™ve had the same experience at Walmart in Waverly Iowa maybe you should really start training your customer service skills again thank you people have a good night

Name: Martin Sedano
Comment: Never buy from Walmart online is the worst place

Name: Zalina Kirshat
Comment: Seriously, I order all sorts of bulky items from them - TP, cat food, shampoos... They ship for free for orders over $50. Once an order came damaged (the shampoo leaked), and they did replace the shampoo. I am a fan!!!

Name: Yu Alec
Comment: I wish I had a way to give a minus score. Walmart online is the worst that I had experienced.  It is unbelievable bad experience for us to deliver to Vancouver.  We bought 3 things online, one was sent with UPS after 3 weeks. UPS even does not attempt to reach to us although we leave all contact information. They simply dropped a slip. We have to go miles to reach to a limited hours UPS store.  The 2nd is even worse. It was a belt of $30. When it is delivered, the belt was completely broken. The package slip read " please send to above address for return" and there is no above address at all. I wrote to both walmart and the deliver vendor to whom we paid delivery fees with attached the images. They never came back.  The 3rd never reached to us.  So we would like to let you know so that you will not be robbed by Walmart like Walmart did to us.

Name: Mary Kelly
Comment: Would not return item from 3rd party after 30 days even though returns were not being accepted at store because of covid-19. I tried to return day after I received the item. Awful service. Walmart.com did nothing and 3rd party did not respond to email. I will never shop on walmart.com again

Name: Amanda H.
Comment: I will only shop INSIDE a Walmart store, BUT NOT ONLINE via the Walmart Marketplace. They need to do a better job of vetting their third-party sellers who are doing a good job of scamming Walmart customers! BEWARE OF DEALS R US - an online Search of DEALS R US to include the search term "Walmart" will produce countless reviews by those who have been scammed by this seller, me included. You won't be able to contact this third-party seller - no working email or phone number. Walmart explained to me that they don't have address information for their third-party sellers. Thankfully I was able to request a refund of a purchase from DEALS R US, for an item which I never received. BUYER BEWARE!

Name: Tony Murillo
Comment: Their inventory system is broken. They're allowing the overselling of items, giving phony delivery dates, and then once it's past the estimated delivery date, it will just sit on delayed indefinitely. I've spent a combined 3 months of waiting on two different items. I will never again shop on Walmart.com.

Name: Richy
Comment: I bought 2 watches from Walmart online May 21 for delivery May 28. Today is June 18. Still no watches and still no refund. Despite numerous communications.

Name: Lee Dodd
Comment: Walmart is getting to be worse than Amazon if that's possible. They don't care about their customers. Both have turned into a modern day corporate Ebay. They allow their sellers to price gouge their customers because there doesn't appear to be any oversight. This is very poor management and very bad customer service. I do believe I have just personally made my last purchase from Walmart. I'm tired of your order giving one delivery date and then when you follow up you get a totally different delivery date. It's not worth it anymore. Walmart isn't worth it!

Name: Tawfik Salama
Comment: the worst on line service .... never again ... and for Walmart please take my email off your list i dont wish to receive any offers.... you have to take care of your customers first

Name: Ange
Comment: Walmart is usually pretty great especially with delivery. Today I received my order and the headache medication was in a bag alone, I put my hand in the bag to get it out and there was a slimy clear substance on the box and my hand. I just wanted to make sure I let you all know in case it was something harmful. I have a picture.

Name: Donald Swanson
Comment: I was expecting Walmart to step up and offer significant competition to Amazon... IMO What we got was a half effort where every transaction leaves me a little disappointed. with all the hype I expected more.

Name: Edith Quinly
Comment: I went to the Wal-Mart at 4021 Lagniappe Way in Tallahassee, FL. First on a Friday afternoon they had only 3 cashiers available plus self serve which had a ridiculous long line. I waited for a cashier who didn't understand that they have a sheet with products in the Garden Center at each cashier station (or they should have one at each cashier) I told her that I needed 12 bags of pine bark mulch and the cost is $1.97 per bag. I found a sheet at another station and was told that she could not discount the pine bark mulch for the displayed price and to go stand in the Customer Service line instead of calling for assistance. The Customer Service line was beyond long so I went and took pictures of the scan bar and price and went back to the cashier where I had originally stood in line. She told me again that she could not help me and to go to Customer Service and by this time the line was more manageable. I was able to but the pine bark mulch. Unfortunately I had to load the 12 bags of mulch by myself since there were not employees to be found near the drive trough mulch.  Once I was in my car I called the store to speak to the manager to complain about my experience. It took approximately 3 minutes for someone to pick up and she put me on hold and after for holding for another 26 minutes waiting to speak to the manager I was hung up on. I'm afraid that the lack of customer service starts at the top with management and goes all the way to the cashiers on the front lines. If the pine bark mulch was the same price at the other Wal-Marts stores I would avoid this location like the plague.

Name: K. Williams
Comment: Purchased a 70â€ T.V. from Walmart in Hampton VA. Once we arrived home and unboxed the T.V. we realized the TV wasnâ€™t the one we purchased and the screen was damaged. We took it back to Walmart and they refused to offer any sort of resolution. The store associate Cora was very disrespectful and the Managers acted as if we were trying to get over. We believe another customer purchased the TV and placed their broken TV back in the box and returned it for a refund. The customer service rep probably didnâ€™t check it as they should and refunded it. Placed it back on the sales floor. Now we are out of $559.63 and have a useless broken T.V. Highly upset that a person would do that. Money is hard to come by and to be cheated out of it is saddening.

Name: Dennis Sage
Comment: In all of the Harrisburg Pennsylvania area stores, there are Never Enough wheelchairs. There are either no chairs available or the ones that could be available have dead batteries. Same goes for handicap parking spaces. Can't tell you how often I see teenagers driving apparently Grandma's car pull into a wheelchair spot go giggling into the store.

Name: Ann Mills
Comment: Went to the Maplewood, Mo Walmart which is normally a decent store. It was an hour before closing. Not 1 shopping cart available at the entrance. The only riding cart available was inoperable. Looked for the Walmart brand 12 Grain & Seed Bread, none found. Went to the canning supplies isle and found mostly empty shelves. A few jars, a few lids but not the 2 piece lids I was looking for. There were no tools either. Quite disappointing.

Name: Sheila Buadu
Comment: Bought a Shark Rocket vacuum cleaner 6/4/21. Took it home unpacked it. Decided to use it 6/14/21, while adding cleaner I noticed the filter was dirty (on this new vacuum cleaner (how???). I looked at the brushes and they were dirty (mind you I am the only person in the household). I immediately took the vacuum back to Walmart and explained everything to Customer Service. Customer Service stated they could not accept return without being in original packaging. I only wanted even exchange, not refund. I paid for a new machine not a used one. I asked to speak to the manager, Ratesha, she immediately re-stated with a blank face they will not accept the return without original packaging. I was very disappointed being that I live in the area and frequently shopped at this Walmart #5927 Lingbergh Florissant. What really puzzles me is what is going on at this Walmart how can a concealed packaged item be used. I will no longer frequent this Walmart and advise everyone that does to check your purchases before discarding the packaging. The manager, Ratesha, was very uncaring in attitude and body language. Had I wanted a used product I would have gone to a thrift store. No longer a Walmart customer.

He damaged coffee cream and a jug of olives was opened and it leaked. Absolutely unacceptable to treat customers this way.

Name: GamerMom
Comment: This is in regards to order that should have been delivered today, June 18th between 12-1pm. I am absolutely furious! My daughter watched the delivery driver go to my next door neighbors house, speak with the neighbor, pick the groceries off of the neighbors porch, reload them back into the trunk of her car and speed away. We then get a zoomed up image of the grocery bags showing my name but conveniently not showing any background so you could see where the groceries were left and a note asking me to tip the driver because the groceries were delivered. I IMMEDIATELY got on a chat with Walmart. For 40 minutes, we went back and forth before he said he would have someone call me. I donâ€™t trust anyone to call (because Walmart proves themselves untrustworthy) so I asked for a phone number where I could call someone. He gave me 2 wrong numbers. I found the right number on the internet called it where after waiting for an eternity the call was picked up, then hung up without anyone saying a word. Not once, twice! Then I get a call for my local Walmart. The gentleman says word for word, â€œHeyâ€¦ummmmâ€¦you were supposed to have a grocery delivery done today but the driver said that YOU gave them an address that doesnâ€™t exist so she brought your groceries back to the storeâ€. Iâ€™m sorry, what!? I order from Walmart 1-2 times a week. I donâ€™t randomly change my address with each individual order, I know where I live and what my address is so it was a bunch of BS. I tell him that I am recovering from surgery and canâ€™t come to pick up my groceries. He says, â€˜I guess I can put in a delivery order for a couple of hours from now but you did give the wrong addressâ€. Right, so we are now double downing on the ridiculous. The driver apparently has an issue telling the truth, the person that called me apparently has an issue with using his common sense. I finally get a call from a Walmart customer service and he â€œrefundsâ€ my money (never telling me that it could take up to 10 days for me to get it) and places the order again for 7-8pm. And surprise, surprise now some items are out of stock. Never mind the fact that they are literally paid for, packed and purchased sitting at Walmart. I donâ€™t get any offers of compensation. I literally have to ask. I get a whopping $10 off coupon. That isnâ€™t even the $12.50 I spend monthly as a Walmart + member! Walmart makes their customers feel like they donâ€™t value them. This kind of craziness happens on a constant basis. I have had my entire order cancelled and never once been notified. Today was just the icing on the cake, implying that I am somehow at fault because I supposedly donâ€™t know my address when it was an incompetent driver. I do not get my groceries delivered because Iâ€™m too lazy to go to the store, I get them delivered because I unfortunately have no other choice! I am disabled and canâ€™t go get groceries, I would love to but physically canâ€™t! I used to use SHIPT and Instacart but they were very expensive. I also used Amazon Fresh but they donâ€™t have a large selection and they also are expensive. I went to Walmart because I thought I would be getting lower prices and quality delivery. Walmart is even jacking their prices up. At least with any of the other three grocery delivery services, I actually got my groceries.

Name: Joe D.
Comment: Woohoo!  Welcome to the 21st century corner market.  This fully automated Amazon grocery is the best thing since sliced bread IMHO, and further cements my tendency to make Jeff Bezos even richer.  On a quick business trip to Seattle, I tried out one of these fully automated Amazon stores (the flight during CV19 was a trip, so to speak).  I'd read about this new concept, testing since about 2018 and now opening up all over (Seattle, Chicago, New York, SF, Philly, NJ).  Amazon is now the owner of Whole Foods (can integration of this tech be far off there?)  They're also experimenting with buying and converting standard grocery stores to this methodology.  The basic idea is you load an app on your phone which clocks you into a little gate at the front of the store.   Everything is fully automated on your Amazon account and there's no need to check out or even self-scan.  A couple of cities have passed ordinances that you must have a cash option, so a few of these stores also have a human checkout for Luddites, but most don't take cash or have any form human attendant.  Wow: clean, fast, good prices and never a chance of a surly check-out dude.  When will this concept come to Miami?

I finally said forget about the appointment do you have time to perform the service. She said yes went out to the vehicle and another clerk came over and started asking the same questions, by that time I was so DISGUSETED I just told him to go away. Treating customers like they are dumb instead of just fixing their mistakes

Comment: I placed an order with Walmart. They used FedEx for the delivery on May 17. They said they would turn it over to the local FedEx. The local FedEx turned it over to their claims contractor, ARC. ARC asked for additional info. I sent it twice. They claimed they could not read it or open it. I sent it again in two different formats and asked for them to confirm that they have it. No response. I have sent over 15 emails to ARC. It has now been over a month. No response. From now on, no Walmart; no FedEx; no worries. I guess I am stuck with Amazon.

Name: Nandi
Comment: I was a relatively new hard working Walmart associate. I found out about their biased/poor treatment of employees but was focused on doing my job well. When the pandemic hit, I decided to take the leave that was offered. I am black, over 55, have underlying health conditions, live in a "hot spot" and learned that a coworker had contracted the virus. I was not willing to take a chance with my life or those that I love... my grandchildren and elderly mother whom I care for on occasion. I extended my leave until June 15, when the governor lifted the stay at home order. Upon my return to work I phoned in to check my work schedule and was informed that I had been terminated weeks ago. It was obvious that the manager was mad when I told her I had extended my leave to June 15, by her sharp tone and the slamming of the phone receiver before I was even finished. No notice, no reason given, fired during the pandemic. Walmart uses unfair, biased and predjudiced practices in the treatment of their employees. Shame on this mega retail store for allowing these practices to take place over and over again.
