Name: linda winchester
Comment: I'm new to using the on line Walart website. Looking at all the canned goods, it skulk help me if canned product descriptions included "Pop Top." Examining the product photos, it doesn't show the top of the can well enough to show that & it is not mentioned in the description. I avoided buying canned veggies $ canned beans. Some of us don't own a cam opener anymore. I wanted to buy a csn of beans to make some heavy duty navajos but I didn't want to gst stuck with a can I can't open. I wanted to buy canned corn & French Cut green beans but it doesn't do me any good when I receive my order & discover I need a can opener. Perhaps I don't want to buy a $5+ manual owner just to open a 59 cent can of Great Value corn & have to buy a tool to get it open. We've had food drives for the needy & a homeless person might have enough to buy an inexpensive canned good but certainly not a nanusl can opener too. & certainly the needy wouldn't have an electric can opener + selectivity. Vienna sausages are popular because they're a meat product that doesn't require refrigeration & these ALWAYS have pop tops. Not everyone is like us. Walmart is complimented for low prices, especially important to low income & homeless folks But those folks can't take advantage of something they desperately need: tenedy their hunger with the small amount of $ they have. Some will donate canned goods that don't have the easy open pop tops. If the recipients don't have access to a can opener, those products are set aside at the end of the day.to be donated to a homeless shelter/charity that prepare meals for the homeless that agrees they can use them. Thanks for reading my perspective on this minor but impactful situation.Respectfully, Linda Winchester

Name: Crescent Moon
Comment: It has been a few days, and I decide that I needed to do this. So I was in a rush, and I went to customer service for help. However, all the spots were taken so I waited for my turn. I waited for a really long time. I heard employee one telling the customer that they were done, but then employee two whisper to employee one, and they both looked at me. Employee one continued to talk to the same customer even though she said they were done and kept on asking him to sign things. When employee two walk back to her space. She service two people who came after me. I was in a rush like really bad. When the two people left, I walked up to employee two. Employee two told me that she was not open. I literally wanted to scream at her. I saw her talk to the people earlier and offer her help, but she refused to help me. The worst part about it was that she kept staring at me the whole time I was waiting for my turn so she definitely saw that I was waiting for a long time. I don't know if she was being lazy or if it was because I am a asian.

Name: Sergey Yasevich
Comment: Casual story - bought an item in the store, paid with my cell phone Walmart Pay came home and realized does not need it. Already have it. Came up to the store and on the way used same App to start a refund - refund started. But no email, or message back. Customer service cannot refund because it is started online and askes for email that never came. Walmart agent online does not process refunds to items bough in store. Luckily the purchase was for 2.74 and after quite a long chat the Agent gave me a refund (as an exception) Thank you Walmart. Lesson learned DO NOT START RETURN WITH THE APP. LET CUSTOMER SERVICE DO ALL THE WORK.

Name: Rebecca
Comment: So... Walmart, You Cancelled Mike Lindells, MyPillows... You Also Just Proved to the Entire Nation, Whose Side You're On. Not Very Smart. I don't think you realized how many ppl were glad you still sold his pillows because they support him and this Nation.. But At Least Now, We Know Where You Stand.

Name: Paul
Comment: I gave them 80% because of the stores that I've gone to, and some of those stores I still do business with, is because Walmart has the best prices overall! Walmart has its own Pharmacy and Vision Center. It also has just about everything you'd need or want for your home, apartment, or business. Pets too! I almost forgot to mention the auto and garden sections! The cold and frozen food sections, have good quality products as well! It's where I do most of my shopping! Name it, and you can probably find it there, including electronics and clothes.

Name: Shelly-Ann Rose
Comment: My go to for everything. I love walmart. The Fast delivery and excellent service keeps me going back

Name: Becky
Comment: Wal-mart has just about everything I need. I have made many purchases, both in person and online. Recently I had an issue with my online account being compromised and later found out that there were more people with the exact same issue. It took numerous phone calls to get them to completely delete my account online. Other than that, I have been pretty happy with my purchases, shipping, and the site as a whole. I love that most products have reviews, that's the main thing I look for when making a purchase.

Name: Pam Beamon
Comment: I use Walmart stores because they have everything I need from food to footwear. I think that the employees could be taught better customer skills. They are not the friendliest store in town. For such a large, successful business, I really feel like they need to be either choosier in their employee selection or teach their employees to better serve their customers.

Name: customer
Comment: Can use to check prices while in store. Walmart pay, saves your form of payment, scan code at register. Can skip receipt, will save in purchase history. Than save it to Savings Catcher. It checks other stores for lower prices in other stores.

Name: Maohamed Saad Abdelaziz Kolkila
Comment: to be honest ... excellent services,,, all my orders delivered without delay.... am speaking about nearly thirty orders....

Name: customer
Comment: False advertising of products I ordered garment bags and hangers for which they are not the adult size/ accommodate adult size clothing I had to pay for the hangers to be shipped back...,now I did not get a response from the vendor that have shipped me the garment bags, I was told by another Walmart.com representative several days ago that they(Walmart) will issue my refund. I called today and was told a different story, this current representative said she will reach back out to the vendor and to call back after 24 hours, only for them to hand me off to another rep. Thursday I will not continue this "merry-go-round" situation.

Name: Lorena senac
Comment: Is clean stores the workers are excellent people

Name: Trine Zac
Comment: Bought some AirPod Pros online at a very good price and they arrived 3 days later. Very satisfied.

Name: Sonia Sanchez
Comment: I recently bought a shirt I from Walmart, Montgomery Crossroad, Savannah, GA. Since the fitting rooms are closed because of the viral pandemic, I couldn't try it on at the store, so I just bought the shirt to try at home, thinking I could return the item easily. The shirt didn't fit well at all, so I tried to return it the next couple of days, but the associate tending the custoner service counter said they are not accepting returns indefinitely. Walmart should have made an advisory about this no return policy while fitting rooms are not usable, so buyers won't be tricked into buying an apparel they could not return if it won't fit.

Name: Hanieh Mohammadi
Comment: Walmart is a terrible company. I give one star because there is nothing lower than 1 star. They did not deliver my package and they were lying that they delivered and they refuse to refund. The told me they are inspecting where is the package now 9 times and for many months every week, they told me to contact next week. When I said to an agent that I want to talk to the supervisor she put me on hold for 2 hours and somebody cut up the phone. I get out of this terrible company, NEVER BUY ANYTHING FROM THEM. That was my LAST SHOPPING FROM WALMART

Name: Aaron E.
Comment: I could get used to this.  Walk in, no lines, walk out.  It feels a little awkward at first but it is very easy to understand.  Prices are competitive, some lower than the majority of grocery stores in Seattle.  Amazon genius at its best.

Name: revelzdevelz
Comment: I get to apply my 70% off coupons when I have to bag and scan my own stuff.

Name: Sally Oceguera
Comment: My son took his car to purchase 2 tires. Afterwards he noticed that his tire pressure monitoring system was NOT working. Prior to taking his car to Walmart it WAS working. They told him to take his car to a dealer to fix the problem and WALMART REFUSED TO PAY FOR THEIR MISTAKE!!!

Name: Gail Miller
Comment: I don't know what is happening to this Wal Mart. Very poor management. The store is always low on stock. One time I went in there for a tooth brush, and they were out.. The shelves are always empty. The are unsupervised teenagers in the sporting good dept. playing basket ball, and knocking things down. I almost got hit by a ball, and all the kids did was laugh. It's messy, dirty, and understocked. They always have people attacking you to buy cable or something. This store has to be evaluated. It's terrible. I will not shop there anymore until they get their ack together. Gail

Name: Jim Halpin
Comment: Walmart sucks. They lie , they bait and switch and their web site sucks. Dont get me started on their custoner service.I'll never order from them again. Instacart is much superior.

Name: Toya Scroggins
Comment: Every time I go shopping at any Walmart itâ€™s frustrating having to find a good shopping cart that is not hard to push, loud or either it shakes fix or replace those damn shopping carts

Name: Tim Provo
Comment: Horrible, how is this company still. How does this company stay afloat? Oh the federal government gives them hand-outs! Worst company in America! Hands down! Please abolish all Walmarts! Liars, a holes, morons

Name: Tonya
Comment: I ordered a knee brace. It was supposedly delivered Friday. I was home all day & it was not delivered to my address. I've called fed x & got a claim #. I waited 48 hours & called walmart.com. lt literally took me 2 hours to find the phone number. I was told I had to deal with another company. Apparently I had ordered from a 3rd party. I'm extremely frustrated at this point. I had to talk to the 3rd part vendor, I was told it was delivered. At this point I lose my cool. I know it said it was delivered. It's not at my house & I'm tired of getting the run around. I may or may not get this $60 knee brace or my money back. I do know this, I WILL NEVER ORDER from WAL-MART.COM again! Update a week later the 3 Rd party sent a new brace but Walmart never called back to make sure everything was taken care of. Customer service is a thing of the past when it involves Walmart.

Name: Libby Worsham
Comment: Some people were nice, others not so much. Pretty decent products. It was just one guy that made my review go from 4 stars to 2 stars. Sorry not sorry.

Name: Kimberly Grimm-Das
Comment: I had walmart delivery in Portland TX. They forgot 10 items with a value of $46. Told the store doesn't handle it. Was given a walmart.com customer service number. Told her my problem and how aggravated I was. She said they'd refund me in 5 business days!! Would not deliver the missing food. NEVER apologized. Told me no supervisor available and had done the max amount for me and hung up. HEB would NEVER do this to their customer. I will NEVER order from walmart again. BEWARE!!

Name: Fatima Gako
Comment: Not only that they offer a lot of items for you but they also have the greatest customer service. Most of the employees Ive met is very accomodating. Great Job and Keep it up.

Name: K Dent
Comment: I bought an inflatable paddleboard in February from a third party seller on Walmart.com. Since it's cold in February and the beaches closed in March and April due to the global pandemic, we did not use the paddleboard until recently. The first time we tried it out in our pool and it worked great. The directions on releasing the air were very unclear but we thought we did it correctly. The second time we tried using it was at the beach last weekend. The valve appeared to be broken and the paddleboard would not maintain the correct PSI of air. I contacted the seller who informed me that it was made out of the country, the warranty had expired, and there was nothing they could do to help me. I contacted Walmart .com's customer service and asked if they stood behind the products sold through third party sellers and was there nothing they could do for me? The rep was sooo friendly and helpful. He assured me that they could help me and put me on hold. After being on hold for about 8 minutes, the rep came back and told me that they were issuing a full refund! THANK YOU, Walmart, for supporting your customers!!!

Name: ConiMans
Comment: I had to use a delivery service for my groceries due to my health and the pandemic so I chose Wal-Mart as I know what they have at their stores. I created my cart, the delivery fee was attached and I placed my order. It was to arrive between 6-7pm and they stated that I would be notified when it arrived. I was very happy, until 6-7pm came and passed. Iwent to the front of my building, no one was there, no groceries so I called the help on the site of my Wal-Mart confirmation email. The lady told me that my order had been cancelled because something went wrong on their end and she said they sent me an email stating that. I returned to my email account, while with her on the phone, and...No...there was only my confirmation email. I asked why would they Not call me, text me or send that email...once again, she said they sent me an email and Once Again I told her No.. They Didn't. She apologized and asked if she could help me re-order my groceries.. You know, they Failed Miserably... so No...I will take my business else where...probably to Target and Food Lion.

Name: Shamim A.
Comment: Amazing concept. Quality foods in affordable price. Thoughtful selection! I am very happy!!

Name: Susan McGeachy
Comment: This is the third time I've shopped at the Walmart in Truth or Consequences and had been double charged for items on my ticket I'm sick of shopping there and I'm sick of getting double charged it's worth the drive to hatch

Name: Jose
Comment: Shipping is horrible! Says 2 days and takes 8!

Name: RM
Comment: got my package literally in a walmart bag as if a neighbor of mine got me a grocery item and dropped it off my front door. of course, it damaged the items since it wasnt placed in a box. so annoyed! you're paying for the item hoping it gets delivered in good shape.

Name: carol
Comment: On-line order instructions say items can be returned in store, but when I took my garage hanger to customer service, I was told I needed a box in order to return it. I went back with a box and was told this time it was a marketplace item and I must contact to seller for a return label. Never, ever buy on line from Walmart. Not worth the hassle. Amazon and Target make returns easy.

Name: Lauren Satterfield
Comment: Walmart.com is actually really helpful in many ways, and most of the time they have a deal that goes on basically saying shipping is free which is great.

Name: Carol Evans Younce
Comment: I just hate this store. Almost all of their product is imported from China, and there have been issues with lead in their little jelly shoes for little girls and purses and toys that I have READ ABOUT on FB. You can walk a mile and still have to wait 20 minutes in the only checkout line. Walmart is on the bottom of the barrel as far as customer service, speed of checkout, pricing, quality and ethics. On the plus side, my friends young son just got a job as a stock boy there for $11 an hour and he likes it a great deal.

Name: Chris Lewis
Comment: Dont do it! I waited 2 weeks for a tv I bought on a good sale to get here. Excited to open it up and the screen is broken. Someone had already been in the box for this tv as all of the plastic protective film had already been removed from the frame and back of the TV. Call Walmart and the girl tells me she will send me a replacement 4 series for the same price. I literally laughed at her. Yeah. I want the base model as a direct replacement for one of the highest rated tv's from last year? She says wait a minute I found a replacement but i would NEED TO PAY AN ADDITIONAL $550 for her to ship it to me. At that point I lost it and flipped out on her. You ship me a broken TV that someone had obviously already returned for being broken. Then you tell try to replace it with a crap model or pay $550 more???? What is that junk? I spoke with a supervisor after her who is going to make it right with a direct replacement. But what a nightmare. Dont put yourself through it. Buy your TV's from a store where easy return is possible.

Name: Tempie Lea Vickery
Comment: My first time ordering in store pick up. My daughter was issued a gift card from her new employer to buy boots needed for the job. I ordered online to pick up in the store to save time. I then received a notice that the item was not available until Thursday. I cancelled the order, which will take them 48hrs to refund the gift card, so we can not go purchase the boots that we found ON THE SHELF, with the gift card that was provided by the employer. I am out the money. Hopefully their refund process is better than their online pickup experience.

Name: Marry C Ako
Comment: I had a bad experience with this company, I ordered furnitures online and the first set of items were delivered to the leasing office and not directly to our unit.I called the walmart call center and complained about the incident and requested to send the items directly to our unit as its all huge and heavy furnitures and the agent promised the next set of items will be delivered directly to our unit.But it did not happen, again they delivered the sofa,beds and tv holder to the leasing office which is quite far from my unit. I CALLED THEIR CALL CENTER AGAIN AND COMPLAINED ABOUT THE SITUATION AND THE AGENT TOLD ME THAT ONLY HANDICAPPED PEOPLE HAVE THE PRIVILEGE TO GET THEIR ITEMS DIRECTLY SENT TO THEIR DOORSTEP, AND I ASKED HIM SO I NEED TO BE DISABLED FIRST BEFORE I CAN GET YOU DELIVERD MY ITEMS DIRECTLY TO MY UNIT AND THE GUY SAID"BASICALLY YES MA'AM!!!!AS IN WOW !!!WHAT A GOOD CUSTOMER SERVICE!!!

Name: Len Stillman
Comment: I ordered a TV and that took about 10 days for processing and eventual delivery which was first problem.  When the TV came the screen was smashed. I called and got instant material to send the device back for a replacement.  Here is the point that caused me to give their CS one star. I asked when re-delivery would be to replace the damaged TV. I was told would take 2 DAYS TO REORDER A DEVICE. So, rather than expedite a re-order since I had no TV, they did not care and I envisioned another 7 days in addition to the 2 day processing to get the new TV, I was offered a 10% discount for the 'inconvenience' BTW. So, beware ordering online from Walmart, the time to order and receive is horrendous, and if damaged replacement is another endless process.  I cancelled the replacement, and ordered from Best Buy with 2 DAY DELIVERY. Saved myself 8 days without a TV if i had kept the order with Walmart. NEVER AGAIN

Name: Gill
Comment: 1st time ordering from Walmart online. 2 days delivery. Ordered a package of t-shirts that you can't really find at the store. This is Walmart, and NOT a 3rd party seller on Walmart.com.  My item should be arriving as promised. 1st time, maybe not the last. Truth be told, I still prefer Amazon on the ordering process.

Name: Thida MacKinnon
Comment: I purchased Kava Kava from VH Nutrition and absolutely love it. Highly recommended!

Name: Latisha Grimes
Comment: Looks like Walmart decided to pick a side. This made me sick to read. Copied and pasted from a private group on FB.  My husband is a good man. My husband is not perfect. My husband makes mistakes. My husband is the type of person that would help anyone at any time. My husband is a police officer. Today I watched the light in my husband and my son's eyes leave. Today I had to defend one of the bravest men I have ever met.  Let's back up a bit. Today is Sunday, June 14th, 2020. Our family went to church as we do every Sunday. After church, we ran to Walmart in Grove Oklahoma. This is not unusual for our family, in fact, this is almost always a weekly trip. Someone has forgotten something and we zip over to Walmart and pick up what we need.  Today changed that for our family. We will never return to Grove Walmart or any other Walmart. While in the store a message repeatedly played over the loudspeaker. This message stated that Walmart understands white privilege exist and supports Black lives matter. It went on to say how they support the black community and acknowledge the injustices committed by the law enforcement agencies. I watched my nine-year-old son whip his head around and the light goes out in my husband's eyes. We decided to leave the store. My husband was just going to leave and not say anything to anyone. But I had to show my son that his father was a good man and that sometimes we have to stand up for what is right.  I asked our check out person if she would please get a manager for us. She said why maybe I can help. I said no please just call a manager. She refused. She looked at my husband and asked him to tell her why I wanted a manager. My husband replied that the message on the speaker is directly against his line of work and that it was not friendly towards the police department. She responded with I am no longer comfortable speaking with you. He said that is fine but you asked what was wrong so I told you. She said I did ask but I no longer want to know. I said that it is fine could you please call the manager my husband and I would like to speak with the manager. He is a police officer and would like to address this issue. At this time she said that she would not serve us at all because he was a police officer and she just walked away. She left us with half of our order rang up. I looked at the lady behind me with tears in my eyes and she told my husband thank you for your service.  Some other checkers came and finished the purchase. A few minutes later two male employees came up. The manager asked what happened. When we told him he said that she had the right to not serve anyone. My husband agreed with that. My husband told the manager that he didn't expect Walmart to back Blue lives but he did think of the very least for impartiality. The manager proceeded to tell us that corporate feel like there are more black people than law enforcement and that money is more important to the corporation than law enforcement and their families. He said this was Walmart's corporate policy. I asked the man so Walmart is not going to support law enforcement officers at all? His response was no not as long as they were making more money from the people in this movement. So this tells me that they only care about money. The manager said that people at corporate make the decisions and they have to play the message. Another officer came up and showed his badge asked about the broadcast and we told him about how we were treated and that Walmart corporation feels that law enforcement can be refused service just for being police officers his face registered utter shock. My son was devastated. We were treated like criminals. My husband was devastated. This is what These black lives matter and defund the police is causing. This is not okay. I am a proud LEO wife, I am proud of my husband. My husband may save that lady someday but still, she will hate him.

Name: Karen Maas
Comment: I was in the walmart on rt 19 in new port richey Florida. They have many customers who are NOT wearing their masks. Store Manager why arent you on the floor handling this situation?

Name: Cheryl Race
Comment: The Walmart in Western Hills Cincinnati is the absolute worse! The parking lot is filthy and the store is not much better. The employees act like they would rather be anywhere but there. There is no pride in working there! It is not located in the best neighborhood so it doesnâ€™t attract the best clientele. I try to avoid that store whenever possible! Clean up your stores Walmart! Make it a place that is pleasant to shop in and pleasant to work in!

Name: Whiskkers
Comment: Walmart.com is a scam. I ordered a "New" battery operated cordless drill and received a used one, I tried getting it swapped out and only got the run around, no product, no refund. A few other times I purchased items only to have them mark the item as "shipped and delivered" and never receiving the item. Again they refused to issue any credit because "Our records show it was delivered". They always put you in a your word against theirs situation. I think all delivery services should do what Amazon does and photograph the delivery; post office as well. I've lost hundreds of dollars using Walmart.com but no more, I refuse to spend another dollar with them online or in their local stores.

Name: Jane
Comment: Walmart has become the most horrible place to deal with.. I have went online for over a month to place order tells me I have to go to the store.. It shows available only in store. Get to the store for them to tell me it wasn't on the truck. Walmart is horrible with updates online

Name: Ajay K.
Comment: Super convenient. I wish this was omnipresent across all airports/train stations/inside office buildings. It is hands down the most efficient way to shop when you're in a rush or on the move. The Vietnamese chicken and Jamaican salads are particularly great. They also have a good number of Indian dishes that need to be heated up. I only wish the store was bigger and I wish they had more hot food/fresh food options (although I don't know if the technology would be able to support that).

Name: Rodney Little
Comment: I ordered delivery of my groceries 6/23. Supposed to be here between 12 & 1. Was not delivered as scheduled. Then left milk, eggs etc outside my door sometime. When I found it it was hot and spoiled. Called store was told would be delivered within an hour. No delivery. Called customer service. They stated that they talked to store manager and would be delivered in a hour. No delivery. Called customer service. Same crap. Called a 230Pm told be delivered in a hour. Itâ€™s 7pm still no delivery. If you need groceries go somewhere else. Walmart is full of liars from top to bottom. Will never use Walmart for anything. No such thing as honesty.

Name: Tina Hawkins
Comment: Never again will I order online. If you have to return thru mail, it takes forever to get refund back. Yesterday my refund was back on my debit card. I went to use my card, used a small sum. Today my card didnt work. I check with my bank and I'm overdrafts 72.00! The reason? They cancelled my refund and took my money back off my card and they dont know who authorized it. Now I'm stuck with an overdraft fee and I have to wait another 10 business days to get my money back again! My bank won't forgive it since it wasn't a bank error.

Name: Jeffrey Bower

Comment: it gud i leik very much i want werk ther pls giv job

Name: TrevorDG
Comment: Liked the Walmart store I visited near Denver, Collorado years ago. Lots of interesting stuff there. I miss shopping in Walmart stores. Like their online service.

Name: Rebecca
Comment: Recently I begin to ordering the clean supplies from Walmart. It helps me keep away from spending more money when I go to shop. The clean supplies are seem with the supplies I brought. It's more convenient for me.

Name: Hannah
Comment: Ordered a cute pair of size 6 shoes and delivery took about a week. Upon receiving the shoes, I see that the box says size 6 but notice that the bottom of the shoe itself says 7. Upon further inspection, the inner sole of the shoe says size 6.5. All in all, I am confused and the shoes are too big. Iâ€™m requesting a return and replacement but thereâ€™s no option to explain whatâ€™s wrong, so weâ€™ll see how that goes ðŸ¤·ðŸ»â€â™€ï¸

Name: Laura Vance
Comment: I placed an online order with WalMart, through my established account. I recently moved and unfortunately did not update my address until after the order was entered. I realized my mistake immediately after submitting my order, so looked to see how I could correct the error.  I was unable to edit so tried to cancel the order, perhaps 3-5 minutes after it was placed and told that it wasn't a guaranteed cancel. Meaning, you cant cancel your order with WalMart.  Next, I contacted WalMart customer service to see if they could cancel it with a guarantee or update the address. I was informed to wait 48 hrs, even though the packages were to be delivered in that same time frame. So I then decided to update the addresse or hold at a FedEx location through FedEx. Here I was informed that the shipper, WalMart, put restrictions on shipping so they were unable to do anything.  Then, I decided to call WalMart to have them change the address through FedEx. They informed me all they could do is add a note with the new address. If there were issues with delivery to the wrong address FedEx would call WalMart and get the new address.  First, this is WalMart, so I was not expecting stellar service. However, I can't believe they're not able to cancel an order before it has shipped. Second, I work for a company that ships product out and as long as the package is not on its way to the final destination, it's a pretty good chance the address can be changed or it can be held at a FedEx location.  This may not mean a lot but I won't be shopping at Walmart again.

Name: Tommy Pryor
Comment: Idk what is wrong with a lot of people. I freaking love Walmart. They have almost anything you can think of.

Name: Cori
Comment: So I bought a 2 in one car seat and stroller combo and when it arrived I received the car seat but not the stroller. So I called and they said to my luck that one is no longer in stock, well they refunded me the money but then a month or so passed and I noticed they charged me yet again for this item. So I called and the resolution team was so disrespectful and rude this lady today me the refund will not be given back because it already was back in March, but when I told her about the new one they recharged she said that there was nothing to be done I bought the item so they had to charge me, when I explained what happened she said she saw that in the notes but seen I was refunded that money so this time they couldnâ€™t. I was livid you recharged me for an item that was not received and then tell me there is nothing u can do. Never shop here again

Name: George
Comment: I'm guessing they are trying to compete with Amazon... I ordered jars of pickles and they busted everyone of the jars then didn't have any to replace the broken ones.. My suggestion is pay a few more dollars for Amazon and avoid headaches...NEVER AGAIN

Name: Jessie Brader
Comment: If four kids so we use their grocery delivery service constantly several times a month especially during the pandemic. Two weeks ago (because that's how long it took to sort out) for some reason our order paused at the preparing section even though we were fully charged and the order was delivered which meant that we never got the substitution or at a stock list now this order was for just under $500 I had to go through and systematically check to see everything that was missing and it came to be about $125. I called they told me that the system would update and the next day it would be accurate and it would see delivered and we would get the refund for the stuff that they did not have in stock that didn't happen, this went on for 4 days. every single time I called I was repeatedly told that either I wasn't allowed to talk to a supervisor because there are there were none or they weren't allowed to take customer calls because they were too busy with calls to which point I asked well who were they talking to if they're not allowed to talk to customers and then I was told they don't know because right now they're working from home and have no idea who's doing what. I spoke to several different people and was told multiple times that my argument was being escalated I was given to them storm manager at the physical store several times who repeatedly asked me to give her the list of every single item and what it cost to which every time I started when she realized that this was so much stuff she would stop me and tell me that someone else would call me back and hang up on me repeatedly. The third time this happened the manager for some reason kept asking me if I wanted to speak Spanish instead I don't know why she kept doing this I kept saying no I don't speak Spanish I don't understand why you're asking me this, at which point she eventually gave me to a Spanish person seeking person who after a minute was very confused when I kept insisting that no I don't speak Spanish nor do I want to try to do that. eventually I finally got to a customer service person who ultimately did an incredibly illegal refund The amount of stuff we were missing was mostly non-food In fact I think the food total came to maybe $14 the rest was predominantly cleaning supplies and baby stuff The food stuff had been paid with food stamps but the rest was off my debit card they proceeded to do the refund based off a previous order and put all of it into food stamps so they ended up illegally putting a crap ton of money on food stamps and I still have yet to have anyone fix this. Walmart I hate you so very much. And yes the status on the order is still listed as just preparing.

Name: kathy Scheer
Comment: I had to give one star but Walmart doesn't deserve even one star. They don't let you try on clothes in a dressing room. So I bought some clothes and brought them home to try on. They were too big and now Walmart won't take them back. The staff at the door showed me a very small sign on the front door stating I have to call them in 6 weeks to see if they will even take them back at all. Today I got a dog bed which is too small for my daughters dog. I tried calling Walmart but of course they aren't answering the phones. After three times I gave up. Goodbye Walmart.

Name: Thomas Koivisto
Comment: I wanted a refund for an item. They made a return label for me to print. I cannot print with my laptop. The system told me one could be sent to me, like I got one from Amazon. The customer service person I talked to was totally incompetent in doing her job. I had to, in a chat, tell her the item 4 times, go over the situation more times, she could not find the order, one time came back with another item, as if she could not read English. I had to go back in their system to get the order number for her, it's the only time I ordered that item that I told her what it was. she finally got someone else who told me they could not send me a label, the first person couldn't do that much, They would give me a refund without sending it back, forget returning it. The whole process only took more than 70 MINUTES.

Name: jewan basdeo

They will try to blame Covid Virus. BUT! I used Jet.com with great service before WM. Then, all well before Covid, they took over Jet. The service immediately started to drop. And this was well before any effect from Covid virus.

Name: Leanne Sydoriak

Iâ€™ve been trying to get my money back since APRIL. Multiple calls to CS, where they sent my info to a manager in the entirely wrong state. They keep referring me to a store manager, but theyâ€™ve never once answered a call. If you make the mistake of shopping with Walmart, watch every single price, because after all of this, I have no doubt they do this on purpose hoping we wonâ€™t notice.

After I placed the order, I received a confirmation stating my order would be delivered the next day. I got up to find an E-mail saying the items would be delivered on Tuesday. I called Customer Service and explained my items were for next day delivery, the woman I spoke to looked up my order, she said I was right, then she send me a $15.00 eGift card for the inconvenience.

The store, attached to the Day 1 building, is a little small and can definitely feel cramped as people start piling in. Grab and go essentially. Not a huge selection, but you can get the basics here (cheese, salads, snacks beverages, and meal kits). It did feel weird to put stuff in my bag and just walk out. I was half expecting someone to tap me on the shoulder or an alarm to go off. Make sure you download the Amazon Go app before going in. You can tap others in under your account.

They just don't have their act together enough to deal with online purchases and shipping!

Name: Terry Terry
Comment: As useless as a fried piece of dog crap. Online order to be picked up. After 3 hours "ready to pick up". Pick up machine after scanning barcode "Please monitor screen and wait". Frigging screen is broken (and according to dumb employees, has been for weeks). Nobody shows up to deliver anything. Walking over to service desk, they cannot even get a hold on somebody. 10 minutes later some :experienced employee bee" shows up and finally gets all my parts on the table (tractor battery, spark plug and a bottle Chemtool B-12 injector/carburetor cleaner) and tells me that these are "restricted items" and he needs to see my drivers license. I tell him to get a manager as I did not need my license to pick up the stuff I already paid for. Another 10 minutes with any of the morons showing up, then the assistant manager telling me it is their "policy" to ask for a license for their "restricted items". I told him to shove it up the other end of his mouth and left. Nothing about any "restricted items" or having a photo id requirement.  !!!! WALMART - F>>K OFF YOU MOTHERF>>>ING RET>>>S !!!!

Name: Faten Zreiqat
Comment: On Tuesday, June 23, 2020, I went into two different Walmart stores in my area looking for a TV, both locations were completely out. My only other option was go on the website. The website gave me a delivery date of Saturday, June 27, 2020, which was perfect because that's the day I needed it by. Saturday comes and no TV. I called to see what was going on and the customer service rep stated the delivery company only delivers Mon-Fri. I was NOT happy because that's not what the website stated. Had I knew that, I would've NEVER ordered from you. At that point there was nothing more I could do, but wait. Monday rolls around, I get an email stating my package was delivered. It was odd because it required a signature and I know I didn't sign for it. I had my daughter go out to check the porch and there was no TV in sight. I called Walmart, they transferred me to FedEX and what would you know, my package was delivered to the wrong house!! Someone signed for my package that I never even heard of. I will NEVER do business with Walmart again!! The absolute worst experience I've ever had and I'll make sure I let everyone know!

Name: Sheri Lillig
Comment: I had problems scanning my own stuff. Needed help, employee got snotty, continued to scan items, put items in cart, went to pay had problems with the gift card, kept trying, employees switched up,, continuing to see the employees overlooking the self scanning process, I cancelled my transaction and walked out with my 3 bags still at the register. Now somebody has to earn their pay by putting everything back. Oh well.

Name: Jaye Trites
Comment: Walmart On-Line Shopping Fiasco! Three weeks ago I bought a small bedside table from Walmart On-Line Shopping because it seems that this is the only way you can get items anymore. When notice was sent to me that my order was ready for pick-up, I went to my local store in Grande Prairie, AB and they said that they would bring the item right out. While outside waiting in their designated parking area, I noticed that vehicles that had arrived after I did, were receiving their big grocery orders before me but I foolishly waited patiently over 20 mins until I got fed up and then went into the store Customer Service Desk to investigate. Here I stood for another 15 mins in line until it was my turn and when the Walmart Pick-Up staff were summoned and arrived at the desk, I was informed that they were unable to locate my package because they believed that the day staff had put it somewhere and that I should call Walmart the next day to inquire with them. Called the next day and the staff said that they would look for my item and call me when found - They NEVER called me back and so ended calling them again and again because I kept receiving notifications that my package was in the store, ready for pick-up. Finally, I took matters into my own hands and contacted Walmart at the Customer Service phone number provided for On-Line Shopping and was informed that the product was supplied by a 3rd-party partner, SaveOnMany and that Walmart would contact them via eMail regarding my order - I received a reply from them within 24-hrs. SaveOnMany said it was shipped over two weeks ago by FedEx and gave me their tracking number to give to my Walmart so that they could find the package. Called Walmart Pick-Up staff and even with this updated information, they were unable to find the item. At this point, I finally conceded that I was beaten by the situation and I cancelled my order. Just wanted to share with other people my terrible experience and put this frustrating incident behind me and to let "All n Sundry" know that I vow to NEVER use Walmart On-Line Disaster Shopping Again!

Name: Jaxon F.
Comment: Made an order, never recieved anything up to this day... No thanks

Name: John Newberg
Comment: I am disgusting every time I have to visit any of the Walmart facilities, the dress code is like street trash the personal hygiene of your employees is nasty. The attitude of your employees are as very unfriendly unhelpful or workability everyone's always standing gossiping and not putting items out for you your for your customers. And then you have these personal shoppers doing this online they Park their carts in the middle of the Isles and then when you try to get around them that you give you attitude but as if you're in their way no we're in there supporting your company so therefore they should make it available for your customers to get up and down the aisle Walmart has become one of the most unfriendly disgusting as far as employee presentability, friendliness.

Name: Haelah Shammasi
Comment: If I can give zero stars I would and I hope the CEO reads this review. The unethical business practice in staling online orders to have customers cancel their order and order again at a high price or staling the shipping because they raised the price of the item and want people to pay the higher price, is ridiculous. Yet the person who ordered the item before the price was jacked up with the higher demand donâ€™t get their original order. I ordered a TV stand on June 22 for the regular price of $168 and it should have arrived today June 29, however my order was still being prepared till today and when I called a day before to see what is the problem because I found out that they have raised the price to $255 for the item and there were only 5 left. The first representative I spoke with said it should be shipped â€œtodayâ€ which was Monday June 28 and I should receive a shipping email. By the end of the day on Monday June 28 I still had not received anything, so I called costumer service again and the representative I spoke with told me that the item is delayed because it was high in demand and that there is a possibility that my order would be canceled. Since that time I have spoken to 5 different representatives who kept telling me that the item is high in demand and that they might have to cancel my order. I asked to speak to a manger after calling for two days and they put me on hold for 26 minutes each time in till it disconnected with no chance to talk to a manger. This is unacceptable business dealing â€œstalingâ€ to get a high price and not allowing customers to talk to a manger to deal with a problem. I had to reorder the item and get the price adjusted to the original price I was paying and now they say I will have to wait till July 13 to revive my item, however there is no guarantee that I will receive my item even then. So now not only did I wait a week for my order that never shipped but I have to wait even longer and had to deal with 5 different people which was stressful and unnecessary. I WILL NEVER SHOP AT WALMART AGAIN!!

Name: Thomas Landsiedel
Comment: Ordered label maker tape on 6/16/2021. Even though I gave them my address it was sent to the WRONG address. 6/29/2021 still waiting. This is BS.

Name: Marianne Kent
Comment: I used to go to Walmart all the time. However that is no longer going to happen because it is to hard to find anything, it gives me anxiety, and I spend more time in line waiting to pay for my groceries and items than it takes me to shop for them. Which means a trip that should be in and out usually takes me an hour or more. The store is unorganized, unkept, you pay more and than they have those self check outs which I don't ever use and only 1 real live cashier working anymore. Walmart corporate is really making a mess out of their stores.

Name: Jay Fennell
Comment: I'd give it a negative number if I could. Bought a new phone, Sim card, and a month of unlimited data. They refused to get my phone going online and said to take it to a retail store and they would resolve the situation. The coach at the store passed the buck back to a third party seller and he said he could do it but he wasn't going to do it. I have a worthless phone and no service. They basically stole my money. I will do everything in my power to keep everyone I know from shopping at this retailer.

Name: Lupe Andino
Comment: I love walmart.com. right on time and items look exactly the way described online. And the prices are great!!â¤â¤â¤

Name: Mel

Most stores pull the items when you purchase them and hold them for you. I am not sure who's brilliant idea it is to do this. But I'm guessing they pale in comparison to anybody else online If they want to compete with Amazon they have a long long way to go if ever. I will never purchase from here again

Name: Kelly
Comment: I visited walmart here in Portage, My favorite one....and really as always..had a very positive experience with a couple of employees, It was when I went to the auto department looking for some R-13 freon for my car, not very familiar with car repair, okay,Ill say it...Im a woman...lol,...anyways... I asked the question to anyone who was at the counter....about what type of freon I needed...the female at the counter started to go with me, but one of the males named Robert, went to the isle with me..long story short..I felt that he really did go over and above..I was suspicious at first when he kept with me, asking, If I needed certain things like leak proof or other stuff, I asked him ..what are you trying to up-sale me for a higher commision or something? he said, nope..I don't get commission, I just want to make sure you have all the right things you will need. ..He even checked all my fluids in my car, after having me drive around to the port...he cleaned my battery cables which he had discovered, which was why my car was not starting, until I jiggle the cable or cleaned the acid accumulated around the connectors,... and recommended a reasonably priced treatment to keep them clean and even put them on after I paid for them...  His Manager Eli, came out to check on us ..also a very nice respectful guy...he too was helpful..I felt so valued... really... I got better service from them, than when I've driven to a auto shop to ask for an estimate. So, I just had to give them both high accolades for their unselfish service... I will definitely return. Great Job Robert and ELi..you are Appreciated

Comment: Walmart is great, everything you need...perfect!

Comment: Dear Lord that website is horrid. The largest retailer in American and a company who has everything...the website is TERRIBLE. Name: Pumpkin Pie
Comment: Ordered a window AC with 2 day shipping. Realized my billing address was incorrect when confirmation email arrived (because app doesn't let you double-check before submitting order). Call customer service, Rep1 tells me I need to cancel the order. Ask for a supervisor. Sup1 explains she can absolutely change my billing address without canceling the order. After hanging up, I get an email that my order was cancelled and now there's a new order scheduled to arrive 3 days later. Back to the phone. Rep2 says nothing he can do. Sup2 tells me she's so sorry throws money at me, and will send a request for Saturday delivery ASAP. Saturday arrives, package is at distribution center but doesn't make the truck. Also says signature required by Walmart but a call to FedEx says no signature required. Call again. Rep3 tells me it's out of his hands. Sup3 calls FedEx but call disconnects when he comes back from hold. He never calls back. Rep4 transfers me to Sup4, who calls FedEx to confirm I don't have to wait to sign, but package will arrive sometime Monday.  Now, at this point, I tell them I had paid for the installation and had an appointment scheduled for Monday at 2. What if the AC isn't there. They say no worries, I can cancel anytime before 1:30.  Monday @ 12:00, notification that package was delivered. We finish shopping and return home to find a CAMPER MATTRESS has been delivered. Who ya gonna call? Yep, tell Rep5 to just give me a supervisor. Sup5 has no idea how this mistake was made. But they'll order another one at no cost and with no further holds on my card (I already have 2 from the original order and the one Sup1 made when she cancelled my order to change the billing address). I explain the whole situation to Sup5, who throws more money back at me and tells me I shouldn't have worried about the billing address because the card would've gone through anyway. Ask for expedited shipping. He tells me they aren't allowed to request such things. I point out Sup3 did it. He sees no record on my order that any expediting was requested. So now from Monday, because it's after 12PM, I have to wait til Thursday. Doesn't matter that the original order was made at 3PM on Wednesday and Friday delivery was estimated.  I have $240 from this purchase being added back to my card, but somehow have THREE holds on funds on my card now, because they actually put a hold on funds for the replacement too. I get to speak to Supervisor 6 tomorrow because as of 10PM on Tuesday night, this product is still in preparation. Soooo....we are going to be at at least 8 days waiting to receive this "free 2 day shipping" item. I've been scouring local stores but no one has anything above 10000 BTUs in stores.  Oh, yeah. Sup5 also assured me he cancelled the installation appointment. Guess who showed up at 2PM? Yeah, the installer who was never notified. Nice guy, offered to install the camper mattress in our window to block the sun.  This has been the most frustrating order of my life. No one can give me the same answer twice, they can't ship the proper item even with a 4 day lead, and their solution to making it right is to refund money. Comes a point where money doesn't make up for the pool of sweat I'm living in.

Name: dudeabar
Comment: I will never order online from Walmart EVER again. The lazy picker didn't find my product on the shelf and just said it was out of stock. We went to the store and talked with a team lead who said they had 5 in stock but not on the shelf. When they brought it to the front however they told me I COULDN"T have it unless I charged my card AGAIN because they had pushed the order to the next stage which should have been to offer me a different similar product or offer another store as an option but that never happened. So here I am with $115 charged on my CC the product sitting right in front of my face but I can't have it. Then because it's 4th of July weekend they tell me it will take over a week to get my CC charge back. ABSOLUTE TRASH SERVICE AND POLICIES!

Name: Bill Dixon
Comment: 2 Pharmacy employees were great. Lalena Berk is always frindly,couteous and knowledible. Akm Alauddin Bhuiyan explained the precriptions and wad knowledible and couteous. It is a pleasure to deal with the Ohamacy. Thanks Hibert Dixon

Name: BB
Comment: Will never order online from them again. This is the second time we ordered something and they said it was available and in stock. Then three days later when itâ€™s supposed to be delivered, suddenly itâ€™s notâ€¦then it takes weeks to get your money back after you cancel the order! Itâ€™s bull! Never again!

Name: VerifiedShopper
Comment: Grade: A-  I'm very happy with the online grocery shopping experience at Walmart. Yes, occasionally, something is missing from my order, but with a quick phone call to customer service, they credit it back to me quickly.  When I arrive to pick up my order, check-in online, with the app, or via phone is easy.  The grocery handler are ALWAYS pleasant and polite. I love the convenience of shopping online at night and picking up my order the next day! Plus, I do not "impulse shop" online! Great service. Grade: A-

If I had not asked they would not have put one more on .when there was 4 people with full trolleys. I went to customer care asked to speak to a manger the assistant manger Andrea could not even be bothered to come and speak to me it seem to be to much to ask for 3 times they called for her to come to customer service !! I have now put it in the hands of head office

Name: Jerry Swafford

Name: Lynn Mantel

I will take to the store to return it and they will tell me it cant be returned at store level. I will contact the seller and have to be dicked around by them with at least 6 emails back and forth with them trying to weasel out of their return policy. Walmart has gone to hell. Their customer service is outrageously incompetent. I've spent hours on hold just to trying to get my refund. No more, I'm NEVER using walmart.com again.

Name: TJ J
Comment: In the middle of a â€œcoin shortageâ€ Walmart will not accept coins as payment. Please explain how this helps coins flow through the economy. Who is the idiot that came up with this idea?

Name: Michael Smith
Comment: Worst customer service anywhere. I bought a lawnmower battery. It won't keep a charge even when it's out of the mower. I accessed the receipt on the iPhone app and started a return and bring it to customer service. They scan it and tell me it's a battery and I need to bring it to auto. Brought it to auto and they don't know how to scan it in. Wait 15 minutes for a supervisor who can't help either. I call customer service and explain this and the transfer me to Store Customer relations. They can't help with an app problem and transfer me back to customer service. They try to call the store with me on the line and after 18 rings they hang up on me. Walmart hires incompetent people who can't process a simple return for a defective product. Shop at your own risk. They just stole $44.95 from me an refused to help. Thank God it wasn't a television!

Comment: Great concept and very accurate in counting my items and sending me my receipt.. but food quality is poor.. if they can get some decent tasting items on the shelf it will be a great success..

Name: Chelsea L.
Comment: I genuinely can't remember if this was the place where I could use my palm as an ID to walk in but I'm assuming it's this one.  I'm really conflicted. I hate how Amazon is ruining local small businesses but this concept is brilliant. There is no wait at all. I love the technology but I'm also still a bit creeped out. I registered my palm ID with just my cell phone number and a credit card, yet somehow Amazon connected that information with my prime account. I did not consent to that but my god they are smart.  It's a pretty cool convenience store but they are pricey. If you're a tourist, consider getting the Seattle Chocolate. They're priced at $3 and everywhere else they're pretty expensive ($4.50 at whole foods and $5 at SeaTac airport).  I would like to bring attention to Brian H's review since apparently both the food quality and selection have gone down. They also used to highlight local food instead of Amazon brands... Amazon please do better in corporate responsibility!!!!

Name: Stephen
Comment: Several times I've ordered items from Walmart.com from third-party sellers only to find, after weeks of waiting, they don't have the items, shipped to the wrong address, or just lost my items altogether. Walmart needs to be careful who the hookup with. These sellers are terrible.

Disappointing!

Now my last and FINAL ORDER i will ever do with Walmart again is LOST!! Fedex says it was delivered but 3 of the items were not delivered, I am so beyond frustrated at this point. You would think being a large corporation and with the last almost two years of most people ordering online that they would have a better system in place. I WANT MY STUFF I PAID FOR IT!

Name: Richard

I thought I inflation was just under 9%. Yes, I have seen everything go up there lately, but just way above inflation. Could be that they gave employees way too much of a raise (for what little they do). Or maybe because they're putting a new neon signage outside the store. P.S. I used to work for a sign company and know the expense involved. Or maybe because there are several brand new cart corrals at the end of their parking lot waiting to replace the perfectly usable ones they already have. (Oh, I also used to be a welder and know the cost for material and labor for those things.) So, ain't just inflation driving up their prices. It's the frivolous unnecessary crap.

Awful overall experience with annoying useless robot contact included I won't be on line ordering again doing this headache with an hr. with customer service to be refunded & to fix irresponsible shopper's mistakes again. Thoughtlessness uncaring in store shoppers,I got one, hope their not all this way.. And have to wait for 5 days to get my money refunded back to me?? Will check on that. Going to double check for 3 same items ordered customer service said it wasn't on the order.. Equates to $60. I placed this order yesterday, Tuesday, July 12, 2022. Itemize your ordered items down to product bulk size, microwave brand, wattage, & be specific in food size/ounces, ECT. for pricing, so you have backing as you won't get a receipt. And how the stuff was bagged & yes your getting plastic bagged charged.. This advice isn't approval to shop on line with them (an uncaring employed money greed filled co.) Management follow through accountability shopping for OUR Paid items..

NEVER BUYING FROM THIS CR** EVER AGAIN.

Name: Jorge F
Comment: I made a large order of gym puzzle flooring for a job project with a delivery date of almost a month from purchase, the month came along and I had a tracking number but Walmart warehouse never sent the items, the only solution they gave me was to reorder with a very small percentage off on all items again and they would not expedite on a timely manner even if it was their mistake to begin with, another month from reordering came along, keep in mind that I called customer service every other day (with an average waiting and talking time of two hours) each time, so we would not have the same issue again as the first order, when I believe that they should have been the ones calling me to make up for their errors, well the same thing happened on the second order, no one knew where my product was, they were annoyed by my calls and made me feel as if I was the one trying to take advantage of them by demanding some sort of fair adjustment since I had been paying interests for months since the first order and my credibility with my client was none existent since project was supposed to be completed months before based on delivery dates provided by walmart.com not by me, at the end out of 32 packages of puzzle flooring that I had paid for only 24 were delivered, so again walmart.com just washed their hands and said we are going to refund you for the other 8 missing, and that was one more of the many signs I had through all this nightmare, that Walmart does not care about their customers, they wont take responsibility for their wrong doing and will leave the customer hanging and dealing with it. They gave me a 50 GC (a total joke) after many calls and still made me feel as if I was trying to profit out of them, when they forgot all they had put me through and my ruptured relationship with my client was all their fault and their negligence to make things right for a customer.

Name: Karen
Comment: I ordered groceries for the first time the bread was a week expired. They substituted items that were 4 times higher in price. Not worth the fees for delivery. Will never order online.

Name: Rajeev Jog
Comment: Incredibly incompetent. Their IT folk simply can't understand that sometimes one needs to be able to change an email address on an account. I was told flat out that the only way to do this would be to close the account and lose all my saved order history etc. RIDICULOUS!!!  Even though my account shows my email as 'unverified' but my phone number is 'verified'. So for security then can always send me a code there.  DUH. Walmart you will never catch up with Amazon.

Name: T
Comment: Dear Walmart please fix the EBT check out some of us would like to use it.

Name: khushbu modi
Comment: Not satisfied.very frustrating service. Tried call more than 7 times and every time tape is going on and than when I press 0 for customer service to speak with nobody was on the other end and phone was disconnected. After 7 attempt I called again and finally get chance to speak with representatives whose name is Vanessa and she do not wants to really help me. I did not finish with my issue yet and she mention me â€œthank you for calling Walmartâ€ ridiculous and horrible service. Do not use Walmart rewards because if you have any issue they are not there to help you out. Very bad and poor service.

Name: misopiso S
Comment: Fun experience, prices are typical for the area Amazon Go is a concept store where you walk in, grab food items and walk out. You must have the Amazon Go App to enter. Lots of great lunch items. A fun novelty.

Name: Paly S.
Comment: This place was so awesome! It's so crazy how detects exactly what you are buying without scanning anything! So convenient!

Name: Topaz Lace
Comment: Ordered small bottle of kitchen cleaner containing bleach. Bottle was not sealed as usual in zip lock bag, just loose in shipping box. Guess, what? Top loosened & spilled contents on other items. Toilet paper, canned items, olive oil, sponges, sea salt, every item in box were covered in bleach. Picked up box to transfer inside & bleach, which had soaked shipping box was now on my clothes. Immediately washed, but to no avail, ruined jeans & dark blue top. Canned goods were salvaged, but labels disintegrated, most of toilet tissue trashed, ouch! Please pay more attention to sealing for shipping. Thaxâ€¦

Name: Cindy Jolley
Comment: Iâ€™ll give it a 3. It can be convenient. One problem I have is the check out. There have been multiple times that I think that I have checked out just to find that my order didnâ€™t go through. I have driven to pick up my order to find out that it didnâ€™t go through. You have to remember that even when you check out they continue to show you items they think you might want. Once I click check out I think that I have checked out. And I wish it would be that straight forward. But it is not. The other problem I have is they always want you to rate the driver, as if you were in the vehicle with them. I really donâ€™t know how theyâ€™re driving because Iâ€™m not in the car with them. And they automatically will charge you a seven dollar tip unless you state otherwise. I would rather tip after I receive my groceries not before. when I signed up and paid for $99 I thought that was the end of it. I thought it would be a service provided by Walmart not that it would be an additional fee for the deliveries. I guess I donâ€™t tip the mail delivery or UPS, or FedEx or the cashier at the checkout I thought that it would be like that. But whatever the case, I prefer to tip after I receive a service not before.

Name: Rhonda Ballance
Comment: I ordered a set of chairs then immediately realized it was the wrong one, tried to get the order stopped, or changed to the right one. They never canceled my order and now they are trying to say they haven't charged me twice!!! It's on the credit card!!!! Crappy service!!!

Name: Ira Stokes
Comment: Incompetency personified. Placed my order & paid Walmart. Product notice said product delivered; didn't happen. Asked for refund in phoncon with Walmart customer service (WCS). WCS turns over the return of funds to its outside vendor, and will no longer communicate with us. You guessed it, the outside vendor is equally incompetent. This fiasco has been ongoing for 2-1/2 months plus....

Name: Robin Stephenson
Comment: I recently tried the Express Delivery option at Walmart, where you order online and Walmart employees do the shopping for you. It was a wonderful experience. The app is easy to shop on, the order was correct and the employee that brought my order out to me was friendly, professional and had a very upbeat attitude. I would highly recommend the Express Delivery option at the Big Spring TX Walmart.

Name: Anne K
Comment: Earlier today, my daughter went to the Walmart in Raleigh NC to buy a patio set and could not get anyone to help her get it off the shelf, to the checkout and into her car. Later that day, I went to the Walmart located on Kildaire Farm Road in Cary, NC to see if I could get that patio set for her. I regret that I did not get any names, but the one lady was OP #008337, if that helps. She was the one that rang up the sale. When asked if she could help me buy this item, she stepped up and found an older gentlemen to try and help. Well, due to the way the stock was arranged, he was a little too older and unable to handle the task himself. The lady then went about to find someone else who could help. Thankfully, she managed to find a young man who probably was the biggest guy in the store, and he easily obtained the patio set I wanted and set it up on the cart for the older gent to finish up the sale and load into my vehicle with some additional assistance. I just wanted to publicly say thank you to those three associates to went out of their way to make sure I was able to buy the item I wanted and have a good experience while doing so.

Name: R S
Comment: LOUSY!!! My item was to be delivered today. It is now 9;34pm and latest tracking shows it stuck in a Westhampton NJ processing facility. Do NOT trust Walmart 's shipping promises. LOUSY, late, lying and liable.

Name: Brandon
Comment: When ordering online they won't honor something you paid for and cancel it. So if you think there is a deal don't bother buying it because they will cancel the order and raise the price of the product.. shop at Amazon.

Name: Armondo Gomez
Comment: I've had my share of reviews with Walmart although this time they came in clutch. I need an evo Wilson ball asap . I had gone to big 5 , D's Sporting goods and nothing. Random I stop by at Walmart and they had it available. The customer service can be challenging at times but for this review they came in clutch. Thank you!

Name: Corinna Bryant
Comment: Walmarts prices are low on clothing , food not so much . Baby items also the lowest I've seen as I frequently buy most of my daycare items from Walmart exclusively. My local Walmart pick up at store is horrible items never there when I'm told to pick up , rude associates . My local store is also the most unorganized and dirtiest I've ever seen and it's a newer store less than 10 years old.

Name: James Welch
Comment: They don't care about there customers any more taking away the price match proves that. But they better remember they are not the ONLY fish in the sea.

Name: Rose Russoo
Comment: I bought name brand hand cream on walmart.com. I thought it would be the real thing but when it came it didnâ€™t say the brand anywhere on it and came in a different box than usual, the cream also felt different. Online it said the hand cream was name brand but when i got it it definitely was not. I no longer trust buying things online from walmart and will not make that mistake again.

Name: Brenda Ehmann
Comment: Walmart in Columbus has the lowest prices of foods in the area but the quality is not the best when youâ€™re looking for fresh meats and fresh fruits. There are other grocery stores that offer those items for the same price and better condition. The lines in Walmart are ridiculous! No cashiers are ever available! They only have one or two lines open with a cashier available. Self cashier register is lined up backed up! Employees are walking around like they donâ€™t have anything to do! Customers are angry and start leaving their carts with food in them because they canâ€™t stand in the long lines anymore. Some go and ask for help for another cashier and get told thereâ€™s nothing they can do about it! No even the managers jump on the cash register! Iâ€™ve never seen a place so disorganized in my life! All these chiefs and no Indians!

Name: Maria Gomez
Comment: I bought a airmatress for my daughter and I, we don't have furniture so I decided to get an air mattress to sleep for a few nights well not only it was used they wouldn't even exchange it for the same thing. I lost the receipt so now I have a use mattress and I lost $100, you have to be careful with the stuff you buy there because some of the stuff are re-stock by the company use.

Name: Paula Diller
Comment: One of the Cedar Rapids, Iowa stores is locking one of the entrance/exit doors and making customers use just one entrance/exit. This is against OSHA rules! Says a lot of how WalMart feels about its customers. They do have an associate at the locked door but still the doors are to be unlocked during business hours. One more reason to boycott them.

Name: Eugene Thomason
Comment: I will do everything I can to shop some where else if possible never can get help in there storeâ€™s and now if I go there I have to ware a make are they nuts I wonâ€™t ever shop there again now same as menards stop supporting these places people get your head out of your butt
