Name: Ronnie
Comment: Walmart is terrible

Name: nalin prabodha (savage vlogs)
Comment: There are many reasons which prompted me to write this review. Out of many bad experiences encountered, there were two incidences at Walmart Store 3162, 80 Buchanan Drive, PE, unfortunately, the second one just after the first. I am a regular customer at the said store and my normal monthly spending exceeding CAD 1500. I was appalled by the way the checkout staffs' treatment directed at certain customers. It seems that they have been instructed to apply the "Walmart 3 meter rule", only for certain customers. I was saddened to see that the caucasian person in front of me greeted and just frowned at when I reached for check out. Me being a visible minority found this disturbing and racist. I believe this is not what Canada and Walmart stand for. I did once confront an agent she said and I quote, "I am having a bad day". Well, it seems to be funny she just started to have her bad day after I reached there. Then she was mocking me by repeated saying Good morning! How are you?. Then yesterday was a similar incident despite being the first to greet the staff with a friendly " Good morning" the person didn't even bother to reply back. It is they who should be greeting the customers first. Unfortunately, I don't have the receipt for the incident the week earlier but I have the TC# 0712 0162 2720 4521 8142 for yesterday. I find this behavior to be common among the new recruits from the same visible minority. Either it is the recruitment of staff by people unqualified or Walmart has decided to do away with their customer-friendly 3-meter rule.

Name: Shawn Burch
Comment: Shop Amazon. 1) no mask required 2) you check yourself out at home 3)no long lines with 200 people and one associate at register

Name: cynthia Christensen
Comment: F@#$ walmart! Nobody works! Take your facemask and shove it!

Name: carol
Comment: other than the lllooonnnggg lines walmart has a great selection more than any store and I visit them all during the week. However i've noticed she shelves are empty and i have to return at a later date.

Name: Cheyan Teague
Comment: I was treated like a terrorist and dehumanized for a sickness I DONT EVEN HAVE.  I am vaccinated. I wore a mask. Everything I touched, I bought. I remained 6 feet away from everyone. My hands were sanitized all the way up to my elbows. I was prepared and cautious, although I AM NOT SICK.  I was there getting meds, Power-Aid, aid and soup for a sick family member.  When a manager found out, she put my bag ON THE GROUND, put her hands in the air, and stepped away. Then she continued to humiliate me by telling me how I put them all in danger. That I should know better. And that BECAUSE OF ME THEY HAVE TO CLEAN.  To make it worse, when other customers walked by, she put her finger up AT ME, her way of telling me to shut up, then continued to grill me AFTER they walked away. She acted like I had a weapon. Like I was going to attack her. I was silent most of the time, because I was so shocked at how this "Manager" was acting. I am never oging back. Not after that humiliation.

Name: Terry Trinity Towers
Comment: Horrible. Never again.  Normally, I get delivery through Instacart, but Walmart was offering a $25.00 off voucher when you make your first order and free delivery above $35 so I thought I'd give it a shot.  Big Mistake...  It took several tries to get the voucher to work. Once it did I placed my order. When I got to delivery I could no longer get free delivery, but they wanted $13.50 much more than Instacart would have charged. Since I had the voucher, I decide to proceed and just curbside pickup.  Fifteen minutes after the order was placed, I decided I wanted to add a bag of cat food to the order. After a fair amount of fussing I managed to add it, but the website then removed the voucher since the modification made it a second order so I apparently I was no longer eligible to receive the $25.00 off!?!?!?  So I called the support. They said.. Oooops system error. Nothing we can do about it but how about we give you a voucher for $25.00 off the next order. I said no. Cancel the entire thing.  Apparently, you can't just cancel an order. I talked to someone one the phone TWICE and online chat TWICE nothing was achieved. Just a "Nothing we can do"  So, I went to Walmart at the pickup time. One of the items a $30.00 bag of dog food was unavailable. They claim I wasn't charged, but my bank account states otherwise.  It's now been 8 hours since this nonsense has started and the order is now in pending return status whatever TF that means and no money has been returned to my account.  So not only do I not have the items, but I'm currently out $115.36.  NEVER AGAIN. STAY FAR AWAY. If you need delivery pay the extra and get Instacart where you actually get good customer service and can modify/cancel your order at any time without penalties.

Name: Vernon Ervin
Comment: I ordered 4 lion sport 4x4 tires size 255/50/19 they were supposed to be delivered 7/15. I received 2 255/60/19 on 7/16. Not only did I receive the tires late the only sent two and they sent the wrong size. You got to be kidding me?? 1 item arrives by end of day Fri, Jul 15, 2022 (Great news, Vernon â€“ order 2000100-85175571 is set to arrive by Fri, Jul 15. Weâ€™ll let you know when itâ€™s been delivered.)  Fedex tracking number 275478611348   Sold and shipped by Priority Tire null Pro Seller  item image Leao Lion Sport 4x4 HP 255/50R19 107W XL A/S High Performance Tire $149.99/EA Qty: 4 $599.96 $149.99 ea Order summary  Subtotal $599.96 Misc fee $4.00 Taxes $39.26  Total $643.22

Name: Bonnie Bell
Comment: I have had groceries delivered to the wrong address twice, and did not get my full refund, when you call them about the problem they act like itâ€™s your problem not theirs. They need to be called on the carpet about this. This was in Albany, Oregon they are the worst, Walmarts reputation is real bad,

Name: RF
Comment: I received an order about 2 weeks late & mentioned it in my review to them along with the fact that I did not believe the item I purchased was authentic (as it was advertised) but it will still do the job I need it to do. They offered me a $10.00 discount... BUT ONLY if I spend at least $50.00 with them online... They stated in their email that this was to make it up to me... What do you think?

Name: Joy Graham
Comment: I ordered 2 items 2 weeks ago and still haven't received them. I have never had this problem before. They were books. I can't believe its taking this long.

Name: Julia
Comment: Yuck. I hate Walmart. Dirty. Unfriendly. Horrible prices. Shop at Costco instead.

Name: Yves Mortele
Comment: I order 3 televisions ... they delivered 1 last week who doesn't work...now3 weeks later still no news...I called them myself today ... They lost them...And they can not deliver them anymore ...OMG ...

Name: Holly Neff
Comment: I work for Walmart and they treat you like garbage The management is selfish and greedy They dont care about the employees or customers  They have been withholding my check for almost a week and every time I ask about it I get the runaround I called personnel for the payroll number and they said they couldn't give it to me What am I supposed to do? Get the law involved?

Name: Kathleen Spain
Comment: Don't buy the rotate your tires for free option at $10 a tire. Can't make an appointment and they take tire purchases and installs first. Came yesterday, was told a 4 hr wait, come first thing in am. Did that and again told a four hour wait.

Name: Barbara
Comment: I ordered a mermaid cake( a half sheet) for my granddaughter. I went to pick it up, wasn't done, no mermaid decorations like in their picture to choose from. They gave me a 1/4 sheet and it look like a child decorated it and it was lopsided. Very disappointed!! Won't order from them again. Middletown Walmart is horrible. I will do my shopping elsewhere.

Name: Mike Bruni
Comment: Ordered a set of adjustable dumbbells that were in stock when I placed the order on Walmart.com. The package was supposedly shipped on 6/25 from Walmart.com, and scheduled for 7/16 delivery. Package never showed. Tracked package on FedEx site, and it stated the label was created, but the package was never taken to their facility. I contacted customer service, and they said they tried to reorder the weights but they were out of stock. Why would they have to reorder them when I had already purchased them? The rep said all she could do is refund my money. Waited 3 weeks for nothing! P.S. This was not COVID related. It was due to people being inept.

Name: Blake Washburn
Comment: As Walmart closes one of the exists because of the "Covid-19" pandemic, we the customers are scratching our heads as to how the hell does that help?. It said to avoid mass population and going through one door is mass population. This is the stupidest Walmart protocol I have ever seen in my life, this review goes to all Walmarts

Name: Brit Elston
Comment: They were supposed to use my EBT card and my bank card instead they took all the money off of my bank card and wonâ€™t give me a refund never had this problem with Amazon or any other site it is crazy that they could do this and thereâ€™s nothing I could do

Name: Abhisekh Adhikari
Comment: I purchased a mattress order # 4662020-368174 and it showed that it will be delivered on July 7, but i didn't get it and when i called the customer service said that the item was lost. So, they gave me a 10% discount and said they will replace it and be delivered by July 17. I again waited for sometime and when I checked on July 14, I saw similar pattern there were no information on FedEx so I called them and they assured that I will get by EOD on July 17. I didn't get and there was no any update in FedEx, so when I called them the customer service said that the best they can do is cancel my order and for the issues they will give me $ 10 promo code and that was not right. He transferred me to supervisor Ana S. who was rude and she simply said that the only solution is cancel and take $ 10 promo code she will provide and without much conversation she cancelled my order. I just told her to keep $ 10.  Next, i called the customer service and after much negotiation they gave me 20% off my next order. Which was nice, but I am very frustrated and depressed about how you guys handled my order. I will never order online and will not recommend my friends and family. Ana S. though I chatted was rude, she called herself supervisor and didn't even consider my feelings. I understand Covid and system issues, but same mistake twice and not alerting when I called two days before about the order is not acceptable. You guys can't compete with Amazon if you can't fulfill order and do same mistake twice and have Ana S. as a supervisor.

Name: Hina Hassan
Comment: worst ppl to deal with for any kind of returns. they would right away turn you away discourage you for any return even if you buy online ask you zillion questions and if you open an item to check it theyd never refund you while others like bestbuy/amazon/staples etc etc happily refund you. i detest walmart and i'd never go there.

Name: Daddy Munky
Comment: very bad store and they donâ€™t even update stuff on there website disguting.

Name: Gc
Comment: Wal-Mart is bowing down to the tyranny implemented by the government during this Shamdemic, requiring customers and employees to wear masks despite health risk and respect to individual autonomy. I will no longer be shopping at Wal-Mart until they respect my American rights to choose what's right for ME and MY health. If anyone is afraid of getting sick, they're free to stay home! The vast majority of people should not be forced to change their lifestyle to accommodate the whims of any group or individual. That is un-American and unethical.

Name: Erika
Comment: Usually making returns is a breeze and I've been a long time customer, until this morning. I bought a pool table online BACK IN MARCH. It was delivered damaged in March 2020. It is now mid july 2020. I have been trying to get this thing returned since it was delivered. After months of trying, and 3 different delivery companies, No such luck or record of these attempts. Then walmart deactivates my account and now I am still trying to make sure they aren't trying to charge me for a pool table they are having a hard time getting someone to pick it up. I do have an email of this order and their "promise" that they won't charge me for it. Deactivating my account after sending this email doesn't make me feel great or make them look good.. I clearly won't be shopping with walmart or Sam's club anymore, not even for our prescriptions. I'M in NJ, everywhere I turn there's a different store looking for loyal customers willing to spend. Goodbye wallyworld. I will be taking me and my families needs elsewhere

Name: Marcio Pugina
Comment: Will not frequent Walmart due to their stupidity and following the herd in requiring masks, I'm sure you're competitors thank you.

Name: Chad Padgett
Comment: My family and I spend about $1000 a month at Walmart. Usually our hometown Walmart only has one checkout lane open at any given time and only half of the self checkout lanes are operational. I would rather spend more for groceries at the local Meijer where at least they have multiple lanes open and employees to help you. That's a $12,000 loss to Walmart and someone else's gain. See ya!!!

Name: Vicki DeRosier
Comment: I went to your Augusta maine store and all that was available were self scanning stations. No cash registers. I will not shop there or at any Walmart until cashiers are available. You suck

Name: Richard Button
Comment: Walmart pick up. I cancelled my order today because it was not ready when i got to the store. I was told to go home and wait until Walmart notified me it was ready, when I called to inquire, I was told it would not be ready for at least 48 hours because they were 'checking my financials for my protection. The payments had already cleared my bank, I have been doing the pick-up order for 18 months. They have 3 different debit cards on file. Explain this to me while i snack on... what?

Name: William Cate
Comment: Walmart will not allow you to change an address for an active order even if you sell your house and move away! You better hope that your post office has better customer service than Walmart to make sure your items don't get delivered to someone else if you're ever in my situation! They will tell you it's policy and it's for security reasons but they do not care and they will not help you!

Name: Kristen
Comment: Absolutely horrible experience with Walmart.com. I ordered a table for $220.93. It was delivered and missing parts to put together. Called Walmart.com they sent a new table to me and the understanding was to take the parts needed and FedEx would pick up 2 days later. I received the table called Walmart.com back and inquired about not receiving a shipping label. The agent notified me itâ€™s digital and I donâ€™t need one. It didnâ€™t seem right so I asked again and was told the same thing. Sat the package outside. FedEx came to pick it up and knocked on my door and stated it didnâ€™t have a label. I told the guy what the agent assured me. He went to the car came back and said he will take the package. Package left a month ago. Today I receive a charge for the second table. Called customer service and agent# K0W05M3 did not care even a little bit about my concern. After explaining what happened she told me there is nothing she can do, she told me I defiantly received a label. (Checked emails no label EVER EMAILED) I asked for a supervisor and she refused to get me to one. She said I need to call FedEx. Called FedEx and they stated I need to call Walmart. Someone dropped the ball at Walmart.com customer service and is attempting to make me pay the price for a table I sent back. Issue still unresolved. I plan on contacting the BBB, my lawyer, and the corporate office because I am an honest person and to be talked to as if I am running a scam for $200 or that I did not follow instructions is ridiculous. The time, effort, and research I have put in just to resolve my issue is unreal. I will NEVER PURCHASE ANOTHER THING FROM WALMART.COM.... who doesnâ€™t need a return slip when making a return?? I knew it sounded weird, told the agent it sounded weird, and was advised that is the process.

Name: Pauly Paul
Comment: Walmart money card is the biggest scam ever. Pray on poor people and take their money. Walmart should be ashamed of themselves. Pushing that money card to steal and lie about your money CANCEL WALMART. BBB EVEN THINKS SO!!!

Name: Anthony Velasquez watersafetyawareness
Comment: It's really disappointing to see these employees treat customers as they do and not in a good way..walmart founder has principals that his employees suppose to follow with one of them being "treat others with respect" but if you ask employees if they know it most don't know it. Walmart employees treat customers like were all thieves . The greeters are no longer greeting. They spend more time chit chatting with the paid police officer whose suppose to be doing security. Its a shame so much work walmart family has done to make walmart what it is today and employees tearing it down. They wouldnt honor a manufacturer warranty and kept my microwave and there never is managers there just team leader..no leadership

Comment: Overcharged for 130.00 order taken out of my account on July 13 2021 then authorization phone center Phillipines 162.23 FOR SAME ORDER CALLED PUT ON HOLD NO SUPERVISOR BIG JOKE CHARGED OVER DOUBLE

Comment: Walmart gift cards can only be used at Murphy's USA, which are in Walmart parking lots, not Murphy's Express which are not in Walmart parking lots. Please have this changed so people don't get mad and they can understand where these gift cards can be used correctly.

Name: Greg Johnson
Comment: I would like to acknowledge Ms Sonita, the pharmacy tech at walmart pharmacy in Ellenwood Ga. She took care of my insurance and prescription issues. She was very professional in handling and helping me understand the process of my insurance. Thanks for making my pharmacy experience exceptional!  Mr, G. Johnson

Name: It's Me Again
Comment: I have went twice this week to stand in sporting goods for 30 minutes or more just to be told there are no employees on site that can sell a fishing license. No wonder, you don't have employees because everyone has to check themselves out. I asked about cucumbers and was told if it's not over there we don't have it. Great, but as I'm pushing my buggy away I spot the cucumbers that they didn't have. I mean why would the employee help a customer, they don't have to do anything else but watch us scan our own groceries.

Name: Sharon Gray
Comment: Was looking for a dryer vent brush, Arthur, manager at the Walmart on Custer and Highway 121 in Frisco, Tx, helped us look for about 10 minutes, we couldnâ€™t find one and settled on a bottle brush which would prob work. As we were checking out, Arthur came running up to front of the store with the exact brush I needed. Above and Beyond! Thank you for your excellent customer service!

Name: Quinn Rickert
Comment: WARNING! Some Walmart stores perform ILLEGAL receipt checks after you have already bought the product and are leaving the store. It is illegal for Walmart to perform receipt checks this way, because they are assuming that everyone is stealing something. When you purchase a product it is your property, they have no business checking your receipt and looking through your stuff. Stay far away from Walmart and other stores that perform these illegal receipt checks.

Name: Ziggy Doom
Comment: I could write a book about all the Walmart horror stories but I'll just share my latest ordeal.I ordered a tv and they used the cheapest and worst shipping company in the world (Estes) to deliver it to me. The tv came broken. They sent the replacement tv with once again the cheapest and worst shipping company in the world and it came missing an entire tv leg. Stay FAR away from Walmart.com and use Amazon.com instead.

Name: Magdy Sefin
Comment: Never again order shipped items from Walmart always comes 12 ore more days late , they have no answer to give you when you asked about your order , same as the shipment company specially FedEx

Name: Gail L.
Comment: Ordered a Mainstay's box spring. Received an e-mail stating they had shipped my order via Fedex with a tracking number. Was to receive it 7/17/20 and had to be home for signature. Waited all day no box spring. Looked on Fedex tracking it stated DELAYED. Called Walmart (INDIA) was told my order was not coming! Had a hard time understanding why? Was asked if I wanted to reorder or cancel and receive a refund. I opted for a refund but of course they couldn't process it because of error. Called back that afternoon and got a credit for the boxspring but not the tax??? Was asked would a $10.00 gift card be ok instead of the tax ($8.40). What???? Never again! Walmart you'll never compete against Amazon. Will never order from Walmart.com again!

Name: LindseyAlayne
Comment: Fun experience, prices are typical for the area Before you go, download the Amazon Go app! When you get to the store, you open your app, scan it as you walk in (or scan for each person in your group, my kids loved this) and then SHOP! When you walk out it "knows" what you bough and charges you! It's a fun experience, it's super convenient and all the food we got was really fresh and tasty. Most of what is stocked are grab and go snacks or small meals. My kids like everything they got and so did I. We went back again the next day and had another great experience. I loved the fresh salads!

Name: Bob
Comment: Their website is horrible. Logged in as requested, searched for the item I wanted and it was available for pickup only at the store. Clicked checkout and it had changed the location to one 50 miles away. Fortunately, I caught that and changed it back to my local store. At the time there were 4 available and this was not a fast moving item. It was in my cart, I went to check out, typed in all the information including CC info, address, etc. and pressed pay now. It hesitated for a few seconds and then told me that they were sorry, but the item that they showed as in stock 30 seconds before wasn't in stock, but they'd gladly put it in the queue for a later purchase sometime in the future. I removed it from the future purchases and will go elsewhere. So there are a couple of things. The website randomly changes your location and they apparently have no control over their inventory. So not only did they not get a $150 sale, I was angry and will only look at Walmart's online 'shopping' as a very last resort. As big as they are and if they want to compete with Amazon, they really need to get their act together, because they look like a bunch of amateurs.

Name: Peter Hunt
Comment: The delivery or pickup part of the website continually erased more than 30 items I'd chosen four times, wasting my time and energy. Also, the Wallet part asks for a P.I.N. and shows 4 lines on which to enter it. After entering the first number, 11 additional lines appear and prevent one from completing that task.  All together, I wasted about 4 hours trying to arrange for groceries to be delivered and by being blown-off by the Deli Department worker that was the only person to answer the phone after I'd called many times. In the end, he put me on hold and left me there for 15 minutes and did not answer the two times I called him back.

Name: Valerie Leavitt
Comment: Walmart is getting so ridiculous 1 cashier open and the line is 3 miles back and the others is self checkout but you can only pay with card. This is why I don't come here anymore and honestly you are going to loose a lot of customers because of this. But corporate don't care as long as they get that Ole mighty dollar.

Name: AnnaMarie Chavez
Comment: The worst customer service I have ever experienced since Walmart opened. It's bad enough that we have to scan and bag our own groceries and items but now we have to go get our own assistance? I was in the pet Department and there was an associate right in the department and he refused to go get me assistance so that I can get a flea collar which was in the case. Couldn't believe it. Even after I told him you're a customer service sales person, you're going to tell me to go get help from someone else when you're supposed to be the one to help me? Wow that's all I can say is wow worst experience ever. His name is Noah and he does no justice to the name!

Name: R. Mc
Comment: This is awful. Again I was missing items. Now my chicken was not in the order. They told me I have to COME all the way back in to either get another one or refunded. The reason I do this is for the convenience and to save time. A few weeks ago it was my wraps----they were open an then stuffed back in the pkg. I called and NEVER GOT A RESPONSE. From now on I am going to Hannafords 543-1681 or Shaws 863-4173 pick up. This letter is also going to be a review on Walmart's page.

Name: Mindy Messer
Comment: Problems with delivery. Groceries and regular products. They use fedex for a lot of their shipping and theyâ€™ve lost my stuff. They also keep the refrigerated groceries out for long periods of time.

Name: Marley
Comment: Well this was an experience that will have me never purchasing anything from Walmart ever again. The customer service was absolutely atrocious. They lost my item, were unhelpful and inconsistent in their approach to helping me find it or take next steps, left me voicemails I couldn't understand, told me I could refund it over the phone, but when I was busy and couldn't do it right then, suddenly I couldn't do it over the phone a day later. Absolutely disgusted with the "service" I received. I urge you, if you're looking for a specific product and other stores have it, GO WITH THE OTHER STORES. Walmart does not care about you or your satisfaction. Satisfaction guaranteed is such a joke. Not to mention, when I did finally receive the package (a tent) magically, a week after I needed it, the tent was garbage quality. Then they sent me an email asking me to submit a review on their website. I jumped at the opportunity only for them to send me an email saying my review had been rejected, because, get this, it was "directing business away". Uh, yeah. So don't trust a single review on Walmart's website as they do not allow people to say the truth, especially if it's negative.

Name: Howard Paul Shore
Comment: Tuesday, July 19, 2016  Back in earlier July of 2016, my 85 year old mother who is Permanently Disabled, including having a Prolapsed Bladder, Heart Condition and Low Circulation In Both Of Her Legs (Making Her Very Immobile With Her Walking) Had Just Bought A Package Of Their Great Value Pink Salmon 700g From The Walmart Location At: c/o Walmart Dufferin Mall Supercentre, 900 Dufferin Street, Toronto, Ontario Canada M6H 4A9 (416) 537-2561 And Had A Very Bad Experience!  First of all, Their Fish Had A Very Bad Odor!  It was So Disgustingly Strong that I could smell it outside of my mother's apartment!  Gross!  It Smelled Like A Dead Body To Be Quite Honest With You!  Secondly, when my mother cooked it and took her very first bite, she did NOT feel very well due to CRAMPING IN HER STOMACH and Immediately Stopped Eating Any More Of That Fish And Threw It Out!  Please NOTE: She could have gotten very sick from their fish if she kept on eating it and thankfully she was Smart Enough To Stop After Her Very First Bite!  Is This The Kind Of Garbage That Walmart Makes,Produces And Sells To The Public?  I would hope NOT, but that was Not My Mother's Experience and I am her Personal Witness in this Case as well!  For Your Information: I am now going to provide You with some vital details that I was able to retrieve from the package of Their Horrible, Disgusting Fish for your reference and further review.  Great Value Pink Salmon Skin-On Fillets 2 Fillets Wild Caught 700 g M5C-C-52677 Upc Code: 6 28915 24305 5 Best Before: 2018 FE 28   In My Complaint, I also provided Pictures Of The Front And Back Side Of The Package Of Fish for your reference and further review.  Sadly, the first response that I got came from a Mark in Customer Service who Purposely and Deliberately Misread My Letter and Changed Around All Of The Wording In My Letter to make it look like I was complaining about the Smell In One Of Their Stores which was a Lie because he just did Not Wish To Deal With My Mother's Complaint.  Can you believe it?  Yes, I do have that letter available to view upon request.  Furthermore, the latest response that I received came from Customer Service stating that they have transferred my case to their Escalations Department and will have an answer for me within 24 hours.  Well, we will wait and see.  For a Billion Dollar Company, I think that they Can Afford to have better staff to deal with in Customer Service and they Can Afford To Have A Much Faster Turnaround Time!  Thank you.  Sincerely yours,      Howard Paul Shore Angry And Upset Wal-Mart Canada Corp. Customer On Behalf Of Mrs. Helene Shore, Your Customer  /HPS

Comment: Walmart. Com is complete garbage. Donâ€™t buy stuff online. Ordered a swingset and delivery was supposed to be 3 days. Then it got moved to the 6th day. Then moved to 10th then 11th. Comment: Very Disappointing I bought Great Value Buffalo Style Chicken Wings, 22 oz (Frozen, Fully Cooked) which I've bought many times in the past. This time they were horrible. They had more breading on then than chicken in them that I almost gagged on them.

Name: Celestra
Comment: This place is horrible!!!! I was accused of forging a legitimate ( printed, signed, paper prescription) that another pharmacy had no problem filling. Forgery is a serious accusation, I could have been arrested and facing a major Felony for something I did not do. !!!!!! My dr had my Rx for July sent to this place electronically and the pharmacist and pharmacy manager refused to fill it and Cancelled it for no legitimate reason !!!!! She caused me to NOT have any medication for July. This is not acceptable. I have no meds for this month. They do not know my medical history and to do this is so wrong!!!!! Do NOT fill your meds here or you might get accused of forgery and go to jail for something you didnâ€™t do !!!!!!

Name: Gunter Retterath
Comment: First time Buyer cannot believe the ineffective Customer Service. Bought a PFD (Life Vest) on line and it was too small. Having been with Amazon for 10 years, I expected a similar return policy of getting a label from Walmart. I even offered to pay for the return shipping. No way, the best Walmart "Customer Service"could do is to make this Senior drive 2 hours to the nearest Walmart. Unlike Amazon, Walmart is not interested to keep Customers. Third-Party Sellers on Walmart have no clear return policies and Walmart allows them to get away with unethical business practices. Walmart is a cruel joke when it comes to on-line purchases. Thank heaven there is Amazon.

Name: Dr. V. P.
Comment: I should have read the reviews prior to ordering through Wal Mart online. Did not receive the very expensive grill, even though the tracking system reflects the shipment arrived in Denver. Hmmm, so where is my grill? Customer service representatives- spoke with two of them and the shipper- all with lackadaisical and who cares attitude. Now, preparing to deal with waiting for the refund. It seems Wal Mart does not need online customers.

Name: Kimberly Hernandez
Comment: I ordered two pinatas for a birthday party. The website stated they would arrive prior to this party. After shipment it stated arrival would be 2 days AFTER the party. When refund was requested it stated I had to wait for delivery of items and then 10 days after! Horrible service and depend on items needed within a specific timeframe.

Name: Rich Estrada
Comment: They sold me a gaming headset and I bought the protection plan and itâ€™s not really a protection plan but an extended warranty basically so if itâ€™s something on there end is messed up theyâ€™ll cover it but if you lose a price or it breaks your on your ownâ€¦

Name: Mr. S
Comment: Their website walmart.com used to be good now that they've updated it it's complete crap. They make it almost impossible for you to get delivery for stuff that you used to be able to order online because their stores don't deliver certain ways and if it's a small thing you need they won't ship it call and ask him about disabilities they don't care about disabled people the elderly or anybody that can't go to their store physically if you're not buying in bulk they won't ship it. They put an idiot in charge of whoever just changed the website it's junk now.

Name: Walmartsucks
Comment: I ordered a product in early June (approx 9th) during my order process the delivery date was June 23rd. Once I placed my order and made payment the delivery date changed to July 5th. I called for updates no less than 3 times because over the next few weeks the online tracking said it was sitting with a shipping label waiting to be picked up - in 3 weeks it never changed. Then, more than a week after my package was supposed to arrive, the cancelled my package on me BECAUSE THEY COULDN'T FIND IT. What kind of a mess is their shipping company?  When I asked why they cancelled it rather than expediting a new item to me (since it was THEIR FAULT) or even paying for a courier (I mean they only make BILLIONS a year) they wouldn't even reply. There are so many places to shop online, I used to spend a ton at WalMart - never again!!

Name: Customer
Comment: I charged twice for the same product. I called to support multiple times. But it's "catch 22", unprofessional. shame for such a big company.

Name: Marta Mendoza
Comment: Walmart, Main Street, Dunedin, Florida  Went bright and early to do my groceries without crowds. To my dismay not one register open. I asked a worker behind the counter and she said no registers open at this time. So I pointed at my full cart and told her you can keep it and walked out. It's appalling that the more prices go up the less the services afforded to consumers. I don't use self-checkouts anywhere becuz I don't get paid to do the corporations jobs.  I will arrange my hours and wait for Publix and Winn-Dixie to open at 7am. They have cashiers open everywhere!

Name: A.B.
Comment: Walmart Has One Of The Worse Track Records On Getting Things Delivered By The Merchants. They Told Me My Shipment Was Damaged & Returned My Money on Card. Then I Left For A Week Out Of Town & Got A Email That : Item Was Delivered! Got Home 3-4 Days Later...Nothing! Now They Want To Recharge My Card For There Stupidness. I Will Never Order On Line Nothing From Them Ever Again or They Merchants!!!

Name: JOSEPH KOLAPARAN
Comment: There playing claw machine is not working & they have not posted a sign machine not working total rip off how much they are collecting on a default machine . Customers be aware

Name: Melissa Lewis
Comment: First time getting something delivered from Walmart and they messed up my order! I had ordered a crib and they delivered a patio set! The people delivering my order never knocked on my door to confirm delivery. I called customer service and they said it will take up to 3 days for someone to come get the wrong order. I am 9 months pregnant single and had this huge box to move off my porch to move it into my garage so no one steals it or the rain doesnâ€™t damage it! I have to wait 20 plus days to get my money back to order another crib! My baby comes in 28 days! The WORST experience I have ever had!! Never will I be ordering from Walmart again!

Name: Roman's Reviews
Comment: Walmart?... So much has already been said So I decided to rhyme this review instead Shopping here could make you a bit nervous It leaves a lot to be desired for given their poor customer service. I don't think they ever had proper training whatsoever, Their approach to customer satisfaction is like,.. whatever! Leave the store feeling appreciated?,.. Never! Being treated like you're a thief,.. Always & forever! Satisfied when returning an item?,.. Hardly ever! But check this out Economical prices is what our continuous shopping here is about And of course their variety Both sole reasons why they still get some notoriety. But stay away from the meat If you wanna remain on your feet..

Name: Chris
Comment: I initially had a good experience with ordering online from Walmart.com, enough so to join Walmart+. After joining Walmart+ though is when all of the problems started racking up. Their return and refund policies were confusing, their store associates were bitter and malicious, purposefully opening or destroying my returns and openly spiting me. Their logistics was a nightmare, resulting in repeated deliveries of many items, sometimes even grocery items worth less than $0.25, many damaged items, and blamed me for "returning" too many items, when in fact their logistics system was so broken that they could not or were not even willing to take my brand-new returns to restock on their shelves Eventually, they deactivated my account, once again blaming me for breaking their ToS for too many returns. This occurred when I was no longer returning any more items, and occurred unexpectedly. Actually, they did so after I had purchased some large, expensive items, preventing me from returning them if they were faulty, which, of course, with their nightmarish logistics, some did come broken. I run a business and my purchasing runs into the thousands/month. Logistics and returns are a day-to-day part of life at such volume, and Walmart was completey unable to handle what their service promises to deliver. I use another service - that will not be named but starts with the letter "A" - with perfect ease and have never had any complaints from them. Their staff are polite and carefully package my mostly unopened, undamaged returns to resell later, probably as brand new items.

Name: Ryuta
Comment: I work two jobs and rarely have time to go shopping when I get home so I utilize the app a lot. I don't know if it's just the area that we live in or what, but the app is slowly becoming the bane of my existence. It was great at first, but now, every other order that I place for delivery is delayed. Delivery times are becoming less and less as well. I'm currently waiting on a delivery that I placed at 2:30 today. The only time that I was forced to take without having to pay $17 extra dollars for express, was 8-9 pm. I got a text at 8:30 letting me know that my items would, once again, be delayed. It is currently 9:30 pm and I'm now being told that some items aren't available. Yeah, of course they are, because you waited until NOW to start looking for them. Most of the groceries I ordered would now be put away at this hour. And even better, the only times that I can choose for tomorrow are either early in the morning or 3:00 pm. All of the others are for walmart + members only. I don't get to this side of town UNTIL 5:45 pm. I don't get home until 6 and then I have to work again straight after. My groceries will be sitting out in 90+ degree humidity for 3 hours, all because I don't have a stupid membership? Nice. I'm going to use another third party delivery service because I'm honestly sick of this. This is the third time in a row that I've had this happen.

Name: Chris
Comment: I placed an order online 5 days prior for in-store pickup at a location 45 minutes from my work because delivery option was not available. On my way there for my scheduled pickup time, I receive a text saying there has been a delay. No problem. I continue on since I'm on my way anyway. While I am there waiting, I receive another message saying the item is not in stock even though it apparently was when I placed the order. Well that's rather upsetting. The item, however, is in stock at another store an hour away, once again available for pickup but not delivery. I cannot waste my time driving all over the place to pick up this item. While there, I end up speaking with customer service on the phone asking if they can do me the courtesy of delivering the item to my home since it's someone in their business who dropped the ball. I was speaking in a measure tone explaining the inconvenience of this whole situation. The supervisor has the gall to start raising his voice and getting upset at me for a mistake THEY made, makes no effort to find a solution, and gives no apologies. Bulls**t company living up to it's awful reputation. My mistake for thinking it was a good idea to try and buy something from them. I've always liked Amazon better anyways whose customer service is *outstanding*.

Name: Lori Mallory
Comment: Walmart + is ridiculous! If I could give negative rating I would because the worst experiences of my life. They wait to charge your account a week after you purchase groceries. They are always out of stock on many common items. I can't stress enough, it's not even worth the $12 a month

Name: Pinesio Sitoe
Comment: I had a great experience. Best attendant Mr. Aakash

Name: Max
Comment: You have Deactivated my account and I'm going to report this matter to my bank regarding Walmart's Marxist policies of refusal to refund past purchases. I'm also going to speak to a lawyer about this. I'm reporting this matter to the FTC.   This is unfair and very poor decision by Marxist Walmart policies ever since the pandemic began.

Name: MARSHA WRIGHT
Comment: WALMART.COM ONLINE IS A HUGE RIP OFF! THEY TOOK MONEY OFF MY CARD BACK ON-OFF SCREWED MY WHOLE CARD! WHEN I TRIED TO RETURN ITEM TO THE STORE THAT I BOUGHT ONLINE THE REFUNDS WERE TO WALMART INSTEAD OF ME! $139.68. RIP OFF! REFUSE TO RETURN IT TO MY CARD! I WILL NEVER EVER SHOP AT A WALMART AGAIN! BEWARE! I AM NOT THE ONLY ONE!

Name: Melissa Young
Comment: I had THE WORST experience at the Walmart on Broad St in Brooksville, FL!!!! I called around to all the local stores to get a flat screen tv they had on clearance & was told this particular location had some. I called and had someone pull one behind the counter for me and told them Iâ€™m on my way. He told me the price was marked normal price but they would take it up to customer service and price match! I drive 45 minutes there and get it up front and the customer service manager named Denise was SO RUDE & NASTY! She said itâ€™s $248....we canâ€™t give it to you for the $149 clearance price! Well I showed her the tv that was on the Walmart app which said the brand and the size and looked identical. She said nope you can either purchase this tv for $248 or leave but we are not price matching! I asked for a manager and she said â€œI am the managerâ€ so I asked for another manager! She gets Frances over there which was nicer but also refused to price match! Denise carts the tv and the tv mount I had back to the back behind electronics. I then ask for corporates number! They call the assistant manager and get them to come talk to me. We do some more research and the $248 tv was the ultra hd so the associate pulled the wrong one out to hold for me. So I said ok just get me the correct tv for $149! Then they say they donâ€™t have any! Well on the app it says they have 3 in stock! They still argue with me saying maybe I could get it somewhere else online but not there! So I add it to the cart through the app and pay for it and it clearly said pick up at their location! So at this point I already bought it so whereâ€™s the tv?! They search everywhere in the back and find an open box returned tv, it was missing the manual but they gave me $15 off which I tuned around and used on the 2 year protection plan and I also bought the $80 mount. They make me pay for the tv again and tell me to cancel my online order. I was there for 2 hours from 6:30-8:30pm!!!! To top it all off.....My car was hit in the parking lot and the car just took off! Now I have to pay my $500 deductible to fix my car!!!! Expensive trip to Walmart!!! I think Iâ€™ll stay away from there!!!!!!!!! I donâ€™t understand how Denise has a job there....she definitely does not know how to speak to a customer!!!!!! I Will Not being doing business at that location again!!!!!!

Name: Carol Smith Sparkman

Name: Browneyed Luna
Comment: I wish I could give them zero stars but thatâ€™s not possible. I started using their Pick Up grocery feature and once you put an order in, it pre-authorize charges yours credit card. The last few times Iâ€™ve used the Grocery Pick Up, they charge me my pre-authorization amount and my final amount. I also had a delivery item. Walmart emailed me a confirmation that it was delivered and charged my credit card for it but I never received the item. When I called Customer Service about this, all they could say was â€œCall your bank to refute the chargesâ€. Iâ€™ve called 4 times with issues in the last month. The customer service reps are also rude and completely useless, why is Walmart wasting their money paying them to sit there and be unhelpful? Do NOT use their service and if you do track the charges. Iâ€™m switching over to Fortinos for my groceries now, they are more expensive and their Pick Up has a minimal charge but itâ€™s worth it to avoid getting charged hundreds of dollars over your actual amount. Very poor experience and very dissatisfied.

Name: *JethroBodine*

Name: Jeremy Auld

Name: Sueann Scarborough
Comment: I ordered a childâ€™s penguin back pack and towel.. the towel wasnâ€™t a towel but an expensive hand towel wth? $16.99 for a penguin hand towel Iâ€™m very disappointed also it took 30 DAYS to get it... the expensive penguin back back dosent hold much maybe childâ€™s sunglasses and a juice box lol also came with a long rope which was a childâ€™s LEASH .. with delivery taking forever and so disappointed in the size Iâ€™ll never order from Walmart ever again!

Comment: This is based on the last 3 orders- I order online through Walmart.com and get a delivery date. Then they send out some food delivery service to dump the items on my doorstep the very same day while I am out of town. No packaging, just stuff dumped on a doorstep. Iâ€™ve never ordered through delivery, just through the shipping area. I have spoken with customer service 3 times, and they guaranteed it wonâ€™t happen againâ€¦. But of course it does. So I get to waste time with customer service people, refunds, and have to go buy my items elsewhere. Really bad customer service with this site - what is with them substituting? If I didnâ€™t order it- donâ€™t send it. If you donâ€™t have it- donâ€™t put it on your site. Some employee doesnâ€™t get to decide what I want. Is that employee going to take the time and gas to return this unwanted item? Nice job putting out your customers Walmart. Iâ€™m done with them. Deliver on or after the date stated, not 2 days before! And bring what I ordered NOT what you decided I should have instead!

Name: Laura Giese
Comment: I received an email that I had ordered a bodycam from Walmart.com. I had not. I called and Walmart said the order was cancelled. The next email I got said that the bodycam had shipped. The shipment I received included a padded envelope with a blank sheet of paper. Initially, Walmart said they would refund the money if I waited until July 11. I waited. Then they said there was nothing they could do. Walmart took the money out of my account, I believe it is their responsibility to replace it, given the correspondence came from Walmart and I paid Walmart. From what I can see, Walmart is the scammer. I am urging everyone I know to NEVER USE WALMART.COM AGAIN,

Name: Carla Isenhower
Comment: I ordered 5 items online. The first delivery arrived wrapped up in a plastic check-out bag, and of the two items supposedly in the bag, only one was present. Two other items arrived later (in a box), but one of the items was not what I ordered. I'm done with Walmart. Back to Amazon.

Name: Darnold
Comment: I wrote a review for "Equate Earloop Face Masks, Blue, 25 Count". I included a photo showing the very small earloops on the Equate mask in comparison with the masks I got elsewhere. Walmart let my review post but did not post my picture. My picture was well within their specifications for posting. So, i tried to do another review with the picture and it will not post. Not sure if that is because I already reviewed the product or not.

Name: Leah Palmer
Comment: My problem is that I shopped online on July 14th 2022 and had a pickup scheduled for the afternoon. When I went to pick up my groceries there were items in my order that were supposed to be canceled. The young man that helped me stated that their computers had gone down that morning and so that's how the items probably made it into my order. I refused to take those items that I had canceled and I did not touch them. I made him take them back into the store. I watched as he deleted those items from my order on his handheld computer. I thanked him and left. I called my bank on 07/18/2022 because Walmart owes me $26.24 for the cancelled items in my order. The bank states that the Walmart transaction from the 14th is still pending because Walmart hasn't taken their money yet. Since when does Walmart give you free food or merchandise?! I've been shopping WM online for years and every single time my groceries were paid for when I picked them up. So why not now? I called Customer service to find out. The first one was a lady who I could not communicate with. No matter how hard I tried, She couldn't answer my question. I asked to speak with someone else and she stated that she couldn't do that. I informed her that I was going to hang up then. I was upset. I didn't understand how such a simple question couldn't be answered. A while later I tried again. Sometime between 5:30-5:45 p.m. CST on July 18th, 2022, when I called I was connected with a man whose name I don't know because he had a thick accent and I didn't understand him when he said his name. I didn't bother to ask for it again because I just wanted to explain my problem and get it resolved. He said in order for him to assist me, I would need to download an app called "Quicksupport". I asked him what it was and how it was going to help. He said it is a tool CS reps use that allows them to see what I see. Meaning the Walmart app. So I said ok. I downloaded the app and when I opened it, he walked me through the set up and before I knew what was happening, he took control of my phone! He didn't ask me for permission, he didn't tell me that he was going to do that. I was extremely upset. He was searching through my phone and I asked him what he was looking for. He asked me what the name of my bank was. I asked him why he needed that information. He said it would help him identify the transaction. I told him my bank name and he said "You don't have the bank app here, I'll just download it." Then he told me he wanted me to sign into my bank account so he could see the pending transactions. I said, "Hell no I'm not!" He kept assuring me that he wouldn't be able to see my account or routing numbers or anything personal. What a crock! By now I was really freaking out and I told him that I was not comfortable with ANY of this! I tried to hang up several times but he kept controlling my phone and wouldn't let me hang up so I shut my phone off to disconnect the call. I'm shocked and scared. I googled Walmart Corporate and sent them an email.

Name: Kathleen Todd
Comment: They are usually great and nice, sometimes not so lucky but will still shop there.

Name: Nathan J
Comment: I honestly like shopping at Walmart, who doesnt??

I pick out my own fresh fruits, vegetables and meats. Why does Walmart think I would leave that to a stranger. Why does Walmart think that the "reserved for pickup" parking is empty? What is Walmart thinking?

Comment: This was a WILD experience. I can see why a ton of tourists come here because this place seems almost too futuristic and unreal.  This is essentially a small grocery shop - so small that it's basically one of those grab and go places. A lot of things in here are single meals or bags of snacks/chips.  You literally scan your app, walk in, walk around, grab what you want, and walk out.  I think it's safe to say that MOST (not all... some people are used to this) people in here are experiencing it for the first time. People are excited - vlogging, talking to their family or friends - when walking around and it's just fun!

Name: M D.

I have reached my break point with them and will stop using amazon or going here anymore. I bought an item in March and Walmart has recharged me three times pertaining the situation. I never received the item and Walmart lied and said the vendor recharged me. I called the vendor and they said that was not the truth. Walmart then deactivated my account because Iâ€™m calling about my items. My experience with Walmart online has made me completely hate them. I barely go in the stores now. The couriers they use forge signatures, or lie and say itâ€™s been delivered. Walmart donâ€™t care about their customers. They want out beat Amazon but customer service is horrible. At least Amazon take the time to make sure things are correct. Walmart hang up in your face and donâ€™t really help. It took me to call the vendors to get help because Walmart was lying on the vendor. Iâ€™m not mad about Walmart closing my account because I donâ€™t want no one taking my money and I donâ€™t have the items. Walmart need to do better. Returns and refunds are part of online orders because either you donâ€™t get he items, the items are broken, or just donâ€™t want them anymore. The customer should not be punished. Walmart should leave to the stores because these rude online reps are horrible. Unless Walmart taking accountability for there actions and either firing reps or holding reps accountable for their actions donâ€™t reach out. Walmart let me down too much in one day.

Name: Jeff Simmons
Comment: TERRIBLE. ORDERED A COUCH WHICH WAS SUPPOSED TO BE DELIVERED WITHIN DAYS! THE DAY OF ARRIVAL, A MESSAGE WAS SENT THAT IT HADN'T EVEN LEFT THEIR DISTRIBUTION CENTER. Name: sharon kirubakar
Comment: My worst experience in Walmart store (in 4040 Nolensville Pike, Nashville, TN 37211).. Around 7:30pm I went to the shop to purchase a car battery.. I see no one on the Auto section to open to lock to pick battery.. After a 15 min search finally I find a senior associate with keys.. He opens it and asks me to carry the heavy battery to the customer service section which was at the other end then on reaching the customer service location he asks me to bring my old battery which was outside my car, I go out and bring my old battery.. He was chatting with 3-4 other associates and I wait there for another 5 mins and he sends another senior associate to help me.. She just came said "oh the customer service is closed come back tomorrow".. what ??? DID THEY THINK I AM IDIOT?? they make me carry the heavy battery from one end to another end then ask me to go out and carry my old battery, make me wait and then cooly tell Customer Service is closed ?? You all literally broke my back.. 3-5 associates were cooly chatting at the money center but you closed the customer service at 7:30pm??.. Another thing.. You had so many counters but just opened 1 cash counter and there was like 15 - 20 ppl in queue and one was my wife.. Are you punishing us for shopping in Walmart?? You have no respect for Customers like us and we have been loyally shopping at your place.. I lost all respect for Walmart today.. I need a Manager to look into my concern and respond...

Name: goldieray
Comment: PLEASE DONOT ORDER ON WALMART CANADA ONLINE, THE PRODUCTS ARE NOT COMING FROM WALMART CANADA, IT IS COMING FROM AN OUTSOURCE IN CHINA AND DEALING WITH THEM ON GETTING THE ITEM IS IMPOSSIBLE. DO NOT ORDER FROM WALMART ONLINE

Name: jessica coles
Comment: I absolutely hate how management runs in Walmart. Their expectations are way too high for the little staff we have. We do not get paid enough to work like this in misery. I'm ready to quit!

Comment: I was shopping online for a child's swing set. The two sets I was interested were not at all clear about what was included in the package, especially when it came to hardware. Very disappointed.

Name: D Trader
Comment: Obviously one needs to be aware of Walmart's quality of merchandise and employees. You pay for what you get. Minimum wage employees will provide minimum level of service. Apparently at store no. 02650 at 4301 Byberry Rd Philadelphia- they are unable to accept returns or exchanges because there computers are down and suggest returning next week...not tomorrow...but next week!. Whatever did store managers do before computers??? How did they function?

Name: Melissa Lancaster
Comment: I have ordered 3 items on the Next day delivery list and I have waited 1 full week for all 3 items to ship a week later!!!! They don't honor the next day shipping!!! Amazon is MUCH better.

Name: Ariel Tidwell
Comment: Just go to Amazon.. Walmart has the same thing as them, but slower, and less efficient.. I've tried so many times over the years to order an important item from Walmart to be let down every time! You never find out till weeks or a month later,when you have to figure out on your own that your products have not and are not going to arrive.. ever!! A few times they have sold out of products after I paid for and bought them, they just threw my money back on my card in those cases and didn't ship me anything.. so a month later when I'm like where's my air conditioner it's hot as hell outside, I find out it's not coming.. and if they've doubled the price if I try to get it againðŸ¤®then my product says it's arrived when I followed the freaking tracking, but it hasn't.. not Walmart problem, even though that's where you were shopping! they will refer you to somebody else that you are actually buying stuff from to fix the problem and hope that they are competent.. usually they're not!! So they steal your money.. if you do get it, it takes weeks. Amazon for the win, Walmart YOU SUCK

Name: Frog
Comment: I shopped at Walmart today, I needed a bag of dog food. The 50# bags of Purina Dog Chow were on the top shelf, I told an associate about it and he said "I don't stock the shelves" and turned and walked away. I don't like to shop at Walmart, and this just added to my distaste for the store.

Name: Ant
Comment: Walmart in Fort Oglethorpe Ga has nothing but lazy staff working there even online chat are just as lazy boycott big businesses such as these lazy crooks.

Name: Spr52
Comment: With a third party seller on Walmart.com, if you do a lot of eBay shopping, you will notice a lot of them are on Walmart.com so you have to be careful who you order from. I go back and forth between eBay, Walmart and Amazon. The problem is that Walmart does not keep their stores stocked with a lot of the items they advertise that they sell so you have to end up ordering online which I think is crazy but that's how it is and when you end up ordering online it's not always with Walmart they are third-party sellers that is why Walmart does not refund from third-party sellers so be careful what you order and keep an eye out for third-party sellers because a lot of times the third party sellers are from China...

Name: Soras
Comment: Walmart did nothing to help customers during March April and May with the pandemic. Useless. Now that things have opened up more where I live Walmart is still doing nothing to help customers. Iâ€™m 70 years old and wanted to buy an item that can only be purchased in store, per their website. It said several local stores had the item in stock but I still called. I was told stores cannot check to see if an item is actually in stock - had to go in. I drove the distance and went into a not all that clean store and of course they didnâ€™t have the item. I called 800# customer service and was told they couldnâ€™t do anything. Not one thing. I asked a supervisor if if she could call the next store which supposedly had the item in stock. It was a 45 minute drive away. She refused saying itâ€™s â€œnot part of the process.â€ So I drove and couldnâ€™t find the item. I waited at the customer service area for over 5 minutes while nobody else was in line but the 2 guys behind the counter were talking and laughing and had no interest in helping me. I stayed patient. Finally they stopped talking and I was called up to the counter and yet again the store didnâ€™t have the item. 4 calls to customer service resulted in no help whatsoever. I had a list of items to get at Walmart along with what I went for - something I promised my granddaughter Iâ€™d get - their website says stores have it. But they donâ€™t have it and I decided after all I went through not to purchase anything else on my list from Walmart. I went to Target. Iâ€™m done with rude, ineffective, unclean, uncaring, useless Walmart.

Name: BPY123
Comment: Fun experience, prices are typical for the area Definitely one of my favorite place to go in Seattle. Not only the technology is cool but also saving time with cashless and no check out line. The price is also very competitive just like regular Amazon items. There are also quite variety of foods to choose from for quick lunch and they taste good to me. I wish there are more Go stores.

Name: Boon Y.

The price is also very competitive just like regular Amazon items. There are also quite variety of foods to choose from for quick lunch and they taste good to me. I wish there are more Go stores.

Comment: Exactly absolutely bs an what if someone isnâ€™t so modernized to have credit card info or whatever the crap on their phones an just wants to pay legit

Name: young g
Comment: right

Name: Brendyn Braithwaite.
Comment: If I could do less than a star I would or maybe I could.. either way Walmart is garbage if you shop online and even in store is pretty Terrible but my mother bought a couch online and didn't receive the entire couch.. Walmart gave her the run around had the exact same conversation with 7 different employees before she had enough and demanded her money back so they took the couch back already but still no money back and I really don't get why they didn't just give her a new couch to replace the Garbage she received.. basically Walmart online is a rip off and a joke to them they clearly don't care about their older online customers they just rip them off

Name: Andrea Zrycki
Comment: I tried giving Walmart a chance. I purchased on July 10th a queen mattress that was supposed to be delivered on the 15th. I actually bought 2 mattresses and the full was delivered on the 19th/late, after delays emails, they delivered my item in a different city and someone signed for it. So now I have to call and dispute with my credit card. Walmart doesn't take accountability for the error. Worst experience ever. No wonder Amazon is a lead in this market.

Name: Diane McCullah Mendoza
Comment: As usual, when ordering online from WalMart.com, the order can (and did) arrive in several deliveries. After a week I received a text & email saying my last package was delivered at my front porch....nothing was there. Checked my camera & no one ever approached my house. No package in mail either. Called CS & was told that some delivery companies will anticipate delivery & post it prior to actually being completed & I should wait a few days. Now we all know that is hogwash, especially from USPS. I waited & called USPS the next day only to find that the tracking number was for a pkg. to a different person/address. Called CS again & requested another shipment be sent expedited. That was when the 3rd party seller BS was started. Bottom line, they will not stand behind any product that is coming from a 3rd party seller even though you order from WalMart & pay on your WalMart card. The last CS supervisor I spoke to was the rudest person I have ever dealt with at ANY company. Granted by this time I was furious but I never cursed or rose my voice. He was condescending & rude. This whole situation was the total opposite of how they treated me during the pandemic, when they needed our business. Their CS has totally bottomed out & I am not speaking of the CS agents answering the phones but of their protocol. I am surprised that the agents aren't less helpful & courteous given the example shown by one of their supervisors. I am a W+ customer but I will no longer be ordering online from WalMart & will not be renewing my subscription when it expires.

Name: Tracy Carmichael
Comment: I am highly disappointed in Walmart all of Walmart's policies have changed Walmarts do not answer their telephones the managers of the Walmart stores do not comply with customers even when the customer is not asking anything above and beyond just asking for their money to be returned in the way of the receipt still Walmart will not comply it is left up to the store manager supposedly corporate has no authority over the store managers so why there's even a corporate I'm not sure I highly suggest anybody who wants to shop at Walmart check into Walmart policies or you might be in a situation highly disappointed and left untaken care of

Name: B
Comment: Allowing scalpers to sell their massively overpriced products on your website is not a good look. Terrible company.

Name: chris
Comment: I really love this site.

Name: Paula R
Comment: Seriously, why purchase ANYthing from Walmart when it is obtainable with excellent customer service from Amazon. I have experienced multiple issues with dismal service from Walmart at all levels. I don't even want to waste my time any more detailing the substandard encounters I have had; after spending the last several days trying to resolve an issue with them to no avail, I am through. Amazon is there waiting with open arms...run to them and don't look back!

Name: Stephen Counceller
Comment: Bad service and the manager walks around while theirs a line outside the building. I've been waiting 35 min while your manager walks around looking stupid. I will go to payless for now on bad service lazy people too

Name: gene eu
Comment: DO NOT BUY ONLINE! IT IS ALMOST FRAUD.

Name: Eva
Comment: Almost every shelf was out and it was crowded. I never had a experience like this before. it was terrible.

Name: Mike Masri
Comment: I have purchased a fryer from Walmart site, I went to return the item because it was too big, I followed the website instructions and printed the return receipt to take to the store on north Tryon the told me they donâ€™t have shipping labels, Really!!! So I called the Walmart online help and I wasnâ€™t helpful at all. So Iâ€™m now stuck with this item. This will never happen with Amazon. So Iâ€™m cancelling my online account with Walmart and giving my business to Amazon because of their great customer service. I have spent thousands with Walmart and now itâ€™s all going to Amazon.

Name: Clark A. Jones
Comment: Product is good, but the delivery was last. They said my product will be delivered to my address on June 15, but it's been delivered to me yesterday.

Name: Tofurry
Comment: Fun experience, prices are typical for the area Now that Amazon Go is open to the public, there can be a line depending on when you decide to visit. It is really fun to just scan in the Amazon Go app linked to your Amazon account (for each person in your party if they do not have their own apps), take whatever you want to buy and walk out. Lots of tourists picking up Amazon Go exclusive items like Theo Chocolate, mugs and water bottles. You can also grab a reusable orange shopping bag while supplies last.  Prices are typical for the area. The nice thing is that there are a lot of vegetarian and even vegan choices. We've tried the curry tofu sandwich, and a couple of other vegan selections and they've all been good.  Some time after you leave, you will get an email from Amazon with a total for what you picked up. Try it once!

Name: Sa Y.
Comment: Just make sure you scan each time your troop go in if you are with others. I don't know how it works, but I found it easy. Choices are not great, but side salad was pretty good. If I'm them, I create Vegan zone.

Name: Jessica O.
Comment: Shopping can't get easier! Amazon Go is a convenient store where you scan their app and then pick out whatever you like and then just walk out of the building. It charges it through the app without you even having to swipe a card! I noticed that there are other locations in Seattle, along with San Francisco, NYC, and Chicago. They are building more in those locations but I hope that they build more in other cities! I would love having stores like this close by since I already use Apple Pay often, but this is even more time saving! I believe that tourist often stop by these locations just like I did. So my recommendation is that there are a few unique (gift shop type) items for purchase also like a mug  or stickers. Definitely worth checking out it's a futuristic experience and a mystery of how it works.

Name: ðŸ’™ðŸ¦‹StacyðŸ¦‹ðŸ’™
Comment: You can work for Amazon.. there is some employees to stock up the shelves. they just donâ€™t have cashiers

Name: Kevin Joseph
Comment: Bought a flashlight from the website from one of their star sellers. The flashlight arrived inoperable as the Li-ion battery will not take a charge. It ried to reach out to the seller as outlined by walmart and never got a response. I left a complaint for walmart and they stated they contacted seller. More than a week later still no communications. DO NOT BUY FROM THEIR WEBSITE. Non-walmart sellers are awful and walmart leaves you stuck.

Name: Debbie Ellis
Comment: Ordered a chainsaw which was through 3rd party Marketplace. Wanted to return but Walmart would not do a refund. Should not use the Walmart name if you are going to honor the purchase. I will not be ordering from Walmart again.

Name: Leslie Owens
Comment: So I made the mistake of ordering from walmart online for delivery. My order was supposed to arrive between 9 & 10 PM. I waited until midnight, no order. I called them the next morning and was told it was still processing and call the store. The store said call customer service. I called customer service they said call the store. Finally I got someone in customer service to at least talk to me. She said the order was picked up and then cancelled. I am like HUH, I didn't cancel it, when will I get my order or a refund? Well your order was picked up and and cancelled. OK.....so where is it. Well ma'am your order was picked up and cancelled. OK..... so where is my order? I could not get a straight answer so I said to cancel it and refund my money. Ok...so she cancelled and aparently my refund will not be sent for 7-10 days. UMM......UM WHAT? So I have to wait 7-10 business days to get my grocery money back so I can buy food for my family? In this economy, living paycheck to paycheck I have to wait a week or more before I can get my grocery money back? HORRIBLE, try not to shop walmart. I will be sharing this with my friends and family and encouraging them to boycott walmart.

Name: edith castagnetti
Comment: Heard from Walmart on my complaint if fraud. In their popsicles. Switching of cheap version to the Popsicle original. Said I would get a call from the store . 5 days later no call. Guess I shouldnâ€™t expect any thing from this company. Bad costumer service

Name: Michael Smith
Comment: I grocery shopped at Walmart in Winchester va for 15 years .150 to 250 every week . Last night all self checkout .Employees walking around everywhere .Never again . I'm now going to do all my grocery shopping at Martin's.

Name: Igal Yungman
Comment: We bought the ROOMTEC 26 Quart Large Air Fryer Toaster Oven about a month ago and we are very happy with it. We used all the different functions and the food we made all tasted great. Also, it was very easy to use and to clean. The customer service of Walmart and A to Z Products, LLC was amazing!

Name: Laura U
Comment: If I could rate this store lower than 1-star I would. The pharmacy staff is apathetic and the attitudes of staff are lazy, not laid back. John, the store manager, is disingenuous when engaging on a very serious issue with the pharmacy concerning my anti-epileptic medication. John is condescending and it is obvious an employeeâ€™s accountability is his absolute last priority. Walmart pharmacy's lax attitude in medication coordination is appalling and borderline negligent in my opinion. Buy your shower curtain there, although I would hesitate doing that, but leave your pharmaceutical needs to the professionals, who are currently NOT affiliated with Walmart. Go to Longs Drugs! Your health is too important and their attitude towards life and death medical issues in my experience is lazy and apathetic. Save yourself!
