They made millions if not billions selling guns and ammo and if there so big on anti guns shouldnâ€™t they give that money back to the people who registered to buy guns from them ? Legally I might add it wasnâ€™t anyone who had legally obtained a weapon that attacked them they are in whole an anti American liberal dishonest immoral greedy company !

Name: Ray Wil TT
Comment: I ordered a product online for in store pick-up and it was delivered to the location on time for my pick up. This was the first time I had tried this so I was a bit uncertain that it would be there when promised. Well done

Name: Doris Kendrick Culverhouse
Comment: Walmart's return policy is there saving grace. If they didn't have that they would be a no go for me. most of their items are good but some are defective. so it is a hit and miss. but since they take them back you don't have to worry.

Name: Nicole Zolondek Michel
Comment: Ordered for the new NextDay Delivery that Walmart advertises on Friday, so I should of received my order on Saturday. No delivery on Saturday and now the order status saying Delayed! Chatted with Walmart who said my order was lost in delivery and they could now reorder. But i will not be getting my order until Tuesday now, so much for NextDay Delivery through Walmart. I would not do this again. Also was offered $10 promo for the difficulty which I thought was great until I opened the email and their was a stipulation for $10 off my next purchase of 15 or more. I thought I was suppose to get something nice for the difficulty Walmart put me through and now I have to spend even more!!!!

Name: Elizabeth Roberts
Comment: You have a woman who checks receipts at the Lebanon, Oregon store, named Linda. She is aggressive and rude, goes through peoples things and accuses them of stealing when they haven't. She has had multiple complaints including one that I made but she is still there!! Many of your customers are not returning because of this horrible associate.. I went in today and she is still there. Should be fired or transferred to another job. She has gray hair and I confirmed her name is Linda. You are losing a lot of business because of this woman.  I complained to Walmart via their website and they don't care! This is a horrible place and I am not going to shop there anymore.

Name: Dante _Cocker Spaniel
Comment: I would give 0 star if I could. Their customer service department is full of unprecedently rude reps including the supervisor Ronda who intentionally hung up on me to avoid unwanted conversation and Hillary from the resolution team. Someone needs to do something to do quality control of the internal staffs. Horrible.

Name: Valerie Leeman
Comment: I ordered something from walmart online over a week ago. Still not here and says it's still in china?? I thought I was buying from the United states!!! No more Walmart for me!!!

Name: Mike
Comment: Seven months ago I bought a small refrigerator. A week and a half after it was supposed to be delayed I called. They told me that they canceled the order and reordered with a 30% discount. When that one was delivered it was all dented and I returned it. They credited me for the discount price and I bought one somewhere else. 2 months ago the charge was on my card again. I called and was told that they hadn't charged me. I contacted the credit card company and they held the money until investigated. Then released it back to my account. Now they billed me for it again and when I called told me the first one ordered was delivered and I would have to pay or contract the credit card company to dispute it. The credit card company has told me that Walmart has to remove the charge. So now I have to give $243.47 to Walmart in order to keep a bad mark against my credit off of my record. DO NOT TRUST WALMART.

Name: Brian
Comment: What can I say about the late great WalMart? Well, I guess first off I would like to give a shout out to Sam, the founder.. Sam, although we all know by now ...that you have probably spent the most part of your passing, rolling in your grave... I just want you to know we DO NOT Blame you in any way shape or form for the abuses it's overseas manufacturing plant workers in China, who are forced to live on $3.00/day and forced to work 7 days a week under human rights violations. Nor, Sam can we disparage you for the fact of the low wages, understaffed, forced to go on welfare employees in the U.S. Nor would anyone accuse you of environmental violations here in the U.S. and far more likely as well around the world. And of course could we Blame you for all the female discrimination that is more than very likely still going on, especially probably still here in the states, and..., And, well... The list so far is only the tip of Mount Everest, so I'm sorry Sam, but there's a recent visit to one of the WalMart stores built years later after our mourning of your passing. And it went a little bit like this... Before I could step on the front outside walkway, I instantly became a wanted suspected criminal as suddenly I was facing a barrage of embarrassing barking orders that I could not enter that particular store w/o a mask even as I had my mask in my hand covering my face as I attempted to secure the mask stringage around both ears. So, Still not sure why I was betrayed for some kind of crime I guess this particular store employee thought she saw before her to bark, I MEAN BARK AT ME AS IF "I WAS A DOG!?" SO... Anyway , I walk into the store and I see another employee ring highly rude to an elderly lady at the self checkouts and I try to ignore this, for fear at being now either barked at or treated in a similar rude manner as the poor old lady was regretfully being talked down to . Anyway ..I realize right away I really have already seen enough to shorten my shopping list. Considerably from 17 items to just one item. So I go to get that one item and... Drumroll, that item is not on the shelf, so I needed to reassure myself that I did not waste time by driving a few miles to get at the store in the first place by choosing the next just as important item off the shelf... Only to find no shelf. The shelf was missing along with the item., Soooooo, I decided on the next important item to find it was the very last item ...and still sitting on the shelf even though clearly it was broken with broken pieces of glass surrounding it. 3X would not be the charm over the fruitless effort I initiated to shop, buy, and bring home with me. So, upon hearing and then witnessing a sudden scuffle between an employee and a customer, with the employee trying his damnest to bring this customer down WWE, THATS when I high-tailed it outta that department nearly running for the exit doors!!! WalMart is as I quickly summized, some twisted parody paradox of it's former self....(what WalMart once was when Sam was alive). From A company that really had a solid grasp of reality when it came to treating not only their employees with respect and dignity, Sam's Way... To some kind of loathing experience shared by customers and employees alike!!!! I mean, come on WalMart!!! What ever happened to you after Sam's passing, huh? Why the ongoing abuse and immoral judgements and unfounded actions you now cling tightly to!?!?!? Where and why did all this have to come about, other than the clear fact it's being run into the ground by some would relate to greedy psychotic behaviors that show case what happens when a once great company comes under seige by bottom lines not to it's employees or customers benefit, but clearly instead to the rich shareholders and the ilk that for now dominate over the corporate offices. Seriously WalMart, what will the future bring you, what will history end up saying about you? Do you want to be on the right side of history? Stay on the same last two decades track of lies and deceit? Seriously?

Name: Stacey S
Comment: This is the first time that I have used Walmart's Next Day Delivery and I am not impressed. My items should have arrived yesterday and according to the FedEx tracking link, they are still in the original location. It looks like I didn't save myself a trip the store AND will end up with twice as much as I wanted.

Name: Sitara M.
Comment: How cool is this place!! You have to see it to believe it. The whole process from start to end is so seamless that it's amazing how it all works. Download the Amazon go app on your phone, walk in to the store, open the app, scan the barcode at the entrance and that's it! If there are multiple folks entering the store but using a single app or a count, then make sure you scan the barcode multiple times to get each one access to enter the store. Pick up an orange Amazon go cloth bag (at no extra charge), pick up what you want and leave the store. No scanning needed! No lines! No wait! This is so awesome when you are in a hurry and have no time to wait In line during peak busy hours. The selection is pretty good too. From beverages to snacks, chocolates and candy, ready to cook meal boxes, ready to eat meals, wraps, sandwiches, desserts, and a bunch of basic supplies like eggs, meat and milk.

Name: Patrick - off to Argentina
Comment: I have to confess Iâ€™m not a Walmart in store shopper most definitely since covid. That said, Iâ€™ve ordered 3 times in the last month from Walmart.com and am impressed with the detailed emails they send advising how the order will be shipped, from multiple suppliers, and shipped date. All were right on time. Of note: if you expect all items ordered will be in the same shipment ðŸšš you may find they ship from the manufacturer, not from a Walmart central warehouse. Thatâ€™s why they can offer free shipping on a $20 orderâ€¦

Name: CBanks
Comment: We ordered an adult tricycle through Walmart.com. The vendor, Joi Market, sent us a cheap $200 Pexmore bike not the $500+ Schwinn bike we ordered. We contacted Walmart immediately and they sent a message to the seller for us to receive return labels for the boxes and a refund. After getting the runaround from the seller for a couple of weeks, Walmart said they would refund our money. A MONTH later, after receiving refund promises from 4 different Walmart representatives, 3 supervisors and a billing representative (thank you Krista), we finally got our money back and a $25 gift card. Very frustrating and horrible customer service!! In the midst of all of this, we ordered the Schwinn bike from Amazon and received the correct bike within two days!

Name: customer
Comment: I went to the 12mile and Van Dyke store to do a return, the line was all the way back to the next entrance/exit doors with only one lady, Ayanna, working the customer service dept. I stood in line approx 40mins. Ayanna took care of maybe 20 people in that time. She never had attitude or tone with any of us, she had the calm to speak and be kind to all of us, gave directions to one customer, spoke to a toddler in the cart, while never missing a beat to get the customers taken care of and keep the line moving, Ayanna was Awesome. I want Wal-Mart to recognize Ayanna as an asset to their company. I realize with the way Sooooo many people would rather stay at home and collect unemployment the stores are struggling to carry on daily duties and cover the depts but here you have a woman who is there truly doing her Best. Wal-Mart needs to recognize and reward Ayanna and anyone else who gets a good review especially in these trying times. Shame on you Walmart if you don't!!!! The reason for only 4 stars is on Wal-Mart not Ayanna, I feel management must have seen the line backup and should have given help, even if just to keep the line down when it built up. No worker should be that out numbered!!! Teamwork Walmart, you wanna preach it.....practice it!!!!

Name: George Kalajyan
Comment: Horrible my order arrived late , the people were no help at all , I requested a handy man service to come set up my desk I had to pay the extra money only to discover I had to book the appointment , the email told me they would email me to set up the appointment but they never did !!!!

Name: Marlene Lenz
Comment: I signed up for Walmart + one month ago. Iâ€™ve had nothing but trouble with grocery deliveries. The last order was never even delivered. Prior to that I received out of date yogurt, moldy onions, etc. They are supposed to text you when your items are delivered, but that never happens. Ice cream sat on the porch for 2 hrs in 98 degree heat. I asked for a refund on my $98.00 yearly fee and was told no. I even offered to pay for the month I had it, still no go. Now Iâ€™m stuck until 7/23 with a crap service!

Name: Amy Frey
Comment: Shouldn't even get 1 reviews i should have had my order today cuz thats wat my tracking order said and its not even here!! First time ordering online now i know why i dont use online never ever again!! God i definitely cant wait for zellars to come back!! This is wat happens when they dont have any competition!! Hell i dont even understand why it went further noth cuz it said it started in milton then went to QC now its still in Toronto and im in kitchener like wth

Name: Dee
Comment: Walmart! Just an organization that prey's on customers mistake and apologize for a stupid policy. How can l cancel an order 3mins that it was made and l won't get my refund immediately. it's been 4 days now Walmart is holding unto my $220, l imagine them holding 500 customers refund for this long. They will definitely be making alot of money. Walmart is just a rip off. You guys need to learn how it's done from Amazon. Amazon will never do this. Walmart you need to do better in your service delivery. This is really unfair and uncalled for. Please refund my money and stop acting on the pretence of a system error.

Name: Pix
Comment: Everytime, I attempt to shop on my app, it's not working properly, I go elsewhere, pay more, but it's way too big a hassle, why can't Walmart get this thing right? Won't try again, think 15 attempts is enough Good luck using it!

Name: Wayne Massella
Comment: I purchased tires on sale to be delivered to my local store. I waited a week and had an install set up. I received a phone call an hour before install that they sent the wrong tires and I needed to call Walmart.com. I called and was informed the only corse of action os to get a refund and reorder the tires which are no longer on sale. I asked for a refund on Friday was told 24-48 for a email and refund. Monday still nothing called back the girl never submitted the refund. So he said he would Wednesday comes still no confirmation email and no refund called back and the file said she would process the refund I told her to forget it after 6 days and three people I will call my back and file a claim. Itâ€™s going on a week had to spend more than 500 more for tires and still donâ€™t have my refund. I will never purchase from Walmart.com and I would strongly recommend you do the same.

Name: Claudia
Comment: Since Wal-mart can't protect their customers, and are not willing to allow customers to protect themselves, I am taking my business elsewhere.

Name: Mary Wilson
Comment: Beware of ordering online and going and picking the products up! !!!!! I was going to my food and checking the dates on the products and on the boxes of chicken broth and beef broth someone had taken an ink pen and punctured it and opened yet and Iâ€™m sure it was whoever was going around the store getting my groceries. I cannot believe these workers are doing this. They couldâ€™ve even spit in it as far as I know. Customers beware when you purchase items and go pick them up at the store and make sure that they have not been opened ! When I called customer service to report it she wanted my order number. She said she could not do a refund without the order number. I had to throw seven boxes of chicken and beef broth in the garbage. I family found the order numbers after 15 minutes and was able to get some of my money back. This is ridiculous that customers from Walmart have to go through this. Just please check your bags your boxes and even your cans. Your milk products anything that has easy access. Thanks

Name: Laura J. Costa
Comment: OK. Prices aren't as competitive as other websites. Range is okay. I would shop from them but not without shopping around first.

Name: Kay.C
Comment: I love the low price and the variety of products here. But sometime the queue is very long. My last time shop there, it took me almost 30 mins to make the purchase because people in front of me keep swapping their stuffs in and out to make the best out of their coupon.

Name: soco carranza
Comment: walmart had a such great customer service .. always with a smile and willing to help any time someone needed help 4

Name: William
Comment: I recently moved and got a new house, and doing so I ordered a lot of furniture/appliances and what not from Walmart and amazon. Not a single Walmart order made it on time. About a dozen orders over 6 weeks. Even on the day it was suppose to be delivered it would still say preparing order. Then show up randomly a week or two later. Even tho it said two day shipping when ordered. Thankfully amazon came through and wasnâ€™t late on a single order. Iâ€™ll never order from Walmart again as long as amazon has it in stock even if Walmart is cheaper Iâ€™d rather know where and when my things are gonna be here

Comment: Walmart.com used to be awesome and I was ordering at least twice a week from them since I live in the stix and online shopping is a necessity. The past few orders have arrived leaking or otherwise damaged. While the damaged items were replaced, it is a hassle to have to wait for additional shipping time. Another huge problem is their "next day" delivery. Ordered Friday and order scheduled for Tuesday...then Wednesday. The customer service dept offered 5% off...ummm yeah...2$ off a 40$ order that is 5 days late. Canceled and will be going back to Amazon, eBay, and Target...They might not have next day shipping but I have found they deliver when they say they will and that is important. Sucks because Walmart used to be reliable...Oh well.

Name: Kelly Love
Comment: I just talked to the rudest customer service person I have ever spoken with. I ordered grocery delivery which was missing a few items, but my account page didn't update to it even being delivered, so I was not given a refund for the items not sent. This person kept turning the conversation on me, like I did something wrong. Every time I tried to get clarification, she would interrupt me and would not let me speak, talking down to me like I was a child or something. She would not confirm if she knows the tech people are working on it or even if they know there is an issue. What an A&&hole!!!!!!!

Name: Van Wein
Comment: Waited all day at sat. because it was supposed to arrive and said it had to be signed for. Did not arrive till 11am wed. And still does not show as delivered in email. No knock to let me know it was outside. Not first time i have had difficulty but will be last.

Name: malik malick
Comment: i have recently worked on wall mart its product quality is excellent

Name: Mike Connelly
Comment: The website is a complete joke. They claimed to have 15 and 25 lb dumbbells in stock. When i got there the shelves were empty. The sporting goods register attendant told me they've been out of stock for months.  He also said the website is completely inaccurate on the stock of most items. I ended up driving 30 minutes out of my way to find out that the website is a lie. Aside from that, this store is dirty, items strewn all over with rude employees.  Drive to Springfield to go to a better Walmart!!

Name: Vincent V.
Comment: I love the speed at which you can get in and out of this store. With the flip of a barcode you can whiz inside and grab what you need and exit. No having to wait in lines with incompetent check-out stand clerks. No having to zig zag between aisles of people lost at what they came for helplessly grasping at a piece of paper they scribbled upon with a list of goods they can hardly find in an overly complicated grocery store. Just you. Your speed. No hassle. I hope one day this grows into a larger store with more selection. I'd never shop anywhere else but here if that day came.

Name: Deana M.
Comment: Easy to sign up and easier to shop. You can sign up in-store and it takes less than 5 minutes. However, it is better if you come in earlier if you want certain food items. Otherwise, it'll be out of stock if you shop later in the day. Our hotel was walking distance so it was a great place to get water, snacks, etc. during out trip.

Name: Kirti V.
Comment: Limited choices and not clear what the process is  Also not apparent how you handle food that needs heating  Kind of a crappy customer experience

Name: Nicole Marfino
Comment: Had half an order delivered. Offered a refund on the missing items no refund on any part of the shipping or tax in this order. Originally bought the product on sale. Name: Lb
Comment: if i could give them less then on star i would. I have had multiple dealings of shipping with them. They are the worse shipping out of all the companies. They shouldnt be they area big company. I mean the worse takes weeks to get their stuff and then at that they change the delivery date again to a longer time. Dont order online with them they are the worse. I will not do any business with them online anymore

Name: Nathan Bakken
Comment: Incompetent company that has again wasted my time. Amazon is the online king because folks like Walmart cant get it together. I'll learn my lesson after strike 5-6 and go to walmart in person only when I'm looking for people_of_walmart.com kind of experience.

Name: Txnt
Comment: Terrible customer service. I bought 10 items and only 8 got delivered. So I contacted them and they refunded me for the 2 that never delivered. Later I return 8 of the boxes by fedex drop off, because the packages were big so I didnâ€™t want to return in store. When I looked at my bank statement they only refunded me for 7 items instead of the whole 8â€¦ so basically they stole $38 from me. I would recommend returning in store for a safer bet of getting your full refund.

Name: Sam
Comment: Don't trust walmart, especially when merchandise price is not listed. Yesterday I stopped at walmart to pick up some dog food, but since I was there I picked up a dozen eggs, but it had no price listed. But since I buy same eggs from our local HEB for $3.49, I figured the price would be about that. But when I got home and checked the receipt it was $4.29, that's 23% higher price at Walmart than a small store in our town. Doing business with Walmart is wrong for you and your family. Not again.

Name: Marie
Comment: A couple of weeks ago I ordered from Walmart catalog for three dresses. I had spent quite a bit of money. After a couple of weeks I had not received the items. I called customer service. I was told so many lies One was that they were delivered so wait patiently. The other was that they would refund me my money but I haven't gotten any money yet. Another was my items were delivered and when I go to the website it's still saying that it was delayed but they're saying it's here I'm still waiting for my items. I have not received them or money and I'm very upset. I really am not using the catalog ever to order anything from Walmart anymore because I feel as though it's a big scam and I am the one who have gotten scammed! I've spoke with several customer service reps at Walmart and I've gotten a different story each and every time. Very disappointed.

Name: X O
Comment: If I could give this PIECE OF S*** company ZERO stars I would! The customer service is H O R R I F F I C ! They will lie, leave you on hold hoping you hang up when you call about an issue, they cancel your store delivery order and try to deliver it TWENTY FOUR HOURS LATER?!? Like what?! They drop the ball â€˜accidentallyâ€™ on refunds that are OWED, theyâ€™re a mess. This is what happens when GREED and QUANTITY supersedes QUALITY. Walmart wants all of the money but doesnâ€™t want to put that money into effectively training competent workers and improving the CUSTOMERS experience! Ridiculous! ðŸ¤® Just go to Target!

Name: ted casado
Comment: Only put 1 star because i had too.service is horrible getting refunded are horrible delivery is horrible le AVOID THIS PLACE PLEASE!!!! T E R R I B L E!

Name: Stephanie Cusack
Comment: Walmart sells worthless Chinese-made goods and other artificial crap for the masses, stay away if you have a brain.

Name: shash sweety
Comment: Worst place , they are cheating customers. Ordered bed frame for $360 and they are sending Chair . Neither they are returning my money . They are making me wait all 2 weeks giving stupid $50 gift card .

Name: Tammie Winkler
Comment: I could not be more disappointed in Walmart (again and again). UNBELIEVABLE THAT I CAN PURCHASE A PROTECTION PLAN WITHOUT BEING TOLD THAT IT REQUIRES THE WALMART APP. Walmart provides many items but NOT EVER ANY CUSTOMER SERVICE. I've spent 1/2 day emailing with you and the end result is DO IT YOURSELF SOMEHOW. I may return the TV and Protection Plan and go buy it at Target where they remember what Customer Service means.

Name: James Hoffman
Comment: I purchased an item from Walmart.com using a third party seller ZooScape. Walmart did not assist with the bad transaction. RIPOFF! Be aware that all the items are sold by WEIGHT from ZooScape. I ordered the salted caramel sugar and it was only 15% filled in a normal sized spice bottle. I sent them an email expressing my displeasure and requested a refund, they did agree if I shipped the item back at my expense. I spent $15 including shipping on the order and have to pay for the shipping back for an $8 credit. BE VERY CAREFUL WHEN ORDERING from Walmart and ZooScape. Read the details!

Name: Santhosh Kumar Loganathan
Comment: They don't honor the shipping dates. The customer service is great specifically for price matching.

Name: Corey Valor
Comment: Very easy place to shop at. Had a lot of different things and a bunch of friendly staff.

Name: Melissa Brewer
Comment: I went in to Walmart here in Oklahoma City to get a few items there were several employees that at were wearing masks however they were on there chins. When I spoke to the one of the managers she did not seem that concerned she kept pulling up her mask as well. And to see all Walmart employees wearing different masks and not their store teams colored mask just does not look right.

Name: cheryl pressler
Comment: ZERO A BIG FAT ZERO! 1 IS WAY TO HIGH OF A NUMBER TO GIVE TO THIS WORTHLESS SYSTEM....MY CHILD ORDERED A SANE DAY PICKUP WITH A GIFT CARD AND IT GOT PUT ON A 48HR FRAUD HOLD....WELL 72 HRS LATER NOW A SYSTEM ERROR AND HE HAS TO CANCEL IT THESE PPL AND SYSTEM ARE BEYOND WORTHLESS AND DONT KNOW THEIR BUTT FROM A HOLE IN THE GROUND! WILL NEVER USE THIS SYSTEM AGAIN!

Why the heck would walmart of all places sell such a thing. I have taken a picture of this warning for proof.

Name: Alexandra
Comment: The absolut rudest people on the phone. I don't even understand how this company got so big with such hostile, rude, uneducated people claiming to be "supervisors". Also, please get people who can speak and understand ENGLISH for your customer service reps!!!!

Name: Rich
Comment: DO NOT USE WALMART.COM ! Bad Customer Service! and SCAM! I make 2 purchases at Walmart.com and both had issue with them. First online order was for a car tire, paid online and when I picked it up, found it was wrong size and I asked to return right away but customer service at the store said that I have to contact Walmart.com. I was at the store on the phone with Walmart.com customer service for almost 2 hours with lots of holding and finally they said call back, they did't know why the store was not accept the return. The second order was for a heating element sold by the 3rd party through Walmart.com, they provide a tracking shown that order delivered 7 days before the estimate delivery date but it never delivered, contact customer service and she said carrier scan and marked as delivered 2 days before it actually delivered and asked to call back after 2 days and they will refund if I still not receive it. Call back and they said it is marked as delivered and refuse to refund. Never ever use Walmart.com any more !!!

Name: HGeeTV Sims
Comment: -5ðŸ˜¡Star rating. Phoenix Arizona Walmart on Bethany Home RD and others. I have had many of the workers completely ignore me and some have been out right confrontational. I give respect an patience to everyone all the time, but I have not had the luxury of receiving it in return from most of the employees at these stores. Iâ€™m a walk away kind of person because I enjoy peace. I bought a cake for my daughter it was ugly and it didnâ€™t taste good. I also ordered one online an, on the day of my son birthday he had no cake because the order wasnâ€™t filled. The bathrooms are so filthy Iâ€™d rather pee on myself than to use there facility. Some of the employees are so comfortable with there lackadaisical and mean demeanor to the point where the racism is so obvious you canâ€™t miss it. For me, never ever again!

Name: Sajid
Comment: What a third class customer services they have. I'm facing a issue from 2 month related my payment method. I'm contacting continuously but there is no one who can solve. Even they are saying you can purchase in-store instead of online purchasing. Pathetic services.

Comment: Bought a phone from walmart.com, Third party sold the phone and received defect phone. I tried to return or replace it but they refused to do that. Walmart has worst service & business. Scamming millions pf people. B**S***! :(

Name: L Lavoie
Comment: Walmart order online is the worst. Always wrong. Terrible quality. Done ever ordering from them again. They make Amazon look awesome.

Name: Robbin
Comment: I went to Walmart in Clinton, MS to buy two new Goodyear tires. I purchased the tires for my SUV and had the technicians put the tires on and balance them. I then took my vehicle to have the alignment done. A few months later I went back to Walmart to get an additional tire for the rear so that I can had a regular size as my spare. When I got to the same Walmart Auto Center in Clinton, MS. The technician that went to put on the rear tire asked me where did I get the front tires and he said they put the wrong size tires on my car. They replaced the tires and the tires did not last me a year. These tires I purchased new tires and then on August 18th 2022 I went to get my regular oil change at another place. They lifted my car up in the ramp and showed me the wire exposed on my front tires on the inside of my front tires only, The technician stated my alignment was off and it wore my tires wrong. I had to pay for new tires again and alignment. Do Not Trust Walmart. They are stupid to offer services of any kind on vehicles. There technician can't read numbers, they don't check their work and they don't want to fix any of their errors. I contacted because I don't normally have to buy tires every year but due to the error and stupidity I am out buying tires again. When I contacted them around the 21st of August sent them the receipt they would not take any responsibility. Instead they kept asking me stupid questions like, do I still have the old tires. What would I be doing with the old tires. I was on a road trip and them incompetent people expected me to travel across states with two tires in the back of my SUV. I paid for a warranty on the tires that were put on my vehicle and then they don't HONOR ANYTHING. How ridiculous Into ride around with bad tires in your vehicle. After this experience I wouldn't let Walmart Auto Center anywhere to any one of my vehicles again. Word to the wise check all of Walmarts work they are always trying to over. The technician that found the issue said riding around with the wrong size tire and then switching to the correct size should have gotten another alignment. No one at Walmart told me that. Incompetent and Idiot and I am past pissed. Don't mess with Walmart Auto Center they don't honor their work or back the incompetent employees that they hire.

I would also like to comment on the self check out my store in particular has only 4 check out spots that are not self check. These lines go out into the way and take hours to get through this is not a fault of employee just of company management. Self check is also not accessible for those with certain disabilities such as those that are visually impaired or have mobility issues will no longer be able to shop at your stores.

Comment: TERRIVEL SERVICE OR A FRAUD???Walmart offer the product, you buy, they place your order, charging you credit card and few minutes later they cancel the order and let you know that your money is going to be available JUST in 7 days. They are holding your money. Is this a kind of fraud? Seems to me that it is.

Name: Genesta Humphrey
Comment: I've noticed the recent mention of changing to entirely self-checkout. I hope you are all taking into consideration that some people, such as a disabled person like me, are not able to use self check out, or it may be inconvenient. I have severe anxiety, and self check out not only makes me extremely anxious and feel vulnerable but on some days where I'm extra shakey due to my anxiety, using self check out can be a battle. Please keep this in mind before you truly change to entirely self check out. It's not exactly disability friendly.

We are talking about $700 folks.They also explained that even if that were possible, they deduct another $ 26 for their inability to send someone for the assembly. As far as I am concerned I count their assembly add on as fraud. There is no one to assemble. Now what do I do? Every time I call I get someone from yet another country.

I called second time and the customer service provided different reason, without much explanation. Then they promised to contact me via email and nobody contacted me yet. Well it is a good reason to give a try to better store like Target etc. Good bye walmart.

Name: Edward Torak
Comment: Be VERY VERY careful buying anything at Walmart.com. If you try to return the item you bought to a Walmart store you might not get a refund for your item. If Walmart's computer system is unable to print out a return label for the item you purchased online you are out of luck and will be stuck keeping the item even if the item is defective. This happen to me and now I am stuck with a defective chainsaw. IN FACT YOU MIGHT WANT TO BUY YOUR ITEM AT A DIFFER STORE TO AVOID THIS HAPPENING TO YOU!

Name: Robert Green
Comment: It was ok my order took a little longer than in amazon

Name: Jim Marnell
Comment: I have been on the phone with Walmart all day and in the end, my order was cancelled by them for some unknown reason. I won't bore you with details except to say I was on the phone with Customer Careless, (mis)manager of the Pick-up & DeliveryDept. of the store on South Columbus Blvd, Philadelphia, about six or seven times during the day. And despite assurances the delivery was in progress, each time it did not turn out the way I was promised. I called the store assistant manager, Felix, to complain and was told he would pick up but 50 minutes later he had not. I spoke to employees who said they heard the same complaints as I had over and over with nothing getting done about it. Walmart has turned into a joke. If you look through this site, ratings average one and one half stars. Trust me, there's a reason. Save yourself aggravation and stay as far away as possible. It is a complete nuthouse.

Name: Maria T.
Comment: Very neat!  Get the app, scan your phone upon entry, get yo' sh!t and get out! (Don't worry, they'll email you your receipt to show what you bought, how much they charged you, etc.)  Small selection but basically has everything you really need from a grocery store (beer, gum, chips, sandwiches, cut up fruit, yogurt, frozen meals, bread, premade meals like couscous and pasta, soda, etc.). Items are reasonably priced. Paper bags are provided at no charge in case you forgot your reusable bag.  For a limited time, you can get a free orange, canvas tote with Amazon Go on it. One per person.  Make sure you don't pick up an item and hand it to someone else. You might get charged for this. Always put back what you don't want.  Quite nice for introverts or people in a hurry!

Name: Elizabeth Zuelke
Comment: Back in June I ordered a grill for my husband. I received a message from the supplier that the grill could not be delivered because the last one was damaged. The message said I would be refunded my money. It also said to ignore any tracking info because it had already been entered. At first, Walmart refunded the money. Then they charged me for the grill again and refused to remove the charge. I first went through their customer service line. They did not understand what I tried to tell them so they said I had to talk to my bank. I disputed the charges but over a month later, Walmart sent 9 pages of what they said was documentation that the grill was delivered. This was the tracking info the first message told me to ignore. Now the charges are back even though I sent them a copy of the message I got from them in the first place. It is outrageous. They don't even read their own messages to the customer. I will NEVER order anything else from them again. Buyer beware.

Name: Brooke Burridge
Comment: CHECK YOUR ORDER - Placed a delivery order through Walmart.com for 2 Day or Next Day Delivery. After process my order I found out it had been changed to Pick-up at a Store that is further than my local Walmart store. With disabilities, illness and not being able to drive at this time, the inconvenience of dealing with platitudes (no matter how kindly given,) and requiring me to do additional steps to correct a problem they created, it was too much and I cancelled the order and asked them to refund the purchase.

Now my bank is holding over $500 for three cancelled orders that Walmart still has pending even though I have all the cancelled emails. I'm now told it can take up to 5-7 business days for the credit to be sent to my bank. Even had my bank on the phone with Walmart and my bank told them there has been no credit by Walmart. Name: Alva Henry

Name: michael kim
Comment: Walmart's online delivery might be the most garbage and inconsistent online service I have ever had. Upon ordering an item last week, it has already been delayed FOUR different times in the span of it's initial purchase. Not only that, but Walmart also provides no useful context of what is happening with your order. It will say transit and that it is in your city, but then for me it got delayed TWICE after it said it was in transit in my city. If I could give a negative star, I would. Walmart provides essentially no feedback as to time of arrival, as they seem to just delay as they please, without any explanation why. This delaying process should not be able to occur FOUR times. It just shows how garbage Walmart is in terms of online delivery.

Name: Viplov Singh
Comment: Extremely horrible service. You kept delaying the delivery date at your whims and with no update. Itâ€™s been an absolute worst experience and I would much rather walk through the entire country to get my product than ever use Walmart again. Name: Andrea Kennedy
Comment: I am sending your company an email voicing my displeasure with Walmart making facemasks mandatory to shop in Airdrie & Canada. Since the start of the "pandemic" I continued to support Walmart and complied with guidelines of physical distancing, washing hands, etc. which by the way, is the RECOMMENDED GUIDELINES by health officials. Excessive measures that you have implemented now, has forced people like me to shop elsewhere. I am very disheartened with your decision to cater to panic and the customers that are terrified of this virus. There are 6 people that I personally know that have made the choice of shopping elsewhere and our money and number will be of no consequence to your profit, I felt it was necessary to let you know I am not alone in my frustration and decision. I would like to know how many Walmart employees and/or customers contracted COVID prior to this decision. I have not heard of any cases/closing of a store but that is, of course the big corporations mentality.

Name: Kristin Coon
Comment: DO NOT buy a major appliance from Walmart.com!!! I ordered a dishwasher from Walmart.com. When the order was confirmed, the ship date was over a month away. That was not acceptable, so I cancelled it immediately - the next day. But Walmart said the dishwasher had already shipped and they couldn't cancel. How could it have shipped within 24 hours, but not be scheduled to get to me until a month later?? Spent HOURS on the phone trying to cancel the order, and every time I spoke with someone I had to explain the situation all over again. The process was ridiculous!! Two weeks and several phone calls later, the shipment was cancelled and a credit was issued to my credit card, but the third party vendor Walmart used charged me a 15% restocking fee ($193!). Walmart customer service was always friendly and reassuring when I spent hours on the phone with them, but essentially they did nothing. I am still on the phone trying to recover the restocking fee. Now they are telling me I should have looked closer at the third party vendor fine print, I should have known there would be a restocking fee. I thought I was dealing with Walmart, but now they are saying I am dealing with the third party vendor, who is impossible to contact. I will NEVER buy anything from Walmart.com again!!

Name: eileen samoy
Comment: I HATE YOU WALMART!!!!!! YOUR EMPLOYEES BARKED AND TRIED TO EAT ME AND MY CHILD FOR NO REASON WE DIDNT EVEN DO ANYTHING AT ALL HOW COULD YOU WALMART?!?! I HAD TO GET MY TAZER AND SHOVE IT UP THEIR ASSES SO THEY COULD STOP!!!! I AM NEVER GOING BACK AGAIN!!!ðŸ˜¾ðŸ˜¾ðŸ˜¾ðŸ˜¾ FROM LINDA

Name: Danica S.
Comment: came here in opening day and it was busy! Thankfully there were employees prepping people and explaining the process before entering the store. I was shocked with the variety of pre made food selection. There was a small area for medicinal items, and dinner kits to take home for $20. Most of us felt a little awkward walking out with our items, but recieved Amazon receipts immediately after leaving the store. Swipe for the option to return or report a problem. We were impressed with how quickly we received a reply to our questions. Well done Amazon, WELL DONE!

Name: Chris N.
Comment: This place is amazing. You can walk in and get what you need without the hassle of long checkout lanes or knowing where everything is because of how small the store is. The employees are very polite and professional. They will even go out of their way to help you find what you need.

Name: Andy C.
Comment: Dimitri, one of the employees, was so friendly and helpful to us. He even mentioned to us that Amazon had a newer store down the street similar to Target. He provided tons more information about Amazon Go and the concept behind it. We will be back when we're in Seattle!

Name: Bees
Comment: I've been using Walmart.com delivery service for several years, but the last few months something has changed with the way they are shipping the product which makes absolutely no sense! They have been dividing my orders and having delivery people from other companies drop off single items, IE. I had a delivery of (1) can of pumpkin puree which costs $2.08 dropped at my doorstep instead of being included with the rest of my orders? I honestly can't see how this can be cost effective for Walmart? This has happened on numerous occasions even after I have sent them emails. I'm not sure if they are trying to keep up with Amazon, but delivering 6 items of an order on 4-5 different days is just plain stupid!

Name: Tina VanWagenen
Comment: I was in Walmart in Cortland 08/30/21. Since there were only two checkouts open and the lines were very long I chose to go to the self check out area. The "watcher" was staring at me, which made me feel uncomfortable. I was purchasing school supplies. When I put the 5 subject notebook in the bag she came right over and said "how many notebooks are you putting in your bag". I said one and had to lift it out the bag to prove to her I was not steeling. If you don't trust people to cash themselves out, HIRE SOME CASHIERS !!! I WILL NOT RETURN TO THE STORE AFTER BEING MADE TO FEEL LIKE A THIEF !!!

Name: Dave
Comment: Ordered tires off the website only to have them canceled because the order didn't pass some "security check."I call customer service and end up with some non english speaking zipper head who can't tell me why. All they cqn do is read some canned blah blah blah response over and over. So Walmarts competitor made a $ 600 sale off of me the next day

Name: Rene Harris
Comment: When my husband placed an online order. It was confirmed they took the money from my husband's account and then turned around and sold our order and canceled our order. Thats crappie.

Name: Carri Mortenson
Comment: I pay for the Walmart + premium membership. I placed an order yesterday for delivery. Usually don't have this big of a problem. I never got the order last night. Called and was told I would get an email today to select a time to receive my order. That never happened. Called this afternoon and was told the order would be here between 6-7 yet no notification of the change was ever received. I called again tonight and was told that the store hadn't assigned a driver and wouldn't. The only option I had was to wait and see if it comes, or cancel. The customer service I received was so horrible that I not only canceled the order but I also canceled the Walmart + premium membership. I usually place 2-4 orders a week. No more! I guess I will pay a little more to get quality service from Instacart or Amazon. NEVER AGAIN!

Name: VIRGINIA WALKER
Comment: My Walmart just started grocery pick up and it is great.

Name: Babar
Comment: I bought a vacuum couple years ago and it stopped working after 3 months and I took it to the Walmart and they said itâ€™s under the companyâ€™s warranty and just call them, So I called the company and they have very rude and disrespectful people there calling them was a no help at all, so I waited for my Walmart warranty to work so I can contact them but they were no help as well with the return. I talked to them for hours on the phone and they transferred my calls to at 4 different people and they said Iâ€™ve to donate it and then email the receipt for a return, but I didnâ€™t have time to go donate so I got an email saying that my thing has expired and to renew it Iâ€™ve to call them and went through all the process of transferring and at the end they just told me that it is expired and there no way to return it. So basically both my warrantyâ€™s were not useful at all and I would not recommend anyone to buy a vacuum or anything else that might stop working in the future.

Name: Anisha
Comment: So being cheapðŸ˜, i decided to pick up some black beans from Walmart instead of getting them from publix or in a bag. I guess because I've never had a issue with can goods, it didn't seem like i was embarking on a horrible journey into the unknown. Imagine yourself, throwing some apple smoked bacon in the pot with some onions, seasons, and black beans. Letting that thang simmer with just a touch of butter, ðŸ¤¤ðŸ˜‹ mmm yesssss honey! Imagine taking a big spoon of those black beans and spreading them over some jasmine rice. I had grilled some ribs but i was only feeling the beans and rice. Imagine taking a big bite of those black beans and chewing and chewing and ouch! What's that?? That can't be a bone?! Now imagine back tracking what you cooked, how you cooked it and realizing on your third bite that you didn't put anything but BONELESS bacon in the black beans! Oh God take the wheel!!! Now imagine ALL the things you could be eating BESIDES black beans! Tell me how in the hellovit, did Walmart just package up a unauthorized extra ingredient in my black beans????? And then to top it off, instead of sending me a$50/$100 gift card to buy some groceries to replace my time, food and stomachðŸ¤¢ðŸ¤®(threw up multiple times), they insult me with a WHOPPING $5 dollarsðŸ¥ºgift card to spend at Walmart, the money I spent on the 4 pack minus tax! Imagine the trauma im experiencing, just knowing some rodent was seasoned up, simmered, baconed up and in my mouth. . . .ðŸ¤¢. . . ðŸ¤®sorry a throw up break. . . Walmart yall gotta do better! Make me feel like y'all was sorry, I have vowed to spend the extra 0.12 cents at Publix, my sister told me, when you pay for quality you get better but when you pay for cheapness you get RATS!!!! Ugh (don't laugh too hard at my pain)ðŸ¤¢ðŸ¤®ðŸ¥ºðŸ™4Me

Name: Dee
Comment: This is about the photo center. I ordered photos one hour service it took three days and put in a complaint. About two months later I ordered photos to be mailed to me that they lost in shipping them delivered four weeks later. Walmart is the worst for photos ordering for pick up and deliver. Pictures of your two year old will show up when the child is 16!!! They ayte the worst for pick up at the store as well for photos and merchandise. You check in and stand there for hours waiting for no one to come help you. Will never order photos again or merchandise to be picked up.

Name: Robert Grendahl
Comment: On 9-6-20 I put a delivery order in for groceries to be delivered. I pressed place order and it deducted the money from my account and went back to the shopping cart. Didnt get a confirmation or anything. Called after a couple hours to see if they knew what was going on, they told me there was a glitch in their system and the money would be back in a couple hours. Called back after about 6 hours and tallked to someone else, he told me it could take up to 3 days for it to go back into my account. It is now 7 days later and they still havent refunded my money. Be aware of the delivery...

Name: Goober s
Comment: Multiple signs out front including a huge one clearly state that masks are required. They even have someone stationed inside the door for the ostensible purpose of enforcing the rule. When I complained about the 1/3 of customers and roughly 20% of employees not following the rule, I was told by the guard that she had been instructed to not enforce the companyâ€™s rule. When I told her to take the signage down, she told me that decision rested elsewhere. In other words, the store manager is too ignorant or too lazy to look at any of the dozens of cameras in their store to see what is happening or they have the authority to overrule company policy with impunity. Walmart does not care if customers and employees that are too stupid or belligerent to understand that masks are not for their benefit but they are intended for the life safety of those they encounter in the store. Walmart - enforce your policies or take the signs down. Based on this experience, I do not feel safe in this store and would advise anyone with any concern about COVID to stay out of this place.

Name: Ursula Glissmann
Comment: Walmart doesn't get it. Website won't function correctly. Shipping is terrible. Broken up in many deliveries. Charges to my card broken up too. Groceries out of stock. Then they keep asking me too tip when I already have tipped. Etc, etc.

Name: Joy Pilcher
Comment: I went to Calhoun GA Walmart this morning. Mask are mandatory. Nobody cares. They have only 1 door open and a health ambassador close to the door. About half the people in there didn't have mask and some employees didn't have them on correctly. Too many people in the store and no one followed the aisle directions. Why pay the extra staff if nothing is going to be done?

Name: Richard Lincoln
Comment: It took 6 months for them to complete my order. The items I ordered came in different packages. I never received any correspondence from them. There tracking system was not used friendly.

Name: George Gegeshidze
Comment: Bought 4 tires in a single order got charged 205$ next day Iâ€™m receiving an notification on my phone that 153$ was authorized to Walmart I checked order details turned out they have changed the quantity of tires from 4 to 3 then I tried to cancel the order but it canceled only one Didnâ€™t cancel all of the tires I called customer service they told me it was entirely my fault and they wouldnâ€™t change anything so Iâ€™m getting only three tire for decoration . The Worst experience ever!

Name: Randi Rae
Comment: Placed an order on 9/10 and it was supposed to arrive 9/12. Fedex tracking shows they had not shipped it yet, only created the shipping label. Opened a chat with them online to find out where it was. Ivan was completely useless. He checked the same tracking link I checked and said it had shipped. I asked to be bumped up to a manager or higher support tier. He refused. I understand that delays are common with Covid. I only asked to find out where my package was and instead I got a frustrating run-around from someone who wasn't really a customer service agent.

Name: Kerr
Comment: I gave it a 1 because my shipment came in 2 deliveries. The first, the delivery person rang door bell as well as called to inform me that the package was there. The 2 delivery came at the time of a storm outside, NO DOORBELL NO CALL NO EMAIL!!! I had no idea, til I left for work in the AM that it was sitting on the porch, not even left in the covered part. Soak everthing was wet.

Name: Stephanie Harrison
Comment: The "new" website is horrific! Seriously, horrific. Mixing Pickup AND .com is a disaster. Having to filter for Pickup Only after every. single. search is infuriating. I click on the item I want, and it shoves it in the "shipping" cart if I forget to filter. I DON'T WANT STUFF SHIPPED. Seriously, have someone who actually SHOPS THE SITE make the site!

Name: Mary Carter
Comment: The new website is terrible. I canâ€™t navigate to pickup like I use to be able to. Now itâ€™s a hybrid of grocery and .com stuff. And I have to either scroll through it all or filter every single item I search for. No thank you!!!!  And letâ€™s not even talk about their 1-800 customer service. They were zero help. They knew nothing about the website. They wouldnâ€™t even ATTEMPT to help me navigate it. I talked to two people before I completely gave up and called a manager at my local store. The manager at least attempted to help me.  Walmart! Get it together! I find myself shopping there less and less.

Name: A-T
Comment: Website new design 100% sucks. Hard to find items and most items are out of stock for some reason that are actually sold by Walmart in store. BIGGEST PROBLEM is the fact my saved items and shopping cart full of items I planned to buy days later is now gone. I can't even remember everything I had in my shopping cart or saved items. Trying to find the items is a headache. Especially since I researched some items before adding them to my cart/saved items. Walmart is very deceptive, acting like your shopping cart disappeared and saved items missing now is no big deal. No warning, of the features of saved items and shopping cart items gone. I am 100% pissed off for wasting my time on Walmart.com! Keep in mind I usually purchase from Walmart.com by weekly. Yeah that's over with.

Name: Rebecca Q.
Comment: New website threw me for a loop. Less available items than before, and more scammer companies! Beware. The companies that have an LLC are delayed for me, so I'm assuming that these will not arrive at all. Update on this site did not improve it at all. Just look at all the unhappy reviews

Name: Melissa Thigpen

Name: Jason
Comment: I am going to give this Walmart 4 stars because I love going to Walmart but it is far from home. The credit card gave me money off my order which was nice but took very long

Name: Sally
Comment: I have never been one to like Walmart, however, I see that Walmart.com is giving Amazon a run for their money. I have been ordering from Amazon for years but have been becoming more and more disenchanted with them. Tried Walmart.com and found their prices to be very competitive and most of their shipping has been free. Always very fast turn around time. I am now more often ordering from Walmart. Fast, efficient, well priced and good service/support. Very happy

Name: Laura
Comment: Easy and fast... thank you!

Name: Clarence Scott
Comment: The last few orders I made have taken forever to get to my place, for some reason they didn't get the quick shipping for free.

Name: Doreen
Comment: Everyone said "order online, it's so easy, no hassle" well I guess they did not mean walmart. My order was due on Thursday, part of it (4 of 13 pieces) arrived and 3 of the 4 bottles of soft cleanser (liquid ) had open caps. The inside of the box and contents were covered in liquid cleanser. I was also informed that the rest of my order was returned to Walmart because it was damaged. Emailed customer service and their response was " thank your your feedback." After numerous emails back and forth I was told that my order was being prepared for shipping and would arrive next Wednesday. If walmart has an IQ test on their application than they must hire the ones that fail. I will NEVER order from Walmart.com again.it is not easy and not hassle free. I will glady carry the heavy items and trade my headache for body pain.

Name: Eric Sutton
Comment: I didnâ€™t know Walmart was controlled by liberals! Any business that encourages any type of gun control will NOT get my business!

They make you do all the work instead of retrieving information that is already in your system, and then they ask you irrelevant questions from their discussion bank which they plug in without taking the time to read your comments. I will not order from Walmart again.

Name: Dawn Parent
Comment: I went to Walmart to buy a $500 gift card to pay for a processing fee for a grant I was supposedly approved for. Well I did ask a lot of questions and felt comfortable with this particular company who was referred to me through Facebook Messenger. Well when I went to Walmart the lady at the counter would not sell me the card because she felt this was a scam. She also gave me a card with the governments number for scams. I found out that it was a scam and my friend was "catfished"! Thank you Walmart, you saved me $500!

Name: Joeseph
Comment: There kind of good they dont treat there workers how there supposed to be treated but they also need to keep up with there supplies

Name: G Skier
Comment: I put on my first order with Walmart.com because it had an item was about half the price I found in other websites. Waited a week for it and on the delivery date got an email from Walmart saying that the order was canceled. When I called customer service they transfered me to the customer retention department. The lady told me there was nothing she can do and if I wanted the item it would be twice the price and they would not price match and I had to wait another week. She obviously didn't care and the customer retention was bull** because she didn't even try. Never again will I place an order with wallmart.com.

Name: Helen Mark
Comment: I am no longer spending my money at walmart, because company policy states that you support a terror organization and not only support but charge every customer a BLM tax. This will be the demise of Walmart and Sam Walton is turning over in his grave.. SHAME on YOU!!!

Name: G S.
Comment: Fun experience!  I had the APP ready on my device to scan in to enter the store.  Had a great time walking around looking at the products.  I picked up 3 items off the shelves and placed in my reusable shopping bag.  Then I simply walked out of the store.  It felt weird to just walk out.  I opened the APP and magically the receipt for the 3 items was there.  Cool concept - no check out, it's fast and convenient.  I would go here often if I lived close by.  The store itself reminds me of a Whole Foods 7 Eleven.

Name: Cheryl
Comment: Lost my nutrition section! Quantities are to large. I hate your new app!

Name: Janine Viktora
Comment: I just wanted to say I had the best experience at your Walmart Vision Center at the store in Vadnais Heights. I went in and had a great experience shopping for glasses. Your staff Donna and Ruthanna helped me choose glasses that look great and feel wonderful. I also want to give the manager Chishonna a big shout out. She promotes great customer service and makes each customer feel special. Janine V.

Name: Rick L
Comment: Totally confusing and extremely hard to find grocery items. Removed all my favorites completely

Name: Tim Schwent
Comment: Walmart uses Capital One to issue their Walmart Masstercard. Though we had credit ratings of 815 to 820 (until after this fiasco) I (the 815 credit rating) was denied the best rewards card and although I refused to take the lower rewards card I was charged a "hard inquiry". We then applied under my wife's name and apparently her cards with Macys, Kohls, Pennys etc did get her the best rewards BUT with only a $300 credit line) We both have a 100% pay on time rating and no derogatory remarks and 2 or less hard inquiries before Capital One. We even have another Capital One credit card with a $26,000 credit limit. Walmart needs to wake up and get a new card handler. We spend over $10,000 with Walmart but it looks like Target will get a new customer.

Name: Deborah Vanlue
Comment: Walmart changed its app I can no longer voice text the groceries I have to type in every word it's very time consuming for me. Word up dumbass Walmart you screwed it up

Name: B Higbee
Comment: I hate this new app it is so confusing. Please go back to how it was this is terrible!

Name: Sandy Felton
Comment: I got really excellent service here today. It is nice to have a company that is consistent in its return policy.

Name: Walmart Shopper
Comment: WTH Walmart! What did you do with the Grocery Website. Without WARNING! The Walmart Grocery interface is gone and has been replaced by Walmart.com. My shopping list is gone. The convenient friendly interface page is gone. The checkout and scheduling my delivery date page is gone. The add and update features on the Grocery Website are gone. PERISHIABLE GROCERY DELIVERY AND MERCHANDISE DELIVERY ARE NOT THE SAME THING! GET YOU ACT TOGETHER!

Name: Stacey Simmons
Comment: Where to begin. Order was promised to be delivered every day until it was a week late. Finally received the order and more than half of the cans were dented. Like they took all the dented cans off a shelf and shipped it to me. Now, trying to return it. They sent me a shipping tag, attached to box and put outside Monday morning as instructed. Box was not picked up on Monday. Put out again Tues and contacted Walmart. After all of this, I am told the box will be picked up Wednesday. Told them I am not bringing the box in and out until they finally get it picked up. Also was promised credit was processed on Friday. Have not seen that either. Done with Walmart. Tired of excuses for every single order being delivered late - even items ordered with 2-day delivery!!!

Name: Wanda Muterspaugh
Comment: Walmart app now mixes in store and online orders. Completely deleted my shopping cart for online Christmas presents that I have saved. The website is such a mess to look up an item. Who has all day to figure out a list? That should be simple and SMOOTH. I hate this!!! Do you all actually shop on Walmart your self? If you did you would know what a mess this is.

Name: Peggy
Comment: I will no longer use Walmart grocery pickup until the website becomes more user friendly. I refuse to try to sit and filter and falter through your website just to get an order ready to send. Why make it harder on your customers in a time when life is already hard?!

Where's my cut of their salary then?..so either drop prices as a discount for doing your job, or make the people getting Paid actually DO their job. and if I'm lucky enough to get a cashier, because we bring our own bags now, they rush you along as we bag our items, you're standing there just watching me, how about help out! If you want me to bag everything, wait patiently until I AM done! Do Better! Looking for alternatives to giving this store any more of my money.

Name: Kathie Allen
Comment: Horrible experience ! They mailed my product to a wrong address (they used a 3rd party delivery group) !! After receiving an email that my monitors (3) were delivered . I called Walmart to let them know I did not receive my product . A customer representative stated that the products were delivered . When I asked what address , they could not tell me & that were delivered to parcel box ( metal stand w/ several mail boxes ???) when I explained that there was no such thing in my neighborhood , they blew me off . All they would tell me is that according to their store policy , since on their side they were told the product was delivered, their would be no replacement or refund !! Really . I asked to speak to a supervisor & she told me she was it . So of course I paid for 3 PC Monitors and never received them . I even tried contacting corporate and once again received the run around ! I would definitely not recommend Walmart.com !!!!!!!

Comment: One the worst Walmart locations ever! Refused to take my online return because â€œthe return barcode/link had been expiredâ€?! I called more than 3 times, they were nice-sounding every time, but never emailed me the return shipping label, without which I could not make the return through mail. Lesson learned, truth approved, itâ€™s an unreliable retailer, 100% no more shopping at Walmart.

Comment: I ordered a bath fan from their website solely because their web page clearly states free 2 day shipping, but when I received order confirmation, it was nearly a week. I contacted support and they stated that 2 day shipping does not apply to 3rd party vendors, but the web page with the item clearly states "Free 2-day shipping". They were unwilling to make this right, the web page states this, and is clearly deceptive. I won't make the mistake of shopping there again!

Name: Susannah Bautista
Comment: Used to be good (briefly) but now it's a joke. And when I say that, I'm referring to the store pickup option. The rest of the website is glitchy garbage with bad search filtering. Don't even get me started on the app (can anyone find the "order history" button?). But the store pickup... A few years ago, it used to be that you could order something on the way to Walmart and it would be ready to pick up by the time you got there. Now days, the website will say it's available today... But then you place your order and all of a sudden, it'll be ready 2 weeks from now! For items that are "in stock". And here's the kicker, it was never in stock in the first place. After the team goes looking for the item and it ends up not being on the shelf (wow, shocker, who could have known?) they then delay your order. No one is keeping track of stock. And this is the same run around for all 3 Walmarts in my area. You can tell that they've invested in making this service look cool, but they really are having an issue with execution.

Name: Robin may
Comment: Walmart employees lied in the store web site had false information and customer service just sit there reading off cards not speaking to me just reading off cards.they were quick enough to take my money but refused to refund it. Then customer service tried to tell me 5 different people came in and brought the same battery at the same time

Name: customer
Comment: There are many things that are not up to my standards of how a business, especially a retail store, that definitely need to be addressed like how many registers are open during peak hours.
