Comment: You know something I wouldnâ€™t even give Walmart not even a one star because I will tell you this I have proof ladies and gentlemen that Walmart is a big sham and they are ripoffs and they donâ€™t treat their customers fairly I hate Walmart with a passion more than youâ€™ll ever know and trust me I will make it my mission for now on to convince other people to go somewhere else besides Walmart So Walmart can go suck an egg and trust me I will present proof to everyone do not go to Walmart trust me

Name: Ash0518
Comment: Cool for the experience - food overpriced I read about it in the internet that amazon opend it first grocery store ,first thing you need to do when you get there to do download an app called (amazon go) and then scan the bar. Code from the app so you enter the store and pick up anything you want from food , fruits , sodas and then they will charge you with everything you choose and charge it on the card that you using in amazon.com ..amazing experience..

Name: Mimi
Comment: This is my follow-up review from the one left yesterday. I tried adding some items to my grocery list for pick-up tomorrow. It was complicated, not as straight forward as before. I clicked on the link in the email that confirmed my order, it took me to my order, I added an item, and then it showed pick up in a town I never heard of in a State far far away!! I tried again, same thing. Also extremely annoying when you find that items will be shipped (and charged!), when all I tried to do was to add items for pick-up, after even having set a pickup time and date. Had to delete the items, go back and search again, and watch very carefully that it was available to pickup. Didn't use to have to do that. What a mess. That has to change. They HAVE to go back to the previous version of grocery.walmart.com site. This new one just isn't working. I'll shop elsewhere until fixed. Way too much frustration.

Name: On Line
Comment: Combining the online shipping with grocery pick up was, bar-none, the WORST idea ever - not sure whi should be fired first, the person who suggested it or the manager who ultimately approved the disaster.... Go back to the separate checkouts!!!!!!

Name: Walmart Grocery Customer
Comment: Good grief, did Walmart have a 5-year-old design this new "improved" website? What a mess! Nothing logical, my cart disappears whenever I click on the main page, it takes 3x as long to get an order together as it did on the old site. Stop making changes just for the sake of making changes!

Name: pearl
Comment: if i could give zero stars i would! why did you change the grocery website!? this new website is absolute garbage! just said to husband not shopping here anymore! $350 a week on curbside pickup no more! favorites are all gone! can't add anything unless you choose pickup for every item? can't find single chocolate turtles! im so mad! this is complete bs!

Name: Deborah
Comment: This app is so confusing can not use, You have lost a customer because you fix things that donâ€™t need fix. Think of us seniors when designed a app. I have been loyal customer for years and the virus started I was happy to pick up groceries, I am a senior at risk Now I have to stop ordering groceries because new app to confusing for me to use

Name: Steve
Comment: This new grocery site is a complete mess while the old site was so simple and easy to use.  Absolutely nothing works as it should, or used to, and your phone service, called them twice today, is completely worthless.  I've been trying to add items to my grocery order all day and keep getting this message "Sorry, your payment method could not be authorized for an additional amount. Please start a new order to purchase these items." So, in total frustration, I started a new order, imagine my surprise when I received this message, "Sorry, your payment method could not be authorized for an additional amount. Please start a new order to purchase these items."  Chase Bank says my card is fine and it's a Walmart issue. What a shock.  Plus my hundreds of 'Favorites', which took over a year to accumulate, are all gone! Fire the overpaid suits who came up with the absolutely terrible idea of a new site with a unified Grocery/Wamart.com cart and bring the old site back.  Are you getting out of the 'selling stuff' business? Sure seems like you've lost interest! I know I'm starting to.

Name: Marla Devian
Comment: New update is AWFUL!!!! So confusing you canâ€™t see which items have delivery free and reviews you have to go to each item to be able to see the reviews why you guys making it so complicated!!!

Name: Resa Yelek
Comment: The new web page is horrible. Once I finally figured out how the cart system worked, mt cart items wouldn't load and the whole list disappeared. I can't get it to load my list. 3 calls to customer service were a waste of time. Going to lose me on this one. Go back to the old web page style. Are you paying any attention to this executives?

Name: Jana Mayo
Comment: What a cluster blunder on the app!! Itâ€™s like reading a library just to accomplish a simple task! I so love using the old app and have my grocery items separate from my hardline stuff. I use to recommend using this app and showed many how easy it was - not anymore! I so wish I could get paid for doing such an unfortunate mistake.

Name: Catherine Dolbinski
Comment: This is regarding an employee working in customer service (I believe he was a manager because he'd assigned a couple employees their next tasks) at the Evergreen, Colorado Walmart. I rarely have experienced such a professional, kind employee at your stores. I believe his name is "David." I just wanted to pass along a commendation re. him. He is a great representative of this store. Please consider moving him upwards and onwards.

Name: Sarah Keith
Comment: The changes to the app/website are terrible. They have taken what used to be an easy to use system to something terribly confusing!! It was so much easier when you had 2 separate carts...one for shipping and one for pickup. I do not want to have to change the filter to pickup every time I search for something. Then, when looking at my cart, some items have changed back to shipping again!! What a pain! Guess I will go back to Kroger pickup!! Their app and website are very easy to use!!

Name: Anahit Gasparyan
Comment: Very non responsible and non professional company with non professional customer service. 3 days ago received email that my order is delivered---but not, spoke w/customer service....Yesterday received again email that my 2 nd item delivered---wrong. Spoke with customer service. Getting very stupid answers. If driver can not deliver or do his job then why is he working. Im gonna call and report this as FRAUD. All my neighborhood have same problems and always ......

Name: Sharron Doyle
Comment: Normally I would have given Walmart a 5 star but someone else has my package. I received a notification with the tracking number that my package was delivered. I went outside and it was nowhere to be found. I called FedEx and found out that Wal-Mart put the wrong address on my package. So now somebody has a free case of Kidney Beans.

Name: Karen Campbell
Comment: Total Fail! 1000% agree with all other reviewers. For grocery pickup customers, the latest update to the website is awful. Needlessly confusing. Have to set the filter for every single search to show only what's available at the store. Added items to my pickup order and the "available to ship" items defaulted to shipped. Had to switch them to "pickup". Why?  This used to be a godsend for my elderly dad - he could easily order and pick up groceries without worrying about Covid exposure. He gave up on the new website because it was so confusing. Too hard for him to change his shipped items into pickup items. He went into his local Walmart store instead - frustrating him again because he didn't know where everything was and left without getting everything he needed. He said he would never go back and we're looking at an alternative grocery pickup/delivery solution for him.  Walmart, you're losing customers with this one. Give us a way to set our preferences or roll back the recent changes!

Name: Jonathan
Comment: Bought local SIM for my phone at Spartanburg. The electric goods manager could not have been more helpful in getting the SIM activated, I am very grateful to him for getting it sorted, and all the while he continued to serve. True professional.

Name: AM
Comment: The new update is awful. The layout is horrific. If I'm trying to order groceries, I want to be able to only look at items they have in the store, not what is available for shipping and what is available for 3-day pickup. In order to see what is available today, you have to select the pickup box from a dropdown menu for every item you look up to add to your order. If your Ibotta is linked, it overlaps information on the website to where you can't see the price. There wasn't anything wrong with the original Walmart grocery app when they first started offering pickup. I prefer it over both updates they have done so far. I plan to use another store's pickup service until this is fixed.

Name: Judy Slosar
Comment: Agree with All the other reviewers. The upgrade is awful. Not user-friendly and takes way too much time to order. Tried to look at a product, pressed options and a ridiculous sized picture popped up. Iâ€™m done and off to Amazon.

Name: NT
Comment: New update is too confusing between pickup/delivery/curbside -- all favorited items for reorder have disappeared. Not user friendly at all and needs to be changed back to a separate experience for curbside pickup. When I search for fabric softener to pick up I don't want to see third party shipping options... Serious fail.

Name: Lori Hartsell
Comment: The new app is awful I have used Walmart for years but Iâ€™m going to Amazon now. I searched the shoes I like and used ones came up as an option??? If I want used shoes Iâ€™ll go thrifting. I hate it so confusing why change something that was so easy and efficient? Bye Walmart

Name: Amber Hankins
Comment: I refuse to go here anymore!!! They decided it was best to take away real cashiers and put in self checkout lanes every where. Iâ€™m a mother who prefers to do my shopping later at night when I donâ€™t have to bring my kids. But I find that incredibly difficult to do at least at Walmart now. I usually have a completely full cart of groceries and now since I have to usually use the self checkout I now have to unload, scan my own stuff, bag it, and then try to maneuver all my stuff into a stacked pile or place my bagged groceries on the floor until my cart is empty because I have no where to put them. On top of that I have someone that just watches me struggle with everything and watches me like Iâ€™m some thief or something. I even had something one time that didnâ€™t have a barcode label or price tag and I asked if the item could be looked up or someone could get me a price for it. The lady told me that they canâ€™t do that and that I would have to go back to where it was and bring up another one that has the price on it. I told her that this item was literally on the opposite side of the store and asked if there was anyway customer service would be able to find out since it was right by us. She said no they wouldnâ€™t know either. Needless to say I didnâ€™t buy the item. This store does not care about their customers or the service their customers receive. Itâ€™s all about the money and how much they are making. I would HIGHLY recommend people spend their money at local small businesses. Oh yeah and how could I forget that Walmart Billionaire Christy Walton is among the biggest donors to anti-Trump Republican group The Lincoln Project. The groupâ€™s website states Donald Trump and his supporters present â€œa clear and present danger to the Constitution and our Republic.â€ I would bet that those â€œsupportersâ€ that you think are a clear and present danger also support your billion dollar company.

Name: Steve Trank
Comment: I want to make sure that the Walmart e-commerce team know of my dissatisfaction and frustration. I ordered from Walmart instead of Amazon because the item was $5 cheaper and would arrive earlier according to the website. Price was good but delivery is delayed! I will not be ordering anything that is time critical from Walmart again. Amazon is much more dependable!!!!

Name: Robert
Comment: Don't pay any attention to the prices and availability shown on your local Walmart website as they won't honor any price differences from what they have at the store. I drove over 20 miles just to buy some fertilizer listed at $14.62. When I purchased it, it rang up $18.88, I showed the cashier the website listing and he said, "we are not allowed to honor "our" prices listed on the website per the instructions of our manager". I told him the price shown on the website was the only reason we came to purchase the fertilizer. The cashier said, "sorry". So...if they won't honor their own website prices, I won't be going back.

Name: Kim Q
Comment: I would give Walmart NEGATIVE STARS if I could. If I never had to deal with Walmart again, I would be elated. I placed an online order. When the product was received I realized I could not use it. I initiated a return online. I received a bar code and instructions to take the item back to any store, have the bar code scanned and that I would receive a refund within 3 hours (that is the text on the return information). I sent my son to the store using gas, my son waited in line for who knows how long only to be told, the item was already in the system as returned and they could not do anything about the return. When he returned home with the products I called the store waited approx 20 minutes (the call never answered) I was disconnected. Called back waited approximately another 15 minutes, the call was answered by someone on the floor and after explaining, I was transferred to customer service. After a few minutes the call was picked up and once again I explained the situation. I was advised she was going to look into it, I was placed on hold, the lady NEVER came back to the phone and then after holding another 10 minutes or so, the phone was disconnected. I tried one more time, placed the call to one store on one phone and to the other store on another phone. After about 10 minutes the first store answered, this time it was another lady. I explained the situation again and the lady said hold on I need to transfer you to Michelle (the first lady who put me on hold and did not return). At this point in time my blood was already boiling. It took me another hour and half or more, several more calls and several more people I had to explain the situation to before I even got someone in a foreign country who could apparently hear how aggravated I was and finally did something constructive.  Customers of Walmart should not have to go through this in order to return something. Walmart is TOO big and the SERVICE is non existent. It is very unfortunate that as angry and as stressed as I am do to all of this I will most likely have to deal with Walmart again. Or maybe I will just use AMAZON (I would rather not use Amazon solely either, they are also too big) for everything and never deal with WALMART again. Yes, I think I hit that nail on the head. I hope anyone suffering this type of aggravation with Walmart will do the same. Walmart has alienated this customer once too many times.

Name: Sandy
Comment: The Pharmacy Account on the Walmart site needs some help.

Name: Federik
Comment: Ordered 10 pairs is solar glasses. 3 days before ellipse they sent e-mail saying thet do noto guarantee they will protect my eyes! Now everyone is sole out.

Name: Lily
Comment: I used to love shopping on Walmart.com, especially when I received my order in just 2 days. Lately, however, their delivery service has been completely unreliable. It used to take 2 days to receive now takes 4 days or more and I order the same items consistently! Even worse, Walmart is now using a new delivery service, Lasership, and they are absolutely terrible!! Every single time my items are shipped through this company I NEVER receive my item, NEVER! When I track the order through Lasership the excuse I receive is either that the package was not receive for shipping by Walmart, even though I received a shipping confirmation from Walmart, or the package was lost in transit. Mind you, I NEVER receive notification that the package was lost. The status still shows as the package is in transit. Recently I ordered the same box of baby wipes I have ordered for over a year. Received an order confirmation, received a shipment notification for 2 day delivery. 1 week later and no package!! Call Walmart, customer service excuse, "the item was lost in transit." AGAIN, why wasn't I notified. They placed a replacement order and 3 days later the package was delivered HOWEVER I never received the package. So WHO was it delivered to??? I called Walmart yet again and received a credit. No apology - just "what would you like me to do?" What do you mean!? I would like to receive the items I pay for! This is it for me. I am NEVER ordering from Walmart again. Done!

Name: Maria Cotto
Comment: they used to be customer first kind of place, but now they are so NOT. Do NOT buy an inflatable mattress, they will make up something how it is against the law to return per health code, the manager in Oklahoma at one of their many stores made up this story and said it to me, when the mattress was defective and all I wanted was a refund or exchange for a new one. The fact they openly lied to my face is crazy, looked it up online, many people have this same thing happen and have posted about it online, when you look up the law in Oklahoma or the USA, IT DOES NOT EXIST.

Name: BeeJay
Comment: I went to Walmart on Beach Blvd for a glucose meter battery at the jewelry counter. I ask a lady from the scan your items lane to page the jewelry personnel.  Vivian, "stated she was at lunch and to come back at 2:00 PM." I told the lady at the scan lane what Vivian said to me and how rude she was. I asked for a manager and I was told to go to the customer service desk.  The lady from the scan lane helped me find the battery I needed.  I asked for the manager at the front entrance. I explained to the manager how rude Vivian was and she lacked customer service.  This compliant is for Vivian, the jewelry counter manager. Vivian is a short woman with gray long hair.  Thank you.

Name: Kathy Cooper
Comment: The only reason they are even getting 2 stars is because the store manager was very helpful. I placed an order for first time ever for grocery pick up. Oooooh. Myyyyy!!!!!!! Never again. Did I say never ever again!?!?! Well first of all tried calling store because confusing billing with wrong name so called store manager. The first person at the pick up area sent me to service desk, who sent me to the manager, who sent me to an 800 number, who transferred me to who knows where and could not get my name correct. Whew! So recalled the store manager, who placed me on hold. I was on hold so long that I was sent back to bakery who told me to call back! Finally, I called back manager and dumb minion hung up on me. Called back and was left on hold for a while. In the meantime, my husband went to pick up order. What a mess. I have decided I will take my shopping elsewhere. My husband asked for the manager and cancelled the order and got the stuff himself. I will be watching for my credit for what I spent. I will never recommend anyone shopping for groceries there by app.

Name: Amanda Baughman
Comment: Last Thursday I ordered some items for in store pickup, never had an issue before then. First I get an email stating my order is delayed (how long does it take an employee to pull the items from the shelves, I mean really), then I requested cancellation on two of the items because I didnâ€™t need them anymore and was refunded for one of the two. I waited the prescribed 48 hours before I contacted customer service about them taking too much money and made it a point to tell them I did pickup the items providing time and date. The store showed the second item I didnâ€™t need was canceled so I need my money back.  The rep I spoke with apologized for the inconvenience, stated a system update threw everything out of whack and said she processed the cancellation and issued me a refund on the last item. Problem is I still donâ€™t have it. I wonâ€™t be using online ever again Iâ€™ll just go to the store and get what I need. Information on the website goes as far as product availability is less than honest anyway.

Name: Walmart Customer
Comment: Walmart always says "we will do better" "we will update" we will do this/that" but they are all just talk...  The website looks like a sixth-grader designed and made it...

Name: Shelley Stapleton
Comment: I decided to finally try the food delivery since the pick up times were gone for the day. NEVER AGAIN! They gave me an entire pound of rotten strawberries, old dirty lettuce with bugs in it and expired frozen chicken nuggets. The high quality paper towels I ordered, they gave me the cheap 50 cent paper towels. Who knows what else I'm gonna find as the week goes by and it's too late to complain

Name: mommyhead
Comment: For the most part, I like Walmart. I like that you can go and get just about anything from hardware to underwear and then do your grocery shopping in one trip. I am an at risk senior so I also like that they've set aside an hour in the morning one day a week for me to shop with less customers in the store. That said, I wish they would follow their own rules. They have arrows marking the directions you should go up and down the aisle to eliminate cross traffic. But I see the Walmart shoppers misusing this all the time. Also, masks are required, but I see Walmart employees either not wearing them or wearing them incorrectly. Last Tuesday one was wearing a silk super thin one layer scarf/kerchief thing and it was just draped up over her face sort of but the sides were open. Like why bother? Not a mask in any way, shape or form. And even at that, she would pull it down to talk to another employee not standing even close to 6 feet apart. I have also seen outside vendors abusing the mask policy, too. And lastly, seems like the senior shopping hour is getting a bit lax, too. The outside single line barriers are all but down. I see people who are either not seniors, or who have very good plastic surgeons or botox or something. And it's not just me or just my store. My daughter-in-law shops at a different Walmart on the other side of town and she's noticed the same abuse of policy. It's one thing to see customers not following the rules, but when it's your own employees, the effort to tout yourselves as an organization who cares and wants to keep everyone safe turns into just more of the same hype.

Name: Tim
Comment: Bought an item on their marketplace. It arrived damaged. It lists the item can be returned in store on the site. NOTHING indicates that you have to contact Walmart to contact the seller and wait 48 hours for their response. After following this procedure I did not receive a followup email. Contacting them through chat the rep indicated the previous rep had not followed through and they expect me to allow them to waste another 48 hours of my time. I've been waiting for a supervisor for over 45 minutes. I will be making a sign for my cork board, "NEVER BUY ANYTHING THROUGH WALMART.COM!"

Name: Emma
Comment: stick with amazon, much better service!

Name: Ann Marie
Comment: I love Walmart.com and grocery pick up! All of the reviews I am reading on this website doesn't describe my experiences with Walmart grocery, or .com.  I have had a short delay and maybe a crushed product/package from Walmart.com, but that is to be expected occasionally! Consumers don't realize that their package is not coming directly from Walmart, IT LITERALLY GOES THROUGH SEVERAL SHIPPING PROCESSES, in warehouses, on trucks, etc. So a lot can happen between Walmart shipping out your items and once it reaches your residence.  Walmart has ALWAYS helped replace the item or refund my money and sometimes even let me keep the item that was damaged so that I don't have to bother with returning it to the store. They also give the option of returning it to the store in person or through mail, they'll send you a shipping label.  Walmart grocery is the best I've ever used! For items that are out of stock, my substitutions are almost always something I'd choose, I've never had to wait more than 10 minutes (always less than) at pick up to get my groceries, the employees are always nice and knowledgeable, and my groceries are usually ready before my scheduled time slot!  I recommend Walmart website to all my friends and family because I have had many more positive experiences than negative! I highly recommend calling customer service if you have ANY problems because they have always solved my problem to my satisfaction.

Name: Heidi
Comment: The recent app changes are awful for a family only wanting to order weekly groceries. After two years of ordering our groceries through the WALMART Grocery app (and bragging to friends not in the know about how awesome it was), all the user-friendly "grocery" features are now gone. We'll be switching to Meijers. What was Walmart thinking???

Name: Danah
Comment: The new website is very confusing. I don't like it at all. I just want to be able to go in and choose grocery pickup and select my items and pickup time. It used to be so simple and now it's a confusing mess. I don't want to shop from the Walmart website and the grocery pickup at the same time. I only want to view the items I can get at the store I am shopping at.

Name: Kathy Mullins Randall
Comment: The new app is terrible. The pop out items is terrible. Being direct to website to look at list is terrible. Having grocery pickup combined is terrible. Canâ€™t see availability of item in my store or other store in area. Saved for later list deleted. Canâ€™t look up price and see if site to store is available hard to add items to list. The app is hard to navigate and just too much. The old app was better and simple. I will just go to the store or order online elsewhere until they fix the app.

Name: CM T
Comment: New website is terrible. If I want to check the inventory at the local store for an item, I have to choose a filter in a drop down menu for each and every search. What a mess by combining the online and the local store in one search. The old site was much user friendlier and easier to find products. Also getting a verification error almost every visit for some reason where I have to press and hold a button on the screen, site is almost unusable. What a big step backwards.

Name: Andrew Foster
Comment: What an absolute travesty the new Walmart website is! Products for pick up, delivery and shipping are all mixed together. There are filters, but you can't save them so you have to reapply them - for every single search! The help is useless. If you search for filters (because you can't understand why you have to set them for every single search) there are zero results. Other searches for help result in error messages and blank pages. Pricing is a mess - 6 bottles of juice for over $70 dollars? That's more than $10 a bottle and there is ludicrous pricing like that scattered across the site. Items that are ordered disappear from the order. Whoever approved rolling out this site needs to be fired!

Name: Ron G.
Comment: Horrible update. I donâ€™t need to repeatedly figure out if you are shipping something when I have already checked I want a pick up.  I know the marketing and app development people are trying to justify their paycheck, but this is not the way to do it.  Bad update

Name: Christine Ellis
Comment: Walmart, why?????? The new site update is HORRIBLE. Searching for basic food items with the local availability always shows no items. But I can add them to my cart from my favorites. WTH? This is not usable for grocery delivery at this point.

Name: Ebony V
Comment: If I could give 0 stars, I would! I took off work and did not get my package on the date promised. I asked them to deliver on the next day I will be available & they had an excuse to why they couldn't. I asked if they could deliver to another secure address, they told me to contact FedEx. I asked to cancel and they said it wasn't possible. I'm so frustrated and disappointed. Absolutely no recourse or regard for the consumer. I will NEVER order from Wal Mart again!...BTW, noone knows where my order is STILL!

Name: Judith Fowler
Comment: I often order online from Walmart. I have never once had a bad experience. I'm completely satisfied with every product and ever order I have ever made. Product delivery is on time, and easily trackable. I love shopping Walmart online. Bigger selection and fast service. ðŸ‘

Name: Frank
Comment: Worst experience I have ever went through today! I submitted a online grocery order this morning supposed to be delivered between 2-3 pm. Got a notification around 3:30 saying it was delayed. So i called they said my order left the store at 3:29pm. Finally showed up at 5 pm. I ordered 118.00 of food. I'm missing 10 items out of 31 items and was still charged for everything. The guy that delivered was shady as fu**. So I make small talk asking if they was busy he says he had a long drive you dumbass Walmart is a 5 minute drive from my house. So after i take the bags I look around and don't see anything like I know there has to be more sh**. He said oh i have the eggs in the back seat. So i go to walk with him and this idiot blocked me off. I HATE WALMART. LIKE WHERE DO THEY FIND THESE EMPLOYEES. IT DOESN'T MAKE ANY SENSE. PLEASE FIRE EVERYONE AND HIRE NEW PEOPLE. and one more thing 9 out of 10 your groceries is not coming from where it says it is. SO MY ADVICE JUST STOP DELIVERING

Name: The Circle
Comment: Purchased a 4k TV January 18th of 2018 along with the protection plan. Seven months later I need to use that plan due to a power surge, but it's NEVER that simple with Walmart punkass. I have had very little progress with the company because I don't have the original receipt. ðŸ˜¡ In 2018 there are a plethora of ways to verify my purchase within your facility, everyone acts as if they cannot reprint my receipt or find it even though it was through a debit card transaction which can be electronically traced. Long story short almost a month has gone by I have heard nothing about using my protection plan I'm warning everybody now do not purchase it!! Stay away from horrible customer service like this, we work too hard to throw our money away. Walmart has stolen my money, I've paid for a service I never even received.

Name: customer
Comment: Baught. A bathing suit wrong size refuned my money with a ease even though it was amazon money

Comment: I hate Walmart! I went there and only got 5 damn items and the total was $9.24 and they took the payment out of my account twice. So it ended up costing me $18 instead. What the hell kind of rip off scam is that? Never going to use my card at Walmart ever again because of this. Screw you Walmart. stupid asses deserve to get sued for stuff like this. Bunch of lame faggots, I hate every single Walmart employee

Name: Kim Stewart
Comment: Why did the Walmart in Battle Creek MI change most of their lanes to self serve? That is such an impersonable move not to mention I am doing the job that a checker should be doing. Does this mean your prices are going to drop since you don't have to pay an employee or are you going to pay me for working at your store while I am checking myself out. What a crap move Walmart, I'm taking my business to Meijer where I can have a person to interact with instead of some hard cold metal. SHAME ON YOU!!

Name: maria lake
Comment: The Walmart on #05035 6745 n church av mullberry fl 33860 The Walmart has a Manager assistant . Migual services skills are outstanding he should be the head Manager of the whole entire Walt Mart. please give to Mighel Raise from long time customer service thanks to you Walt mart love you it

Name: Gee Coles
Comment: Worst Online Store ever!!! They DONT protect their customers! Twas my first time to purchase online from walmart. After i received their official receipt email, I tracked my package and says item not found. when I called Walmart Customer Service, the rep told me that he cant tract my package either. he firther instruct me to contact directly the seller. But when I explained to him that the official receipt email i received from walmart doesnt give me an option to contact the seller directly, he told me "you bought something from a 3rd party through walmart, I cannot help you with that but I can report your issue to my manager and you have to wait for 24hrs for our email." 24hrs became 50hrs & so on but still havent heard anything from walmart, package still untrackable & definetely hasnt arrived ðŸ’” I was SCAMMED! SHAME ON YOU FOR STEALING PEOPLES MONEY! walmart.ca posts products on their website & it says 3rd party seller, I was expecting that It was a safe purchase because it was a 3rd party seller through walmart but I was wrong. so please all beware! DONT BUY FROM WALMART ONLINE STORE!

Name: Gerald Furry
Comment: I was at walmart earlier and received some ver bad service there was a woman in front of me and we all were doing the social distance mess. There wa stwo women in front of the woman in front of me. As the second woman was paying for her stuff the employee let the woman in front of me start putting here items on the belt. Ok once her items which were few had moved up to where the clerk was and there was still 6 to 7 feet between us, I started putting my few items on the counter, oh the clerk informed me quick to stay back and not put my items on the counter yet. The woman in front of me was paying for her stuff while the clerk bagged the items, so I stepped to the counter again still 6 ft way and mroe, and the damn clerk told me again to step back, by this time the woman in front of me had paid for her stuff and got the bags and she was on the other end of the aisle where the round table is, I then stepped for ward a third time and the clerk told me again to step back. This was ignorant insanity to the limit. I turned around and went to the self check out area and was in and gone in under 5 minutes. I will never try to support the the few employees again by going to the manned isles and will instead use from here on out the self checkout line.

Name: Rose
Comment: I have had very good experiences shopping with WalMart online. Occasionally I have items sent directly to friends and family as gifts. Sometimes I have items delivered to my home. Most often, I place an order online and pick it up at our local WalMart store. I have learned to carefully read the details about who is selling the item on WalMart.com. Many times it is a third party seller and an item is not eligible for return or exchange through WalMart. I have found several excellent bargains online (over WalMart's regular in-store low prices.)

Name: Frankie
Comment: I just found out that Walmart donates food 4 the elderly ok. I will never critize them again ok. They r great. I do still have issues about the store performance inside but. They help alot of the elderly and that's ok by me.PS be kind 2 the people around and don't fight it doesn't do us any good we all need 2 get along ok in this bio diverse world of ours. I went 2 Woodstock ok. Peace love  Patti Hawley Pezet

Name: Jim Zak
Comment: What a clusterf**k! Who designed this crap, some high school interns? And who approved it? You just alienated most of your customers, dumbasses.

Name: Advance PT
Comment: I used to order every week from walmart.com but no more! I DONT LIKE the new website atall. Its SO HARD to browse and find STUFF! I understand at the end of the day ITS ALL ABOUT MONEY! But why copy Amazon? You guys made it a marketplace allows 3rd party to sell and now its hard to find out which seller I am buying from and the return policy. Not to mention GROCERY PICKUP is so hard to use! You guys messed up big time! I am no longer going to use walmart.com anymore. Taking my business somewhere else. This new website is NOT USER FRIENDLY atall. Good Luck!

Name: Marty Masters
Comment: Absolutely hate the new website. I did all my grocery shopping online with Wal-mart and the new site is impossible to use.

Name: Christella Moore
Comment: Walmart.com sucks. Walmart grocery pickup delivery USED TO BE great I recommended it to everybody but lately its been absolutely awful. Deliveries are always wrong if they arrive at all. AND THE ONLY FEEDBACK THE LOCAL STORE CAN GIVE IS "CALL 1-800-WALMART. It really sucks because that hasn't solve any problems for me yet. They're unreliable and have unacceptably horrible customer service

Name: Racquel
Comment: The new Walmart app no longer allows me to scan the item and see the correct price in my local store. If I scan a Clearanced item, the app tells me the full price. This new app is inaccurate and no longer helpful. The old app was perfect and user friendly. Incredibly disappointed.

Name: Donna Wade
Comment: Walmart has changed there grocery website and it is horrible. It was so bad that after being a paid member for home delivery for almost 3 years I called to ask why 1 loaf of wonder bread was now $11.89 and 3 day delivery. When I called I was told that in fact that was the price because it was coming from the distribution center. There old system was great. Now someone that doesn't speak very good english is telling customers that Wonder bread is a special item. I don't need this type of trouble to many other stores deliver.

Name: Jim Jordan
Comment: It is impossible to just look at what is in stock at your local walmart. Even when you find something that is supposed to be there. It will change to shipping, once you go to cart.

Name: KIMBERLEIGH
Comment: Walmart advertises items they do not even have available online. I learned the hard way. When I ordered from them, they gave me a delivery date that was not met, and put a "delayed" status on my order. I needed the item for a birthday gift. Their customer service is a joke. Nobody knows anything and all they say is sorry for your luck and to wait for further info. They suck.

Name: Dorie Glory
Comment: This new Walmart app is a piece of crap whoever decided to do this was definitely on something!! Name: Lloyd Landers
Comment: What is it with walmart it use to be a decent store not great but and ok box store. Was in today at two o'clock to find a pair of pants for my 92 year old mother the last time I saw that much camo I wasn't in Canada. What a joke. We have target back. Just another name, same garbage. I would love to see a Canadian store that wasn't out for the dollar. Then maybe we would finally be treated like our country and not some cheap knock off

Name: Ron S.
Comment: Don't sign up for deliveries. I cancel my plan and did not know I was being charged the last 2 years. When I called the first time about the charge, no one in there office had no idea what the charge was for. Good thing my credit card blocked the last transaction. Caused me a lot of inconveniences.  I also had another issue where the manager was supposed to call me for a delivery and each time I followed up, They said someone would call back  Basically if you have an major issue that requires you to call the store or customer service, no one can help regardless how many times you call. Worst customer service I've experienced with any retailer.

Name: Ingrid
Comment: I ordered bedding from Walmart (Three Duvet covers: one green King size and two blue colored double size) They claim these were delivered. However, ONLY the green King size was- not the 2 double size ones. Walmart is not being helpful one bit and claim the company received a signature. There was no signature request for the package that we did receive (the Green one) so how can they have ANY signature? They claim the signature the company has is "S Smith" NOBODY we know- they get a signature but throw the package on the driveway? (green one only!!) This is kriminal at this point claiming there is a signature for delivery. It has been a frustrating experience with the company that supposedly shipped it and WALMART. I placed my order via Walmart so I hold them responsible for my order! I am going to close my account as soon as I pay the other items. They don't care, and are of no help!! Be aware when you order on line , if your package does not arrive they will do nothing about ti!!

Name: J Satmaria
Comment: I ordered a specific electric toothbrush. What came, on the correct date, was a package that looked like it had been wrapped by a small child, with the incorrect toothbrush. I went to my local Walmart and had to wait in line for about 20 minutes for customer service to tell me that their label machine was not working and that I needed to go to another Walmart. I drove to a further town and waited 25 minutes in line for a customer service person to help me.... while in a pandemic. Will not order from Walmart again. What a hassle!!!!!

Name: jen
Comment: Their online shopping is pathetic. I ordered 2 25lb weight plates on July 21. Ship date was months later on 8/31, to arrive 9/17. The only shipment progress states "label created" and ready for UPS. When my item still doesn't show any shipment progress on the 17th, I check with customer service. They claim the item was "lost" during shipment. First of all, how the heck do you lose 2 25lb weight plates? Secondly, it was never in the UPS system. Sounds like lies to cover up what really happened. Definitely not shopping at Walmart either in store or online. The entire time (from July to September), I could have ordered from another merchant who is honest and won't take months to ship an item.

Name: Laura Budd Giarrusso
Comment: First delivery was made on time, but my second delivery with 4 items is taking more than 7 days! The delivery status still says delayed and it should have been delivered on the 15th! So disappointed at this as I can't seem to find items I want in store. Sorry but after I get my items I'm not ordering again, it shouldn't take 7 days to get items that have been clearly marked for 2 day delivery. Not to mention you can easily send me e-mail detailing whats going on! I can't even return these items either, Walmart your giving me the run around and I don't appreciate that. I would give zero stars but I can't write a review with it. Order at your own risk people.

Name: Denene Draper
Comment: Always have a hard time actually placing order. The app never ewants to get thru review your order to actually place it....WHY

Name: EUGENE HINTZ
Comment: The old adage of if it isn't broke don't fix it. Well it was not broke and they sure as hell tried to fix it, but failed beyond words. Where do they get these dummies that think they know it all. The fix they tried is sick, sad, awful, terrible, lousy, for rotten, sucks, stinks, changed by a no brain jerk and did a job that they should have hired a 7 year old to do, as I'm sure they could have done better. I could go on and on, but are they listening, I doubt it although time will tell, or maybe after Walmart Pick goes down the tubes in favor of the competition. Sad!!!!

Name: donna munson
Comment: After ordering my grocery delivery, I had to log on to see if anyone else was completely confused with the new website/system. Thankfully I am not alone. I placed my weekly order and when I went to check out, it said that one item (a box of pudding) was available at the same location my order was coming from, but I had to go pick it up??? What? Then, it says one of my items would be shipped and I would receive it by Monday. Then, when I got my notice about substitutions, it says "good news, 8 items were available from your store and will be delivered." They were always supposed to be delivered. What a mess. You've made it so hard to order, and I hope you change it back.

Name: customer
Comment: 0 STARS !!!! This new update that has taken place on the website is absolutely difficult and the extra steps they've added is just ridiculous. I'm about to just switch to shopping with Safeway.

Name: Peggy Kunz Martin
Comment: If I could give a 0 I would.... I am so disappointed in Walmart. I have been having my groceries delivered by them for almost a year with the only problem being squashed bread and broken eggs. Well today I was suppose to receive and order. The incompent delivery person sent me a text message to let him in my complex. I explained to him how to get in. The next thing I know I get a cancelation notice from the store saying there was a problem with my delivery. YES THERE WAS, THEIR DRIVER WAS INCOMPETENT!!!!!! And now they want me to reorder and can't get my groceries until later tonight. Why do they expect me to be the one to suffer because they screwed up. I AM FURIOUS AND WILL NEVER ORDER FROM WALMART AGAIN. AND TO WHOEVER ANSWER THESE WITH I'M SO SORRY YOU HAD TO GO THRU THIS, DON'T, BECAUSE IT'S NOTHING BUT A LIE. There is always a way to fix things that are satisfactory to the client but they only wanted to do it their way. I AM THE CUSTOMER AND I DESERVED TO BE SERVED THE WAY I WAS SUPPOSE TO BE. A LITTLE HINT TO MANAGEMENT: HIRE BETTER DRIVERS...SMARTER DRIVERS...THAT UNDERSTAND WHAT THEY NEED TO DO...

Name: Sherry
Comment: Why has Walmart ruined the ease and efficiency of grocery shopping? I click on my app to buy GROCERIES and the first thing I see is celebrating Hispanic founders. While the mural is very pretty and the painter very talented I don't want to be inundated with diversity first thing when I just want to do my GROCERY shopping. It may be your company's mission NOW to be involved with all kinds of social issues but Iâ€™m sure Walt just wanted to sell good products at good prices and that's all I want from my primary GROCERY store. The next thing I see is telling me how to â€˜Set the Table for Fallâ€™. I donâ€™t want decor advice when shopping for GROCERIES. When I SHOP FOR GROCERIES I have absolutely no interest in stocking up for college. Then I see a message for 'Free Assembly'. I don't need any of my GROCERIES assembled. Then there is your Home lookbook: fall edition. Again, I JUST WANT TO BUY GROCERIES!!! Then there's a picture of various products to that I should learn more about. At no point does it take me TO my GROCERIES. My only option now is to 'See times'. That is the LAST step in my GROCERY SHOPPING process. My only direct options on this current page are to: -Search. -Look at my (still empty) grocery cart. -Click on my local Supercenter or my address. -See times. -Shop now. -Add all my essentials in one click. (Which is needed almost never) -View savings on my last order. (I can practically guarantee no one cares) -Reorder my essentials. (which finally lets me actually shop MY items after 10 minutes of BS telling me how much Walmart cares all the while wasting my time trying to sell me stuff I don't care about when I was only looking to purchase food for my family)  When it finally does get to the items I actually want to order it gives me the options to go to Reorder, Lists and Registries. Who the hell has a grocery registry? There is so much superfluous stuff added to an already tiny screen on a phone app. I really don't need to know I've bought something 12 times before. Or of it's available for pickup, delivery or 2 day shipping. When Iâ€™m GROCERY shopping I know itâ€™s either going to be picked up or delivered. I don't even want to see non perishable food items if they are only available for 2 day in my normal GROCERY shopping.  I could go on an on but if you really want to help your customers who have come to expect an easy efficient GROCERY shopping experience please let GROCERY shopping be its own thing.  Plus there are also glitches in this new app going back and forth between pages and often ending on something random I was not looking for or crashing all together. I cannot fathom that the huge highly profitable Walmart actually tested this new rollout of merging Groceries with home/college/clothing/electronics etc with actual average everyday consumer customers.

Name: Dave Adams
Comment: The latest app and website is a terrible user experience if you just want to shop for delivery or pick up from store. Searching shows you everything including shipping. Fire every search you have to perform 3 licks to just show items for pickup or delivery. I'g give zeros stars if possible

Name: Frank Castro
Comment: It is so sad that Walmart only gives you the option to rate the driver which has nothing to do with a process of ordering your items or picking the items. What a flawed system

Name: Dave Stomberg
Comment: Zero Stars more appropriate,, hate new site for aisle online,, it needs to be undone! Shopping elsewhere till then!

Name: EUGENE HINTZ
Comment: The old adage of if it isn't broke don't fix it. Well it was not broke and they sure as hell tried to fix it, but failed beyond words. Where do they get these dummies that think they know it all. The fix they tried is sick, sad, awful, terrible, lousy, for rotten, sucks, stinks, changed by a no brain jerk and did a job that they should have hired a 7 year old to do, as I'm sure they could have done better. I could go on and on, but are they listening, I doubt it although time will tell, or maybe after Walmart Pick goes down the tubes in favor of the competition. Sad!!!!

Name: donna munson
Comment: After ordering my grocery delivery, I had to log on to see if anyone else was completely confused with the new website/system. Thankfully I am not alone. I placed my weekly order and when I went to check out, it said that one item (a box of pudding) was available at the same location my order was coming from, but I had to go pick it up??? What? Then, it says one of my items would be shipped and I would receive it by Monday. Then, when I got my notice about substitutions, it says "good news, 8 items were available from your store and will be delivered." They were always supposed to be delivered. What a mess. You've made it so hard to order, and I hope you change it back.

Name: customer
Comment: 0 STARS !!!! This new update that has taken place on the website is absolutely difficult and the extra steps they've added is just ridiculous. I'm about to just switch to shopping with Safeway.

Name: Peggy Kunz Martin
Comment: If I could give a 0 I would.... I am so disappointed in Walmart. I have been having my groceries delivered by them for almost a year with the only problem being squashed bread and broken eggs. Well today I was suppose to receive and order. The incompent delivery person sent me a text message to let him in my complex. I explained to him how to get in. The next thing I know I get a cancelation notice from the store saying there was a problem with my delivery. YES THERE WAS, THEIR DRIVER WAS INCOMPETENT!!!!!! And now they want me to reorder and can't get my groceries until later tonight. Why do they expect me to be the one to suffer because they screwed up. I AM FURIOUS AND WILL NEVER ORDER FROM WALMART AGAIN. AND TO WHOEVER ANSWER THESE WITH I'M SO SORRY YOU HAD TO GO THRU THIS, DON'T, BECAUSE IT'S NOTHING BUT A LIE. There is always a way to fix things that are satisfactory to the client but they only wanted to do it their way. I AM THE CUSTOMER AND I DESERVED TO BE SERVED THE WAY I WAS SUPPOSE TO BE. A LITTLE HINT TO MANAGEMENT: HIRE BETTER DRIVERS...SMARTER DRIVERS...THAT UNDERSTAND WHAT THEY NEED TO DO...

It may be your company's mission NOW to be involved with all kinds of social issues but Iâ€™m sure Walt just wanted to sell good products at good prices and that's all I want from my primary GROCERY store. The next thing I see is telling me how to â€˜Set the Table for Fallâ€™. I donâ€™t want decor advice when shopping for GROCERIES. When I SHOP FOR GROCERIES I have absolutely no interest in stocking up for college. Then I see a message for 'Free Assembly'. I don't need any of my GROCERIES assembled. Then there is your Home lookbook: fall edition. Again, I JUST WANT TO BUY GROCERIES!!! Then there's a picture of various products to that I should learn more about. At no point does it take me TO my GROCERIES. My only option now is to 'See times'. That is the LAST step in my GROCERY SHOPPING process. My only direct options on this current page are to: -Search. -Look at my (still empty) grocery cart. -Click on my local Supercenter or my address. -See times. -Shop now. -Add all my essentials in one click. (Which is needed almost never) -View savings on my last order. (I can practically guarantee no one cares) -Reorder my essentials. (which finally lets me actually shop MY items after 10 minutes of BS telling me how much Walmart cares all the while wasting my time trying to sell me stuff I don't care about when I was only looking to purchase food for my family)  When it finally does get to the items I actually want to order it gives me the options to go to Reorder, Lists and Registries. Who the hell has a grocery registry? There is so much superfluous stuff added to an already tiny screen on a phone app. I really don't need to know I've bought something 12 times before. Or of it's available for pickup, delivery or 2 day shipping. When Iâ€™m GROCERY shopping I know itâ€™s either going to be picked up or delivered. I don't even want to see non perishable food items if they are only available for 2 day in my normal GROCERY shopping.  I could go on an on but if you really want to help your customers who have come to expect an easy efficient GROCERY shopping experience please let GROCERY shopping be its own thing.  Plus there are also glitches in this new app going back and forth between pages and often ending on something random I was not looking for or crashing all together. I cannot fathom that the huge highly profitable Walmart actually tested this new rollout of merging Groceries with home/college/clothing/electronics etc with actual average everyday consumer customers.

Name: Dave Adams
Comment: The latest app and website is a terrible user experience if you just want to shop for delivery or pick up from store. Searching shows you everything including shipping. Fire every search you have to perform 3 licks to just show items for pickup or delivery. I'g give zeros stars if possible

Name: Frank Castro
Comment: It is so sad that Walmart only gives you the option to rate the driver which has nothing to do with a process of ordering your items or picking the items. What a flawed system

Name: Dave Stomberg
Comment: Zero Stars more appropriate,, hate new site for aisle online,, it needs to be undone! Shopping elsewhere till then!

Name: EUGENE HINTZ
Comment: The old adage of if it isn't broke don't fix it. Well it was not broke and they sure as hell tried to fix it, but failed beyond words. Where do they get these dummies that think they know it all. The fix they tried is sick, sad, awful, terrible, lousy, for rotten, sucks, stinks, changed by a no brain jerk and did a job that they should have hired a 7 year old to do, as I'm sure they could have done better. I could go on and on, but are they listening, I doubt it although time will tell, or maybe after Walmart Pick goes down the tubes in favor of the competition. Sad!!!!

Name: donna munson
Comment: After ordering my grocery delivery, I had to log on to see if anyone else was completely confused with the new website/system. Thankfully I am not alone. I placed my weekly order and when I went to check out, it said that one item (a box of pudding) was available at the same location my order was coming from, but I had to go pick it up??? What? Then, it says one of my items would be shipped and I would receive it by Monday. Then, when I got my notice about substitutions, it says "good news, 8 items were available from your store and will be delivered." They were always supposed to be delivered. What a mess. You've made it so hard to order, and I hope you change it back.

Name: Llda Vlahova
Comment: The newest Walmart bull.....is a membership fee.Good luck with that ðŸ˜ðŸ˜ðŸ˜ðŸ˜.

Name: customer
Comment: 0 STARS !!!! This new update that has taken place on the website is absolutely difficult and the extra steps they've added is just ridiculous. I'm about to just switch to shopping with Safeway.

Name: Peggy Kunz Martin
Comment: If I could give a 0 I would.... I am so disappointed in Walmart. I have been having my groceries delivered by them for almost a year with the only problem being squashed bread and broken eggs. Well today I was suppose to receive and order. The incompent delivery person sent me a text message to let him in my complex. I explained to him how to get in. The next thing I know I get a cancelation notice from the store saying there was a problem with my delivery. YES THERE WAS, THEIR DRIVER WAS INCOMPETENT!!!!!! And now they want me to reorder and can't get my groceries until later tonight. Why do they expect me to be the one to suffer because they screwed up. I AM FURIOUS AND WILL NEVER ORDER FROM WALMART AGAIN. AND TO WHOEVER ANSWER THESE WITH I'M SO SORRY YOU HAD TO GO THRU THIS, DON'T, BECAUSE IT'S NOTHING BUT A LIE. There is always a way to fix things that are satisfactory to the client but they only wanted to do it their way. I AM THE CUSTOMER AND I DESERVED TO BE SERVED THE WAY I WAS SUPPOSE TO BE. A LITTLE HINT TO MANAGEMENT: HIRE BETTER DRIVERS...SMARTER DRIVERS...THAT UNDERSTAND WHAT THEY NEED TO DO...

While the mural is very pretty and the painter very talented I don't want to be inundated with diversity first thing when I just want to do my GROCERY shopping. It may be your company's mission NOW to be involved with all kinds of social issues but Iâ€™m sure Walt just wanted to sell good products at good prices and that's all I want from my primary GROCERY store. The next thing I see is telling me how to â€˜Set the Table for Fallâ€™. I donâ€™t want decor advice when shopping for GROCERIES. When I SHOP FOR GROCERIES I have absolutely no interest in stocking up for college. Then I see a message for 'Free Assembly'. I don't need any of my GROCERIES assembled. Then there is your Home lookbook: fall edition. Again, I JUST WANT TO BUY GROCERIES!!! Then there's a picture of various products to that I should learn more about. At no point does it take me TO my GROCERIES. My only option now is to 'See times'. That is the LAST step in my GROCERY SHOPPING process. My only direct options on this current page are to: -Search. -Look at my (still empty) grocery cart. -Click on my local Supercenter or my address. -See times. -Shop now. -Add all my essentials in one click. (Which is needed almost never) -View savings on my last order. (I can practically guarantee no one cares) -Reorder my essentials. (which finally lets me actually shop MY items after 10 minutes of BS telling me how much Walmart cares all the while wasting my time trying to sell me stuff I don't care about when I was only looking to purchase food for my family)  When it finally does get to the items I actually want to order it gives me the options to go to Reorder, Lists and Registries. Who the hell has a grocery registry? There is so much superfluous stuff added to an already tiny screen on a phone app. I really don't need to know I've bought something 12 times before. Or of it's available for pickup, delivery or 2 day shipping. When Iâ€™m GROCERY shopping I know itâ€™s either going to be picked up or delivered. I don't even want to see non perishable food items if they are only available for 2 day in my normal GROCERY shopping.  I could go on an on but if you really want to help your customers who have come to expect an easy efficient GROCERY shopping experience please let GROCERY shopping be its own thing.  Plus there are also glitches in this new app going back and forth between pages and often ending on something random I was not looking for or crashing all together. I cannot fathom that the huge highly profitable Walmart actually tested this new rollout of merging Groceries with home/college/clothing/electronics etc with actual average everyday consumer customers.

Name: Dave Adams
Comment: The latest app and website is a terrible user experience if you just want to shop for delivery or pick up from store. Searching shows you everything including shipping. Fire every search you have to perform 3 licks to just show items for pickup or delivery. I'g give zeros stars if possible

Name: Frank Castro
Comment: It is so sad that Walmart only gives you the option to rate the driver which has nothing to do with a process of ordering your items or picking the items. What a flawed system

Name: Dave Stomberg
Comment: Zero Stars more appropriate,, hate new site for aisle online,, it needs to be undone! Shopping elsewhere till then!

Name: EUGENE HINTZ
Comment: The old adage of if it isn't broke don't fix it. Well it was not broke and they sure as hell tried to fix it, but failed beyond words. Where do they get these dummies that think they know it all. The fix they tried is sick, sad, awful, terrible, lousy, for rotten, sucks, stinks, changed by a no brain jerk and did a job that they should have hired a 7 year old to do, as I'm sure they could have done better. I could go on and on, but are they listening, I doubt it although time will tell, or maybe after Walmart Pick goes down the tubes in favor of the competition. Sad!!!!

Name: donna munson
Comment: After ordering my grocery delivery, I had to log on to see if anyone else was completely confused with the new website/system. Thankfully I am not alone. I placed my weekly order and when I went to check out, it said that one item (a box of pudding) was available at the same location my order was coming from, but I had to go pick it up??? What? Then, it says one of my items would be shipped and I would receive it by Monday. Then, when I got my notice about substitutions, it says "good news, 8 items were available from your store and will be delivered." They were always supposed to be delivered. What a mess. You've made it so hard to order, and I hope you change it back.

Name: Llda Vlahova
Comment: The newest Walmart bull.....is a membership fee.Good luck with that ðŸ˜ðŸ˜ðŸ˜ðŸ˜.

Name: customer
Comment: 0 STARS !!!! This new update that has taken place on the website is absolutely difficult and the extra steps they've added is just ridiculous. I'm about to just switch to shopping with Safeway.

Name: Peggy Kunz Martin
Comment: If I could give a 0 I would.... I am so disappointed in Walmart. I have been having my groceries delivered by them for almost a year with the only problem being squashed bread and broken eggs. Well today I was suppose to receive and order. The incompent delivery person sent me a text message to let him in my complex. I explained to him how to get in. The next thing I know I get a cancelation notice from the store saying there was a problem with my delivery. YES THERE WAS, THEIR DRIVER WAS INCOMPETENT!!!!!! And now they want me to reorder and can't get my groceries until later tonight. Why do they expect me to be the one to suffer because they screwed up. I AM FURIOUS AND WILL NEVER ORDER FROM WALMART AGAIN. AND TO WHOEVER ANSWER THESE WITH I'M SO SORRY YOU HAD TO GO THRU THIS, DON'T, BECAUSE IT'S NOTHING BUT A LIE. There is always a way to fix things that are satisfactory to the client but they only wanted to do it their way. I AM THE CUSTOMER AND I DESERVED TO BE SERVED THE WAY I WAS SUPPOSE TO BE. A LITTLE HINT TO MANAGEMENT: HIRE BETTER DRIVERS...SMARTER DRIVERS...THAT UNDERSTAND WHAT THEY NEED TO DO...

Name: Cleo Heinemann
Comment: Tried curbside pick up for the first time. Not a great experience. Had to phone four times before anyone answered. The associate had an accent, I couldn't understand him and he was really rude. The young lady that brought my order was very nice, but was working all alone so I waited 20 minutes. This was not easier than going in to the store.

Name: Leo Cintron
Comment: I ordered 6 items they sent only 5. This happens so often that I'm no longer going to buy from Wal-Mart. I will order from Amazon even if it cost me more. Wal-Mart has the worse employees/customer service in the whole U.S.A.  Spectracide Weed & Grass Killer, 40 oz $11.64/EA Qty: 6

Name: Estee C
Comment: Bad experience at local Walmart store. Using the self scan and all of a sudden it froze up for no reason. Employee was so abrupt and disturbed that I asked him for help! I mean what was I suppose to do ? I had to pay. So he kept sliding some card he had on him super fast like I donâ€™t know how many times. So he gets frustrated and walks away saying I donâ€™t know. At this point I was shocked at the service I was receiving and asked for a manager. Now Iâ€™m waiting 20 minutes more and no manager in sight, omg ! Well had to leave all my stuff and walk out, so frustrated !!! No wonder Walmart has a bad name, I can see why !!! Yep you got it not going there anymore !!! Iâ€™d rate them way below 0 if I could !! They are a bad bad business !!

Name: Damond Mathis
Comment: If I could give zero stars I would! Ordering online products, they bombard you with emails but return policies are not stated therein on each email. It's pathetic that you can have an unused product, only to be told that it can not be returned. In store policy is different from online ordering as I was told. I've ordered many items for my business online but this experience was enough for me to never shop walmart again and take my business elsewhere. Not even a store credit is absurd! Feel like I was robbed literally for their mistake of shipping the wrong item!

Name: Jennifer Lavery
Comment: Friendly , Just not enough staff. I am always finding myself looking for a staff member for a question I have about a certain product. There are never exta staff stalking shelves or anywhere in the store that seems to have time to stop and chat. Hire more People Walmart.... Im Sure you can afford it.

Name: Alan Awad
Comment: The lowest of the low no customer service Ordered online and my orders was canceled after 5 days Could not pick up at the store associate refused to give me the items of the money or even to answer my questions Called and chatted with 7 different people from Walmart I get different story from each one and now itâ€™s 19 days and still didnâ€™t get my money back

Name: Dan Smith
Comment: I used to work at Walmart Walmart paying their employees good Iâ€™ll see it when I believe it They can start out 18+ an hour And you wonâ€™t get work 40 hours a week and have to work two jobs donâ€™t believe Walmart Walmart is a joke

Name: Jones Phil
Comment: Great variety of devices to be sourced. Good quality over price ratio. Sometime difficult to found what I'm looking for, but usually can make it happen.   Reason I chose this business: Pieces I was looking for are available at reasonable price. Not urgent.

Name: Chunguang Wang
Comment: If I can give it 0, I would definitely do that. I'm moving this weekend, and because my new apartment doesn't have a microwave, so I ordered a microwave last week from Walmart.com. Walmart.com promised that the microwave will be delivered this Friday. So I'm happy I could expect to receive the microwave before I move. However, until this Thursday, the package was still not shipped from Indianna, Iâ€™m living in Seattle, only the shipping label was created. It's impossible to be delivered this Wednesday. Then I called Walmart.com this Thursday. One agent responded that I could expect to receive the microwave this Friday still, because he would reach out to the carrier for an expedition, if I don't get it, I could call them to get a refund. I waited the whole day this Friday, no delivery at all. Then I called back to Walmart.com for a refund because I'm moving this Weekend. However this time the agent told me I could only call them next Wednesday after 8:00pm for a refund because that's the Fedex delivery estimate time. I couldn't receive the package next Wednesday, let alone the estimated time is 5 days later than the original promised date by Walmart.com. Itâ€™s just a waste of time to call them twice, and I need to call them a third time for a microwave order! Will never Walmart.com, itâ€™s not worth the time and money.

Name: Braxton Lathan Williams
Comment: Wow. This is a major corporation. They have literally the worst online shipping I've ever seen. I have tried with four different agents to get my order fixed that was shipped incorrectly. I still haven't gotten it fixed. I don't know if I ever will. I've only ordered from Walmart one time and they have completely screwed it up and then have dropped the ball in fixing it. They say it's fixed and it simply isn't I simply have not gotten I ordered and paid for. -Braxton

Name: Phillip Martin
Comment: Worst app change ever! I canâ€™t even function with this nightmare of an app.

Name: Deb
Comment: Walmart's new app is horrible!! It took me 48 mins to order 6 items. RIDICULOUS!!! IT is very confusing, a chaotic mess!!!! That was my last order unless they fix that mess!! I'm done!!!

Name: Megan Casto
Comment: Not user friendly at all!!! I live out of town, so I used to do a big grocery pick up once every two weeks and I would put items in my cart as I needed them. Between time I would have things shipped to my house that were not in my local Wal-Mart. Unable to do that anymore! So disappointing. Going to use Kroger grocery pick up until Wal-Mart fixes this horrible new site and app. Also, my mother and grandma can no longer use it so they switched to Kroger as well because it's much more user friendly. My grandma had things shipped instead of picked up and was so upset because she did not understand they were shipped.

Name: Maria l Ayala
Comment: Walmart new app is horrible it doesnâ€™t even let you add or delete anything. I would not be buying from Walmart until they bring back the old app.

Name: Donna Consiglio
Comment: I'm hoping Walmart takes notice of these reviews and does something about it. I miss the way it worked before. It is a hassle and frustrating to use now.

Name: Andrea Snow
Comment: I loved the old walmart app please go back to it. I hate this app it is confusing and there is only 1 cart well I do shipping and pick up so I need 2 carts I live far away and don't get my groceries the same time I do my shipping order. I hope you corporate people listen and actually fix this I notice alot of people feel like I do. If it's not broke don't mess with it and that old app was great! Thank you

Name: Cyndi
Comment: Very disappointed and aggravated with the updated app. So much so, I gave up and placed my order with Foodlion and will continue to do so until Walmart changes either back to the way it was or something better then the current.

Name: st
Comment: I agree with all the one star (and less) reviews. Every time I go to their site I send them feedback that I hate the new site. Hope everyone will do that and maybe it will be changed!

Name: Dhas a Point
Comment: The redesigned layout of walmart website should be taken down. I am so frustrated! it used to be user friendly and efficient. If I am shopping for groceries I do not want to have to weed through marketplace sellers and ship only items. I want to see only what is available for the curbside pickup.

Name: Brenda
Comment: This updated Walmart app is a disaster! Some items are being shipped that I know are on the shelves that could be delivered with my groceries. If they don't clean this mess up I'll go to Instacart for my grocery delivery. I'm adding to my review since the grocery items are updated in my online grocery order. The toothpaste is showing along with bananas as being weight adjusted. The substitutions no longer are able to be approved. What a mess! Instacart will be my grocery choice from now on. Walmart just lost another customer due to this crappy app.

Name: Wanda
Comment: I shop at Walmart Store #434 in Huntsville AL. I was there today to buy my usual bi-weekly groceries. I am completely appalled and thoroughly disgusted in what I saw in their meat department. The beef section, all of it has turned gray and has obviously gone bad. It needs to be thrown out not sold to customers. The ground beef, roasts, steaks all the beef half gray and brown. I know I am just one customer and not very important but I am done with Walmart. Someone will get sick from eating that meat and they obviously don't care.

Name: Denise Lopez
Comment: I truly appreciate the structured help I get each time if needed when I go to Walmart. Anna from this particular Walmart has truly shined in our life's. Thank you for shining so bright! Neighborhood Walmart (Yuma)

Name: Denise Lopez
Comment: I truly appreciate the structured help I get each time if needed when I go to Walmart. Anna from this particular Walmart has truly shined in our life's. Thank you for shining so bright! Neighborhood Walmart (Yuma)

Name: Denise Lopez
Comment: I truly appreciate the structured help I get each time if needed when I go to Walmart. Anna from this particular Walmart has truly shined in our life's. Thank you for shining so bright! Neighborhood Walmart (Yuma)

Name: Dave HatesWalmart
Comment: TERRIBLE!!! Used their service - company called Ria - and they would NOT pay my 3 employees when they attempted to claim the money. I had paid in CASH! Some lady in Pakistan told me there was a â€œgeneral security alertâ€ in their system and I would need to go back to Walmart for a refund. That was it! Never again! Ria, you and Walmart SUCK!!! Walmart employees and manager were equally useless.

Name: Kurt
Comment: Walmart Online is worthless. The lead time they gave me was over a week. 2 days after it was supposed to be here, I called, The tracking number said it had not yet left Irvine and I live on the East Coast. They told me they left the vendor a voicemail and the vendor had to email me within 24 hours and if not, I should call Walmart back. Nice pass the buck Walmart. I told them I needed it now - Walmart stated that I would have to speak to the vendor about that. Again pass the buck. Amazon has gotten worse, but not this bad.

Name: Jackie Sanders
Comment: I am greatly disappointed with my local stores. My last trip to the store I couldn't find 3 different products. Some they are no longer carrying, others they just didn't have stock. Employees filling online orders blocked aisles and were rude. I know they have a job to do, but as an in store customer I got the message that they would prefer I not be there. I picked up an item on a shelf that had a large display of like items, across the top of shelf was multiple large signs that said clearance and no not on clearance. To top it off there are 20+ check out lanes with only one that had a checker. I opted to use the self checkout against my better judgement. My first item rang up at the wrong price. Two items later it said I needed assistance, once again waiting on employee as she was helping other customers who were also having trouble, she did what ever she was supposed to do and it said no action needed. Really! Very frustrating, especially since this has become the norm. I will be doing the bulk of my shopping elsewhere in the future. Somewhere along the line Walmart has become more about the money and less about the customers. Very disappointed.

Name: Alexander Wood
Comment: literally such a terrible store. The staff are always disrespectful and unprofessional. One time as i left the store with my family (with my younger brother who repeats everything he hears), the staff were cursing like sailors off in a corner at the door and everybody could hear. completely unprofessional. It's what you'd expect from the staff there at this point, though. worst. store. ever.

Name: Wes
Comment: I purchased an item from Walmart.com using a third party seller and Walmart did not assist with the bad transaction.

Name: R. Lemieux
Comment: Walmart online is really horrible. Sent me the wrong order last time and now I order two pair of jeans, accidentally with the wrong size, and I can't cancel the order 5 minutes after it was placed! Makes no sense. Chatting with customer service solved nothing. I hope Amazon devours your online presence. Get a clue Walmart management.

Name: David Chadwick
Comment: I come to Walmart in Cape Coral Delprado to shop itâ€™s a total disaster and not pleasurable feeling At the store they having 40+ self checkouts you try to check out with fresh vegetables fruit anything from the produce department and itâ€™s a total disaster you scan the item you weigh it and then it wants you to enter a number it is not a pleasure shopping here I donâ€™t understand the self check out it is horrible you have a checkout person thatâ€™s leaning against the cash register not paying attention for you guys to say youâ€™re good customer service you need to reevaluate yourself because this is the worst experience Iâ€™ve ever had I am fed up with coming to Walmart to try to shop

Name: RS
Comment: Walmart (SuperStore) - Rinehart Road, Sanford, FL  To help improve service I wanted to give you feedback on my recent pickup experience for this order detailed below. Fast it was not, convenient I am also afraid not, and to top it off despite waiting over 30mins when the order was presented it was wrong.  To give some further details, when I arrived, I called the number I was requested to do. It took the Walmart associated (Alyssa) almost 20mins to respond and when she did it was the wrong order. She was not apologetic in any form for either her tardy responsiveness or the fact that the order was wrong. So, fast it was not. The associate went back inside without any communication of the purpose and did not return. I called the number a second time in order to receive the goods I ordered and paid of. The associated eventually return but this time only provided me with 1 item of the 4 I ordered. So in reality I only received 25% or the order and requesting formally a refund for the other 75% or for the order to be fulfilled as originally requested. Convenient, not even close, hassle would be closer to the actual experience.  For your information one of their direct competitors, Target, I have done curbside picked numerous times in the last 6 months. They make curbside pick-up extremely convenient, the staff are pleasant, highly responsive, and arrive at the car almost as soon as you get there (highly organized and efficient). Orders are completed in full almost 100% of the time and when they canâ€™t, for whatever reason, they are prompt with their action, communication, and refund to remediate. That was not the experience with Walmart.

Name: customer
Comment: At the Boerne Texas store i always have a good experience. During COVID I started shopping here as HEB was a mess. They are always friendly, have lots of room in the store and have everything I need. Thanks Boerne Walmart, you are doing great work!

Name: margaret jane dalzell
Comment: The policy is now no return or exchange on clothing or footwear , ridiculous new. policy

Name: Pat Hamer
